GE07mbh_08_u:001.000-0001_02: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_08_u:001.001a: tato droṇe hate rājan duryodhanamukhā nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:001.005a: te veśmasv api kauravya pṛthvīśā nāpnuvan sukham
GE07mbh_08_u:001.007a: yat tad dyūtaparikliṣṭāṃ kṛṣṇām āninyire sabhām
GE07mbh_08_u:001.008a: cintayantaś ca pārthānāṃ tān kleśān dyūtakāritān
GE07mbh_08_u:001.009a: tataḥ prabhāte vimale sthitā diṣṭasya śāsane
GE07mbh_08_u:001.010c: yogam ājñāpayām āsur yuddhāya ca viniryayuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:001.012a: niṣkair gobhir hiraṇyena vāsobhiś ca mahādhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:001.016a: tataḥ śatrukṣayaṃ kṛtvā sumahāntaṃ raṇe vṛṣaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:001.017a: tatas tat saṃjayaḥ sarvaṃ gatvā nāgāhvayaṃ puram
GE07mbh_08_u:001.018a: āpageyaṃ hataṃ śrutvā droṇaṃ ca samare paraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:001.018c: yo jagāma parām ārtiṃ vṛddho rājāmbikāsutaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:001.020a: yasmiñ jayāśāṃ putrāṇām amanyata sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:001.020c: tasmin hate sa kauravyaḥ kathaṃ prāṇān adhārayat
GE07mbh_08_u:001.021a: durmaraṃ bata manye 'haṃ nṛṇāṃ kṛcchre 'pi vartatām
GE07mbh_08_u:001.021c: yatra karṇaṃ hataṃ śrutvā nātyajaj jīvitaṃ nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:001.022a: tathā śāṃtanavaṃ vṛddhaṃ brahman bāhlikam eva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:001.022c: droṇaṃ ca somadattaṃ ca bhūriśravasam eva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:001.023a: tathaiva cānyān suhṛdaḥ putrapautrāṃś ca pātitān
GE07mbh_08_u:001.023c: śrutvā yan nājahāt prāṇāṃs tan manye duṣkaraṃ dvija
GE07mbh_08_u:001.024a: etan me sarvam ācakṣva vistareṇa tapodhana
GE07mbh_08_u:001.024c: na hi tṛpyāmi pūrveṣāṃ śṛṇvānaś caritaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_08_u:001.025a: hate karṇe mahārāja niśi gāvalgaṇis tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:001.025c: dīno yayau nāgapuram aśvair vātasamair jave
GE07mbh_08_u:001.027c: vavande prāñjalir bhūtvā mūrdhnā pādau nṛpasya ha
GE07mbh_08_u:001.028c: hā kaṣṭam iti coktvā sa tato vacanam ādade
GE07mbh_08_u:001.029a: saṃjayo 'haṃ kṣitipate kaccid āste sukhaṃ bhavān
GE07mbh_08_u:001.030c: agṛhītāny anusmṛtya kaccin na kuruṣe vyathām
GE07mbh_08_u:001.031c: nagṛhītam anusmṛtya kaccin na kuruṣe vyathām
GE07mbh_08_u:001.032c: nihatān yudhi saṃsmṛtya kaccin na kuruṣe vyathām
GE07mbh_08_u:001.034c: droṇe ca parameṣvāse bhṛśaṃ me vyathitaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:001.035a: yo rathānāṃ sahasrāṇi daṃśitānāṃ daśaiva hi
GE07mbh_08_u:001.037c: sākṣād rāmeṇa yo bālye dhanurveda upākṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:001.039a: taṃ droṇaṃ nihataṃ śrutvā dhṛṣṭadyumnena saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:001.039c: satyasaṃdhaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ bhṛśaṃ me vyathitaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:001.039d-0003_01: yayor loke pumān astre na samo 'sti caturvidhe
GE07mbh_08_u:001.039d-0003_02: tau droṇabhīṣmau śrutvā tu hatau me vyathitaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:001.040a: trailokye yasya śāstreṣu na pumān vidyate samaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:001.040c: taṃ droṇaṃ nihataṃ śrutvā kim akurvata māmakāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:001.044c: madrarājasya śalyasya drauṇeś caiva kṛpasya ca
GE07mbh_08_u:001.046a: etat sarvaṃ yathā vṛttaṃ tattvaṃ gāvalgaṇe raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:001.047a: pāṇḍaveyair hi yad vṛttaṃ kauraveyeṣu māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:001.047c: tac chrutvā mā vyathāṃ kārṣīd iṣṭe na vyathate manaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:001.048a: yasmād abhāvī bhāvī vā bhaved artho naraṃ prati
GE07mbh_08_u:001.048c: aprāptau tasya vā prāptau na kaś cid vyathate budhaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:001.049a: na vyathā śṛṇvataḥ kā cid vidyate mama saṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:001.049c: diṣṭam etat purā manye kathayasva yathecchakam
GE07mbh_08_u:002.001a: hate droṇe maheṣvāse tava putrā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:002.002a: avāṅmukhāḥ śastrabhṛtaḥ sarva eva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:002.003a: tān dṛṣṭvā vyathitākārān sainyāni tava bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:002.004a: śastrāṇy eṣāṃ ca rājendra śoṇitāktāny aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:002.006a: tathārtaṃ stimitaṃ dṛṣṭvā gatasattvam iva sthitam
GE07mbh_08_u:002.006c: svaṃ balaṃ tan mahārāja rājā duryodhano 'bravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:002.007a: bhavatāṃ bāhuvīryaṃ hi samāśritya mayā yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:002.008a: tad idaṃ nihate droṇe viṣaṇṇam iva lakṣyate
GE07mbh_08_u:002.008c: yudhyamānāś ca samare yodhā vadhyanti sarvataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:002.009a: jayo vāpi vadho vāpi yudhyamānasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:002.009c: bhavet kim atra citraṃ vai yudhyadhvaṃ sarvatomukhāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:002.010a: paśyadhvaṃ ca mahātmānaṃ karṇaṃ vaikartanaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:002.011a: yasya vai yudhi saṃtrāsāt kuntīputro dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:002.013a: yena divyāstravic chūro māyāvī sa ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:002.013c: amoghayā raṇe śaktyā nihato bhairavaṃ nadan
GE07mbh_08_u:002.014c: bāhvor draviṇam akṣayyam adya drakṣyatha saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:002.016a: sarva eva bhavantaś ca śūrāḥ prājñāḥ kulodgatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:002.016b-0005_01: pāṇḍuputrān raṇe hantuṃ sasainyān kim u saṃhatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:002.017a: evam ukte mahārāja karṇo vaikartano nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:002.018a: sa sṛñjayānāṃ sarveṣāṃ pāñcālānāṃ ca paśyatām
GE07mbh_08_u:002.019c: agre puṅkhe ca saṃsaktā yathā bhramarapaṅktayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:002.020a: sa pīḍayitvā pāñcālān pāṇḍavāṃś ca tarasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:002.020d-0007_07: upasthāya ca rājānaṃ viniḥśvasya ca sūtajaḥ saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:002.020d-0007_10: hato vaikartanaḥ karṇaḥ kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_08_u:002.020d-0007_12: kṛtvāsau kadanaṃ śete vātanunna iva drumaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:002.020d-0007_14: vyālena nihato yadvat tathāsau nihataḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:002.020d-0007_15: nirāśān pāṇḍavān kṛtvā jaye rājan sasātyakān
GE07mbh_08_u:002.020d-0007_17: hatvā śūrān maheṣvāsān vidrāvya ca diśo daśa
GE07mbh_08_u:002.020d-0007_22: pṛthivyā dāraṇaṃ yādṛk tādṛk karṇasya pātanam
GE07mbh_08_u:002.020d-0007_23: yodhāś ca bahavo rājan hatās tatra jayaiṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:002.020d-0007_25: rathaughāś ca naraughāś ca hatā rājan sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:002.020d-0007_26: vāraṇā nihatās tatra vājinaś ca mahāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:002.020d-0007_27: kṣatriyāś ca mahārāja senayor ubhayor hatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:002.020d-0007_31: jayāśā dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ vairasya ca mukhaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_08_u:002.020d-0007_32: tīrṇaṃ tat pāṇḍavai rājan yat purā nāvabudhyase
GE07mbh_08_u:002.020d-0007_34: tad idaṃ samanuprāptaṃ vyasanaṃ tvāṃ mahābhayam
GE07mbh_08_u:002.020d-0007_36: caritāny ahitāny eva teṣāṃ te phalam āgatam
GE07mbh_08_u:002.020d-0007_37: hato duḥśāsano rājan yathoktaṃ pāṇḍavena tu
GE07mbh_08_u:002.020d-0007_39: pītaṃ ca kṣatajaṃ tasya dhārtarāṣṭrasya sayuge
GE07mbh_08_u:003.001c: śokasyāntam apaśyan vai hataṃ matvā suyodhanam
GE07mbh_08_u:003.001e: vihvalaḥ patito bhūmau naṣṭacetā iva dvipaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:003.003a: sa śabdaḥ pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ pūrayām āsa sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:003.004c: niḥsaṃjñā patitā bhūmau sarvāṇy antaḥpurāṇi ca
GE07mbh_08_u:003.005a: tatas tāḥ saṃjayo rājan samāśvāsayad āturāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:003.006a: samāśvastāḥ striyas tās tu vepamānā muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:003.007c: āśvāsayām āsa tadā siñcaṃs toyena kauravam
GE07mbh_08_u:003.008a: sa labdhvā śanakaiḥ saṃjñāṃ tāś ca dṛṣṭvā striyo nṛpa
GE07mbh_08_u:003.008c: unmatta iva rājā sa sthitas tūṣṇīṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:003.009a: tato dhyātvā ciraṃ kālaṃ niḥśvasaṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:003.009c: svān putrān garhayām āsa bahu mene ca pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_08_u:003.010c: dhyātvā ca suciraṃ kālaṃ vepamāno muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:003.011a: saṃstabhya ca mano bhūyo rājā dhairyasamanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:003.012a: yat tvayā kathitaṃ vākyaṃ śrutaṃ saṃjaya tan mayā
GE07mbh_08_u:003.012c: kaccid duryodhanaḥ sūta na gato vai yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_08_u:003.012d-0010_01: jaye nirāśaḥ putro me satataṃ jayakāmukaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:003.012e: brūhi saṃjaya tattvena punar uktāṃ kathām imām
GE07mbh_08_u:003.013c: hato vaikartano rājan saha putrair mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:003.014c: pītaṃ ca rudhiraṃ kopād bhīmasenena saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:003.014d-0012_03: vyākulaṃ me manas tāta mā tāvat kiṃ cid ucyatām
GE07mbh_08_u:003.014d-0012_04: rājāpi nābravīt kiṃ cit saṃjayo viduras tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:003.014d-0012_05: tūṣṇīṃ bhūtas tathā so 'tha babhūva jagatīpatiḥ 08,004.000*0013_00
GE07mbh_08_u:004.000-0013_01: śrutvā karṇaṃ hataṃ yuddhe putrāṃś caiva palāyinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.000-0013_04: kāle yad uktavāṃs tasmiṃs tan mamācakṣva tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.002c: hataṃ vaikartanaṃ śrutvā śoko marmāṇi kṛntati
GE07mbh_08_u:004.003c: kurūṇāṃ sṛñjayānāṃ ca ke nu jīvanti ke mṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.003d-0014_01: etan me sarvam ācakṣva kuśalo hy asi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:004.005c: nihatya yudhi durdharṣaḥ paścād rukmaratho hataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.006c: ardhaṃ nihatya sainyasya karṇo vaikartano hataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.008a: atha putro vikarṇas te kṣatravratam anusmaran
GE07mbh_08_u:004.011c: vaśe tiṣṭhanti vīrasya yaḥ sthitas tava śāsane
GE07mbh_08_u:004.012a: akṣauhiṇīr daśaikāṃ ca nirjitya niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.017c: hato bhūriśravā rājañ śūraḥ sātyakinā yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:004.019a: tava putraḥ sadā saṃkhye kṛtāstro yuddhadurmadaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.024a: samaḥ karṇasya samare yaḥ sa karṇasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.025a: abhimanyor vadhaṃ smṛtvā pratijñām api cātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.026c: viśrāvya vairaṃ pārthena śrutāyuḥ sa nipātitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.027c: hato rukmaratho rājan bhrātā mātulajo yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:004.028a: rājā bhagīratho vṛddho bṛhatkṣatraś ca kekayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.030a: pitāmahas tava tathā bāhlikaḥ saha bāhlikaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.032a: putras te durmukho rājan duḥsahaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.036c: śūrasenāś ca vikrāntāḥ sarve yudhi nipātitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.038e: te sarve pārtham āsādya gatā vaivasvatakṣayam
GE07mbh_08_u:004.041a: oghavāṃś ca mahārāja bṛhantaḥ sahito raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:004.042a: tathaiva rathināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kṣemadhūrtir viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:004.043c: sumahat kadanaṃ kṛtvā hataḥ sātyakinā raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:004.044d-0018_01: vikrāntā balavantaś ca bhrātaraḥ saha bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:004.045a: rādheyāḥ sūtaputrāś ca bhrātaraś ca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.046c: yaudheyāś ca lalitthāś ca kṣudrakāś cāpy uśīnarāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.047c: prācyodīcyāḥ pratīcyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:004.048a: pattīnāṃ nihatāḥ saṃghā hayānām ayutāni ca
GE07mbh_08_u:004.048c: rathavrajāś ca nihatā hatāś ca varavāraṇāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.049c: kālena mahatā yattāḥ kule ye ca vivardhitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.051a: ete cānye ca bahavo rājānaḥ sagaṇā raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:004.051c: hatāḥ sahasraśo rājan yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_08_u:004.052a: mahendreṇa yathā vṛtro yathā rāmeṇa rāvaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.052e: kārtavīryaś ca rāmeṇa bhārgaveṇa hato yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:004.053d-0021_01: yathā skandena mahiṣo yathā rudreṇa cāndhakaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.055a: jayāśā dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ vairasya ca mukhaṃ yataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.055c: tīrṇaṃ tat pāṇḍavai rājan yat purā nāvabudhyase
GE07mbh_08_u:004.056b-0022_01: na kṛtaṃ ca tvayā pūrvaṃ daivena vidhinā balāt
GE07mbh_08_u:004.056c: tad idaṃ samanuprāptaṃ vyasanaṃ tvāṃ mahātyayam
GE07mbh_08_u:004.057c: ahitānīva cīrṇāni teṣāṃ te phalam āgatam
GE07mbh_08_u:004.058a: ākhyātā māmakās tāta nihatā yudhi pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.059d-0023_01: naraś cāśvāḥ sanāgāś ca rathāś ca śataśo narāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.059d-0024_01: nārāyaṇā ballavāś ca rāmāś ca śataśo 'pare
GE07mbh_08_u:004.059d-0024_02: anuraktāś ca vijaye bhīṣmeṇa nihatā raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:004.060a: samaḥ kirīṭinā saṃkhye vīryeṇa ca balena ca
GE07mbh_08_u:004.060d-0025_01: pāñcālāś ca maheṣvāsāḥ prāyo rājann amarṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.062a: yo bāla eva samare saṃmitaḥ savyasācinā
GE07mbh_08_u:004.063a: sa eṣa kadanaṃ kṛtvā mahad raṇaviśāradaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.064a: taṃ kṛtaṃ virathaṃ vīraṃ kṣatradharme vyavasthitam
GE07mbh_08_u:004.067d-0027_01: sāmudraś citrasenaś ca saha putreṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:004.067d-0027_03: anūpavāsī nīlaś ca vyāghradattaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_08_u:004.068a: citrāyudhaś citrayodhī kṛtvā tau kadanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_08_u:004.071c: droṇena yugapad rājan divaṃ saṃpreṣitau śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.072a: nṛpāś ca pratiyudhyantaḥ parākrāntā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:004.074a: abhibhūḥ kāśirājaś ca kāśikair bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.075b-0030_01: lakṣmaṇena hatau rājaṃs tava pautreṇa māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:004.075c: nihatya śataśaḥ śūrān parair vinihatau raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:004.076a: kṣatradharmā ca pāñcālyaḥ kṣatravarmā ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:004.077c: lakṣmaṇena hato rājaṃs tava pautreṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:004.079b-0032_01: purujit paramo rājā kṛtvā kadanam āhave
GE07mbh_08_u:004.081a: tathā satyadhṛtis tāta kṛtvā kadanam āhave
GE07mbh_08_u:004.082c: nihatya śātravān saṃkhye droṇena nihato yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:004.082d-0035_01: virāṭaputraḥ śaṅkhaś ca uttaraś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.083a: tathā satyadhṛtir vīro madirāśvaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_08_u:004.086d-0038_02: aśvatthāmnā hatas tatra gamito vai yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_08_u:004.087a: ete cānye ca bahavaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.087c: hatā droṇena vikramya yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_08_u:004.088c: ahatāñ śaṃsa me sūta ye 'tra jīvanti ke cana
GE07mbh_08_u:004.089a: eteṣu nihateṣv adya ye tvayā parikīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.089c: ahatān manyase yāṃs tvaṃ te 'pi svargajito matāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.090a: yasmin mahāstrāṇi samarpitāni; citrāṇi śubhrāṇi caturvidhāni
GE07mbh_08_u:004.090c: divyāni rājan nihitāni caiva; droṇena vīradvijasattamena
GE07mbh_08_u:004.091a: mahārathaḥ kṛtimān kṣiprahasto; dṛḍhāyudho dṛḍhamuṣṭir dṛḍheṣuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.091c: sa vīryavān droṇaputras tarasvī; vyavasthito yoddhukāmas tvadarthe
GE07mbh_08_u:004.092c: svayaṃ bhojaḥ kṛtavarmā kṛtāstro; vyavasthito yoddhukāmas tvadarthe
GE07mbh_08_u:004.093a: śāradvato gautamaś cāpi rājan; mahābalo bahucitrāstrayodhī
GE07mbh_08_u:004.093c: dhanuś citraṃ sumahad bhārasāhaṃ; vyavasthito yotsyamānaḥ pragṛhya
GE07mbh_08_u:004.094a: ārtāyaniḥ samare duṣprakampyaḥ; senāgraṇīḥ prathamas tāvakānām
GE07mbh_08_u:004.094c: svasreyāṃs tān pāṇḍaveyān visṛjya; satyāṃ vācaṃ tāṃ cikīrṣus tarasvī
GE07mbh_08_u:004.095c: durādharṣaḥ śakrasamānavīryaḥ; śalyaḥ sthito yoddhukāmas tvadarthe
GE07mbh_08_u:004.096c: gāndhārarājaḥ svabalena yukto; vyavasthito yoddhukāmas tvadarthe
GE07mbh_08_u:004.097a: tathā sutas te jvalanārkavarṇaṃ; rathaṃ samāsthāya kurupravīra
GE07mbh_08_u:004.097c: vyavasthitaḥ kurumitro narendra; vyabhre sūryo bhrājamāno yathā vai
GE07mbh_08_u:004.098a: duryodhano nāgakulasya madhye; mahāvīryaḥ saha sainyapravīraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.099c: padmaprabho vahnir ivālpadhūmo; meghāntare sūrya iva prakāśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.100a: tathā suṣeṇo 'py asicarmapāṇis; tavātmajaḥ satyasenaś ca vīraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.100c: vyavasthitau citrasenena sārdhaṃ; hṛṣṭātmānau samare yoddhukāmau
GE07mbh_08_u:004.101a: hrīniṣedhā bharatā rājaputrāś; citrāyudhaḥ śrutakarmā jayaś ca
GE07mbh_08_u:004.101c: śalaś ca satyavrataduḥśalau ca; vyavasthitā balino yoddhukāmāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.102a: kaitavyānām adhipaḥ śūramānī; raṇe raṇe śatruhā rājaputraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.102c: patrī hayī nāgarathaprayāyī; vyavasthito yoddhukāmas tvadarthe
GE07mbh_08_u:004.103a: vīraḥ śrutāyuś ca śrutāyudhaś ca; citrāṅgadaś citravarmā sa vīraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.103c: vyavasthitā ye tu sainye narāgryāḥ; prahāriṇo māninaḥ satyasaṃdhāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.104a: karṇātmajaḥ satyaseno mahātmā; vyavasthitaḥ samare yoddhukāmaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.104c: athāparau karṇasutau varārhau; vyavasthitau laghuhastau narendra
GE07mbh_08_u:004.104e: balaṃ mahad durbhidam alpadhairyaiḥ; samāśritau yotsyamānau tvadarthe
GE07mbh_08_u:004.105a: etaiś ca mukhyair aparaiś ca rājan; yodhapravīrair amitaprabhāvaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:004.105c: vyavasthito nāgakulasya madhye; yathā mahendraḥ kururājo jayāya
GE07mbh_08_u:004.108c: vyākulaṃ me manas tāta śrutvā sumahad apriyam
GE07mbh_08_u:004.108d-0042_01: mano muhyati cāṅgāni na ca śaknomi dhāritum
GE07mbh_08_u:005.001a: śrutvā karṇaṃ hataṃ yuddhe putrāṃś caivāpalāyinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.001c: narendraḥ kiṃ cid āśvasto dvijaśreṣṭha kim abravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:005.002c: tasmin yad uktavān kāle tan mamācakṣva pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.005a: divaḥ prapatanaṃ bhānor urvyām iva mahādyuteḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.007c: nedam astīti saṃcintya karṇasya nidhanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_08_u:005.008a: prāṇinām etad ātmatvāt syād apīti vināśanam
GE07mbh_08_u:005.009a: vidhvastātmā śvasan dīno hā hety uktvā suduḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.009d-0043_01: uvāca ca punar vākyaṃ saṃśayaṃ bhṛśavihvalaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.011a: vṛṣabho vṛṣabhasyeva yo yuddhe na nivartate
GE07mbh_08_u:005.014a: sa kathaṃ rathināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ karṇaḥ pārthena saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:005.015a: yo nāmanyata vai nityam acyutaṃ na dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_08_u:005.015c: na vṛṣṇīn api tān anyān svabāhubalam āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.016c: ahaṃ divyād rathād ekaḥ pātayiṣyāmi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:005.017a: iti yaḥ satataṃ mandam avocal lobhamohitam
GE07mbh_08_u:005.018a: yaś cājaiṣīd atibalān amitrān api durjayān
GE07mbh_08_u:005.018c: gāndhārān madrakān matsyāṃs trigartāṃs taṅgaṇāñ śakān
GE07mbh_08_u:005.019a: pāñcālāṃś ca videhāṃś ca kuṇindān kāśikosalān
GE07mbh_08_u:005.019c: suhmān aṅgāṃś ca puṇḍrāṃś ca niṣādān vaṅgakīcakān
GE07mbh_08_u:005.020a: vatsān kaliṅgāṃs taralān aśmakān ṛṣikāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:005.020c: yo jitvā samare vīraś cakre balibhṛtaḥ purā
GE07mbh_08_u:005.020d-0044_01: śabarān parahūṇāṃś ca prāṅmukhān saralān api
GE07mbh_08_u:005.020d-0044_04: karam āhārayām āsa jitvā sarvān arīṃs tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:005.020d-0045_02: duryodhanasya vṛddhyarthaṃ vartate yo jayāya ca
GE07mbh_08_u:005.020d-0045_03: senāgopaś ca sa kathaṃ śatrubhiḥ paramāstravit
GE07mbh_08_u:005.020d-0045_05: vṛṣo mahendro deveṣu vṛṣaḥ karṇo nareṣv api
GE07mbh_08_u:005.021c: varo mahendro devānāṃ karṇaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.023a: taṃ śrutvā nihataṃ karṇaṃ dvairathe savyasācinā
GE07mbh_08_u:005.023b-0048_02: nṛvṛṣaṃ nihataṃ śrutvā dvairathe rathināṃ varam
GE07mbh_08_u:005.024a: īdṛśair yady ahaṃ duḥkhair na vinaśyāmi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:005.024c: vajrād dṛḍhataraṃ manye hṛdayaṃ mama durbhidam
GE07mbh_08_u:005.025c: ko mad anyaḥ pumāṃl loke na jahyāt sūta jīvitam
GE07mbh_08_u:005.026a: viṣam agniṃ prapātaṃ vā parvatāgrād ahaṃ vṛṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:005.026c: na hi śakṣyāmi duḥkhāni soḍhuṃ kaṣṭāni saṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:005.026d-0050_01: cintayann eva sīdāmi mano me 'tīva muhyati
GE07mbh_08_u:005.027a: śriyā kulena yaśasā tapasā ca śrutena ca
GE07mbh_08_u:005.027c: tvām adya santo manyante yayātim iva nāhuṣam
GE07mbh_08_u:005.029a: daivam eva paraṃ manye dhik pauruṣam anarthakam
GE07mbh_08_u:005.031c: sa kathaṃ nihataḥ śete vātarugṇa iva drumaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.032c: cintā me vardhate tīvrā mumūrṣā cāpi jāyate
GE07mbh_08_u:005.033a: karṇasya nidhanaṃ śrutvā vijayaṃ phalgunasya ca
GE07mbh_08_u:005.033c: aśraddheyam ahaṃ manye vadhaṃ karṇasya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:005.034c: yac chrutvā puruṣavyāghraṃ hataṃ karṇaṃ na dīryate
GE07mbh_08_u:005.035a: āyur nūnaṃ sudīrghaṃ me vihitaṃ daivataiḥ purā
GE07mbh_08_u:005.035c: yatra karṇaṃ hataṃ śrutvā jīvāmīha suduḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.036a: dhig jīvitam idaṃ me 'dya suhṛd dhīnasya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:005.036c: adya cāhaṃ daśām etāṃ gataḥ saṃjaya garhitām
GE07mbh_08_u:005.037a: aham eva purā bhūtvā sarvalokasya satkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.037c: paribhūtaḥ kathaṃ sūta punaḥ śakṣyāmi jīvitum
GE07mbh_08_u:005.037e: duḥkhāt suduḥkhaṃ vyasanaṃ prāptavān asmi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:005.038a: tasmād bhīṣmavadhe caiva droṇasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.038c: nātra śeṣaṃ prapaśyāmi sūtaputre hate yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:005.039a: sa hi pāraṃ mahān āsīt putrāṇāṃ mama saṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:005.039c: yuddhe vinihataḥ śūro visṛjan sāyakān bahūn
GE07mbh_08_u:005.040a: ko hi me jīvitenārthas tam ṛte puruṣarṣabham
GE07mbh_08_u:005.042a: yad balaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ yato bhayam
GE07mbh_08_u:005.043a: sa hi vīro maheṣvāsaḥ putrāṇām abhayaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.043c: śete vinihato vīraḥ śakreṇeva yathā balaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.045a: anyathā cintitaṃ kāryam anyathā tat tu jāyate
GE07mbh_08_u:005.045c: aho nu balavad daivaṃ kālaś ca duratikramaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.046c: kaccin na nihataḥ sūta putro duḥśāsano mama
GE07mbh_08_u:005.047a: kaccin na nīcācaritaṃ kṛtavāṃs tāta saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:005.047b-0051_01: putro duryodhanaḥ saṃkhye nihato mama saṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:005.047c: kaccin na nihataḥ śūro yathā na kṣatriyā hatāḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:005.047d-0052_01: ity evaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭro 'tha vilapya bahu duḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.047d-0053_02: gāndhārāṃś ca videhāṃś ca jitvā kāryārtham āhave
GE07mbh_08_u:005.048a: yudhiṣṭhirasya vacanaṃ mā yuddham iti sarvadā
GE07mbh_08_u:005.050a: jalasya dhārāṃ vihitāṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ pāṇḍavena ha
GE07mbh_08_u:005.050c: abravīt sa mahābāhus tāta saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.051a: praśamād dhi bhavec chāntir madantaṃ yuddham astu ca
GE07mbh_08_u:005.052a: akurvan vacanaṃ tasya nūnaṃ śocati me sutaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.053a: ahaṃ tu nihatāmātyo hataputraś ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:005.053c: dyūtataḥ kṛcchram āpanno lūnapakṣa iva dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.054a: yathā hi śakuniṃ gṛhya chittvā pakṣau ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:005.055c: tathāham api saṃprāpto lūnapakṣa iva dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.056c: kāṃ diśaṃ pratipatsyāmi dīnaḥ śatruvaśaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.057c: sa jitaḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ śūraiḥ samarthair vīryaśālibhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.058a: tasmin hate maheṣvāse karṇe yudhi kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_08_u:005.058c: ke vīrāḥ paryavartanta tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:005.059a: kaccin naikaḥ parityaktaḥ pāṇḍavair nihato raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:005.059c: uktaṃ tvayā purā vīra yathā vīrā nipātitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.061b-0054_01: dharmarājavacaḥ śrutvā aśvatthāmā hatas tv iti
GE07mbh_08_u:005.062a: antareṇa hatāv etau chalena ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.062c: aśrauṣam aham etad vai bhīṣmadroṇau nipātitau
GE07mbh_08_u:005.063a: bhīṣmadroṇau hi samare na hanyād vajrabhṛt svayam
GE07mbh_08_u:005.063c: nyāyena yudhyamānau hi tad vai satyaṃ bravīmi te
GE07mbh_08_u:005.064a: karṇaṃ tv asyantam astrāṇi divyāni ca bahūni ca
GE07mbh_08_u:005.064c: katham indropamaṃ vīraṃ mṛtyur yuddhe samaspṛśat
GE07mbh_08_u:005.068a: yaś ca droṇamukhān dṛṣṭvā vimukhān arditāñ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.072a: etāni divasāny asya yuddhe bhīto dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.072c: nāgamad dvairathaṃ vīraḥ sa kathaṃ nihato raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:005.072d-0056_01: etān hatvā haniṣyāmi paścād vaikartanaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:005.072d-0056_02: iti vyapadiśan pārtho varjayan sūtajaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:005.072d-0056_03: sa kathaṃ nihato vīraḥ pārthena paramāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:005.073a: rathasaṅgo na cet tasya dhanur vā na vyaśīryata
GE07mbh_08_u:005.073c: na ced astrāṇi nirṇeśuḥ sa kathaṃ nihataḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.074a: ko hi śakto raṇe karṇaṃ vidhunvānaṃ mahad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.074c: vimuñcantaṃ śarān ghorān divyāny astrāṇi cāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:005.075a: dhruvaṃ tasya dhanuś chinnaṃ ratho vāpi gato mahīm
GE07mbh_08_u:005.075c: astrāṇi vā pranaṣṭāni yathā śaṃsasi me hatam
GE07mbh_08_u:005.075e: na hy anyad anupaśyāmi kāraṇaṃ tasya nāśane
GE07mbh_08_u:005.076a: na hanyām arjunaṃ yāvat tāvat pādau na dhāvaye
GE07mbh_08_u:005.076c: iti yasya mahāghoraṃ vratam āsīn mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.077a: yasya bhīto vane nityaṃ dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.077c: trayodaśa samā nidrāṃ na lebhe puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.078c: mama putraḥ sabhāṃ bhāryāṃ pāṇḍūnāṃ nītavān balāt
GE07mbh_08_u:005.079a: tatra cāpi sabhāmadhye pāṇḍavānāṃ ca paśyatām
GE07mbh_08_u:005.079d-0057_01: na santi patayaḥ kṛṣṇe sarve ṣaṇḍhatilaiḥ samāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.079d-0057_03: ity evaṃ yaḥ purā vāco rūkṣāḥ saṃśrāvayan ruṣā
GE07mbh_08_u:005.079d-0057_04: sabhāyāṃ sūtajaḥ kṛṣṇāṃ sa kathaṃ nihataḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.079d-0057_05: yadi bhīṣmo raṇaślāghī droṇo vā yudhi durmadaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.079d-0057_07: sarvān eva haniṣyāmi vyetu te mānaso jvaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.079d-0057_08: kiṃ kariṣyati gāṇḍīvam akṣayyau ca maheṣudhī
GE07mbh_08_u:005.079d-0057_10: sa nūnam ṛṣabhaskandho hy arjunena kathaṃ hataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.080a: yaś ca gāṇḍīvamuktānāṃ sparśam ugram acintayan
GE07mbh_08_u:005.080c: apatir hy asi kṛṣṇeti bruvan pārthān avaikṣata
GE07mbh_08_u:005.081a: yasya nāsīd bhayaṃ pārthaiḥ saputraiḥ sajanārdanaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.082a: tasya nāhaṃ vadhaṃ manye devair api savāsavaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.082c: pratīpam upadhāvadbhiḥ kiṃ punas tāta pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.083a: na hi jyāṃ spṛśamānasya talatre cāpi gṛhṇataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.083c: pumān ādhiratheḥ kaś cit pramukhe sthātum arhati
GE07mbh_08_u:005.085a: yadi mandaḥ sahāyena bhrātrā duḥśāsanena ca
GE07mbh_08_u:005.086a: sa nūnam ṛṣabhaskandhaṃ dṛṣṭvā karṇaṃ nipātitam
GE07mbh_08_u:005.086c: duḥśāsanaṃ ca nihataṃ manye śocati putrakaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.087c: jayataḥ pāṇḍavān dṛṣṭvā kiṃ svid duryodhano 'bravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:005.088a: durmarṣaṇaṃ hataṃ śrutvā vṛṣasenaṃ ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:005.088c: prabhagnaṃ ca balaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadhyamānaṃ mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.089c: vidrutān rathino dṛṣṭvā manye śocati putrakaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.090c: hatotsāhaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā kiṃ svid duryodhano 'bravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:005.090d-0059_01: svayaṃ vairaṃ mahat kṛtvā vāryamāṇaḥ suhṛdgaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.092c: karṇo 'rjunaṃ raṇe hantā hate tasmin kim abravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:005.093a: dyūtaṃ kṛtvā purā hṛṣṭo vañcayitvā ca pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_08_u:005.093c: śakuniḥ saubalas tāta hate karṇe kim abravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:005.094c: karṇaṃ vinihataṃ dṛṣṭvā hārdikyaḥ kim abhāṣata
GE07mbh_08_u:005.095a: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā yasya śikṣām upāsate
GE07mbh_08_u:005.096c: aśvatthāmā hate karṇe kim abhāṣata saṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:005.097c: kṛpaḥ śāradvatas tāta hate karṇe kim abravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:005.098c: diṣṭaṃ tena hi tat sarvaṃ yathā karṇo nipātitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.098d-0060_01: kim abhāṣata sauvīro madrāṇām adhipo balī
GE07mbh_08_u:005.099a: ye ca ke cana rājānaḥ pṛthivyāṃ yoddhum āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.099c: vaikartanaṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā kim abhāṣanta saṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:005.100a: karṇe tu nihate vīre rathavyāghre nararṣabhe
GE07mbh_08_u:005.100c: kiṃ vo mukham anīkānām āsīt saṃjaya bhāgaśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.101a: madrarājaḥ kathaṃ śalyo niyukto rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.102c: vāmaṃ cakraṃ rarakṣur vā ke vā vīrasya pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.103a: ke karṇaṃ vājahuḥ śūrāḥ ke kṣudrāḥ prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_08_u:005.103c: kathaṃ ca vaḥ sametānāṃ hataḥ karṇo mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:005.104a: pāṇḍavāś ca kathaṃ śūrāḥ pratyudīyur mahāratham
GE07mbh_08_u:005.105a: sa ca sarpamukho divyo maheṣupravaras tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:005.105c: vyarthaḥ kathaṃ samabhavat tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:005.106c: avaśeṣaṃ na paśyāmi kakude mṛdite sati
GE07mbh_08_u:005.107a: tau hi vīrau maheṣvāsau madarthe kurusattamau
GE07mbh_08_u:005.107c: bhīṣmadroṇau hatau śrutvā ko nv artho jīvitena me
GE07mbh_08_u:005.108a: na mṛṣyāmi ca rādheyaṃ hatam āhavaśobhinam
GE07mbh_08_u:005.108c: yasya bāhvor balaṃ tulyaṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ śataṃ śatam
GE07mbh_08_u:005.109a: droṇe hate ca yad vṛttaṃ kauravāṇāṃ paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_08_u:005.110a: yathā ca karṇaḥ kaunteyaiḥ saha yuddham ayojayat
GE07mbh_08_u:005.110c: yathā ca dviṣatāṃ hantā raṇe śāntas tad ucyatām
GE07mbh_08_u:006.001a: hate droṇe maheṣvāse tasminn ahani bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:006.002c: vyūhya pārthaḥ svakaṃ sainyam atiṣṭhad bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_08_u:006.003a: tam avasthitam ājñāya putras te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_08_u:006.003c: dravac ca svabalaṃ dṛṣṭvā pauruṣeṇa nyavārayat
GE07mbh_08_u:006.004c: yuddhvā ca suciraṃ kālaṃ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:006.005a: labdhalakṣaiḥ parair hṛṣṭair vyāyacchadbhiś ciraṃ tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:006.005d-0062_01: niveśya ca balaṃ ghoraṃ kṣutpipāsābhayair yutam
GE07mbh_08_u:006.005d-0062_02: śrameṇa mahatā yuktaṃ tathā droṇavadhena ca
GE07mbh_08_u:006.005d-0062_03: dīnarūpā raṇe kṛtvā karma ghorāṃ ca śarvarīm
GE07mbh_08_u:006.005d-0062_04: niveśaṃ prāpya sā senā viśramya muditābhavat
GE07mbh_08_u:006.009a: matiṃ matimatāṃ śreṣṭhāḥ sarve prabrūta māciram
GE07mbh_08_u:006.009c: evaṃ gate tu yat kāryaṃ bhavet kāryakaraṃ nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.012a: rāgo yogas tathā dākṣyaṃ nayaś cety arthasādhakāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.013c: nītimantas tathā yuktā dakṣā raktāś ca te hatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.014a: na tv eva kāryaṃ nairāśyam asmābhir vijayaṃ prati
GE07mbh_08_u:006.014c: sunītair iha sarvārthair daivam apy anulomyate
GE07mbh_08_u:006.015a: te vayaṃ pravaraṃ nṝṇāṃ sarvair guṇagaṇair yutam
GE07mbh_08_u:006.015d-0065_01: eṣa hy atibalaḥ śūraḥ kṛtāstro yuddhadurmadaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.015d-0065_02: vaivasvata ivāsahyaḥ śakto jetuṃ raṇe ripūn
GE07mbh_08_u:006.015d-0068_01: āśāṃ bahumatīṃ cakre karṇaṃ prati sa vai tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:006.015d-0068_02: hate bhīṣme ca droṇe ca karṇo jeṣyati pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_08_u:006.015d-0068_03: tām āśāṃ hṛdaye kṛtvā samāśvasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:006.016a: tato duryodhanaḥ prītaḥ priyaṃ śrutvā vacas tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:006.018a: karṇa jānāmi te vīryaṃ sauhṛdaṃ ca paraṃ mayi
GE07mbh_08_u:006.018c: tathāpi tvāṃ mahābāho pravakṣyāmi hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.019a: śrutvā yatheṣṭaṃ ca kuru vīra yat tava rocate
GE07mbh_08_u:006.019c: bhavān prājñatamo nityaṃ mama caiva parā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.021a: vṛddhau ca tau maheṣvāsau sāpekṣau ca dhanaṃjaye
GE07mbh_08_u:006.021c: mānitau ca mayā vīrau rādheya vacanāt tava
GE07mbh_08_u:006.022c: rakṣitās tāta bhīṣmeṇa divasāni daśaiva ha
GE07mbh_08_u:006.023a: nyastaśastre ca bhavati hato bhīṣmaḥ pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.024c: tvayokte puruṣavyāghra droṇo hy āsīt puraḥsaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.025a: tenāpi rakṣitāḥ pārthāḥ śiṣyatvād iha saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:006.025c: sa cāpi nihato vṛddho dhṛṣṭadyumnena satvaram
GE07mbh_08_u:006.026c: tvatsamaṃ samare yodhaṃ nānyaṃ paśyāmi cintayan
GE07mbh_08_u:006.027a: bhavān eva tu naḥ śakto vijayāya na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.027c: pūrvaṃ madhye ca paścāc ca tavaiva viditaṃ hi tat
GE07mbh_08_u:006.028a: sa bhavān dhuryavat saṃkhye dhuram udvoḍhum arhasi
GE07mbh_08_u:006.029a: devatānāṃ yathā skandaḥ senānīḥ prabhur avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.029c: tathā bhavān imāṃ senāṃ dhārtarāṣṭrīṃ bibhartu me
GE07mbh_08_u:006.029e: jahi śatrugaṇān sarvān mahendra iva dānavān
GE07mbh_08_u:006.030a: avasthitaṃ raṇe jñātvā pāṇḍavās tvāṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_08_u:006.031a: bhavaty avasthite yat te pāṇḍavā gatacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.032a: yathā hy abhyuditaḥ sūryaḥ pratapan svena tejasā
GE07mbh_08_u:006.032c: vyapohati tamas tīvraṃ tathā śatrūn vyapoha naḥ saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:006.032d-0069_02: hate bhīṣme ca droṇe ca karṇo jeṣyati pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_08_u:006.032d-0069_03: tām āśāṃ hṛdaye kṛtvā karṇam evaṃ tadābravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:006.032d-0069_04: sūtaputra na te pārthaḥ sthitvāgre saṃyuyutsati saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:006.032d-0070_01: evam uktas tu rādheyo rājñā duryodhanena
GE07mbh_08_u:006.032d-0070_02: rājñāṃ madhye mahābāhuḥ prītātmā sa mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.032d-0070_03: harṣayann abravīt karṇo duryodhanam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.033a: uktam etan mayā pūrvaṃ gāndhāre tava saṃnidhau
GE07mbh_08_u:006.034c: sthiro bhava mahārāja jitān viddhi ca pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_08_u:006.034d-0071_03: na vā mad anyaḥ prahased raṇe 'rjunaṃ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.035a: evam ukto mahātejās tato duryodhano nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.035c: uttasthau rājabhiḥ sārdhaṃ devair iva śatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.038d-0072_01: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyās tathā śūdrāś ca saṃmatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.038d-0072_03: tato 'bhiṣikto rājendra niṣkair gobhir dhanena ca
GE07mbh_08_u:006.038d-0073_01: pūjayām āsa vastraiś ca viprān vedavidas tataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.038d-0074_05: jayety ūcur nṛpāḥ sarve rādheyaṃ tatra saṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.039a: jaya pārthān sagovindān sānugāṃs tvaṃ mahāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:006.039c: iti taṃ bandinaḥ prāhur dvijāś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_08_u:006.040a: jahi pārthān sapāñcālān rādheya vijayāya naḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.040c: udyann iva sadā bhānus tamāṃsy ugrair gabhastibhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.041a: na hy alaṃ tvad visṛṣṭānāṃ śarāṇāṃ te sakeśavāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.042a: na hi pārthāḥ sapāñcālāḥ sthātuṃ śaktās tavāgrataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:006.042c: āttaśastrasya samare mahendrasyeva dānavāḥ saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:006.042d-0075_02: karṇo duryodhanaṃ vākyam abravīt prahasan priyam
GE07mbh_08_u:006.046a: tava putrair vṛtaḥ karṇaḥ śuśubhe tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:006.046c: devair iva yathā skandaḥ saṃgrāme tārakāmaye
GE07mbh_08_u:007.001a: senāpatyaṃ tu saṃprāpya karṇo vaikartanas tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:007.001c: tathoktaś ca svayaṃ rājñā snigdhaṃ bhrātṛsamaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.002b-0076_01: hitaś ca priyakāmaś ca mama putrasya nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.002c: akarot kiṃ mahāprājñas tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:007.003a: karṇasya matam ājñāya putras te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_08_u:007.004a: mahaty apararātre tu tava putrasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:007.005c: saṃnahyatāṃ padātīnāṃ vājināṃ ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:007.006c: babhūva tumulaḥ śabdo divaspṛk sumahāṃs tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:007.011a: dṛṣṭvā karṇaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ rathasthaṃ rathināṃ varam
GE07mbh_08_u:007.012a: na bhīṣmavyasanaṃ ke cin nāpi droṇasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:007.013a: tatas tu tvarayan yodhāñ śaṅkhaśabdena māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:007.015a: makarasya tu tuṇḍe vai karṇo rājan vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.015c: netrābhyāṃ śakuniḥ śūra ulūkaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.016c: madhye duryodhano rājā balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.017a: vāme pāde tu rājendra kṛtavarmā vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.018a: pāde tu dakṣiṇe rājan gautamaḥ satyavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.018c: trigartaiś ca maheṣvāsair dākṣiṇātyaiś ca saṃvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.019a: anupādas tu yo vāmas tatra śalyo vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.020c: vṛto rathasahasraiś ca dantināṃ ca śatais tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:007.021a: pucche āstāṃ mahāvīrau bhrātarau pārthivau tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:007.021c: citrasenaś ca citraś ca mahatyā senayā vṛtau
GE07mbh_08_u:007.023c: karṇena nirmitāṃ vīra guptāṃ vīrair mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.024c: phalguśeṣā mahābāho tṛṇais tulyā matā mama
GE07mbh_08_u:007.025a: eko hy atra maheṣvāsaḥ sūtaputro vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.025e: carācarais tribhir lokair yo 'jayyo rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.026a: taṃ hatvādya mahābāho vijayas tava phalguna
GE07mbh_08_u:007.026c: uddhṛtaś ca bhavec chalyo mama dvādaśavārṣikaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.026e: evaṃ jñātvā mahābāho vyūhaṃ vyūha yathecchasi
GE07mbh_08_u:007.027a: bhrātus tad vacanaṃ śrutvā pāṇḍavaḥ śvetavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.029a: madhye vyūhasya sākṣāt tu pāṇḍavaḥ kṛṣṇasārathiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.029c: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca dharmarājaś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.031a: śeṣā nṛpatayo vīrāḥ sthitā vyūhasya daṃśitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.032a: evam etan mahāvyūhaṃ vyūhya bhārata pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.032c: tāvakāś ca maheṣvāsā yuddhāyaiva mano dadhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.033a: dṛṣṭvā vyūḍhāṃ tava camūṃ sūtaputreṇa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:007.033c: nihatān pāṇḍavān mene tava putraḥ sahānvayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.034a: tathaiva pāṇḍavīṃ senāṃ vyūḍhāṃ dṛṣṭvā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.034c: dhārtarāṣṭrān hatān mene sakarṇān vai janādhipa
GE07mbh_08_u:007.035a: tataḥ śaṅkhāś ca bheryaś ca paṇavānakagomukhāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.038a: na droṇavyasanaṃ kaś cij jānīte bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_08_u:007.038c: dṛṣṭvā karṇaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ mukhe vyūhasya daṃśitam
GE07mbh_08_u:007.039c: yoddhukāme sthite rājan hantum anyonyam añjasā
GE07mbh_08_u:007.041a: nṛtyamāne tu te sene sameyātāṃ parasparam
GE07mbh_08_u:007.041c: tayoḥ pakṣaiḥ prapakṣaiś ca nirjagmur vai yuyutsavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:007.042c: rathināṃ ca mahārāja anyonyaṃ nighnatāṃ dṛḍham
GE07mbh_08_u:008.002a: tato gajā rathāś cāśvāḥ pattayaś ca mahāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:008.006a: taiḥ sphuradbhir mahī bhāti raktāṅgulitalais tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:008.007c: vimānebhyo yathā kṣīṇe puṇye svargasadas tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:008.008a: gadābhir anyair gurvībhiḥ parighair musalair api
GE07mbh_08_u:008.008c: pothitāḥ śataśaḥ petur vīrā vīratarai raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:008.009a: rathā rathair vinihatā mattā mattair dvipair dvipāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:008.010a: rathā vararathair nāgair aśvārohāś ca pattibhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:008.010c: aśvārohaiḥ padātāś ca nihatā yudhi śerate
GE07mbh_08_u:008.011a: rathāśvapattayo nāgai rathair nāgāś ca pattayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:008.012c: pāṇipādaiś ca śastraiś ca rathaiś ca kadanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_08_u:008.013a: tathā tasmin bale śūrair vadhyamāne hate 'pi ca
GE07mbh_08_u:008.014c: sātyakiś cekitānaś ca draviḍaiḥ sainikaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_08_u:008.015a: bhṛtā vittena mahatā pāṇḍyāś cauḍrāḥ sakeralāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:008.019c: karūṣāḥ kosalāḥ kāśyā māgadhāś cāpi dudruvuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:008.020a: teṣāṃ rathāś ca nāgāś ca pravarāś cāpi pattayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:008.020c: nānāvidharavair hṛṣṭā nṛtyanti ca hasanti ca
GE07mbh_08_u:008.025a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā dviradaṃ dūrāt kṣemadhūrtir dvipasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:008.028c: pragṛhya caiva dhanuṣī jaghnatur vai parasparam
GE07mbh_08_u:008.029c: tau janān harṣayitvā ca siṃhanādān pracakratuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:008.032c: nirbibheda tu vegena ṣaḍbhiś cāpy aparair nadan
GE07mbh_08_u:008.035c: daśabhis tomaraṃ chittvā śaktyā vivyādha pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_08_u:008.036c: ripor abhyardayan nāgam unmadaḥ pāṇḍavaḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:008.040c: chittvā śarāsanaṃ śatror nāgam āmitram ārdayat
GE07mbh_08_u:008.042a: purā nāgasya patanād avaplutya sthito mahīm
GE07mbh_08_u:008.043b-0080_01: uddhṛtya khaḍgaṃ niśitam abhyadhāvat sa pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_08_u:008.044a: sa papāta hataḥ sāsir vyasuḥ svam abhito dvipam
GE07mbh_08_u:009.002a: tathaiva pāṇḍavā rājaṃs tava putrasya vāhinīm
GE07mbh_08_u:009.003a: karṇo rājan mahābāhur nyavadhīt pāṇḍavīṃ camūm
GE07mbh_08_u:009.004a: tatra bhārata karṇena nārācais tāḍitā gajāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:009.004c: neduḥ seduś ca mamluś ca babhramuś ca diśo daśa
GE07mbh_08_u:009.006a: bhīmasenas tathā drauṇiṃ kurvāṇaṃ karma duṣkaram
GE07mbh_08_u:009.010a: śrutakīrtis tathā śalyaṃ mādrīputraḥ sutaṃ tava
GE07mbh_08_u:009.011c: sātyakiḥ kekayau caiva chādayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:009.012a: tāv enaṃ bhrātarau vīraṃ jaghnatur hṛdaye bhṛśam
GE07mbh_08_u:009.015c: śaineyasya rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ chādayām āsatuḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:009.016a: tayos tu dhanuṣī citre chittvā śaurir mahāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:009.016c: atha tau sāyakais tīkṣṇaiś chādayām āsa duḥsahaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:009.017a: athānye dhanuṣī mṛṣṭe pragṛhya ca mahāśarān
GE07mbh_08_u:009.017c: sātyakiṃ pūrayantau tau ceratur laghu suṣṭhu ca
GE07mbh_08_u:009.019c: anyonyasya dhanuś caiva cicchidus te mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:009.019d-0081_01: sātvatasya dhanus tatra ubhau cicchidatū raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:009.020c: dhanur anyat samādāya sajyaṃ kṛtvā ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:009.020d-0082_01: anumṛjya ca rājendra tad dhanur bhārasādhanam
GE07mbh_08_u:009.022a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ śūraṃ bhrātā tasya mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:009.022c: sajyam anyad dhanuḥ kṛtvā śaineyaṃ pratyavārayat
GE07mbh_08_u:009.023a: sa śaktyā sātyakiṃ viddhvā svarṇapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:009.023c: nanāda balavan nādaṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:009.024a: sa sātyakiṃ punaḥ kruddhaḥ kekayānāṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:009.025c: rarāja samare rājan sapatra iva kiṃśukaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:009.026d-0083_01: tāv anyonyasya samare dhanuś chittvā mahārathau
GE07mbh_08_u:009.026d-0083_02: hatvā ca sārathī tūrṇaṃ hayāṃś ca rathināṃ varau
GE07mbh_08_u:009.027a: śatacandracite gṛhya carmaṇī subhujau tu tau
GE07mbh_08_u:009.028a: maṇḍalāni tatas tau ca vicarantau mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:009.028d-0084_01: anyonyasya vadhe caiva cakratur yatnam uttamam
GE07mbh_08_u:009.029a: kekayasya tataś carma dvidhā ciccheda sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:009.029c: sātyakeś ca tathaivāsau carma ciccheda pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:009.030a: carma cchittvā tu kaikeyas tārāgaṇaśatair vṛtam
GE07mbh_08_u:009.032a: savarmā kekayo rājan dvidhā chinno mahāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:009.033a: taṃ nihatya raṇe śūraḥ śaineyo rathasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:009.034a: tato 'nyaṃ ratham āsthāya vidhivat kalpitaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:009.034c: kekayānāṃ mahat sainyaṃ vyadhamat sātyakiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:009.035c: tam utsṛjya rathaṃ śatruṃ pradudrāva diśo daśa
GE07mbh_08_u:010.002a: abhisāras tu taṃ rājā navabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:010.003d-0085_02: mūrchām abhiyayau vīraḥ kaśmalaṃ cāviveśa ha
GE07mbh_08_u:010.005c: dhanuś ciccheda bhallena taṃ ca vivyādha saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:010.007a: sa śaraiś citrito rājaṃś citramālyadharo yuvā
GE07mbh_08_u:010.008c: bibheda samare kruddhas tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:010.010c: rarāja samare rājan sapuṣpa iva kiṃśukaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:010.014c: yadṛcchayā yathā candraś cyutaḥ svargān mahītale
GE07mbh_08_u:010.015a: rājānaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā abhisāraṃ ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:010.016a: tataḥ kruddho maheṣvāsas tat sainyaṃ prādravac charaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:010.016d-0087_01: te vadhyamānāḥ samare tava pautreṇa dhanvinā
GE07mbh_08_u:010.016d-0087_02: vyadravanta diśas tūrṇaṃ dāvadagdhā iva dvipāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:010.016d-0087_03: tāṃs tu vidravato dṛṣṭvā nirutsāhān dviṣajjaye
GE07mbh_08_u:010.017a: prativindhyas tataś citraṃ bhittvā pañcabhir āśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:010.017c: sārathiṃ tribhir ānarcchad dhvajam ekeṣuṇā tataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:010.018a: taṃ citro navabhir bhallair bāhvor urasi cārdayat
GE07mbh_08_u:010.019a: prativindhyo dhanus tasya chittvā bhārata sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:010.020c: prāhiṇot tava putrāya ghorām agniśikhām iva
GE07mbh_08_u:010.021a: tām āpatantīṃ sahasā śaktim ulkām ivāmbarāt
GE07mbh_08_u:010.021c: dvidhā ciccheda samare prativindhyo hasann iva
GE07mbh_08_u:010.022a: sā papāta tadā chinnā prativindhyaśaraiḥ śitaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:010.023a: śaktiṃ tāṃ prahatāṃ dṛṣṭvā citro gṛhya mahāgadām
GE07mbh_08_u:010.024a: sā jaghāna hayāṃs tasya sārathiṃ ca mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:010.025a: etasminn eva kāle tu rathād āplutya bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:010.026a: tām āpatantīṃ jagrāha citro rājan mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:010.026c: tatas tām eva cikṣepa prativindhyāya bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:010.027e: patitābhāsayac caiva taṃ deśam aśanir yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:010.029a: sa tasya devāvaraṇaṃ bhittvā hṛdayam eva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:010.030a: sa papāta tadā rājaṃs tomareṇa samāhataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:010.032a: sṛjanto vividhān bāṇāñ śataghnīś ca sakiṅkiṇīḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:010.032c: ta enaṃ chādayām āsuḥ sūryam abhragaṇā iva
GE07mbh_08_u:010.034a: te vadhyamānāḥ samare tāvakāḥ pāṇḍavair nṛpa
GE07mbh_08_u:010.036a: tataḥ samāgamo ghoro babhūva sahasā tayoḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.001a: bhīmasenaṃ tato drauṇī rājan vivyādha patriṇā
GE07mbh_08_u:011.002a: athainaṃ punar ājaghne navatyā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.003c: rarāja samare rājan raśmivān iva bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.005a: śaraiḥ śarāṃs tato drauṇiḥ saṃvārya yudhi pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_08_u:011.006a: lalāṭasthaṃ tato bāṇaṃ dhārayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.006c: yathā śṛṅgaṃ vane dṛptaḥ khaḍgo dhārayate nṛpa
GE07mbh_08_u:011.007a: tato drauṇiṃ raṇe bhīmo yatamānaṃ parākramī
GE07mbh_08_u:011.007c: tribhir vivyādha nārācair lalāṭe vismayann iva
GE07mbh_08_u:011.008a: lalāṭasthais tato bāṇair brāhmaṇaḥ sa vyarocata
GE07mbh_08_u:011.009a: tataḥ śaraśatair drauṇim ardayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.009c: na cainaṃ kampayām āsa mātariśveva parvatam
GE07mbh_08_u:011.010a: tathaiva pāṇḍavaṃ yuddhe drauṇiḥ śaraśataiḥ śitaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.011a: tāv anyonyaṃ śarair ghoraiś chādayānau mahārathau
GE07mbh_08_u:011.014a: vyāghrāv iva ca saṃgrāme ceratus tau mahārathau
GE07mbh_08_u:011.015a: abhūtāṃ tāv adṛśyau ca śarajālaiḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.017a: apasavyaṃ tataś cakre drauṇis tatra vṛkodaram
GE07mbh_08_u:011.017c: kirañ śaraśatair ugrair dhārābhir iva parvatam
GE07mbh_08_u:011.018a: na tu tan mamṛṣe bhīmaḥ śatror vijayalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:011.018c: praticakre ca taṃ rājan pāṇḍavo 'py apasavyataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.019c: babhūva tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ tayos tatra mahāmṛdhe
GE07mbh_08_u:011.020a: caritvā vividhān mārgān maṇḍalaṃ sthānam eva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:011.021a: anyonyasya vadhe yatnaṃ cakratus tau mahārathau
GE07mbh_08_u:011.021c: īṣatur virathaṃ caiva kartum anyonyam āhave
GE07mbh_08_u:011.022c: tāny astrair eva samare pratijaghne 'sya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.024a: te bāṇāḥ samasajjanta kṣiptās tābhyāṃ tu bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:011.024c: dyotayanto diśaḥ sarvās tac ca sainyaṃ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.027c: ati yuddhāni sarvāṇi yuddham etat tato 'dhikam
GE07mbh_08_u:011.028c: naitādṛśaṃ punar yuddhaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_08_u:011.029c: aho bhīme balaṃ bhīmam etayoś ca kṛtāstratā
GE07mbh_08_u:011.030a: aho vīryasya sāratvam aho sauṣṭhavam etayoḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.031a: rudrau dvāv iva saṃbhūtau yathā dvāv iva bhāskarau
GE07mbh_08_u:011.031c: yamau vā puruṣavyāghrau ghorarūpāv imau raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:011.032a: śrūyante sma tadā vācaḥ siddhānāṃ vai muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.032e: adbhutaṃ cāpy acintyaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā karma tayor mṛdhe
GE07mbh_08_u:011.032f-0090_02: praśaṃsanti tadā devāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.032f-0090_03: sādhu drauṇe mahābāho sādhu bhīmeti cābruvan
GE07mbh_08_u:011.036a: tāv anyonyaṃ dhvajau viddhvā sārathī ca mahārathau
GE07mbh_08_u:011.037a: tataḥ kruddhau mahārāja bāṇau gṛhya mahāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:011.039a: tau parasparavegāc ca śarābhyāṃ ca bhṛśāhatau
GE07mbh_08_u:011.040a: tatas tu sārathir jñātvā droṇaputram acetanam
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041a: tathaiva pāṇḍavaṃ rājan vihvalantaṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041c: apovāha rathenājau sārathiḥ śatrutāpanam saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0005: prativivyādha taṃ śalyas tribhis tūrṇam ajihmagaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0006: sārathiṃ cāsya bhallena bhṛśaṃ vivyādha bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0007: sa śalyaṃ śaravarṣeṇa chādayām āsa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0011: śrutakīrtis tataḥ śalyaṃ bhittvā navabhir āyasaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0012: sārathiṃ tribhir ānarchat punaḥ śalyaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0013: tasya śalyo dhanuś chittvā hastāvāpaṃ nikṛtya ca
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0014: vivyādha samare tūrṇaṃ saptabhis taṃ śarottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0017: tatas tu samare rājaṃs tena viddhaḥ śilīmukhaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0018: prativivyādha taṃ cāpi navatyā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0019: tasya madreśvaraś cāpaṃ punaś ciccheda māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0021: paṭṭair jāmbūnadair baddhāṃ rūpyapaṭṭaiś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0025: viṣṭabhya ca gadāṃ vīraḥ pātayitvā ca bhūtale
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0027: tasya śaktiṃ raṇe bhūyaś cikṣepa bhujagopamām
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0028: tāṃ dvidhā cācchinac chalyo medinyāṃ sā tv aśīryata
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0029: tasya śalyaḥ kṣurapreṇa yantuḥ kāyāc chiro 'harat
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0030: bālahastād yathā śyena āmiṣaṃ vai narottama
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0031: sa papāta rathopasthāt sārathis tasya bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0032: tatas te prādravan saṃkhye hayās tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0036: vyagāhata mudā yukto nalinīṃ dvirado yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0037: lolayām āsa sa balaṃ siṃhaḥ paśugaṇān iva
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0040: aśobhata raṇe śalyo vidhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0041: senākakṣaṃ mahad dagdhvā kakṣam agnir ivotthitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:011.041d-001_0042: sthito rarāja samare puraṃ dagdhveva śaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:012.001b-0092_01: aśvatthāmnas tu yad yuddham arjunasya ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:012.001c: anyeṣāṃ ca madīyānāṃ pāṇḍavais tad bravīhi me
GE07mbh_08_u:012.002a: śṛṇu rājan yathāvṛttaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ bruvato mama
GE07mbh_08_u:012.004a: śirāṃsy unmathya vīrāṇāṃ śitair bhallair dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:012.004e: saṃtastāra kṣitiṃ kṣipraṃ vinālair nalinair iva
GE07mbh_08_u:012.006a: dhuryān dhuryatarān sūtān dhvajāṃś cāpāni sāyakān
GE07mbh_08_u:012.006c: pāṇīn aratnīn asakṛd bhallaiś ciccheda pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:012.007a: dvipān hayān rathāṃś caiva sārohān arjuno raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:012.008e: nighnantam abhijaghnus te śaraiḥ śṛṅgair ivarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:012.009a: tasya teṣāṃ ca tad yuddham abhaval lomaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:012.010c: iṣubhir bahubhis tūrṇaṃ viddhvā prāṇān rarāsa saḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:012.015c: yau sadā bibhratur vīrau tāv imau keśavārjunau
GE07mbh_08_u:012.017a: ity etan mahad āścaryaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:012.019a: yadi māṃ manyase vīra prāptam arham ivātithim
GE07mbh_08_u:012.019c: tataḥ sarvātmanādya tvaṃ yuddhātithyaṃ prayaccha me
GE07mbh_08_u:012.021a: saṃśaptakāś ca me vadhyā drauṇir āhvayate ca mām
GE07mbh_08_u:012.021c: yad atrānantaraṃ prāptaṃ praśādhi tvaṃ mahābhuja
GE07mbh_08_u:012.023c: aśvatthāman sthiro bhūtvā praharāśu sahasva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:012.024c: sūkṣmo vivādo viprāṇāṃ sthūlau kṣātrau jayājayau
GE07mbh_08_u:012.025a: yāṃ na saṃkṣamase mohād divyāṃ pārthasya satkriyām
GE07mbh_08_u:012.025c: tām āptum icchan yudhyasva sthiro bhūtvādya pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_08_u:012.026a: ity ukto vāsudevena tathety uktvā dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:012.026c: vivyādha keśavaṃ ṣaṣṭyā nārācair arjunaṃ tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:012.028c: tribhiḥ śarair vāsudevaṃ sahasreṇa ca pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_08_u:012.029c: sasṛje drauṇir āyastaḥ saṃstabhya ca raṇe 'rjunam
GE07mbh_08_u:012.030a: iṣudher dhanuṣo jyāyā aṅgulībhyaś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:012.033c: paśya mādhava daurātmyaṃ droṇaputrasya māṃ prati
GE07mbh_08_u:012.034c: eṣo 'sya hanmi saṃkalpaṃ śikṣayā ca balena ca
GE07mbh_08_u:012.034d-0094_02: dhanuś citraṃ patākāṃ ca rathaṃ śaktiṃ gadāṃ śubhām
GE07mbh_08_u:012.035a: aśvatthāmnaḥ śarān astāṃś chittvaikaikaṃ tridhā tridhā
GE07mbh_08_u:012.037a: ye ye dadṛśire tatra yad yad rūpaṃ yathā yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:012.037c: te te tat tac charair vyāptaṃ menire ''tmānam eva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:012.038c: krośe sāgre sthitān ghnanti dvipāṃś ca puruṣān raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:012.039a: bhallaiś chinnāḥ karāḥ petuḥ kariṇāṃ madakarṣiṇām
GE07mbh_08_u:012.039c: chinnā yathā paraśubhiḥ pravṛddhāḥ śaradi drumāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:012.040a: paścāt tu śailavat petus te gajāḥ saha sādibhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:012.045c: yuyutsur nāśakad yoddhuṃ pārthas tān antarācchinat
GE07mbh_08_u:012.047a: atha saṃśaptakāṃs tyaktvā pāṇḍavo drauṇim abhyayāt
GE07mbh_08_u:012.047c: apāṅkteyam iva tyaktvā dātā pāṅkteyam arthinam
GE07mbh_08_u:012.047d-0096_01: sthitāḥ saṃśaptakā rājan dṛṣṭvā yuddhaṃ mahātmanoḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:012.050c: sa tena vibabhau drauṇir ūrdhvaraśmir yathā raviḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:012.053a: sa keśavaṃ cārjunaṃ cātitejā; vivyādha marmasv atiraudrakarmā
GE07mbh_08_u:012.053c: bāṇaiḥ sumuktair atitīvravegair; yair āhato mṛtyur api vyatheta
GE07mbh_08_u:012.054a: drauṇer iṣūn arjunaḥ saṃnivārya; vyāyacchatas tad dviguṇaiḥ supuṅkhaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:012.054c: taṃ sāśvasūtadhvajam ekavīram; āvṛtya saṃśaptakasainyam ārchat
GE07mbh_08_u:012.055a: dhanūṃṣi bāṇān iṣudhīr dhanurjyāḥ; pāṇīn bhujān pāṇigataṃ ca śastram
GE07mbh_08_u:012.055c: chatrāṇi ketūṃs turagān athaiṣāṃ; vastrāṇi mālyāny atha bhūṣaṇāni
GE07mbh_08_u:012.056a: carmāṇi varmāṇi manorathāṃś ca; priyāṇi sarvāṇi śirāṃsi caiva
GE07mbh_08_u:012.056c: ciccheda pārtho dviṣatāṃ pramuktair; bāṇaiḥ sthitānām aparāṅmukhānām
GE07mbh_08_u:012.057c: pārtheritair bāṇagaṇair nirastās; tair eva sārdhaṃ nṛvarair nipetuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:012.060a: teṣāṃ dvipānāṃ vicakarta pārtho; varmāṇi marmāṇi karān niyantṝn
GE07mbh_08_u:012.060c: dhvajāḥ patākāś ca tataḥ prapetur; vajrāhatānīva gireḥ śirāṃsi
GE07mbh_08_u:012.061a: teṣu prarugṇeṣu guros tanūjaṃ; bāṇaiḥ kirīṭī navasūryavarṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:012.061c: pracchādayām āsa mahābhrajālair; vāyuḥ samudyuktam ivāṃśumantam
GE07mbh_08_u:012.062a: tato 'rjuneṣūn iṣubhir nirasya; drauṇiḥ śarair arjunavāsudevau
GE07mbh_08_u:012.062c: pracchādayitva divi candrasūryau; nanāda so 'mbhoda ivātapānte
GE07mbh_08_u:012.063a: tam arjunas tāṃś ca punas tvadīyān; abhyarditas tair avikṛttaśastraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:012.063c: bāṇāndhakāraṃ sahasaiva kṛtvā; vivyādha sarvān iṣubhiḥ supuṅkhaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:012.064a: nāpy ādadat saṃdadhan naiva muñcan; bāṇān raṇe 'dṛśyata savyasācī
GE07mbh_08_u:012.064c: hatāṃś ca nāgāṃs turagān padātīn; saṃsyūtadehān dadṛśū rathāṃś ca
GE07mbh_08_u:012.065a: saṃdhāya nārācavarān daśāśu; drauṇis tvarann ekam ivotsasarja
GE07mbh_08_u:012.065c: teṣāṃ ca pañcārjunam abhyavidhyan; pañcācyutaṃ nirbibhiduḥ sumuktāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:012.066c: samāptavidyena yathābhibhūtau; hatau svid etau kim u menire 'nye
GE07mbh_08_u:012.067a: athārjunaṃ prāha daśārhanāthaḥ; pramādyase kiṃ jahi yodham etam
GE07mbh_08_u:012.067c: kuryād dhi doṣaṃ samupekṣito 'sau; kaṣṭo bhaved vyādhir ivākriyāvān
GE07mbh_08_u:012.068a: tatheti coktvācyutam apramādī; drauṇiṃ prayatnād iṣubhis tatakṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:012.068c: chittvāśvaraśmīṃs turagān avidhyat; te taṃ raṇād ūhur atīva dūram
GE07mbh_08_u:012.069a: āvṛtya neyeṣa punas tu yuddhaṃ; pārthena sārdhaṃ matimān vimṛśya
GE07mbh_08_u:012.069c: jānañ jayaṃ niyataṃ vṛṣṇivīre; dhanaṃjaye cāṅgirasāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:012.069d-0100_01: niyamya tu hayān drauṇiḥ samāśvasya ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:012.070a: pratīpakāye tu raṇād aśvatthāmni hṛte hayaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:013.003c: bhagadattād anavaraḥ śikṣayā ca balena ca
GE07mbh_08_u:013.004a: enaṃ hatvā nihantāsi punaḥ saṃśaptakān iti
GE07mbh_08_u:013.005a: sa māgadhānāṃ pravaro 'ṅkuśagraho; graheṣv asahyo vikaco yathā grahaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:013.005c: sapatnasenāṃ pramamātha dāruṇo; mahīṃ samagrāṃ vikaco yathā grahaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:013.006c: rathāśvamātaṅgagaṇān sahasraśaḥ; samāsthito hanti śarair dvipān api
GE07mbh_08_u:013.007a: rathān adhiṣṭhāya savājisārathīn; rathāṃś ca padbhis tvarito vyapothayat
GE07mbh_08_u:013.007c: dvipāṃś ca padbhyāṃ caraṇaiḥ kareṇa ca; dvipāsthito hanti sa kālacakravat
GE07mbh_08_u:013.008a: narāṃś ca kārṣṇāyasavarmabhūṣaṇān; nipātya sāśvān api pattibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_08_u:013.008c: vyapothayad dantivareṇa śuṣmiṇā; saśabdavat sthūlanaḍān yathā tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:013.010a: tato 'rjunaṃ dvādaśabhiḥ śarottamair; janārdanaṃ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ samārdayat
GE07mbh_08_u:013.010c: sa daṇḍadhāras turagāṃs tribhis tribhis; tato nanāda prajahāsa cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_08_u:013.011a: tato 'sya pārthaḥ saguṇeṣukārmukaṃ; cakarta bhallair dhvajam apy alaṃkṛtam
GE07mbh_08_u:013.011c: punar niyantṝn saha pādagoptṛbhis; tatas tu cukrodha girivrajeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:013.012c: atīva cukṣobhayiṣur janārdanaṃ; dhanaṃjayaṃ cābhijaghāna tomaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:013.013a: athāsya bāhū dvipahastasaṃnibhau; śiraś ca pūrṇendunibhānanaṃ tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:013.013c: kṣuraiḥ praciccheda sahaiva pāṇḍavas; tato dvipaṃ bāṇaśataiḥ samārdayat
GE07mbh_08_u:013.014a: sa pārthabāṇais tapanīyabhūṣaṇaiḥ; samārucat kāñcanavarmabhṛd dvipaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:013.014c: tathā cakāśe niśi parvato yathā; davāgninā prajvalitauṣadhidrumaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:013.015a: sa vedanārto 'mbudanisvano nadaṃś; calan bhraman praskhalito ''turo dravan
GE07mbh_08_u:013.015c: papāta rugṇaḥ saniyantṛkas tathā; yathā girir vajranipātacūrṇitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:013.016c: hate raṇe bhrātari daṇḍa āvrajaj; jighāṃsur indrāvarajaṃ dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_08_u:013.017a: sa tomarair arkakaraprabhais tribhir; janārdanaṃ pañcabhir eva cārjunam
GE07mbh_08_u:013.017c: samarpayitvā vinanāda cārdayaṃs; tato 'sya bāhū vicakarta pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:013.018a: kṣuraprakṛttau subhṛśaṃ satomarau; cyutāṅgadau candanarūṣitau bhujau
GE07mbh_08_u:013.018c: gajāt patantau yugapad virejatur; yathādriśṛṅgāt patitau mahoragau
GE07mbh_08_u:013.019a: athārdhacandreṇa hṛtaṃ kirīṭinā; papāta daṇḍasya śiraḥ kṣitiṃ dvipāt
GE07mbh_08_u:013.019c: tac choṇitābhaṃ nipatad vireje; divākaro 'stād iva paścimāṃ diśam
GE07mbh_08_u:013.020c: bibheda pārthaḥ sa papāta nānadan; himādrikūṭaḥ kuliśāhato yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:013.021a: tato 'pare tatpratimā gajottamā; jigīṣavaḥ saṃyati savyasācinam
GE07mbh_08_u:013.021c: tathā kṛtās tena yathaiva tau dvipau; tataḥ prabhagnaṃ sumahad ripor balam
GE07mbh_08_u:013.022a: gajā rathāśvāḥ puruṣāś ca saṃghaśaḥ; parasparaghnāḥ paripetur āhave
GE07mbh_08_u:013.022c: parasparapraskhalitāḥ samāhatā; bhṛśaṃ ca tat tat kulabhāṣiṇo hatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:013.023a: athārjunaṃ sve parivārya sainikāḥ; puraṃdaraṃ devagaṇā ivābruvan
GE07mbh_08_u:013.023c: abhaiṣma yasmān maraṇād iva prajāḥ; sa vīra diṣṭyā nihatas tvayā ripuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:013.024a: na cet paritrāsya imāñ janān bhayād; dviṣadbhir evaṃ balibhiḥ prapīḍitān
GE07mbh_08_u:013.024c: tathābhaviṣyad dviṣatāṃ pramodanaṃ; yathā hateṣv eṣv iha no 'riṣu tvayā
GE07mbh_08_u:013.025a: itīva bhūyaś ca suhṛdbhir īritā; niśamya vācaḥ sumanās tato 'rjunaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:013.025c: yathānurūpaṃ pratipūjya taṃ janaṃ; jagāma saṃśaptakasaṃghahā punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:014.001a: pratyāgatya punar jiṣṇur ahan saṃśaptakān bahūn
GE07mbh_08_u:014.002c: vicelur babhramur neduḥ petur mamluś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:014.003a: dhuryaṃ dhuryatarān sūtān rathāṃś ca parisaṃkṣipan
GE07mbh_08_u:014.003c: pāṇīn pāṇigataṃ śastraṃ bāhūn api śirāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_08_u:014.004a: bhallaiḥ kṣurair ardhacandrair vatsadantaiś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:014.006a: teṣāṃ tasya ca tad yuddham abhaval lomaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:014.007a: tam avidhyat tribhir bāṇair dandaśūkair ivāhibhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:014.007c: ugrāyudhas tatas tasya śiraḥ kāyād apāharat
GE07mbh_08_u:014.009c: samyag astaiḥ śaraiḥ sarvān sahitān ahanad bahūn
GE07mbh_08_u:014.011a: te rathās tatra vidhvastāḥ parārdhyā bhānty anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:014.014c: babhramuś caskhaluḥ petur nedur mamluś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:014.015c: śarair nijaghnivān pārtho mahendra iva dānavān
GE07mbh_08_u:014.016c: sarathāḥ sadhvajā vīrā hatāḥ pārthena śerate
GE07mbh_08_u:014.017c: gatāḥ śarīrair vasudhām ūrjitaiḥ karmabhir divam
GE07mbh_08_u:014.019a: uhyamānā rathāśvais te pattayaś ca jighāṃsavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:014.022b-0104_01: ete balādhikāḥ prāptāḥ pārtha kiṃ krīḍase 'nagha
GE07mbh_08_u:014.023a: tathety uktvārjunaḥ kṣipraṃ śiṣṭān saṃśaptakāṃs tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:014.023c: ākṣipya śastreṇa balād daityān indra ivāvadhīt
GE07mbh_08_u:014.024a: ādadhat saṃdadhan neṣūn dṛṣṭaḥ kaiś cid raṇe 'rjunaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:014.024c: vimuñcan vā śarāñ śīghraṃ dṛśyate sma hi kair api
GE07mbh_08_u:014.025a: āścaryam iti govindo bruvann aśvān acodayat
GE07mbh_08_u:014.025c: haṃsāṃsagaurās te senāṃ haṃsāḥ sara ivāviśan
GE07mbh_08_u:014.025d-0105_02: tāṃ senāṃ viviśur hṛṣṭā haṃsā iva mahat saraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:014.029c: tailadhautāṃś ca nārācān nirmuktān iva pannagān
GE07mbh_08_u:014.032a: jāmbūnadamayaiḥ paṭṭair baddhāś ca vipulā gadāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:014.033b-0107_01: parighān bhiṇḍipālāṃś ca bhuśuṇḍīḥ kuṇapān api
GE07mbh_08_u:014.034a: śataghnīḥ paśya citrāś ca vipulān parighāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:014.034c: cakrāṇi cāpaviddhāni mudgarāṃś ca bahūn raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:014.037c: nistriṃśaiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ prāsair nakharair laguḍair api
GE07mbh_08_u:014.043c: aśvāṃś ca bahudhā paśya śoṇitena pariplutān
GE07mbh_08_u:014.044a: yodhānāṃ ca mahāśaṅkhān pāṇḍurāṃś ca prakīrṇakān
GE07mbh_08_u:014.046a: vipāṭitā vicitrāś ca rūpacitrāḥ kuthās tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:014.046c: bhinnāś ca bahudhā ghaṇṭāḥ patadbhiś cūrṇitā gajaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:014.051a: sajīvāṃś ca narān paśya kūjamānān samantataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:014.052a: jñātibhiḥ sahitais tatra rodamānair muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:014.054a: jalārthaṃ ca gatāḥ ke cin niṣprāṇā bahavo 'rjuna
GE07mbh_08_u:014.054c: saṃnivṛttāś ca te śūrās tān dṛṣṭvaiva vicetasaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:014.055c: jalaṃ pītvā mṛtān paśya pibato 'nyāṃś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:014.057d-0111_01: evaṃ bruvaṃs tadā kṛṣṇo yayau yena yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:014.057d-0112_01: yāhi yāhīti govindaṃ muhur muhur acodayat
GE07mbh_08_u:014.057d-0113_01: tāṃ yuddhabhūmiṃ pārthasya darśayitvā ca mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:014.058c: divi vā devarājasya tvayā yat kṛtam āhave
GE07mbh_08_u:014.059a: evaṃ tāṃ darśayan kṛṣṇo yuddhabhūmiṃ kirīṭine
GE07mbh_08_u:014.061a: praviśya tad balaṃ kṛṣṇas turagair vātavegibhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:014.062a: sa hi nānāvidhair bāṇair iṣvāsapravaro yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:014.062c: nyahanad dviṣatāṃ vrātān gatāsūn antako yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:014.063c: bhittvā praharatāṃ śreṣṭho videhāsūṃś cakāra saḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:014.064c: bhittvā tān ahanat pāṇḍyaḥ śatrūñ śakra ivāsurān
GE07mbh_08_u:015.001a: proktas tvayā pūrvam eva pravīro lokaviśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:015.001c: na tv asya karma saṃgrāme tvayā saṃjaya kīrtitam
GE07mbh_08_u:015.002c: śikṣāṃ prabhāvaṃ vīryaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ darpam eva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:015.003c: samāptavidyān dhanuṣi śreṣṭhān yān manyase yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:015.003d-0114_01: yo hy ākṣipati vīryeṇa sarvān etān mahārathān
GE07mbh_08_u:015.003d-0114_02: na mene cātmanā tulyaṃ kaṃ cid eva nareśvaram
GE07mbh_08_u:015.007c: samyag astaiḥ śaraiḥ pāṇḍyo vāyur meghān ivākṣipat
GE07mbh_08_u:015.010a: dākṣiṇātyāṃś ca bhojāṃś ca krūrān saṃgrāmakarkaśān
GE07mbh_08_u:015.011a: caturaṅgaṃ balaṃ bāṇair nighnantaṃ pāṇḍyam āhave
GE07mbh_08_u:015.012a: ābhāṣya cainaṃ madhuram abhi nṛtyann abhītavat
GE07mbh_08_u:015.017a: mahatā rathaghoṣeṇa divaṃ bhūmiṃ ca nādayan
GE07mbh_08_u:015.017c: varṣānte sasyahā pītho bhābhir āpūrayann iva
GE07mbh_08_u:015.019a: evam uktas tathety uktvā prahareti ca tāḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:015.022a: teṣāṃ pañcācchinat pāṇḍyaḥ pañcabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:015.023a: atha droṇasutasyeṣūṃs tāṃś chittvā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:015.024a: vijyaṃ dhanur athādhijyaṃ kṛtvā drauṇir amitrahā
GE07mbh_08_u:015.024b-0115_01: prekṣya cāśu rathe yuktān narair anyān hayottamān
GE07mbh_08_u:015.024e: iṣusaṃbādham ākāśam akarod diśa eva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:015.025a: tatas tān asyataḥ sarvān drauṇer bāṇān mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:015.026a: prahitāṃs tān prayatnena chittvā drauṇer iṣūn ariḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:015.026c: cakrarakṣau tatas tasya prāṇudan niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:015.027c: prāsyad droṇasuto bāṇān vṛṣṭiṃ pūṣānujo yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:015.028a: aṣṭāv aṣṭagavāny ūhuḥ śakaṭāni yad āyudham
GE07mbh_08_u:015.028c: ahnas tad aṣṭabhāgena drauṇiś cikṣepa māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:015.029c: ye ye dadṛśire tatra visaṃjñāḥ prāyaśo 'bhavan
GE07mbh_08_u:015.030a: parjanya iva gharmānte vṛṣṭyā sādridrumāṃ mahīm
GE07mbh_08_u:015.034a: astrair astrāṇi saṃvārya chittvā sarvāyudhāni ca
GE07mbh_08_u:015.034c: prāptam apy ahitaṃ drauṇir na jaghāna raṇepsayā
GE07mbh_08_u:015.034d-0116_02: drāvayām āsa sa tadā pāṇḍavānāṃ mahad balam
GE07mbh_08_u:015.034d-0116_03: virathān rathinaś cakre gajān aśvāṃś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:015.035a: hateśvaro dantivaraḥ sukalpitas; tvarābhisṛṣṭaḥ pratiśarmago balī
GE07mbh_08_u:015.035c: tam adhyatiṣṭhan malayeśvaro mahān; yathādriśṛṅgaṃ harir unnadaṃs tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:015.036c: sasarja śīghraṃ pratipīḍayan gajaṃ; guroḥ sutāyādripatīśvaro nadan
GE07mbh_08_u:015.037c: hato 'sy asāv ity asakṛn mudā nadan; parābhinad drauṇivarāṅgabhūṣaṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:015.039a: tataḥ prajajvāla pareṇa manyunā; padāhato nāgapatir yathā tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:015.040a: dvipasya pādāgrakarān sa pañcabhir; nṛpasya bāhū ca śiro 'tha ca tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:015.040c: jaghāna ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣaḍ ṛtūttamatviṣaḥ; sa pāṇḍyarājānucarān mahārathān
GE07mbh_08_u:015.041c: bhujau dharāyāṃ patitau nṛpasya tau; viveṣṭatus tārkṣyahatāv ivoragau
GE07mbh_08_u:015.042a: śiraś ca tat pūrṇaśaśiprabhānanaṃ; saroṣatāmrāyatanetram unnasam
GE07mbh_08_u:015.042c: kṣitau vibabhrāja patat sakuṇḍalaṃ; viśākhayor madhyagataḥ śaśī yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:015.043a: samāptavidyaṃ tu guroḥ sutaṃ nṛpaḥ; samāptakarmāṇam upetya te sutaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:015.043c: suhṛdvṛto 'tyartham apūjayan mudā; jite balau viṣṇum ivāmareśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:016.001a: pāṇḍye hate kim akarod arjuno yudhi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:016.002a: samāptavidyo balavān yukto vīraś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:016.003a: tasmān mahad bhayaṃ tīvram amitraghnād dhanaṃjayāt
GE07mbh_08_u:016.003c: sa yat tatrākarot pārthas tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:016.004a: hate pāṇḍye 'rjunaṃ kṛṣṇas tvarann āha vaco hitam
GE07mbh_08_u:016.005a: aśvatthāmnaś ca saṃkalpād dhatāḥ karṇena sṛñjayāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:016.006a: etac chrutvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca bhrātur ghoraṃ mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_08_u:016.006c: vāhayāśvān hṛṣīkeśa kṣipram ity āha pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:016.007b-0119_01: tadā reṇuḥ samabhavat punas tatra mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:016.007c: dāruṇaś ca punas tatra prādurāsīt samāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:016.010a: gadāḥ prāsān asīn kuntān bhiṇḍipālān mahāṅkuśān
GE07mbh_08_u:016.012a: tena śabdena mahatā saṃhṛṣṭāś cakrur āhavam
GE07mbh_08_u:016.013c: tāḍitānāṃ ca patatāṃ ninādaḥ sumahān abhūt
GE07mbh_08_u:016.014c: śrutvā śabdaṃ bhṛśaṃ tresur jaghnur mamluś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:016.015a: teṣāṃ nānadyatāṃ caiva śastravṛṣṭiṃ ca muñcatām
GE07mbh_08_u:016.016a: pañca pāñcālavīrāṇāṃ rathān daśa ca pañca ca
GE07mbh_08_u:016.019c: vidhunvānaḥ śitair bāṇaiḥ śirāṃsy unmathya pātayat
GE07mbh_08_u:016.021c: maurvyā talatrair nyavadhīt kaśayā vājino yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:016.022c: mamarda karṇas tarasā siṃho mṛgagaṇān iva
GE07mbh_08_u:016.023a: tataḥ pāñcālaputrāś ca draupadeyāś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:016.023c: yamau ca yuyudhānaś ca sahitāḥ karṇam abhyayuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:016.024c: priyān asūn raṇe tyaktvā yodhā jagmuḥ parasparam
GE07mbh_08_u:016.025c: gadābhir musalaiś cānye parighaiś ca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:016.026c: nadantaś cāhvayantaś ca pravalgantaś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:016.028c: jīvanta iva cāpy ete tasthuḥ śastropabṛṃhitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:016.029a: parasparaṃ cāpy apare paṭṭiśair asibhis tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:016.030a: tatakṣuś cicchiduś cānye bibhiduś cikṣipus tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:016.030c: saṃcakartuś ca jaghnuś ca kruddhā nirbibhiduś ca ha
GE07mbh_08_u:016.031c: kṣarantaḥ svarasaṃ raktaṃ prakṛtāś candanā iva
GE07mbh_08_u:016.032a: rathai rathā vinihatā hastinaś cāpi hastibhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:016.032c: narā naravaraiḥ petur aśvāś cāśvaiḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:016.033a: dhvajāḥ śirāṃsi cchatrāṇi dvipahastā nṛṇāṃ bhujāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:016.033c: kṣurair bhallārdhacandraiś ca chinnāḥ śastrāṇi tatyajuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:016.033d-0122_01: vadhyatāṃ dāruṇaḥ śabdaḥ patatāṃ stanatām api
GE07mbh_08_u:016.034a: narāṃś ca nāgāṃś ca rathān hayān mamṛdur āhave
GE07mbh_08_u:016.034b-0123_01: tathā hatā rathāḥ petur aśvārohaiḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:016.034c: aśvārohair hatāḥ śūrāś chinnahastāś ca dantinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:016.035a: sapatākā dhvajāḥ petur viśīrṇā iva parvatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:016.035c: pattibhiś ca samāplutya dviradāḥ syandanās tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:016.036a: prahatā hanyamānāś ca patitāś caiva sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:016.036e: sādibhiḥ pattisaṃghāś ca nihatā yudhi śerate
GE07mbh_08_u:016.037a: mṛditānīva padmāni pramlānā iva ca srajaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:016.037c: hatānāṃ vadanāny āsan gātrāṇi ca mahāmate
GE07mbh_08_u:016.038d-0124_01: tathaiva mukhavarṇaś ca keṣāṃ cit tatra dṛśyate
GE07mbh_08_u:017.001a: hastibhis tu mahāmātrās tava putreṇa coditāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.002a: prācyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca pravīrā gajayodhinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.002c: aṅgā vaṅgāś ca puṇḍrāś ca māgadhās tāmraliptakāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.003a: mekalāḥ kośalā madrā daśārṇā niṣadhās tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:017.004c: siṣicus te tataḥ sarve pāñcālācalam āhave
GE07mbh_08_u:017.006a: ekaikaṃ daśabhiḥ ṣaḍbhir aṣṭābhir api bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:017.008c: sātyakiś ca śikhaṇḍī ca cekitānaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_08_u:017.008d-0126_01: samantāt siṣicur vīrā meghās toyair ivācalān
GE07mbh_08_u:017.009a: te mlecchaiḥ preṣitā nāgā narān aśvān rathān api
GE07mbh_08_u:017.009c: hastair ākṣipya mamṛduḥ padbhiś cāpy atimanyavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.010a: bibhiduś ca viṣāṇāgraiḥ samākṣipya ca cikṣipuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.011a: pramukhe vartamānaṃ tu dvipaṃ vaṅgasya sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.013c: sahadevaḥ prayatnāt tair nārācair vyahanat tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.014c: taṃ kṛtvā dviradaṃ bhūyaḥ sahadevo 'ṅgam abhyagāt
GE07mbh_08_u:017.015c: nārācair yamadaṇḍābhais tribhir nāgaṃ śatena ca
GE07mbh_08_u:017.016c: nakulāya śatāny aṣṭau tridhaikaikaṃ tu so 'cchinat
GE07mbh_08_u:017.017c: sa papāta hato mlecchas tenaiva saha dantinā
GE07mbh_08_u:017.018c: aṅgāḥ kruddhā mahāmātrā nāgair nakulam abhyayuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.022a: tatas tad abhavad yuddhaṃ rathināṃ hastibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_08_u:017.023a: nāgānāṃ prasphuṭuḥ kumbhā marmāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_08_u:017.024c: sahadevo jaghānāśu te petuḥ saha sādibhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.028a: evaṃ hatvā tava gajāṃs te pāṇḍunarakuñjarāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.029a: te tāṃ senām avālokya pāṇḍuputrasya sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.030a: sahadevaṃ tataḥ kruddhaṃ dahantaṃ tava vāhinīm
GE07mbh_08_u:017.031a: tau sametau mahāyuddhe dṛṣṭvā tatra narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.031c: siṃhanādaravāṃś cakrur vāsāṃsy ādudhuvuś ca ha
GE07mbh_08_u:017.032a: tato bhārata kruddhena tava putreṇa dhanvinā
GE07mbh_08_u:017.032c: pāṇḍuputras tribhir bāṇair vakṣasy abhihato balī
GE07mbh_08_u:017.033c: viddhvā vivyādha saptatyā sārathiṃ ca tribhis tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.034a: duḥśāsanas tadā rājaṃś chittvā cāpaṃ mahāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:017.035a: sahadevas tataḥ kruddhaḥ khaḍgaṃ gṛhya mahāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:017.035c: vyāvidhyata yudhāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ śrīmāṃs tava sutaṃ prati
GE07mbh_08_u:017.036a: samārgaṇagaṇaṃ cāpaṃ chittvā tasya mahān asiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.036c: nipapāta tato bhūmau cyutaḥ sarpa ivāmbarāt
GE07mbh_08_u:017.038d-0127_01: tatas taṃ niśitaṃ khaḍgam āvidhya yudhi satvaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.038d-0127_02: dhanuś cānyat samādāya śaraṃ jagrāha vīryavān
GE07mbh_08_u:017.039a: tam āpatantaṃ sahasā nistriṃśaṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.039c: pātayām āsa samare sahadevo hasann iva
GE07mbh_08_u:017.040a: tato bāṇāṃś catuḥṣaṣṭiṃ tava putro mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:017.041a: tāñ śarān samare rājan vegenāpatato bahūn
GE07mbh_08_u:017.042a: sa nivārya mahābāṇāṃs tava putreṇa preṣitān
GE07mbh_08_u:017.042c-0128_02: tān bāṇāṃs tava putro 'pi chittvaikaikaṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.042c-0128_04: tato duḥśāsano rājan viddhvā pāṇḍusutaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:017.043e: vikṛṣya balavac cāpaṃ tava putrāya so 'sṛjat
GE07mbh_08_u:017.044a: sa taṃ nirbhidya vegena bhittvā ca kavacaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_08_u:017.044c: prāviśad dharaṇīṃ rājan valmīkam iva pannagaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.044e: tataḥ sa mumuhe rājaṃs tava putro mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.045a: mūḍhaṃ cainaṃ samālakṣya sārathis tvarito ratham
GE07mbh_08_u:017.045c: apovāha bhṛśaṃ trasto vadhyamānaṃ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.045d-0129_01: nādas tu sumahān āsīn nādayan vai vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_08_u:017.046a: parājitya raṇe taṃ tu pāṇḍavaḥ pāṇḍupūrvaja
GE07mbh_08_u:017.047c: tathā sā kauravī senā mṛditā tena bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:017.048c: karṇo vaikartano rājan vārayām āsa vai tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:017.049a: nakulaś ca tadā karṇaṃ prahasann idam abravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:017.050a: yasya me tvaṃ raṇe pāpa cakṣurviṣayam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.050c: tvaṃ hi mūlam anarthānāṃ vairasya kalahasya ca
GE07mbh_08_u:017.051c: tvām adya samare hatvā kṛtakṛtyo 'smi vijvaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.053a: praharasva raṇe bāla paśyāmas tava pauruṣam
GE07mbh_08_u:017.053c: karma kṛtvā raṇe śūra tataḥ katthitum arhasi
GE07mbh_08_u:017.054a: anuktvā samare tāta śūrā yudhyanti śaktitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.054c: sa yudhyasva mayā śaktyā vineṣye darpam adya te
GE07mbh_08_u:017.055a: ity uktvā prāharat tūrṇaṃ pāṇḍuputrāya sūtajaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.056a: nakulas tu tato viddhaḥ sūtaputreṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:017.057a: tasya karṇo dhanuś chittvā svarṇapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.058a: te tasya kavacaṃ bhittvā papuḥ śoṇitam āhave
GE07mbh_08_u:017.058c: āśīviṣā yathā nāgā bhittvā gāṃ salilaṃ papuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.059c: karṇaṃ vivyādha viṃśatyā sārathiṃ ca tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.062c: vismayaṃ paramaṃ jagmū rathinaḥ saha daivataiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.063a: athānyad dhanur ādāya karṇo vaikartanas tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:017.064a: uraḥsthair atha tair bāṇair mādrīputro vyarocata
GE07mbh_08_u:017.065a: nakulas tu tataḥ karṇaṃ viddhvā saptabhir āyasaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.065c: athāsya dhanuṣaḥ koṭiṃ punaś ciccheda māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:017.067c: ciccheda sa śarāṃs tūrṇaṃ śarair eva mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.068a: tato bāṇamayaṃ jālaṃ vitataṃ vyomny adṛśyata
GE07mbh_08_u:017.068c: khadyotānāṃ gaṇair eva saṃpatadbhir yathā nabhaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.069a: tair vimuktaiḥ śaraśataiś chāditaṃ gaganaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:017.069c: śalabhānāṃ yathā vrātais tadvad āsīt samākulam
GE07mbh_08_u:017.070a: te śarā hemavikṛtāḥ saṃpatanto muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.071c: samasarpat tato bhūtaṃ kiṃ cid eva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:017.072a: niruddhe tatra mārge tu śarasaṃghaiḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.074a: nakulasya tathā bāṇair vadhyamānā camūs tava
GE07mbh_08_u:017.075a: te sene vadhyamāne tu tābhyāṃ divyair mahāśaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.078c: te tu karṇam avacchādya vyatiṣṭhanta yathā pare
GE07mbh_08_u:017.079a: śaraveśmapraviṣṭau tau dadṛśāte na kaiś cana
GE07mbh_08_u:017.080a: tataḥ kruddho raṇe karṇaḥ kṛtvā ghorataraṃ vapuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.081c: na cakāra vyathāṃ rājan bhāskaro jaladair yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:017.083a: ekacchāyam abhūt sarvaṃ tasya bāṇair mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.084a: tataḥ karṇo mahārāja dhanuś chittvā mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.084c: sārathiṃ pātayām āsa rathanīḍād dhasann iva
GE07mbh_08_u:017.085a: tathāśvāṃś caturaś cāsya caturbhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.085c: yamasya sadanaṃ tūrṇaṃ preṣayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:017.086a: athāsya taṃ rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ tilaśo vyadhamac charaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.086c: patākāṃ cakrarakṣau ca dhvajaṃ khaḍgaṃ ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:017.086f-0131_01: suvarṇavikṛtaṃ tac ca dhanuḥ saśaram āhave
GE07mbh_08_u:017.087a: hatāśvo virathaś caiva vivarmā ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:017.087c: avatīrya rathāt tūrṇaṃ parighaṃ gṛhya viṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.088a: tam udyataṃ mahāghoraṃ parighaṃ tasya sūtajaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.089c: ārdayad bahuśaḥ karṇo na cainaṃ samapīḍayat
GE07mbh_08_u:017.091a: tam abhidrutya rādheyaḥ prahasan vai punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.091c: sajyam asya dhanuḥ kaṇṭhe so 'vāsṛjata bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:017.092c: pariveṣam anuprāpto yathā syād vyomni candramāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.092e: yathaiva ca sito meghaḥ śakracāpena śobhitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.093a: tam abravīt tadā karṇo vyarthaṃ vyāhṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_08_u:017.093c: vadedānīṃ punar hṛṣṭo vadhyaṃ māṃ tvaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.094a: mā yotsīr gurubhiḥ sārdhaṃ balavadbhiś ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_08_u:017.094c: sadṛśais tāta yudhyasva vrīḍāṃ mā kuru pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_08_u:017.094e: gṛhaṃ vā gaccha mādreya yatra vā kṛṣṇaphalgunau
GE07mbh_08_u:017.095a: evam uktvā mahārāja vyasarjayata taṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.095c: vadhaprāptaṃ tu taṃ rājan nāvadhīt sūtanandanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.095e: smṛtvā kuntyā vaco rājaṃs tata enaṃ vyasarjayat
GE07mbh_08_u:017.098a: taṃ visṛjya raṇe karṇaḥ pāñcālāṃs tvarito yayau
GE07mbh_08_u:017.099a: tatrākrando mahān āsīt pāṇḍavānāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:017.100c: madhyaṃ gate dinakare cakravat pracaran prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.101c: sasūtair hatasūtaiś ca bhagnākṣaiś caiva māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:017.102a: tatra tatra ca saṃbhrāntā vicerur mattakuñjarāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.104c: tam evābhimukhā yānti śalabhā iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_08_u:017.105c: kṣarantaḥ śoṇitaṃ gātrair nagā iva jalaplavam
GE07mbh_08_u:017.106a: uraśchadair vimuktāś ca vālabandhaiś ca vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.106c: rājataiś ca tathā kāṃsyaiḥ sauvarṇaiś caiva bhūṣaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.107a: hīnā āstaraṇaiś caiva khalīnaiś ca vivarjitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.107c: cāmaraiś ca kuthābhiś ca tūṇīraiḥ patitair api
GE07mbh_08_u:017.109a: prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiś ca saṃsyūtān ṛṣṭibhiś ca narādhipa
GE07mbh_08_u:017.109d-0134_01: nihatān vadhyamānāṃś ca vepamānāṃś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:017.109d-0136_01: vihayān sahayāṃś cāpi veṣṭamānāṃs tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.111a: bhagnākṣakūbarān kāṃś cic chinnacakrāṃś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:017.112b-0137_01: rathāṃs tu tatra vicchinnāṃs tilaśaḥ karṇavikramaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.113a: viśastrāṃś ca tathaivānyān saśastrāṃś ca bahūn hatān
GE07mbh_08_u:017.115a: śirāṃsi bāhūn ūrūṃś ca chinnān anyāṃs tathā yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:017.115b-0138_01: chinnāñ śarais tathā bāhūn ūrūś cāpāñ janādhipa
GE07mbh_08_u:017.115b-0139_01: śirobhir bāhubhiś chinnaiś citrair ūrubhir eva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:017.117c: tam evābhimukhā yānti pataṃgā iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_08_u:017.118a: taṃ dahantam anīkāni tatra tatra mahāratham
GE07mbh_08_u:017.119a: hataśeṣās tu ye vīrāḥ pāñcālānāṃ mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.119c: tān prabhagnān drutān karṇaḥ pṛṣṭhato vikirañ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:017.120a: tāpayām āsa tān bāṇaiḥ sūtaputro mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.001a: yuyutsuṃ tava putraṃ tu prādravantaṃ mahad balam
GE07mbh_08_u:018.002a: yuyutsus tu tato rājañ śitadhāreṇa patriṇā
GE07mbh_08_u:018.003a: ulūkas tu tataḥ kruddhas tava putrasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:018.003c: kṣurapreṇa dhanuś chittvā tāḍayām āsa karṇinā
GE07mbh_08_u:018.004a: tad apāsya dhanuś chinnaṃ yuyutsur vegavattaram
GE07mbh_08_u:018.005a: śākuniṃ ca tataḥ ṣaṣṭyā vivyādha bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_08_u:018.005c: sārathiṃ tribhir ānarchat taṃ ca bhūyo vyavidhyata
GE07mbh_08_u:018.006a: ulūkas taṃ tu viṃśatyā viddhvā hemavibhūṣitaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.006c: athāsya samare kruddho dhvajaṃ ciccheda kāñcanam
GE07mbh_08_u:018.009d-0140_01: tac chinnam apatad bhūmau yuyutsoḥ sārathes tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:018.010a: jaghāna caturo 'śvāṃś ca taṃ ca vivyādha pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.011a: taṃ nirjitya raṇe rājann ulūkas tvarito yayau
GE07mbh_08_u:018.011c: pāñcālān sṛñjayāṃś caiva vinighnan niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.013a: hatāśve tu rathe tiṣṭhañ śatānīko mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.013c: gadāṃ cikṣepa saṃkruddhas tava putrasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:018.014a: sā kṛtvā syandanaṃ bhasma hayāṃś caiva sasārathīn
GE07mbh_08_u:018.015a: tāv ubhau virathau vīrau kurūṇāṃ kīrtivardhanau
GE07mbh_08_u:018.016a: putras tu tava saṃbhrānto vivitso ratham āviśat
GE07mbh_08_u:018.017a: sutasomas tu śakuniṃ vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.018a: sutasomas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā pitur atyantavairiṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:018.019a: tāñ śarāñ śakunis tūrṇaṃ cicchedānyaiḥ patatribhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.019c: laghvastraś citrayodhī ca jitakāśī ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:018.020a: nivārya samare cāpi śarāṃs tān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.021a: tasyāśvān ketanaṃ sūtaṃ tilaśo vyadhamac charaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.021c: syālas tava mahāvīryas tatas te cukruśur janāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.022a: hatāśvo virathaś caiva chinnadhanvā ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:018.022c: dhanvī dhanurvaraṃ gṛhya rathād bhūmāv atiṣṭhata
GE07mbh_08_u:018.023a: chādayām āsur atha te tava syālasya taṃ ratham
GE07mbh_08_u:018.024c: pramṛdnaṃś ca śarāṃs tāṃs tāñ śaravrātair mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.025a: tatrātuṣyanta yodhāś ca siddhāś cāpi divi sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.025e: rathasthaṃ nṛpatiṃ taṃ tu padātiḥ sann ayodhayat
GE07mbh_08_u:018.026c: vyahanat kārmukaṃ rājā tūṇīraṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.027a: sa cchinnadhanvā samare khaḍgam udyamya nānadan
GE07mbh_08_u:018.029d-0142_01: bhrāntam udbhrāntam āviddham āplutaṃ viplutaṃ sṛtam
GE07mbh_08_u:018.029d-0142_02: saṃpātaṃ samudīryaṃ ca darśayām āsa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:018.030a: saubalas tu tatas tasya śarāṃś cikṣepa vīryavān
GE07mbh_08_u:018.032a: ciccheda tāṃś ca khaḍgena śikṣayā ca balena ca
GE07mbh_08_u:018.034a: sa cchinnaḥ sahasā bhūmau nipapāta mahān asiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.034c: avaśasya sthitaṃ haste taṃ khaḍgaṃ satsaruṃ tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:018.035a: chinnam ājñāya nistriṃśam avaplutya padāni ṣaṭ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.036a: sa cchittvā saguṇaṃ cāpaṃ raṇe tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.037a: saubalo 'pi dhanur gṛhya ghoram anyat suduḥsaham
GE07mbh_08_u:018.038a: tatra nādo mahān āsīt pāṇḍavānāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:018.039a: tāny anīkāni dṛptāni śastravanti mahānti ca
GE07mbh_08_u:018.040a: yathā daityacamūṃ rājan devarājo mamarda ha
GE07mbh_08_u:018.041a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ kṛpo rājan vārayām āsa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:018.041c: yathā dṛptaṃ vane nāgaṃ śarabho vārayed yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:018.042c: padāt padaṃ vicalituṃ nāśaknot tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:018.043c: vitresuḥ sarvabhūtāni kṣayaṃ prāptaṃ ca menire
GE07mbh_08_u:018.044c: droṇasya nidhane nūnaṃ saṃkruddho dvipadāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.045c: api svasti bhaved adya dhṛṣṭadyumnasya gautamāt
GE07mbh_08_u:018.046a: apīyaṃ vāhinī kṛtsnā mucyeta mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_08_u:018.046c: apy ayaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ sarvān na no hanyāt samāgatān
GE07mbh_08_u:018.048a: ācāryaḥ kṣiprahastaś ca vijayī ca sadā yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:018.049a: pārṣataś ca bhṛśaṃ yuddhe vimukho 'dyāpi lakṣyate
GE07mbh_08_u:018.049c: ity evaṃ vividhā vācas tāvakānāṃ paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_08_u:018.050a: viniḥśvasya tataḥ kruddhaḥ kṛpaḥ śāradvato nṛpa
GE07mbh_08_u:018.052a: tam abravīt tato yantā kaccit kṣemaṃ nu pārṣata
GE07mbh_08_u:018.052c: īdṛśaṃ vyasanaṃ yuddhe na te dṛṣṭaṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_08_u:018.053a: daivayogāt tu te bāṇā nātaran marmabhedinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.054c: avadhyaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ manye yena te vikramo hataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.055a: dhṛṣṭadyumnas tato rājañ śanakair abravīd vacaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.055c: muhyate me manas tāta gātre svedaś ca jāyate
GE07mbh_08_u:018.056a: vepathuṃ ca śarīre me romaharṣaṃ ca paśya vai
GE07mbh_08_u:018.056c: varjayan brāhmaṇaṃ yuddhe śanair yāhi yato 'cyutaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.057a: arjunaṃ bhīmasenaṃ vā samare prāpya sārathe
GE07mbh_08_u:018.057c: kṣemam adya bhaved yantar iti me naiṣṭhikī matiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.058a: tataḥ prāyān mahārāja sārathis tvarayan hayān
GE07mbh_08_u:018.058c: yato bhīmo maheṣvāso yuyudhe tava sainikaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.059a: pradrutaṃ tu rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhṛṣṭadyumnasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:018.060a: śaṅkhaṃ ca pūrayām āsa muhur muhur ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.060c: pārṣataṃ prādravad yantaṃ mahendra iva śambaram
GE07mbh_08_u:018.061c: hārdikyo vārayām āsa smayann iva muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.063a: kṛtavarmā tu saṃkruddho bhittvā ṣaṣṭibhir āśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.063c: dhanur ekena ciccheda hasan rājan mahārathaḥ
