GE07mbh_08_u:018.066a: vitathāṃs tān samālakṣya patitāṃś ca mahītale
GE07mbh_08_u:018.067c: aśītyā mārgaṇaiḥ kruddho bāhvor urasi cārdayat
GE07mbh_08_u:018.069a: skandhadeśe sthitair bāṇaiḥ śikhaṇḍī ca rarāja ha
GE07mbh_08_u:018.069c: śākhāpratānair vimalaiḥ sumahān sa yathā drumaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.070a: tāv anyonyaṃ bhṛśaṃ viddhvā rudhireṇa samukṣitau
GE07mbh_08_u:018.070b-0147_05: bhujagāv iva saṃkruddhau rejatus tau narottamau
GE07mbh_08_u:018.071a: anyonyasya vadhe yatnaṃ kurvāṇau tau mahārathau
GE07mbh_08_u:018.073a: tato 'sya samare bāṇaṃ bhojaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:018.074a: sa tenābhihato rājan mūrchām āśu samāviśat
GE07mbh_08_u:018.075a: apovāha raṇāt taṃ tu sārathī rathināṃ varam
GE07mbh_08_u:018.076a: parājite tataḥ śūre drupadasya sute prabho
GE07mbh_08_u:019.002a: pratyudyayus trigartās taṃ śibayaḥ kauravaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_08_u:019.002c: śālvāḥ saṃśaptakāś caiva nārāyaṇabalaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_08_u:019.003c: sauśrutiś citrasenaś ca mitravarmā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:019.003d-0148_01: suśarmā ca sudharmā ca suvarmā caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:019.006a: te tv arjunaṃ samāsādya yodhāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.006c: agacchan vilayaṃ sarve tārkṣyaṃ dṛṣṭveva pannagāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.007a: te vadhyamānāḥ samare nājahuḥ pāṇḍavaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:019.007c: dahyamānā yathā rājañ śalabhā iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_08_u:019.008a: satyasenas tribhir bāṇair vivyādha yudhi pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_08_u:019.008c: mitradevas triṣaṣṭyā ca candradevaś ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.009c: śatruṃjayaś ca viṃśatyā suśarmā navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.009d-0149_01: sa viddho bahubhiḥ saṃkhye prativivyādha tān nṛpān
GE07mbh_08_u:019.009d-0150_01: sauśrutiṃ saptabhir viddhvā satyasenaṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.010a: śatruṃjayaṃ ca rājānaṃ hatvā tatra śilāśitaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.010e: tvaritaś candradevaṃ ca śarair ninye yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_08_u:019.012a: satyasenas tu saṃkruddhas tomaraṃ vyasṛjan mahat
GE07mbh_08_u:019.012c: samuddiśya raṇe kṛṣṇaṃ siṃhanādaṃ nanāda ca
GE07mbh_08_u:019.013a: sa nirbhidya bhujaṃ savyaṃ mādhavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.014c: pratodaḥ prāpatad dhastād raśmayaś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:019.014d-0156_02: krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ kṛṣṇaṃ cedam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_08_u:019.014d-0157_01: yāvad enaṃ śarais tīkṣṇair nayāmi yamasādanam
GE07mbh_08_u:019.015a: sa pratodaṃ punar gṛhya raśmīṃś caiva mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.015c: vāhayām āsa tān aśvān satyasenarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_08_u:019.016a: viṣvaksenaṃ tu nirbhinnaṃ prekṣya pārtho dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.017a: tataḥ suniśitair bāṇai rājñas tasya mahac chiraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.018a: taṃ nihatya śitair bāṇair mitravarmāṇam ākṣipat
GE07mbh_08_u:019.021c: śastraughair mamṛduḥ kruddhā nādayanto diśo daśa
GE07mbh_08_u:019.024a: akṣāṇām atha yoktrāṇāṃ cakrāṇāṃ raśmibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_08_u:019.025a: aśmanāṃ patatāṃ caiva prāsānām ṛṣṭibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_08_u:019.025c: gadānāṃ parighāṇāṃ ca śaktīnāṃ tomaraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_08_u:019.027a: hārāṇām atha niṣkāṇāṃ tanutrāṇāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:019.027c: chatrāṇāṃ vyajanānāṃ ca śirasāṃ mukuṭaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_08_u:019.027e: aśrūyata mahāñ śabdas tatra tatra viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:019.030a: nihatai rājaputraiś ca kṣatriyaiś ca mahābalaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.030c: hastibhiḥ patitaiś caiva turagaiś cābhavan mahī
GE07mbh_08_u:019.031c: nighnataḥ śātravān bhallair hastyaśvaṃ cāmitaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_08_u:019.032b-0163_01: āsāditas tato rājan rathacakraṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:019.034a: vadhyamānaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ pāṇḍuputreṇa dhanvinā
GE07mbh_08_u:019.035a: tāñ jitvā samare jiṣṇuḥ saṃśaptakagaṇān bahūn
GE07mbh_08_u:019.035c: rarāja sa mahārāja vidhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan
GE07mbh_08_u:019.037a: tam āpatantaṃ sahasā tava putraṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_08_u:019.037c: dharmarājo drutaṃ viddhvā tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:019.038a: sā ca taṃ prativivyādha navabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.040a: caturbhiś caturo vāhāṃs tasya hatvā mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.040c: pañcamena śiraḥ kāyāt sārathes tu samākṣipat
GE07mbh_08_u:019.041a: ṣaṣṭhena ca dhvajaṃ rājñaḥ saptamena ca kārmukam
GE07mbh_08_u:019.041c: aṣṭamena tathā khaḍgaṃ pātayām āsa bhūtale
GE07mbh_08_u:019.042a: hatāśvāt tu rathāt tasmād avaplutya sutas tava
GE07mbh_08_u:019.042c: uttamaṃ vyasanaṃ prāpto bhūmāv eva vyatiṣṭhata
GE07mbh_08_u:019.044c: abhyayuḥ samare rājaṃs tato yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_08_u:019.045e: yad abhyagacchan samare pāñcālāḥ kauravaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_08_u:019.045f-0165_01: te śūrāḥ samare sarve prākṣīyanta tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.046c: rathāś ca rathibhiḥ sārdhaṃ hayāś ca hayasādibhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.047b-0166_01: tāvakānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca citrāṇi ca gurūṇi ca
GE07mbh_08_u:019.047d-0167_01: te śūrāḥ samare sarve citraṃ laghu ca suṣṭhu ca
GE07mbh_08_u:019.048e: na hi te samaraṃ cakruḥ pṛṣṭhato vai kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_08_u:019.049a: muhūrtam eva tad yuddham āsīn madhuradarśanam
GE07mbh_08_u:019.051a: nāgā hayān samāsādya vikṣipanto bahūn atha
GE07mbh_08_u:019.051c: drāvayām āsur atyugrās tatra tatra tadā tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:019.051d-0168_03: dhāvamānāṃs tatas tāṃs tu dravamāṇān mahāgajān
GE07mbh_08_u:019.052a: vidrāvya ca bahūn aśvān nāgā rājan balotkaṭāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.052c: viṣāṇaiś cāpare jaghnur mamṛduś cāpare bhṛśam
GE07mbh_08_u:019.053a: sāśvārohāṃś ca turagān viṣāṇair bibhidū raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:019.054c: cakrur ārtasvaraṃ ghoraṃ vyadravanta diśo daśa
GE07mbh_08_u:019.056c: jagṛhur bibhiduś caiva citrāṇy ābharaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_08_u:019.056d-0169_01: tāṃs tu tatra prasaktān vai parivārya padātayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.056d-0169_03: apare hastibhir hastaiḥ khaṃ vikṣiptā mahāmṛdhe
GE07mbh_08_u:019.056d-0169_05: apare sahasā gṛhya viṣāṇair eva sūditāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.056d-0169_06: senāntaraṃ samāsādya ke cit tatra mahāgajaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.056d-0169_07: kṣuṇṇagātrā mahārāja vikṣipya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.056d-0169_09: puraḥsarāś ca nāgānām apareṣāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:019.058a: nigṛhya ca gadāḥ ke cit pārśvasthair bhṛśadāruṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.058b-0170_01: nāgāś ca śataśo rājan nirbhinnā bhūmim āviśan
GE07mbh_08_u:019.059a: sarathaṃ sādinaṃ tatra apare tu mahāgajāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.059d-0171_01: tathā sāvaraṇān kāṃś cit tatra tatra viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:019.060a: rathaṃ nāgāḥ samāsādya dhuri gṛhya ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:019.062a: yodhā yodhān samāsādya muṣṭibhir vyahanan yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:019.062c: keśeṣv anyonyam ākṣipya cicchidur bibhiduḥ saha
GE07mbh_08_u:019.063a: udyamya ca bhujāv anyo nikṣipya ca mahītale
GE07mbh_08_u:019.063c: padā coraḥ samākramya sphurato vyahanac chiraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.064a: mṛtam anyo mahārāja padbhyāṃ tāḍitavāṃs tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:019.064c: jīvataś ca tathaivānyaḥ śastraṃ kāye nyamajjayat
GE07mbh_08_u:019.065a: muṣṭiyuddhaṃ mahac cāsīd yodhānāṃ tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:019.065c: tathā keśagrahaś cogro bāhuyuddhaṃ ca kevalam
GE07mbh_08_u:019.067a: saṃsakteṣu ca yodheṣu vartamāne ca saṃkule
GE07mbh_08_u:019.070a: naiva sve na pare rājan vijñāyante śarāturāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.071a: svān sve jaghnur mahārāja parāṃś caiva samāgatān
GE07mbh_08_u:019.072a: rathair bhagnair mahārāja vāraṇaiś ca nipātitaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.072c: hayaiś ca patitais tatra naraiś ca vinipātitaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.074a: pāñcālān avadhīt karṇas trigartāṃś ca dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:019.074c: bhīmasenaḥ kurūn rājan hastyanīkaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:020.002a: tathā tu me kathayase yathā yuddhaṃ tu vartate
GE07mbh_08_u:020.002c: na santi sūta kauravyā iti me naiṣṭhikī matiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:020.003a: duryodhanas tu virathaḥ kṛtas tatra mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:020.003c: dharmaputraḥ kathaṃ cakre tasmin vā nṛpatiḥ katham
GE07mbh_08_u:020.004c: tan mamācakṣva tattvena kuśalo hy asi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:020.005c: ratham anyaṃ samāsthāya putras tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:020.006b-0174_03: śriyā jvalantaṃ kaunteyaṃ yathā vajradharaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:020.006c: duryodhanas tu dṛṣṭvā vai dharmarājaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_08_u:020.006e: uvāca sūta tvaritaṃ yāhi yāhīti bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:020.007a: atra māṃ prāpaya kṣipraṃ sārathe yatra pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:020.008a: sa sūtaś codito rājñā rājñaḥ syandanam uttamam
GE07mbh_08_u:020.009a: tato yudhiṣṭhiraḥ kruddhaḥ pramatta iva sadgavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:020.009c: sārathiṃ codayām āsa yāhi yatra suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:020.013a: duryodhanasya ciccheda dhvajaṃ kārmukam eva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:020.015a: anyonyaṃ jaghnatuś caiva nardamānau vṛṣāv iva
GE07mbh_08_u:020.015c: anyonyaṃ prekṣamāṇau ca ceratus tau mahārathau
GE07mbh_08_u:020.015d-0177_01: antaraṃ nāgamat tatra rājā naiva suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:020.017a: tato rājan pratibhayān siṃhanādān muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:020.017c: talayoś ca tathā śabdān dhanuṣoś ca mahāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:020.018c: anyonyaṃ ca mahārāja pīḍayāṃ cakratur bhṛśam
GE07mbh_08_u:020.019a: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā tava putraṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:020.020a: prativivyādha taṃ tūrṇaṃ tava putro mahīpatim
GE07mbh_08_u:020.021a: tato duryodhano rājā śaktiṃ cikṣepa bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:020.022c: tribhiś ciccheda sahasā taṃ ca vivyādha saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:020.024a: śaktiṃ vinihatāṃ dṛṣṭvā putras tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:020.026a: samādhatta ca taṃ bāṇaṃ dhanuṣy ugraṃ mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:020.026c: cikṣepa ca tato rājā rājñaḥ kruddhaḥ parākramī
GE07mbh_08_u:020.027a: sa tu bāṇaḥ samāsādya tava putraṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_08_u:020.027c: vyamohayata rājānaṃ dharaṇīṃ ca jagāma ha
GE07mbh_08_u:020.028a: tato duryodhanaḥ kruddho gadām udyamya vegitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:020.030a: rathasthaḥ sa tayā viddho varma bhittvā mahāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:020.030c: bhṛśaṃ saṃvignahṛdayaḥ papāta ca mumoha ca
GE07mbh_08_u:020.030d-0179_01: bhīmas tam āha ca tataḥ pratijñām anucintayan
GE07mbh_08_u:020.030d-0179_02: nāyaṃ vadhyas tava nṛpa ity uktaḥ sa nyavartata
GE07mbh_08_u:020.032e: evaṃ tad abhavad yuddhaṃ tvadīyānāṃ paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_08_u:021.003c: dviradarathahayā mahāhave; varapuruṣaiḥ puruṣāś ca vāhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:021.006c: tad ahitanihataṃ babhau balaṃ; pitṛpatirāṣṭram iva prajākṣaye
GE07mbh_08_u:021.007a: atha tava naradeva sainikās; tava ca sutāḥ surasūnusaṃnibhāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:021.010a: tam api sarathavājisārathiṃ; śinivṛṣabho vividhaiḥ śarais tvaran
GE07mbh_08_u:021.012a: tam udadhinibham ādravad balī; tvaritataraiḥ samabhidrutaṃ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:021.013a: atha puruṣavarau kṛtāhnikau; bhavam abhipūjya yathāvidhi prabhum
GE07mbh_08_u:021.013c: arivadhakṛtaniścayau drutaṃ; tava balam arjunakeśavau sṛtau
GE07mbh_08_u:021.014c: sitahayam upayāntam antikaṃ; hṛtamanaso dadṛśus tadārayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:021.015a: atha visphārya gāṇḍīvaṃ raṇe nṛtyann ivārjunaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:021.015c: śarasaṃbādham akarot khaṃ diśaḥ pradiśas tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:021.017c: sādino 'śvāṃś ca pattīṃś ca śarair ninye yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_08_u:021.018a: tam antakam iva kruddham anivāryaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_08_u:021.019a: tasyārjuno dhanuḥ sūtaṃ ketum aśvāṃś ca sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:021.019c: hatvā saptabhir ekaikaṃ chatraṃ ciccheda patriṇā
GE07mbh_08_u:021.021a: tato drauṇer dhanuś chittvā hatvā cāśvavarāñ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:021.022a: hārdikyasya dhanuś chittvā dhvajaṃ cāśvaṃ tathāvadhīt
GE07mbh_08_u:021.023a: atha sātyakim utsṛjya tvaran karṇo 'rjunaṃ tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:021.023c: viddhvā vivyādha viṃśatyā kṛṣṇaṃ pārthaṃ punas tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:021.023d-0185_01: na glānir āsīt karṇasya kṣipataḥ sāyakān bahūn
GE07mbh_08_u:021.023d-0186_01: karṇasya sphurad atyarthaṃ prāsyataḥ sāyakān dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:021.024a: atha sātyakir āgatya karṇaṃ viddhvā śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:021.024c: navatyā navabhiś cograiḥ śatena punar ārdayat
GE07mbh_08_u:021.025a: tataḥ pravīrāḥ pāṇḍūnāṃ sarve karṇam apīḍayan
GE07mbh_08_u:021.026a: uttamaujā yuyutsuś ca yamau pārṣata eva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:021.026e: cekitānaś ca balavān dharmarājaś ca suvrataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:021.027e: bhāṣanto vāgbhir ugrābhiḥ sarve karṇavadhe vṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:021.028a: tāṃ śastravṛṣṭiṃ bahudhā chittvā karṇaḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:021.028c: apovāha sma tān sarvān drumān bhaṅktveva mārutaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:021.029c: śaravrātāṃś ca saṃkruddho nighnan karṇo vyadṛśyata
GE07mbh_08_u:021.031c: diśaḥ khaṃ caiva bhūmiṃ ca prāvṛṇoc charavṛṣṭibhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:021.032c: śataghnya iva cāpy anye vajrāṇy ugrāṇi vāpare
GE07mbh_08_u:021.034c: vadhyamānāḥ śarair anye tadā bhītāḥ pradudruvuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:021.035a: evaṃ teṣāṃ tadā yuddhe saṃsaktānāṃ jayaiṣiṇām
GE07mbh_08_u:021.036a: tamasā ca mahārāja rajasā ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:021.036c: na kiṃ cit pratyapaśyāma śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
GE07mbh_08_u:021.038a: kauraveṣu ca yāteṣu tadā rājan dinakṣaye
GE07mbh_08_u:021.038c: jayaṃ sumanasaḥ prāpya pārthāḥ svaśibiraṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:021.040a: kṛte 'vahāre tair vīraiḥ sainikāḥ sarva eva te
GE07mbh_08_u:021.041d-0187_01: raṇe pravṛttāny ahani kathayantaḥ sukhaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:022.001a: svena cchandena naḥ sarvān nāvadhīd vyaktam arjunaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.001c: na hy asya samare mucyetāntako 'py ātatāyinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.002a: pārtho hy eko 'harad bhadrām ekaś cāgnim atarpayat
GE07mbh_08_u:022.002c: ekaś cemāṃ mahīṃ jitvā cakre balibhṛto nṛpān
GE07mbh_08_u:022.003b-0188_01: nivātakavacānāṃ ca tisraḥ koṭīr jaghāna ha
GE07mbh_08_u:022.004e: te na nindyāḥ praśasyāś ca yat te cakrur bravīhi tat
GE07mbh_08_u:022.004f-0189_01: tato duryodhanaḥ sūta paścāt kim akarot tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:022.006a: śibirasthāḥ punar mantraṃ mantrayanti sma kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.007a: tān abravīt tataḥ karṇaḥ kruddhaḥ sarpa iva śvasan
GE07mbh_08_u:022.008a: yatto dṛḍhaś ca dakṣaś ca dhṛtimān arjunaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_08_u:022.008c: sa bodhayati cāpy enaṃ prāptakālam adhokṣajaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.009c: śvas tv ahaṃ tasya saṃkalpaṃ sarvaṃ hantā mahīpate
GE07mbh_08_u:022.010a: evam uktas tathety uktvā so 'nujajñe nṛpottamān
GE07mbh_08_u:022.010b-0190_01: te 'nujñātā nṛpāḥ sarve svāni veśmāni bhejire
GE07mbh_08_u:022.010c: sukhoṣitās te rajanīṃ hṛṣṭā yuddhāya niryayuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.013d-0191_01: sarveṣāṃ caiva sainyānāṃ karṇam evāgaman manaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.014a: yad vo 'gaman mano mandāḥ karṇaṃ vaikartanaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:022.014c: apy adrākṣata taṃ yūyaṃ śītārtā iva bhāskaram
GE07mbh_08_u:022.015a: kṛte 'vahāre sainyānāṃ pravṛtte ca raṇe punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.015e: kathaṃ ca pāṇḍavāḥ sarve yuyudhus tatra sūtajam
GE07mbh_08_u:022.016a: karṇo hy eko mahābāhur hanyāt pārthān sasomakān
GE07mbh_08_u:022.016f-0192_01: mama caiva sadā mandaḥ śaṃsate nityam agrataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.016f-0192_02: karṇaś ca tān maheṣvāsān pāṇḍuputrān mahārathān
GE07mbh_08_u:022.018a: karṇam āśritya saṃgrāme darpo duryodhane punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.019a: aho bata mahad duḥkhaṃ yatra pāṇḍusutān raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:022.019c: nātarad rabhasaḥ karṇo daivaṃ nūnaṃ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:022.019e: aho dyūtasya niṣṭheyaṃ ghorā saṃprati vartate
GE07mbh_08_u:022.021a: saubalaṃ ca tathā tāta nītimān iti manyate
GE07mbh_08_u:022.021b-0193_01: karṇaś ca rabhaso nityaṃ rājānaṃ cāpy anuvrataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.021b-0194_01: karṇaṃ cāpratimaṃ yuddhe devair api durutsaham
GE07mbh_08_u:022.021b-0194_02: manyate 'bhyadhikaṃ pārthād daivaṃ cāsya hṛdi sthitam
GE07mbh_08_u:022.022c: aśrauṣaṃ nihatān putrān nityam eva ca nirjitān
GE07mbh_08_u:022.023a: na pāṇḍavānāṃ samare kaś cid asti nivārakaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.023c: strīmadhyam iva gāhanti daivaṃ hi balavattaram saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:022.024a: atikrāntaṃ hi yat kāryaṃ paścāc cintayatīti ca
GE07mbh_08_u:022.024c: tac cāsya na bhavet kāryaṃ cintayā ca vinaśyati
GE07mbh_08_u:022.025a: tad idaṃ tava kāryaṃ tu dūraprāptaṃ vijānatā
GE07mbh_08_u:022.025c: na kṛtaṃ yat tvayā pūrvaṃ prāptāprāptavicāraṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:022.026a: ukto 'si bahudhā rājan mā yudhyasveti pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.026c: gṛhṇīṣe na ca tan mohāt pāṇḍaveṣu viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:022.028a: tat tv idānīm atikramya mā śuco bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_08_u:022.028c: śṛṇu sarvaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ ghoraṃ vaiśasam acyuta
GE07mbh_08_u:022.029a: prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ tu karṇo rājānam abhyayāt
GE07mbh_08_u:022.030c: haniṣyāmi ca taṃ vīraṃ sa vā māṃ nihaniṣyati
GE07mbh_08_u:022.031a: bahutvān mama kāryāṇāṃ tathā pārthasya pārthiva
GE07mbh_08_u:022.031c: nābhūt samāgamo rājan mama caivārjunasya ca
GE07mbh_08_u:022.032a: idaṃ tu me yathāprajñaṃ śṛṇu vākyaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:022.032c: anihatya raṇe pārthaṃ nāham eṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:022.033a: hatapravīre sainye 'smin mayi caiva sthite yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:022.034a: tataḥ śreyaskaraṃ yat te tan nibodha janeśvara
GE07mbh_08_u:022.034c: āyudhānāṃ ca yad vīryaṃ dravyāṇām arjunasya ca
GE07mbh_08_u:022.035c: sauṣṭhave cāstrayoge ca savyasācī na matsamaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.035d-0196_01: prāṇe śaurye ca vijñāne vikrame cāpi bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:022.037a: yena daityagaṇān rājañ jitavān vai śatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.037c: yasya ghoṣeṇa daityānāṃ vimuhyanti diśo daśa
GE07mbh_08_u:022.038a: tad divyaṃ bhārgavo mahyam adadād dhanur uttamam
GE07mbh_08_u:022.038c: yena yotsye mahābāhum arjunaṃ jayatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_08_u:022.038e: yathendraḥ samare sarvān daiteyān vai samāgatān
GE07mbh_08_u:022.038f-0197_01: nijaghāna tathā sarvāñ jeṣyāmi yudhi pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_08_u:022.039a: dhanur ghoraṃ rāmadattaṃ gāṇḍīvāt tad viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_08_u:022.040a: dhanuṣo yasya karmāṇi divyāni prāha bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.040c: tad rāmo hy adadān mahyaṃ yena yotsyāmi pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_08_u:022.041c: nihatya samare vīram arjunaṃ jayatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_08_u:022.044a: na hi māṃ samare soḍhuṃ sa śakto 'gniṃ tarur yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:022.044c: avaśyaṃ tu mayā vācyaṃ yena hīno 'smi phalgunāt
GE07mbh_08_u:022.045a: jyā tasya dhanuṣo divyā tathākṣayyau maheṣudhī
GE07mbh_08_u:022.045b-0198_01: sārathis tasya govindo mama tādṛṅ na vidyate
GE07mbh_08_u:022.045c: tasya divyaṃ dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ gāṇḍīvam ajaraṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:022.046a: vijayaṃ ca mahad divyaṃ mamāpi dhanur uttamam
GE07mbh_08_u:022.046c: tatrāham adhikaḥ pārthād dhanuṣā tena pārthiva
GE07mbh_08_u:022.047a: mayā cābhyadhiko vīraḥ pāṇḍavas tan nibodha me
GE07mbh_08_u:022.048a: agnidattaś ca vai divyo rathaḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.048c: acchedyaḥ sarvato vīra vājinaś ca manojavāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.048e: dhvajaś ca divyo dyutimān vānaro vismayaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.049a: kṛṣṇaś ca sraṣṭā jagato rathaṃ tam abhirakṣati
GE07mbh_08_u:022.049c: ebhir dravyair ahaṃ hīno yoddhum icchāmi pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_08_u:022.050a: ayaṃ tu sadṛśo vīraḥ śalyaḥ samitiśobhanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.050c: sārathyaṃ yadi me kuryād dhruvas te vijayo bhavet
GE07mbh_08_u:022.051a: tasya me sārathiḥ śalyo bhavatv asukaraḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.051c: nārācān gārdhrapatrāṃś ca śakaṭāni vahantu me
GE07mbh_08_u:022.052a: rathāś ca mukhyā rājendra yuktā vājibhir uttamaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.052c: āyāntu paścāt satataṃ mām eva bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_08_u:022.053a: evam abhyadhikaḥ pārthād bhaviṣyāmi guṇair aham
GE07mbh_08_u:022.053c: śalyo hy abhyadhikaḥ kṛṣṇād arjunād adhiko hy aham
GE07mbh_08_u:022.054c: tathā śalyo 'pi jānīte hayānāṃ vai mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.055a: bāhuvīrye samo nāsti madrarājasya kaś cana
GE07mbh_08_u:022.055c: tathāstrair matsamo nāsti kaś cid eva dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.056a: tathā śalyasamo nāsti hayayāne ha kaś cana
GE07mbh_08_u:022.056c: so 'yam abhyadhikaḥ pārthād bhaviṣyati ratho mama
GE07mbh_08_u:022.056d-0200_01: samudyātuṃ na śakṣyanti devā api savāsavāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.056d-0201_02: bhave yudhi jayeyaṃ ca phālgunaṃ kurusattama
GE07mbh_08_u:022.057b-0203_01: kriyatām eṣa kāmo me mā vaḥ kālo 'tyagād ayam
GE07mbh_08_u:022.057c: evaṃ kṛte kṛtaṃ mahyaṃ sarvakāmair bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_08_u:022.058a: tato draṣṭāsi samare yat kariṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:022.058c: sarvathā pāṇḍavān sarvāñ jeṣyāmy adya samāgatān
GE07mbh_08_u:022.058d-0204_01: na hi me samare śaktāḥ samudyātuṃ surāsurāḥ saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:022.058d-0204_02: kim u pāṇḍusutā rājan raṇe mānuṣayonayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.059a: sarvam etat kariṣyāmi yathā tvaṃ karṇa manyase
GE07mbh_08_u:022.060a: nārācān gārdhrapakṣāṃś ca śakaṭāni vahantu te
GE07mbh_08_u:022.060c: anuyāsyāma karṇa tvāṃ vayaṃ sarve ca pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:022.061a: evam uktvā mahārāja tava putrāḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_08_u:023.001a: putras tava mahārāja madrarājam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:023.001b-0205_01: evam ukto mahārāja tava putraḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_08_u:023.001b-0205_03: sarvaṃ tathākarot tūrṇaṃ rādheyas tad yad abravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:023.001b-0205_04: madrarājaṃ ca samare praṇamya ca mahāratham
GE07mbh_08_u:023.003a: śrutavān asi karṇasya bruvato vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_08_u:023.003c: yathā nṛpatisiṃhānāṃ madhye tvāṃ varayaty ayam
GE07mbh_08_u:023.003d-0207_01: tvaṃ pāhi sarvataḥ karṇaṃ bhavaṃ brahmeva suvrata
GE07mbh_08_u:023.004a: tasmāt pārthavināśārthaṃ hitārthaṃ mama caiva hi
GE07mbh_08_u:023.004c: sārathyaṃ rathināṃ śreṣṭha sumanāḥ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_08_u:023.004d-0208_01: tvayi yantari rādheyo vidviṣo me vijeṣyate
GE07mbh_08_u:023.004d-0208_02: abhīṣūṇāṃ hi karṇasya grahītānyo na vidyate
GE07mbh_08_u:023.005b-0209_01: ṛte hi tvāṃ mahābhāga vāsudevasamaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:023.005c: sa pātu sarvataḥ karṇaṃ bhavān brahmeva śaṃkaram
GE07mbh_08_u:023.006c: tathā tvam api rādheyaṃ sarvataḥ paripālaya
GE07mbh_08_u:023.006d-0210_01: yathā ca sarvathāpatsu vārṣṇeyaḥ pāti pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_08_u:023.007a: bhīṣmo droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ karṇo bhavān bhojaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_08_u:023.007c: śakuniḥ saubalo drauṇir aham eva ca no balam
GE07mbh_08_u:023.007e: eṣām eva kṛto bhāgo navadhā pṛtanāpate
GE07mbh_08_u:023.008a: naiva bhāgo 'tra bhīṣmasya droṇasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:023.008c: tābhyām atītya tau bhāgau nihatā mama śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:023.009a: vṛddhau hi tau naravyāghrau chalena nihatau ca tau
GE07mbh_08_u:023.009c: kṛtvā nasukaraṃ karma gatau svargam ito 'nagha
GE07mbh_08_u:023.010e: tyaktvā prāṇān yathāśakti ceṣṭāḥ kṛtvā ca puṣkalāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:023.010f-0211_01: tad idaṃ hatabhūyiṣṭhaṃ balaṃ mama narādhipa
GE07mbh_08_u:023.010f-0211_02: pūrvam apy alpakaiḥ pārthair hataṃ kim uta sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_08_u:023.010f-0211_04: balaṃ śeṣaṃ na hanyur me yathā tat kuru pārthiva
GE07mbh_08_u:023.010f-0212_01: hatavīram idaṃ sainyaṃ pāṇḍavaiḥ samare vibho
GE07mbh_08_u:023.011a: karṇo hy eko mahābāhur asmatpriyahite rataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:023.011f-0215_01: tasmāj jayāya me vīra sārathyaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_08_u:023.012b-0216_01: tathā karṇarathe rājaṃs tvam abhīṣugraho bhava
GE07mbh_08_u:023.012c: tena yukto raṇe pārtho rakṣyamāṇaś ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_08_u:023.012e: yāni karmāṇi kurute pratyakṣāṇi tathaiva te
GE07mbh_08_u:023.013a: pūrvaṃ na samare hy evam avadhīd arjuno ripūn
GE07mbh_08_u:023.013b-0217_01: idānīṃ vikramo hy asya kṛṣṇena sahitasya ca
GE07mbh_08_u:023.013c: ahany ahani madreśa drāvayan dṛśyate yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:023.014c: taṃ bhāgaṃ saha karṇena yugapan nāśayāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:023.014d-0218_01: aruṇena yathā sārdhaṃ tamaḥ sūryo vyapohati
GE07mbh_08_u:023.014d-0218_02: tathā karṇena sahito jahi pārthaṃ mahāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:023.015a: sūryāruṇau yathā dṛṣṭvā tamo naśyati māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:023.016a: rathānāṃ pravaraḥ karṇo yantṝṇāṃ pravaro bhavān
GE07mbh_08_u:023.016b-0220_01: saṃyogo yuvayor loke nābhūn na ca bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_08_u:023.016c: saṃnipātaḥ samo loke bhavator nāsti kaś cana
GE07mbh_08_u:023.017a: yathā sarvāsv avasthāsu vārṣṇeyaḥ pāti pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_08_u:023.017c: tathā bhavān paritrātu karṇaṃ vaikartanaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:023.017d-0221_02: yathā ca samare kṛṣṇo rakṣate sarvato 'rjunam
GE07mbh_08_u:023.017d-0221_03: tathā tvam api rādheyaṃ rakṣasva ca mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:023.018a: tvayā sārathinā hy eṣa apradhṛṣyo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_08_u:023.018e: kiṃ punaḥ pāṇḍaveyānāṃ mātiśaṅkīr vaco mama
GE07mbh_08_u:023.019b-0222_02: evam uktas tu sa krodhāt padā spṛṣṭa ivoragaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:023.019c: triśikhāṃ bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā dhunvan hastau punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:023.021a: avamanyase māṃ gāndhāre dhruvaṃ māṃ pariśaṅkase
GE07mbh_08_u:023.021c: yan māṃ bravīṣi visrabdhaṃ sārathyaṃ kriyatām iti
GE07mbh_08_u:023.022c: na cāhaṃ yudhi rādheyaṃ gaṇaye tulyam ātmanā
GE07mbh_08_u:023.023c: tam ahaṃ samare hatvā gamiṣyāmi yathāgatam
GE07mbh_08_u:023.024a: atha vāpy eka evāhaṃ yotsyāmi kurunandana
GE07mbh_08_u:023.024c: paśya vīryaṃ mamādya tvaṃ saṃgrāme dahato ripūn
GE07mbh_08_u:023.025a: na cābhikāmān kauravya vidhāya hṛdaye pumān
GE07mbh_08_u:023.025c: asmadvidhaḥ pravarteta mā mā tvam atiśaṅkithāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:023.026a: yudhi cāpy avamāno me na kartavyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_08_u:023.027a: dhanuḥ paśya ca me citraṃ śarāṃś cāśīviṣopamān
GE07mbh_08_u:023.027c: rathaṃ paśya ca me kḷptaṃ sadaśvair vātavegitaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:023.028a: dārayeyaṃ mahīṃ kruddho vikireyaṃ ca parvatān
GE07mbh_08_u:023.028c: śoṣayeyaṃ samudrāṃś ca tejasā svena pārthiva
GE07mbh_08_u:023.029a: tan mām evaṃvidhaṃ jānan samartham arinigrahe
GE07mbh_08_u:023.029d-0223_01: na cāpi mama rādheyaḥ kalām arhati ṣoḍaśīm
GE07mbh_08_u:023.029d-0223_02: sakarṇā ye trayo lokāḥ sārjunāḥ sajanārdanāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:023.029d-0223_03: nibaddhāṃs tān raṇe rājan na mucyeyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_08_u:023.029d-0223_04: tathāpi śaktaṃ kauravya vihāya hṛdayena mām
GE07mbh_08_u:023.029d-0223_05: na cāhaṃ prākṛtaḥ kaś cin na cāpy adhigataḥ svayam
GE07mbh_08_u:023.029d-0224_01: ayaṃ cāpy avamāno me na kartavyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_08_u:023.030a: na nāma dhuri rājendra prayoktuṃ tvam ihārhasi
GE07mbh_08_u:023.030c: na hi pāpīyasaḥ śreyān bhūtvā preṣyatvam utsahe
GE07mbh_08_u:023.031a: yo hy abhyupagataṃ prītyā garīyāṃsaṃ vaśe sthitam
GE07mbh_08_u:023.031c: vaśe pāpīyaso dhatte tat pāpam adharottaram
GE07mbh_08_u:023.032a: brāhmaṇā brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā mukhāt kṣatram athorasaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:023.032c: ūrubhyām asṛjad vaiśyāñ śūdrān padbhyām iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:023.034d-0225_01: prajānāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ dānaṃ yuddhaṃ kṣatrasya nirmitam
GE07mbh_08_u:023.035a: kṛṣiś ca pāśupālyaṃ ca viśāṃ dānaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:023.036c: na viṭśūdrasya tatraiva śṛṇu vākyaṃ mamānagha
GE07mbh_08_u:023.037c: mahārathaḥ samākhyātaḥ sevyaḥ stavyaś ca bandinām
GE07mbh_08_u:023.039a: avamānam ahaṃ prāpya na yotsyāmi kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_08_u:023.041a: praṇayād bahumānāc ca taṃ nigṛhya sutas tava
GE07mbh_08_u:023.042a: yathā śalya tvam ātthedam evam etad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_08_u:023.042c: abhiprāyas tu me kaś cit taṃ nibodha janeśvara
GE07mbh_08_u:023.043a: na karṇo 'bhyadhikas tvattaḥ śaṅke naiva kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_08_u:023.043c: na hi madreśvaro rājā kuryād yad anṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_08_u:023.044a: ṛtam eva hi pūrvās te vahanti puruṣottamāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:023.044b-0227_01: jñātam eva hi pūrvaṃ te vartma rājarṣisattama
GE07mbh_08_u:023.044c: tasmād ārtāyaniḥ prokto bhavān iti matir mama
GE07mbh_08_u:023.045a: śalyabhūtaś ca śatrūṇāṃ yasmāt tvaṃ bhuvi mānada
GE07mbh_08_u:023.045c: tasmāc chalyeti te nāma kathyate pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_08_u:023.046a: yad eva vyāhṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ bhavatā bhūridakṣiṇa
GE07mbh_08_u:023.046c: tad eva kuru dharmajña madarthaṃ yad yad ucyase
GE07mbh_08_u:023.047a: na ca tvatto hi rādheyo na cāham api vīryavān
GE07mbh_08_u:023.047c: vṛṇīmas tvāṃ hayāgryāṇāṃ yantāram iti saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:023.048a: yathā hy abhyadhikaṃ karṇaṃ guṇais tāta dhanaṃjayāt
GE07mbh_08_u:023.048c: vāsudevād api tvāṃ ca loko 'yam iti manyate
GE07mbh_08_u:023.049a: karṇo hy abhyadhikaḥ pārthād astrair eva nararṣabha
GE07mbh_08_u:023.049c: bhavān apy adhikaḥ kṛṣṇād aśvayāne bale tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:023.050c: dviguṇaṃ tvaṃ tathā vettha madrarāja na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:023.051a: yan mā bravīṣi gāndhāre madhye sainyasya kaurava
GE07mbh_08_u:023.051c: viśiṣṭaṃ devakīputrāt prītimān asmy ahaṃ tvayi
GE07mbh_08_u:023.052c: yudhyataḥ pāṇḍavāgryeṇa yathā tvaṃ vīra manyase
GE07mbh_08_u:023.053a: samayaś ca hi me vīra kaś cid vaikartanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_08_u:023.054a: tatheti rājan putras te saha karṇena bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:024.001a: bhūya eva tu madreśa yat te vakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_08_u:024.001c: yathā purā vṛttam idaṃ yuddhe devāsure vibho
GE07mbh_08_u:024.002a: yad uktavān pitur mahyaṃ mārkaṇḍeyo mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.002e: tvaṃ nibodha na cāpy atra kartavyā te vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_08_u:024.002f-0228_01: samutpannā hi rājānaḥ pramoha iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.003a: devānām asurāṇāṃ ca mahān āsīt samāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.003b-0229_02: te nirastāḥ kṛtā devair dānavā balagarvitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.003e: nirjitāś ca tadā daityā daivatair iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_08_u:024.004a: nirjiteṣu ca daityeṣu tārakasya sutās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.004c: tārākṣaḥ kamalākṣaś ca vidyunmālī ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_08_u:024.004d-0231_01: kaś cit prajāpatir ghoras tena sārdhaṃ mahātmanā
GE07mbh_08_u:024.004d-0231_02: yuddham āsīn mahāghoraṃ daivatair na iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.004d-0231_04: devair nirastā hy asurā niḥśvasyāmarṣitās tataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.005a: tapa ugraṃ samāsthāya niyame parame sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.005c: tapasā karśayām āsur dehān svāñ śatrutāpana
GE07mbh_08_u:024.006a: damena tapasā caiva niyamena ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_08_u:024.006c: teṣāṃ pitāmahaḥ prīto varadaḥ pradadau varān
GE07mbh_08_u:024.007a: avadhyatvaṃ ca te rājan sarvabhūteṣu sarvadā
GE07mbh_08_u:024.008a: tān abravīt tadā devo lokānāṃ prabhur īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.008e: varam anyaṃ vṛṇīdhvaṃ vai yādṛśaṃ saṃprarocate
GE07mbh_08_u:024.009a: tatas te sahitā rājan saṃpradhāryāsakṛd bahu
GE07mbh_08_u:024.009d-0232_01: vayam icchāma nagaraṃ kartuṃ kāmagamaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_08_u:024.009d-0232_04: na kṛtyābhir na śastraiś ca na śāpair brahmavādinām
GE07mbh_08_u:024.009d-0232_05: vadhyeta tripuraṃ devaṃ prasanne tvayi sādaram
GE07mbh_08_u:024.010a: asmākaṃ tvaṃ varaṃ deva prayacchemaṃ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_08_u:024.010c: vayaṃ purāṇi trīṇy eva samāsthāya mahīm imām
GE07mbh_08_u:024.011a: tato varṣasahasre tu sameṣyāmaḥ parasparam brahmovāca
GE07mbh_08_u:024.011b-0233_02: iti cintya vadhopāyaṃ kaṃ cid eva niśāmaya
GE07mbh_08_u:024.012a: samāgatāni caitāni yo hanyād bhagavaṃs tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:024.012c: ekeṣuṇā devavaraḥ sa no mṛtyur bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_08_u:024.012d-0234_01: teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā dānavānāṃ mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.012e: evam astv iti tān devaḥ pratyuktvā prāviśad divam
GE07mbh_08_u:024.013a: te tu labdhavarāḥ prītāḥ saṃpradhārya parasparam
GE07mbh_08_u:024.014a: tato mayaḥ svatapasā cakre dhīmān purāṇi ha
GE07mbh_08_u:024.014c: trīṇi kāñcanam ekaṃ tu raupyaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:024.015a: kāñcanaṃ divi tatrāsīd antarikṣe ca rājatam
GE07mbh_08_u:024.017c: prāsādair vividhaiś caiva dvāraiś cāpy upaśobhitam
GE07mbh_08_u:024.018a: pureṣu cābhavan rājan rājāno vai pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_08_u:024.019a: trayas te daityarājānas trīṃl lokān āśu tejasā
GE07mbh_08_u:024.019c: ākramya tasthur varṣāṇāṃ pūgān nāma prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.020d-0236_01: māṃsāśanāḥ sudṛptāś ca surair vinikṛtās tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:024.020e: mahad aiśvaryam icchantas tripuraṃ durgam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.021a: sarveṣāṃ ca punas teṣāṃ sarvayogavaho mayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.021c: tam āśritya hi te sarve avartantākutobhayāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.022a: yo hi yaṃ manasā kāmaṃ dadhyau tripurasaṃśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.022c: tasmai kāmaṃ mayas taṃ taṃ vidadhe māyayā tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:024.024a: sa tuṣṭam avṛṇod devaṃ vāpī bhavatu naḥ pure
GE07mbh_08_u:024.024c: śastrair vinihatā yatra kṣiptāḥ syur balavattarāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.025a: sa tu labdhvā varaṃ vīras tārakākṣasuto hariḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.025c: sasṛje tatra vāpīṃ tāṃ mṛtānāṃ jīvanīṃ prabho
GE07mbh_08_u:024.026a: yena rūpeṇa daityas tu yena veṣeṇa caiva ha
GE07mbh_08_u:024.026d-0238_02: evaṃ vīryeṇa saṃyuktāḥ kṛtās tena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_08_u:024.027a: tāṃ prāpya traipurasthās tu sarvāṃl lokān babādhire
GE07mbh_08_u:024.027b-0239_02: vidhāya sarvalokānāṃ hitaṃ pathyaṃ vidhāya ca
GE07mbh_08_u:024.027d-0240_01: ekasmin nihate daitye sṛjanti sma daśāsurān
GE07mbh_08_u:024.027e: na teṣām abhavad rājan kṣayo yuddhe kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_08_u:024.029a: vidrāvya sagaṇān devāṃs tatra tatra tadā tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:024.030c: ṛṣīṇām āśramān puṇyān yūpāñ janapadāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:024.030f-0241_01: nisthānāś ca kṛtā devā ṛṣayaḥ pitṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_08_u:024.030f-0241_02: daityais tribhis trayo lokā hy ākrāntās taiḥ suretaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.030f-0242_03: nāśakat tāny abhedyāni yadā bhettuṃ puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.030f-0242_05: tadā bhītaḥ surapatir muktvā tāni purāṇy atha
GE07mbh_08_u:024.031a: te devāḥ sahitāḥ sarve pitāmaham ariṃdama
GE07mbh_08_u:024.032a: te tattvaṃ sarvam ākhyāya śirasābhipraṇamya ca
GE07mbh_08_u:024.033a: śrutvā tad bhagavān devo devān idam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_08_u:024.033c: asurāś ca durātmānas te cāpi vibudhadviṣaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.033e: aparādhyanti satataṃ ye yuṣmān pīḍayanty uta
GE07mbh_08_u:024.033f-0245_01: na tvāstu tān ahaṃ manye ye vai yuṣmān apīḍayan
GE07mbh_08_u:024.034a: ahaṃ hi tulyaḥ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.034c: adhārmikās tu hantavyā ity ahaṃ prabravīmi vaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.034d-0246_02: na ca sthāṇumṛte śakto bhettum ekeṣuṇā puraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.035a: te yūyaṃ sthāṇum īśānaṃ jiṣṇum akliṣṭakāriṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:024.035c: yoddhāraṃ vṛṇutādityāḥ sa tān hantā suretarān
GE07mbh_08_u:024.036a: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā devāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.036b-0247_01: te devās tena vākyena coditāḥ praṇatāḥ sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.036b-0247_02: divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ vai tapas taptvā surarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.036c: brahmāṇam agrataḥ kṛtvā vṛṣāṅkaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.037a: tapaḥ paraṃ samātasthur gṛṇanto brahma śāśvatam
GE07mbh_08_u:024.037c: ṛṣibhiḥ saha dharmajñā bhavaṃ sarvātmanā gatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.037d-0248_01: devadevaṃ paraṃ sthāṇuṃ varadaṃ tryambakaṃ śivam
GE07mbh_08_u:024.039a: tapoviśeṣair bahubhir yogaṃ yo veda cātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.039c: yaḥ sāṃkhyam ātmano veda yasya cātmā vaśe sadā
GE07mbh_08_u:024.040a: te taṃ dadṛśur īśānaṃ tejorāśim umāpatim
GE07mbh_08_u:024.040b-0249_01: pareṇa yatnena bhavaṃ tridaśāḥ śarvam īśvaram
GE07mbh_08_u:024.041a: ekaṃ ca bhagavantaṃ te nānārūpam akalpayan
GE07mbh_08_u:024.042a: sarvabhūtamayaṃ ceśaṃ tam ajaṃ jagataḥ patim
GE07mbh_08_u:024.042c: devā brahmarṣayaś caiva śirobhir dharaṇīṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.044c: namo namas te 'stu vibho tata ity abruvan bhavam
GE07mbh_08_u:024.047b-0250_01: arhāya caiva śuddhāya kṣayāya krathanāya ca
GE07mbh_08_u:024.050c: gavāṃ ca pataye nityaṃ yajñānāṃ pataye namaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.051c: manovākkarmabhir deva tvāṃ prapannān bhajasva naḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.052c: provāca vyetu vastrāso brūta kiṃ karavāṇi vaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.052d-0251_01: devāḥ śarvasya vacanaṃ śrutvā harṣam upāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.053c: satkṛtya śaṃkaraṃ prāha brahmā lokahitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.053d-0252_01: imāny asuradurgāṇi lokāṃs trīn ākramanti ca
GE07mbh_08_u:024.053d-0252_02: kaś ca prajāpatir ghorāṃs tān sarvāñ jahi māciram
GE07mbh_08_u:024.054d-0253_01: nāsty anyo yudhi teṣāṃ vai nihantā iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_08_u:024.055c: tvām ṛte bhūtabhavyeśa tvaṃ hy eṣāṃ pratyarir vadhe
GE07mbh_08_u:024.056a: sa tvaṃ deva prapannānāṃ yācatāṃ ca divaukasām
GE07mbh_08_u:024.056c: kuru prasādaṃ deveśa dānavāñ jahi śūlabhṛt
GE07mbh_08_u:024.056d-0254_01: tvatprasāj jagat sarvaṃ sukham aidhata mānada
GE07mbh_08_u:024.056d-0254_02: śaraṇyas tvaṃ hi lokeśa te vayaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.057a: hantavyāḥ śatravaḥ sarve yuṣmākam iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.057c: na tv eko 'haṃ vadhe teṣāṃ samartho vai suradviṣām
GE07mbh_08_u:024.058c: jayadhvaṃ yudhi tāñ śatrūn saṃghāto hi mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.059a: asmattejobalaṃ yāvat tāvad dviguṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:024.059c: teṣām iti ha manyāmo dṛṣṭatejobalā hi te
GE07mbh_08_u:024.060a: vadhyās te sarvataḥ pāpā ye yuṣmāsv aparādhinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.060c: mama tejobalārdhena sarvāṃs tān ghnata śātravān
GE07mbh_08_u:024.061a: bibhartuṃ tejaso 'rdhaṃ te na śakṣyāmo maheśvara
GE07mbh_08_u:024.061c: sarveṣāṃ no balārdhena tvam eva jahi śātravān
GE07mbh_08_u:024.061d-0255_01: vayaṃ ca sarvathā deva rakṣaṇīyās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:024.061d-0255_02: sa no rakṣa mahādeva tvam eva jahi śātravān śrībhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:024.061d-0256_01: yadi śaktir na vaḥ kā cid vibhartuṃ māmakaṃ balam
GE07mbh_08_u:024.062a: tatas tatheti deveśas tair ukto rājasattama
GE07mbh_08_u:024.063a: sa tu devo balenāsīt sarvebhyo balavattaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.064a: tato 'bravīn mahādevo dhanur bāṇadharas tv aham
GE07mbh_08_u:024.064c: haniṣyāmi rathenājau tān ripūn vai divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.065a: te yūyaṃ me rathaṃ caiva dhanur bāṇaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:024.067d-0257_01: viṣṇuṃ somaṃ hutāśaṃ ca tasyeṣuṃ samakalpayan
GE07mbh_08_u:024.067d-0257_02: śṛṅgam agnir babhūvāsya bhallaḥ somo viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:024.067d-0257_03: kuḍmalaś cābhavad viṣṇus tasminn iṣuvare tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:024.069a: mandaraṃ parvataṃ cākṣaṃ jaṅghās tasya mahānadīḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.069c: diśaś ca pradiśaś caiva parivāraṃ rathasya hi
GE07mbh_08_u:024.069d-0258_07: gaṅgā sarasvatī sindhur dhuram ākāśam eva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:024.069d-0258_08: upaskaro rathasyāsann āpaḥ sarvāś ca nimnagāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.069d-0258_09: ahorātrāḥ kalāś caiva kāṣṭhāś ca ṛtavas tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:024.070a: anukarṣān grahān dīptān varūthaṃ cāpi tārakāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.071c: pakṣau pūrvāparau tatra kṛte rātryahanī śubhe
GE07mbh_08_u:024.072b-0259_01: yoktrāṇi cakrur nāgāṃś ca niḥśvasanto mahoragān
GE07mbh_08_u:024.072d-0260_03: diśaś ca pradiśaś caiva raśmayo rathavājinām
GE07mbh_08_u:024.073a: śamyāṃ dhṛtiṃ ca medhāṃ ca sthitiṃ saṃnatim eva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:024.074c: sinīvālīm anumatiṃ kuhūṃ rākāṃ ca suvratām
GE07mbh_08_u:024.074e: yoktrāṇi cakrur vāhānāṃ rohakāṃś cāpi kaṇṭhakam
GE07mbh_08_u:024.075a: karma satyaṃ tapo 'rthaś ca vihitās tatra raśmayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.075c: adhiṣṭhānaṃ manas tv āsīt parirathyaṃ sarasvatī
GE07mbh_08_u:024.076a: nānāvarṇāś ca citrāś ca patākāḥ pavaneritāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.076d-0262_02: yo yajñe vihitaḥ pūrvam īśānasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.076d-0262_03: saṃvatsaro dhanus tad vai sāvitrī jyā mahāsvanā
GE07mbh_08_u:024.076d-0262_04: divyaṃ ca varma vihitaṃ mahārhaṃ ratnabhūṣitam
GE07mbh_08_u:024.076d-0262_09: kḷptaṃ tu taṃ rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitā devatābhavan
GE07mbh_08_u:024.076d-0262_11: yuktaṃ nivedayām āsur devās tasmai mahātmane
GE07mbh_08_u:024.078a: svāny āyudhāni mukhyāni nyadadhāc chaṃkaro rathe
GE07mbh_08_u:024.080c: ṛgvedaḥ sāmavedaś ca purāṇaṃ ca puraḥsarāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.081c: divyā vācaś ca vidyāś ca paripārśvacarāḥ kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.082a: tottrādayaś ca rājendra vaṣaṭkāras tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:024.083a: vicitram ṛtubhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ kṛtvā saṃvatsaraṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.083b-0263_01: chāyām evātmanaś cakre dhanur jyām akṣayāṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:024.083b-0263_02: kālo hi bhagavān rudras tasya saṃvatsaro dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.083c: tasmān nṝṇāṃ kālarātrir jyā kṛtā dhanuṣo 'jarā
GE07mbh_08_u:024.084a: iṣuś cāpy abhavad viṣṇur jvalanaḥ soma eva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:024.084b-002_0001: **** **** balārdhaṃ yadi me devā na dhārayitum āhave
GE07mbh_08_u:024.084b-002_0002: **** **** śaktāḥ sarve hi saṃgamya yūyaṃ tat prabravīmi vaḥ

GE07mbh_08_u:024.084c: agnīṣomau jagat kṛtsnaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ cocyate jagat
GE07mbh_08_u:024.085c: tasmād dhanurjyāsaṃsparśaṃ na viṣehur harasya te
GE07mbh_08_u:024.088a: duścyāvaś cyāvano jetā hantā brahmadviṣāṃ haraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.088c: nityaṃ trātā ca hantā ca dharmādharmāśritāñ janān
GE07mbh_08_u:024.088d-0264_01: pramāthibhir balaṃ lebhe savegair damane dhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.089c: vibhāti bhagavān sthāṇus tair evātmaguṇair vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.090a: tasyāṅgāni samāśritya sthitaṃ viśvam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_08_u:024.091a: dṛṣṭvā tu taṃ rathaṃ divyaṃ kavacī sa śarāsanī
GE07mbh_08_u:024.092a: tasya vājāṃs tato devāḥ kalpayāṃ cakrire vibhoḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.093a: tam āsthāya mahādevas trāsayan daivatāny api
GE07mbh_08_u:024.093c: āruroha tadā yattaḥ kampayann iva rodasī
GE07mbh_08_u:024.094a: sa śobhamāno varadaḥ khaḍgī bāṇī śarāsanī
GE07mbh_08_u:024.094c: hasann ivābravīd devo sārathiḥ ko bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_08_u:024.095a: tam abruvan devagaṇā yaṃ bhavān saṃniyokṣyate
GE07mbh_08_u:024.095c: sa bhaviṣyati deveśa sārathis te na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.096a: tān abravīt punar devo mattaḥ śreṣṭhataro hi yaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.096c: taṃ sārathiṃ kurudhvaṃ me svayaṃ saṃcintya māciram
GE07mbh_08_u:024.097a: etac chrutvā tato devā vākyam uktaṃ mahātmanā
GE07mbh_08_u:024.098c: tathā ca kṛtam asmābhiḥ prasanno vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.099c: sārathiṃ tu na jānīmaḥ kaḥ syāt tasmin rathottame
GE07mbh_08_u:024.100a: tasmād vidhīyatāṃ kaś cit sārathir devasattama
GE07mbh_08_u:024.100c: saphalāṃ tāṃ giraṃ deva kartum arhasi no vibho
GE07mbh_08_u:024.101a: evam asmāsu hi purā bhagavann uktavān asi
GE07mbh_08_u:024.101c: hitaṃ kartāsmi bhavatām iti tat kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_08_u:024.102a: sa deva yukto rathasattamo no; durāvaro drāvaṇaḥ śātravāṇām
GE07mbh_08_u:024.102c: pinākapāṇir vihito 'tra yoddhā; vibhīṣayan dānavān udyato 'sau
GE07mbh_08_u:024.103a: tathaiva vedāś caturo hayāgryā; dharā saśailā ca ratho mahātman
GE07mbh_08_u:024.104a: tatra sārathir eṣṭavyaḥ sarvair etair viśeṣavān
GE07mbh_08_u:024.104c: tatpratiṣṭho ratho deva hayā yoddhā tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:024.104e: kavacāni ca śastrāṇi kārmukaṃ ca pitāmaha
GE07mbh_08_u:024.105a: tvām ṛte sārathiṃ tatra nānyaṃ paśyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_08_u:024.105c: tvaṃ hi sarvair guṇair yukto devatābhyo 'dhikaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_08_u:024.105d-0267_01: tvaṃ deva śakto loke 'smin niyantuṃ pradrutān imān
GE07mbh_08_u:024.105d-0267_02: vedāśvān sopaniṣadaḥ sārathir bhava naḥ svayam
GE07mbh_08_u:024.105d-0267_03: yoddhuṃ balena sattvena vayasā vinayena ca
GE07mbh_08_u:024.105d-0267_04: adhikaḥ sārathiḥ kāryo nāsti cānyo 'dhiko bhavān
GE07mbh_08_u:024.105d-0267_05: sa bhavāṃs tārayatv asmān kuru sārathyam avyaya
GE07mbh_08_u:024.105d-0267_06: bhavān abhyadhikas tvatto nānyo 'sti bhavitā tv iha
GE07mbh_08_u:024.105d-0267_07: tvaṃ hi deveśa sarvais tu viśiṣṭo vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_08_u:024.105d-0267_08: taṃ rathaṃ tvaṃ samāruhya saṃyaccha paramān hayān
GE07mbh_08_u:024.105d-0267_10: sa no rakṣa mahābāho daityebhyo mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_08_u:024.105d-0267_11: tvaṃ hi no gatir avyagra tvaṃ no goptā mahāvrata
GE07mbh_08_u:024.105d-0267_12: tvatprasādāt surāḥ sarve pūjyante tridive prabho

GE07mbh_08_u:024.114d-004_0008: nimittāni ca ghorāṇi tatra saṃdadhataḥ śaram

GE07mbh_08_u:024.120c: trailokyasāraṃ tam iṣuṃ mumoca tripuraṃ prati

GE07mbh_08_u:024.120d-0279_02: mahān ārtasvaro hy āsīt purāṇāṃ patatāṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_08_u:024.121a: evaṃ tat tripuraṃ dagdhaṃ dānavāś cāpy aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.122a: sa cātmakrodhajo vahnir hāhety uktvā nivāritaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.122b-0281_02: kālāgnim iva nirdagdhum utthitaṃ taṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.122c: mā kārṣīr bhasmasāl lokān iti tryakṣo 'bravīc ca tam
