GE07mbh_08_u:024.128d-0287_01: tvayā rājyaṃ sukhaṃ caiva jīvitaṃ jayam eva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:024.128d-0287_02: samāsaktaṃ mahīpāla kuru me hitam īpsitam
GE07mbh_08_u:024.128e: tvayi karṇaś ca rājyaṃ ca vayaṃ caiva pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.129a: imaṃ cāpy aparaṃ bhūya itihāsaṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_08_u:024.129c: pitur mama sakāśe yaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ prāha dharmavit
GE07mbh_08_u:024.130c: kuru śalya viniścitya mā bhūd atra vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_08_u:024.132a: sa tīvraṃ tapa āsthāya prasādayitavān bhavam
GE07mbh_08_u:024.133a: tasya tuṣṭo mahādevo bhaktyā ca praśamena ca
GE07mbh_08_u:024.133c: hṛdgataṃ cāsya vijñāya darśayām āsa śaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.134a: rāma tuṣṭo 'smi bhadraṃ te viditaṃ me tavepsitam
GE07mbh_08_u:024.134c: kuruṣva pūtam ātmānaṃ sarvam etad avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_08_u:024.135a: dāsyāmi te tadāstrāṇi yadā pūto bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_08_u:024.135c: apātram asamarthaṃ ca dahanty astrāṇi bhārgava
GE07mbh_08_u:024.136a: ity ukto jāmadagnyas tu devadevena śūlinā
GE07mbh_08_u:024.137a: yadā jānāsi deveśa pātraṃ mām astradhāraṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:024.137c: tadā śuśrūṣate 'strāṇi bhavān me dātum arhati
GE07mbh_08_u:024.138a: tataḥ sa tapasā caiva damena niyamena ca
GE07mbh_08_u:024.140a: abravīt tasya bahuśo guṇān devyāḥ samīpataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.140c: bhaktimān eṣa satataṃ mayi rāmo dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.141a: evaṃ tasya guṇān prīto bahuśo 'kathayat prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.142a: etasminn eva kāle tu daityā āsan mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.143a: tataḥ saṃbhūya vibudhās tān hantuṃ kṛtaniścayāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.143c: cakruḥ śatruvadhe yatnaṃ na śekur jetum eva te
GE07mbh_08_u:024.144c: prasādayantas taṃ bhaktyā jahi śatrugaṇān iti
GE07mbh_08_u:024.146a: ripūn bhārgava devānāṃ jahi sarvān samāgatān
GE07mbh_08_u:024.146d-0290_01: evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca tryambakaṃ varadaṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_08_u:024.146d-0291_01: evam uktas tu devena bhārgavaḥ sumahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.147a: akṛtāstrasya deveśa kā śaktir me maheśvara
GE07mbh_08_u:024.148c: vijitya ca ripūn sarvān guṇān prāpsyasi puṣkalān
GE07mbh_08_u:024.149a: etac chrutvā ca vacanaṃ pratigṛhya ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.150b-0292_03: ity uktā bhārgaveṇātha daityā yuddhaṃ pracakramuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.150b-0292_04: sa tān nihatya samare daityān bhārgavanandanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.152a: prītaś ca bhagavān devaḥ karmaṇā tena tasya vai
GE07mbh_08_u:024.153c: nipātāt tava śastrāṇāṃ śarīre yābhavad rujā
GE07mbh_08_u:024.154a: tayā te mānuṣaṃ karma vyapoḍhaṃ bhṛgunandana
GE07mbh_08_u:024.155c: labdhvā bahuvidhān rāmaḥ praṇamya śirasā śivam
GE07mbh_08_u:024.156a: anujñāṃ prāpya deveśāj jagāma sa mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.156c: evam etat purāvṛttaṃ tadā kathitavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.158a: vṛjinaṃ hi bhavet kiṃ cid yadi karṇasya pārthiva
GE07mbh_08_u:024.158c: nāsmai hy astrāṇi divyāni prādāsyad bhṛgunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.158d-0293_01: sūtena vardhito nityaṃ na śūdro nṛpa eva saḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.158d-0293_02: viśuddhayoniṃ vijñāya divyāny astrāṇy adāt prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.159a: nāpi sūtakule jātaṃ karṇaṃ manye kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_08_u:024.159d-0294_02: sarvathā na hy ayaṃ śalya karṇaḥ sūtakulodbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.161a: paśya hy asya bhujau pīnau nāgarājakaropamau
GE07mbh_08_u:024.161d-0295_01: na tv eṣa prākṛtaḥ kaś cit karṇo vaikartano vṛṣaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:024.161d-0295_02: mahātmā hy eṣa rājendra rāmaśiṣyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_08_u:025.001c: sārathyam akarot tatra yatra rudro 'bhavad rathī
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002c: tasmāt tvaṃ puruṣavyāghra niyaccha turagān yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0001: yathā devagaṇais tatra vṛto yatnāt pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0002: tathāsmābhir bhavān yatnāt karṇād abhyadhiko vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0003: yathā devair mahārāja īśvarād adhiko vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0004: tathā bhavān api kṣipraṃ rudrasyeva pitāmahaḥ śalya uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0008: yathā ca cakre sārathyaṃ bhavasya prapitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0010: kṛṣṇasya cāpi viditaṃ sarvam etat purā hy abhūt
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0011: yathā pitāmaho jajñe bhagavān sārathis tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0014: svayaṃbhūr iva rudrasya kṛṣṇaḥ pārthasya bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0015: yadi hanyāc ca kaunteyaṃ sūtaputraḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0016: dṛṣṭvā pārthaṃ hi nihataṃ svayaṃ yotsyati keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0018: na cāpi tasya kruddhasya vārṣṇeyasya mahātmanaḥ saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0019: sthāsyate pratyanīkeṣu kaś cid atra nṛpas tava
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0020: taṃ tathā bhāṣamāṇaṃ tu madrarājam ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0026: pratyakṣaṃ te mahābāho yathā rātrau ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0028: na cātiṣṭhata bībhatsuḥ pratyanīke kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0029: etāṃś ca divasān sarvān bhayena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0031: uktaś ca saṃjñayā rājan mūḍha audariko yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0032: mādrīputrau tathā śūrau yena jitvā mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0033: kam apy arthaṃ puraskṛtya na hatau yudhi māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0034: yena vṛṣṇipravīras tu sātyakiḥ sātvatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0035: nirjitya samare śūro virathaś ca balātkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0038: taṃ kathaṃ pāṇḍavā yuddhe vijeṣyanti mahāratham
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0039: yo hanyāt samare kruddho vajrahastaṃ puraṃdaram
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0041: bāhuvīryeṇa te tulyaḥ pṛthivyāṃ nāsti kaś cana
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0043: tatas tvam ucyase rājañ śalya ity arisūdana
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0044: tava bāhubalaṃ prāpya na śekuḥ sarvasātvatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0045: tava bāhubalād rājan kiṃ nu kṛṣṇo balādhikaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0046: yathā hi kṛṣṇena balaṃ dhāryaṃ vai phalgune hate
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0047: tathā karṇātyayībhāve tvayā dhāryaṃ mahad balam
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0049: kimarthaṃ ca bhavān sainyaṃ na haniṣyati māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0050: tvatkṛte padavīṃ gantum iccheyaṃ yudhi māriṣa śalya uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0052: yan māṃ bravīṣi gāndhāre agre sainyasya mānada
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0053: viśiṣṭaṃ devakīputrāt prītimān asmy ahaṃ tvayi
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0055: yudhyataḥ pāṇḍavāgryeṇa yathā tvāṃ vīra manyase
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0056: samayaś ca hi me vīra kaś cid vaikartanaṃ prati saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0058: tatheti rājan putras te saha karṇena māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0061: duryodhanas tadā hṛṣṭaḥ karṇaṃ tam abhiṣasvaje
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0062: abravīc ca punaḥ karṇaṃ stūyamānaḥ sutas tava
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0063: jahi pārthān raṇe sarvān mahendro dānavān iva
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0067: rājan madhurayā vācā punar enaṃ bravīhi vai
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0072: tasya tvaṃ puruṣavyāghra niyaccha turagān yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0073: karṇo hatvetarān sarvān phalgunaṃ hantum icchati
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0074: tasyābhīṣugrahe rājan prayāce tvāṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:025.002d-005_0076: tathā tvam api rādheyaṃ sarvataḥ paripālaya
GE07mbh_08_u:025.003a: tataḥ śalyaḥ pariṣvajya sutaṃ te vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:025.004a: evaṃ cen manyase rājan gāndhāre priyadarśana
GE07mbh_08_u:025.004c: tasmāt te yat priyaṃ kiṃ cit tat sarvaṃ karavāṇy aham
GE07mbh_08_u:025.005a: yatrāsmi bharataśreṣṭha yogyaḥ karmaṇi karhi cit
GE07mbh_08_u:025.005c: tatra sarvātmanā yukto vakṣye kāryadhuraṃ tava
GE07mbh_08_u:025.006a: yat tu karṇam ahaṃ brūyāṃ hitakāmaḥ priyāpriyam
GE07mbh_08_u:025.006c: mama tatkṣamatāṃ sarvaṃ bhavān karṇaś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:025.007a: īśānasya yathā brahmā yathā pārthasya keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:025.007c: tathā nityaṃ hite yukto madrarāja bhajasva naḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:025.009a: yat tu vidvan pravakṣyāmi pratyayārtham ahaṃ tava
GE07mbh_08_u:025.010a: ahaṃ śakrasya sārathye yogyo mātalivat prabho
GE07mbh_08_u:026.001a: ayaṃ te karṇa sārathyaṃ madrarājaḥ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_08_u:026.002a: yathā harihayair yuktaṃ saṃgṛhṇāti sa mātaliḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.003a: yodhe tvayi rathasthe ca madrarāje ca sārathau
GE07mbh_08_u:026.005c: ity ukto ratham āsthāya tatheti prāha bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:026.006c: svaṃ sūta syandanaṃ mahyaṃ kalpayety asakṛt tvaran
GE07mbh_08_u:026.007c: vidhivat kalpitaṃ bhartre jayety uktvā nyavedayat
GE07mbh_08_u:026.008a: taṃ rathaṃ rathināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ karṇo 'bhyarcya yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_08_u:026.009a: kṛtvā pradakṣiṇaṃ yatnād upasthāya ca bhāskaram
GE07mbh_08_u:026.011a: tataḥ śalyāsthitaṃ rājan karṇaḥ svaratham uttamam
GE07mbh_08_u:026.012c: vyabhrājetāṃ yathā meghaṃ sūryāgnī sahitau divi
GE07mbh_08_u:026.016c: duryodhanaḥ sma rādheyam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:026.018a: manogataṃ mama hy āsīd bhīṣmadroṇau mahārathau
GE07mbh_08_u:026.018c: arjunaṃ bhīmasenaṃ ca nihantārāv iti dhruvam
GE07mbh_08_u:026.019a: tābhyāṃ yad akṛtaṃ vīra vīrakarma mahāmṛdhe
GE07mbh_08_u:026.019c: tat karma kuru rādheya vajrapāṇir ivāparaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.020a: gṛhāṇa dharmarājaṃ vā jahi vā tvaṃ dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_08_u:026.020c: bhīmasenaṃ ca rādheya mādrīputrau yamāv api
GE07mbh_08_u:026.021a: jayaś ca te 'stu bhadraṃ ca prayāhi puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_08_u:026.023a: pratigṛhya tu tad vākyaṃ rathastho rathasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.024c: bhīmasenaṃ yamau cobhau rājānaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_08_u:026.025a: adya paśyatu me śalya bāhuvīryaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.026a: adya kṣepsyāmy ahaṃ śalya śarān paramatejanān
GE07mbh_08_u:026.026c: pāṇḍavānāṃ vināśāya duryodhanajayāya ca saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:026.026d-0298_01: etac chrutvā vacas tasya śalyaḥ karṇaṃ vaco 'bravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:026.027a: sūtaputra kathaṃ nu tvaṃ pāṇḍavān avamanyase
GE07mbh_08_u:026.028c: api saṃjanayeyur ye bhayaṃ sākṣāc chatakratoḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.029d-0299_03: yadā drakṣyasi saṃgrāme dharmaputraṃ yamau tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:026.029d-0299_06: pārthivān api cānyāṃs tvaṃ tadā naivaṃ vadiṣyasi
GE07mbh_08_u:026.030a: anādṛtya tu tad vākyaṃ madrarājena bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_08_u:026.030c: drakṣyasy adyety avocad vai śalyaṃ karṇo nareśvara
GE07mbh_08_u:026.032c: bāṇaśabdaiś ca vividhair garjitaiś ca tarasvinām
GE07mbh_08_u:026.032e: niryayus tāvakā yuddhe mṛtyuṃ kṛtvā nivartanam
GE07mbh_08_u:026.033a: prayāte tu tataḥ karṇe yodheṣu muditeṣu ca
GE07mbh_08_u:026.033c: cacāla pṛthivī rājan rarāsa ca suvisvaram
GE07mbh_08_u:026.034c: ulkāpātaś ca saṃjajñe diśāṃ dāhas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:026.034e: tathāśanyaś ca saṃpetur vavur vātāś ca dāruṇāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.035c: apasavyaṃ tadā cakrur vedayanto mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_08_u:026.036a: prasthitasya ca karṇasya nipetus turagā bhuvi
GE07mbh_08_u:026.037a: jajvaluś caiva śastrāṇi dhvajāś caiva cakampire
GE07mbh_08_u:026.037c: aśrūṇi ca vyamuñcanta vāhanāni viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:026.038a: ete cānye ca bahava utpātās tatra māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:026.039a: na ca tān gaṇayām āsuḥ sarve te daivamohitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.039c: prasthitaṃ sūtaputraṃ ca jayety ūcur narā bhuvi
GE07mbh_08_u:026.039e: nirjitān pāṇḍavāṃś caiva menire tava kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.040a: tato rathasthaḥ paravīrahantā; bhīṣmadroṇāv āttavīryau nirīkṣya
GE07mbh_08_u:026.040c: samajvalad bhārata pāvakābho; vaikartano 'sau rathakuñjaro vṛṣaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.041a: sa śalyam ābhāṣya jagāda vākyaṃ; pārthasya karmāpratimaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā
GE07mbh_08_u:026.041c: mānena darpeṇa ca dahyamānaḥ; krodhena dīpyann iva niḥśvasitvā
GE07mbh_08_u:026.042a: nāhaṃ mahendrād api vajrapāṇeḥ; kruddhād bibhemy āttadhanū rathasthaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.042c: dṛṣṭvā tu bhīṣmapramukhāñ śayānān; na tv eva māṃ sthiratā saṃjahāti
GE07mbh_08_u:026.043c: avadhyakalpau nihatau yadā parais; tato mamādyāpi raṇe 'sti sādhvasam
GE07mbh_08_u:026.044a: samīkṣya saṃkhye 'tibalān narādhipair; narāśvamātaṅgarathāñ śarair hatān
GE07mbh_08_u:026.044c: kathaṃ na sarvān ahitān raṇe 'vadhīn; mahāstravid brāhmaṇapuṃgavo guruḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.045a: sa saṃsmaran droṇahavaṃ mahāhave; bravīmi satyaṃ kuravo nibodhata
GE07mbh_08_u:026.045c: na vo mad anyaḥ prasahed raṇe 'rjunaṃ; kramāgataṃ mṛtyum ivograrūpiṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:026.046a: śikṣā prasādaś ca balaṃ dhṛtiś ca; droṇe mahāstrāṇi ca saṃnatiś ca
GE07mbh_08_u:026.046c: sa ced agān mṛtyuvaśaṃ mahātmā; sarvān anyān āturān adya manye
GE07mbh_08_u:026.047a: neha dhruvaṃ kiṃ cid api pracintyaṃ; vidur loke karmaṇo 'nityayogāt
GE07mbh_08_u:026.047c: sūryodaye ko hi vimuktasaṃśayo; garvaṃ kurvītādya gurau nipātite
GE07mbh_08_u:026.048a: na nūnam astrāṇi balaṃ parākramaḥ; kriyā sunītaṃ paramāyudhāni vā
GE07mbh_08_u:026.048c: alaṃ manuṣyasya sukhāya vartituṃ; tathā hi yuddhe nihataḥ parair guruḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.049c: naye bṛhaspatyuśanaḥsamaṃ sadā; na cainam astraṃ tad apāt suduḥsaham
GE07mbh_08_u:026.050c: mayā kṛtyam iti jānāmi śalya; prayāhi tasmād dviṣatām anīkam
GE07mbh_08_u:026.051a: yatra rājā pāṇḍavaḥ satyasaṃdho; vyavasthito bhīmasenārjunau ca
GE07mbh_08_u:026.051c: vāsudevaḥ sṛñjayāḥ sātyakiś ca; yamau ca kas tau viṣahen mad anyaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.052a: tasmāt kṣipraṃ madrapate prayāhi; raṇe pāñcālān pāṇḍavān sṛñjayāṃś ca
GE07mbh_08_u:026.052c: tān vā haniṣyāmi sametya saṃkhye; yāsyāmi vā droṇamukhāya manye
GE07mbh_08_u:026.053a: na tv evāhaṃ na gamiṣyāmi madhyaṃ; teṣāṃ śūrāṇām iti mā śalya viddhi
GE07mbh_08_u:026.053c: mitradroho marṣaṇīyo na me 'yaṃ; tyaktvā prāṇān anuyāsyāmi droṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:026.054c: ato vidvann abhiyāsyāmi pārthaṃ; diṣṭaṃ na śakyaṃ vyativartituṃ vai
GE07mbh_08_u:026.055a: kalyāṇavṛttaḥ satataṃ hi rājan; vaicitravīryasya suto mamāsīt
GE07mbh_08_u:026.055c: tasyārthasiddhyartham ahaṃ tyajāmi; priyān bhogān dustyajaṃ jīvitaṃ ca
GE07mbh_08_u:026.056c: rathaprabarhaṃ turagaprabarhair; yuktaṃ prādān mahyam idaṃ hi rāmaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.057a: dhanūṃṣi citrāṇi nirīkṣya śalya; dhvajaṃ gadāṃ sāyakāṃś cograrūpān
GE07mbh_08_u:026.057c: asiṃ ca dīptaṃ paramāyudhaṃ ca; śaṅkhaṃ ca śubhraṃ svanavantam ugram
GE07mbh_08_u:026.058c: imaṃ samāsthāya rathaṃ ratharṣabhaṃ; raṇe haniṣyāmy aham arjunaṃ balāt
GE07mbh_08_u:026.059a: taṃ cen mṛtyuḥ sarvaharo 'bhirakṣate; sadāpramattaḥ samare pāṇḍuputram
GE07mbh_08_u:026.059c: taṃ vā haniṣyāmi sametya yuddhe; yāsyāmi vā bhīṣmamukho yamāya
GE07mbh_08_u:026.060a: yamavaruṇakuberavāsavā vā; yadi yugapat sagaṇā mahāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:026.060c: jugupiṣava ihaitya pāṇḍavaṃ; kim u bahunā saha tair jayāmi tam
GE07mbh_08_u:026.061a: iti raṇarabhasasya katthatas; tad upaniśamya vacaḥ sa madrarāṭ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.061c: avahasad avamanya vīryavān; pratiṣiṣidhe ca jagāda cottaram
GE07mbh_08_u:026.062a: virama virama karṇa katthanād; atirabhaso 'syati cāpy ayuktavāk
GE07mbh_08_u:026.062c: kva ca hi naravaro dhanaṃjayaḥ; kva punar iha tvam upāramābudha
GE07mbh_08_u:026.063c: prasabham iha vilokya ko haret; puruṣavarāvarajām ṛte 'rjunāt
GE07mbh_08_u:026.064a: tribhuvanasṛjam īśvareśvaraṃ; ka iha pumān bhavam āhvayed yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:026.065c: iṣubhir ajayad agnigauravāt; svabhilaṣitaṃ ca havir dadau jayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.066a: smarasi nanu yadā parair hṛtaḥ; sa ca dhṛtarāṣṭrasuto vimokṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.066c: dinakaraja narottamair yadā; maruṣu bahūn vinihatya tān arīn
GE07mbh_08_u:026.067a: prathamam api palāyite tvayi; priyakalahā dhṛtarāṣṭrasūnavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.067c: smarasi nanu yadā pramocitāḥ; khacaragaṇān avajitya pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.068a: samuditabalavāhanāḥ punaḥ; puruṣavareṇa jitāḥ stha gograhe
GE07mbh_08_u:026.068c: sagurugurusutāḥ sabhīṣmakāḥ; kim u na jitaḥ sa tadā tvayārjunaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.069a: idam aparam upasthitaṃ punas; tava nidhanāya suyuddham adya vai
GE07mbh_08_u:026.069c: yadi na ripubhayāt palāyase; samaragato 'dya hato 'si sūtaja
GE07mbh_08_u:026.070a: iti bahuparuṣaṃ prabhāṣati; pramanasi madrapatau ripustavam
GE07mbh_08_u:026.070c: bhṛśam atiruṣitaḥ paraṃ vṛṣaḥ; kurupṛtanāpatir āha madrapam
GE07mbh_08_u:026.071a: bhavatu bhavatu kiṃ vikatthase; nanu mama tasya ca yuddham udyatam
GE07mbh_08_u:026.071c: yadi sa jayati māṃ mahāhave; tata idam astu sukatthitaṃ tava
GE07mbh_08_u:026.072a: evam astv iti madreśa uktvā nottaram uktavān
GE07mbh_08_u:026.072c: yāhi madreśa cāpy enaṃ karṇaḥ prāha yuyutsayā
GE07mbh_08_u:026.073a: sa rathaḥ prayayau śatrūñ śvetāśvaḥ śalyasārathiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.073c: nighnann amitrān samare tamo ghnan savitā yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:026.074a: tataḥ prāyāt prītimān vai rathena; vaiyāghreṇa śvetayujātha karṇaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:026.074c: sa cālokya dhvajinīṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ; dhanaṃjayaṃ tvarayā paryapṛcchat
GE07mbh_08_u:027.001a: prayān eva tadā karṇo harṣayan vāhinīṃ tava
GE07mbh_08_u:027.002c: tasmai dadyām abhipretaṃ varaṃ yaṃ manasecchati
GE07mbh_08_u:027.003a: sa cet tad abhimanyeta tasmai dadyām ahaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.003c: śakaṭaṃ ratnasaṃpūrṇaṃ yo me brūyād dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.003d-0303_01: atha vā śakaṭaṃ pūrṇaṃ ratnānāṃ ṣaḍgavāyutam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.003d-0303_02: dhuri kṣamair bṛhadbhiś ca gobhir yuktam akālikam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.004b-0304_01: śataṃ dadyāṃ gavāṃ tasmai naityakaṃ kāṃsyadohanam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.004b-0306_01: tathā tasmai punar dadyāṃ śvetam aśvatarīratham
GE07mbh_08_u:027.004b-0306_02: yuktam añjanakeśībhir yo me brūyād dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.004b-0307_01: atha vāsmai punar dadyāṃ varam anyad yathepsitam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.004c: anyaṃ tasmai punar dadyāṃ sauvarṇaṃ hastiṣaḍgavam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.005a: tathā tasmai punar dadyāṃ strīṇāṃ śatam alaṃkṛtam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.005d-0309_02: tasmai dadyāṃ śataṃ nāgāñ śataṃ grāmāñ śataṃ rathān
GE07mbh_08_u:027.005d-0309_03: suvarṇasya ca mukhyasya hayāgryāṇāṃ śataṃ śatān
GE07mbh_08_u:027.005d-0309_04: ṛddhyā guṇaiḥ sudāntāṃś ca dhuryavāhān suśikṣitān
GE07mbh_08_u:027.005d-0309_06: dadyāṃ tasmai savatsānāṃ yo me brūyād dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.006c: anyaṃ tasmai varaṃ dadyāṃ śvetān pañcaśatān hayān
GE07mbh_08_u:027.007c: sudāntān api caivāhaṃ dadyām aṣṭaśatān parān
GE07mbh_08_u:027.007d-0310_02: rathāñ jātyair hayair yuktān dadyām aṣṭādaśaiva tān
GE07mbh_08_u:027.007d-0311_01: anyam asmai varaṃ dadyāṃ dhuryān dāntāś catuḥśatam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.007d-0311_03: dadyām asmai payasvinyo yo me brūyād dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.008a: rathaṃ ca śubhraṃ sauvarṇaṃ dadyāṃ tasmai svalaṃkṛtam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.008c: yuktaṃ paramakāmbojair yo me brūyād dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.009a: anyaṃ tasmai varaṃ dadyāṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ śatāni ṣaṭ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.010b-0313_01: dadyāṃ varṇasya varṇasya hayāgryāṇāṃ śataṃ śatam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.010b-0313_04: tasmai dadyāṃ grāmaśataṃ śataṃ hastīñ śataṃ hayān
GE07mbh_08_u:027.010b-0314_01: anyaṃ tasmai varaṃ dadyāṃ vaiśyagrāmāṃś caturdaśa
GE07mbh_08_u:027.010b-0314_05: pratyagravayasāṃ dadyāṃ yo me brūyād dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.010c: anyaṃ tasmai varaṃ dadyāṃ yam asau kāmayet svayam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.011a: putradārān vihārāṃś ca yad anyad vittam asti me
GE07mbh_08_u:027.011c: tac ca tasmai punar dadyāṃ yad yat sa manasecchati
GE07mbh_08_u:027.012a: hatvā ca sahitau kṛṣṇau tayor vittāni sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.012c: tasmai dadyām ahaṃ yo me prabrūyāt keśavārjunau
GE07mbh_08_u:027.013a: etā vācaḥ subahuśaḥ karṇa uccārayan yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:027.014a: tā vācaḥ sūtaputrasya tathā yuktā niśamya tu
GE07mbh_08_u:027.017a: tathā prahṛṣṭe sainye tu plavamānaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_08_u:027.019a: bālyād iva tvaṃ tyajasi vasu vaiśravaṇo yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:027.020a: parāsṛjasi mithyā kiṃ kiṃ ca tvaṃ bahu mūḍhavat
GE07mbh_08_u:027.020c: apātradāne ye doṣās tān mohān nāvabudhyase
GE07mbh_08_u:027.021a: yat pravedayase vittaṃ bahutvena khalu tvayā
GE07mbh_08_u:027.021c: śakyaṃ bahuvidhair yajñair yaṣṭuṃ sūta yajasva taiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.022a: yac ca prārthayase hantuṃ kṛṣṇau mohān mṛṣaiva tat
GE07mbh_08_u:027.022c: na hi śuśruma saṃmarde kroṣṭrā siṃhau nipātitau
GE07mbh_08_u:027.023a: aprārthitaṃ prārthayase suhṛdo na hi santi te
GE07mbh_08_u:027.023c: ye tvāṃ na vārayanty āśu prapatantaṃ hutāśane
GE07mbh_08_u:027.024c: bahvabaddham akarṇīyaṃ ko hi brūyāj jijīviṣuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.025a: samudrataraṇaṃ dorbhyāṃ kaṇṭhe baddhvā yathā śilām
GE07mbh_08_u:027.025c: giryagrād vā nipatanaṃ tādṛk tava cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.026c: dhanaṃjayena yudhyasva śreyaś cet prāptum icchasi
GE07mbh_08_u:027.027a: hitārthaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrasya bravīmi tvā na hiṃsayā
GE07mbh_08_u:027.027c: śraddhatsvaitan mayā proktaṃ yadi te 'sti jijīviṣā
GE07mbh_08_u:027.028c: tvaṃ tu mitramukhaḥ śatrur māṃ bhīṣayitum icchasi
GE07mbh_08_u:027.029a: na mām asmād abhiprāyāt kaś cid adya nivartayet
GE07mbh_08_u:027.029c: apīndro vajram udyamya kiṃ nu martyaḥ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_08_u:027.030a: iti karṇasya vākyānte śalyaḥ prāhottaraṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.031a: yadā vai tvāṃ phalgunaveganunnā; jyācoditā hastavatā visṛṣṭāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.031c: anvetāraḥ kaṅkapatrāḥ śitāgrās; tadā tapsyasy arjunasyābhiyogāt
GE07mbh_08_u:027.032a: yadā divyaṃ dhanur ādāya pārthaḥ; prabhāsayan pṛtanāṃ savyasācī
GE07mbh_08_u:027.032c: tvām ardayeta niśitaiḥ pṛṣatkais; tadā paścāt tapsyase sūtaputra
GE07mbh_08_u:027.033a: bālaś candraṃ mātur aṅke śayāno; yathā kaś cit prārthayate 'pahartum
GE07mbh_08_u:027.033c: tadvan mohād yatamāno rathasthas; tvaṃ prārthayasy arjunam adya jetum
GE07mbh_08_u:027.034a: triśūlam āśliṣya sutīkṣṇadhāraṃ; sarvāṇi gātrāṇi nigharṣasi tvam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.035a: siddhaṃ siṃhaṃ kesariṇaṃ bṛhantaṃ; bālo mūḍhaḥ kṣudramṛgas tarasvī
GE07mbh_08_u:027.035c: samāhvayet tadvad etat tavādya; samāhvānaṃ sūtaputrārjunasya
GE07mbh_08_u:027.036a: mā sūtaputrāhvaya rājaputraṃ; mahāvīryaṃ kesariṇaṃ yathaiva
GE07mbh_08_u:027.036c: vane sṛgālaḥ piśitasya tṛpto; mā pārtham āsādya vinaṅkṣyasi tvam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.038a: bilasthaṃ kṛṣṇasarpaṃ tvaṃ bālyāt kāṣṭhena vidhyasi
GE07mbh_08_u:027.038c: mahāviṣaṃ pūrṇakośaṃ yat pārthaṃ yoddhum icchasi
GE07mbh_08_u:027.039c: sṛgāla iva mūḍhatvān nṛsiṃhaṃ karṇa pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.042c: vatsa āhvayase yuddhe karṇa pārthaṃ dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.044a: yathā ca svagṛhasthaḥ śvā vyāghraṃ vanagataṃ bhaṣet
GE07mbh_08_u:027.044c: tathā tvaṃ bhaṣase karṇa naravyāghraṃ dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.045a: sṛgālo 'pi vane karṇa śaśaiḥ parivṛto vasan
GE07mbh_08_u:027.045c: manyate siṃham ātmānaṃ yāvat siṃhaṃ na paśyati
GE07mbh_08_u:027.046a: tathā tvam api rādheya siṃham ātmānam icchasi
GE07mbh_08_u:027.047a: vyāghraṃ tvaṃ manyase ''tmānaṃ yāvat kṛṣṇau na paśyasi
GE07mbh_08_u:027.048c: tāvad eva tvayā karṇa śakyaṃ vaktuṃ yathecchasi
GE07mbh_08_u:027.049c: nardantam iva śārdūlaṃ dṛṣṭvā kroṣṭā bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_08_u:027.050a: nityam eva sṛgālas tvaṃ nityaṃ siṃho dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.051a: yathākhuḥ syād biḍālaś ca śvā vyāghraś ca balābale
GE07mbh_08_u:027.051c: yathā sṛgālaḥ siṃhaś ca yathā ca śaśakuñjarau
GE07mbh_08_u:027.052a: yathānṛtaṃ ca satyaṃ ca yathā cāpi viṣāmṛte
GE07mbh_08_u:027.052c: tathā tvam api pārthaś ca prakhyātāv ātmakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.054a: guṇān guṇavataḥ śalya guṇavān vetti nāguṇaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.054c: tvaṃ tu nityaṃ guṇair hīnaḥ kiṃ jñāsyasy aguṇo guṇān
GE07mbh_08_u:027.055a: arjunasya mahāstrāṇi krodhaṃ vīryaṃ dhanuḥ śarān
GE07mbh_08_u:027.055c: ahaṃ śalyābhijānāmi na tvaṃ jānāsi tat tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:027.056a: evam evātmano vīryam ahaṃ vīryaṃ ca pāṇḍave
GE07mbh_08_u:027.056c: jānann evāhvaye yuddhe śalya nāgniṃ pataṃgavat
GE07mbh_08_u:027.057a: asti cāyam iṣuḥ śalya supuṅkho raktabhojanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.059c: nirbhindyāṃ yena ruṣṭo 'ham api meruṃ mahāgirim
GE07mbh_08_u:027.060a: tam ahaṃ jātu nāsyeyam anyasmin phalgunād ṛte
GE07mbh_08_u:027.060c: kṛṣṇād vā devakīputrāt satyaṃ cātra śṛṇuṣva me
GE07mbh_08_u:027.061c: yotsye paramasaṃkruddhas tat karma sadṛśaṃ mama
GE07mbh_08_u:027.063a: tāv etau puruṣavyāghrau sametau syandane sthitau
GE07mbh_08_u:027.063c: mām ekam abhisaṃyātau sujātaṃ śalya paśya me
GE07mbh_08_u:027.064c: maṇī sūtra iva protau draṣṭāsi nihatau mayā
GE07mbh_08_u:027.066a: tvaṃ tu duṣprakṛtir mūḍho mahāyuddheṣv akovidaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.067a: saṃstauṣi tvaṃ tu kenāpi hetunā tau kudeśaja
GE07mbh_08_u:027.067c: tau hatvā samare hantā tvām addhā sahabāndhavam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.068c: suhṛd bhūtvā ripuḥ kiṃ māṃ kṛṣṇābhyāṃ bhīṣayann asi
GE07mbh_08_u:027.069a: tau vā mamādya hantārau hantāsmi samare sthitau
GE07mbh_08_u:027.069c: nāhaṃ bibhemi kṛṣṇābhyāṃ vijānann ātmano balam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.070c: aham eko haniṣyāmi joṣam āssva kudeśaja
GE07mbh_08_u:027.071a: striyo bālāś ca vṛddhāś ca prāyaḥ krīḍāgatā janāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.071e: tā gāthāḥ śṛṇu me śalya madrakeṣu durātmasu
GE07mbh_08_u:027.072c: śrutvā caikamanā mūḍha kṣama vā brūhi vottaram
GE07mbh_08_u:027.073a: mitradhruṅ madrako nityaṃ yo no dveṣṭi sa madrakaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.074c: yāvadantaṃ hi daurātmyaṃ madrakeṣv iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.075a: pitā mātā ca putraś ca śvaśrūśvaśuramātulāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.075c: jāmātā duhitā bhrātā naptā te te ca bāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.076c: puṃbhir vimiśrā nāryaś ca jñātājñātāḥ svayecchayā
GE07mbh_08_u:027.077c: pītvā sīdhuṃ sagomāṃsaṃ nardanti ca hasanti ca
GE07mbh_08_u:027.078a: yāni caivāpy abaddhāni pravartante ca kāmataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.079c: nāpi vairaṃ na sauhārdaṃ madrakeṣu samācaret
GE07mbh_08_u:027.080a: madrake saṃgataṃ nāsti madrako hi sacāpalaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.080c: madrakeṣu ca duḥsparśaṃ śaucaṃ gāndhārakeṣu ca
GE07mbh_08_u:027.082d-0318_01: tathaiva saṃgataṃ kṛtvā naraḥ patati madrakaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.082d-0319_01: na tathā saṃgataṃ cāpi madrakeṣv iha vidyate
GE07mbh_08_u:027.083a: madrake saṃgataṃ nāsti hataṃ vṛścikato viṣam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.083c: ātharvaṇena mantreṇa sarvā śāntiḥ kṛtā bhavet
GE07mbh_08_u:027.084c: kurvanti bheṣajaṃ prājñāḥ satyaṃ tac cāpi dṛśyate
GE07mbh_08_u:027.084e: evaṃ vidvañ joṣam āssva śṛṇu cātrottaraṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.085a: vāsāṃsy utsṛjya nṛtyanti striyo yā madyamohitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.085e: tāsāṃ putraḥ kathaṃ dharmaṃ madrako vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_08_u:027.086e: tvaṃ putras tādṛśīnāṃ hi dharmaṃ vaktum ihecchasi
GE07mbh_08_u:027.088a: mā mā suvīrakaṃ kaś cid yācatāṃ dayito mama
GE07mbh_08_u:027.088c: putraṃ dadyāṃ pratipadaṃ na tu dadyāṃ suvīrakam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.089c: ghasmarā naṣṭaśaucāś ca prāya ity anuśuśruma
GE07mbh_08_u:027.089d-0320_02: spṛṣṭvā vāgbhir na mṛdbhiś ca nityocchiṣṭā bhavanti hi
GE07mbh_08_u:027.090a: evamādi mayānyair vā śakyaṃ vaktuṃ bhaved bahu
GE07mbh_08_u:027.090c: ā keśāgrān nakhāgrāc ca vaktavyeṣu kuvartmasu
GE07mbh_08_u:027.091a: madrakāḥ sindhusauvīrā dharmaṃ vidyuḥ kathaṃ tv iha
GE07mbh_08_u:027.092a: eṣa mukhyatamo dharmaḥ kṣatriyasyeti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.092c: yad ājau nihataḥ śete sadbhiḥ samabhipūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.093a: āyudhānāṃ saṃparāye yan mucyeyam ahaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.093c: na me sa prathamaḥ kalpo nidhane svargam icchataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.094a: so 'haṃ priyaḥ sakhā cāsmi dhārtarāṣṭrasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.094c: tadarthe hi mama prāṇā yac ca me vidyate vasu
GE07mbh_08_u:027.095a: vyaktaṃ tvam apy upahitaḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ pāpadeśaja
GE07mbh_08_u:027.095c: yathā hy amitravat sarvaṃ tvam asmāsu pravartase
GE07mbh_08_u:027.096a: kāmaṃ na khalu śakyo 'haṃ tvadvidhānāṃ śatair api
GE07mbh_08_u:027.096c: saṃgrāmād vimukhaḥ kartuṃ dharmajña iva nāstikaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.097a: sāraṅga iva gharmārtaḥ kāmaṃ vilapa śuṣya ca
GE07mbh_08_u:027.098c: yā gatir guruṇā prāṅ me proktā rāmeṇa tāṃ smara
GE07mbh_08_u:027.099a: sveṣāṃ trāṇārtham udyuktaṃ vadhāya dviṣatām api
GE07mbh_08_u:027.099c: viddhi mām āsthitaṃ vṛttaṃ paurūravasam uttamam
GE07mbh_08_u:027.100a: na tad bhūtaṃ prapaśyāmi triṣu lokeṣu madraka
GE07mbh_08_u:027.100c: yo mām asmād abhiprāyād vārayed iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:027.101a: evaṃ vidvañ joṣam āssva trāsāt kiṃ bahu bhāṣase
GE07mbh_08_u:027.101c: mā tvā hatvā pradāsyāmi kravyādbhyo madrakādhama
GE07mbh_08_u:027.103a: punaś ced īdṛśaṃ vākyaṃ madrarāja vadiṣyasi
GE07mbh_08_u:027.104a: śrotāras tv idam adyeha draṣṭāro vā kudeśaja
GE07mbh_08_u:027.104c: karṇaṃ vā jaghnatuḥ kṛṣṇau karṇo vāpi jaghāna tau
GE07mbh_08_u:027.105a: evam uktvā tu rādheyaḥ punar eva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:028.002a: yathaiva matto madyena tvaṃ tathā na ca vā tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:028.003a: imāṃ kākopamāṃ karṇa procyamānāṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_08_u:028.003c: śrutvā yatheṣṭaṃ kuryās tvaṃ vihīna kulapāṃsana
GE07mbh_08_u:028.004a: nāham ātmani kiṃ cid vai kilbiṣaṃ karṇa saṃsmare
GE07mbh_08_u:028.004c: yena tvaṃ māṃ mahābāho hantum icchasy anāgasam
GE07mbh_08_u:028.005a: avaśyaṃ tu mayā vācyaṃ budhyatāṃ yadi te hitam
GE07mbh_08_u:028.006a: samaṃ ca viṣamaṃ caiva rathinaś ca balābalam
GE07mbh_08_u:028.006c: śramaḥ khedaś ca satataṃ hayānāṃ rathinā saha
GE07mbh_08_u:028.007c: bhāraś cāpy atibhāraś ca śalyānāṃ ca pratikriyā
GE07mbh_08_u:028.008a: astrayogaś ca yuddhaṃ ca nimittāni tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:028.008c: sarvam etan mayā jñeyaṃ rathasyāsya kuṭumbinā
GE07mbh_08_u:028.008e: atas tvāṃ kathaye karṇa nidarśanam idaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.014a: atha haṃsāḥ samudrānte kadā cid abhipātinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.015a: kumārakās tato haṃsān dṛṣṭvā kākam athābruvan
GE07mbh_08_u:028.015c: bhavān eva viśiṣṭo hi patatribhyo vihaṃgama
GE07mbh_08_u:028.015d-0322_02: ebhis tvam abhiśaknoṣi kasmān na prāpitas tvayā
GE07mbh_08_u:028.016a: pratāryamāṇas tu sa tair alpabuddhibhir aṇḍajaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.016c: tad vacaḥ satyam ity eva maurkhyād darpāc ca manyate
GE07mbh_08_u:028.017a: tān so 'bhipatya jijñāsuḥ ka eṣāṃ śreṣṭhabhāg iti
GE07mbh_08_u:028.018a: teṣāṃ yaṃ pravaraṃ mene haṃsānāṃ dūrapātinām
GE07mbh_08_u:028.018c: tam āhvayata durbuddhiḥ patāma iti pakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:028.019a: tac chrutvā prāhasan haṃsā ye tatrāsan samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.019c: bhāṣato bahu kākasya balinaḥ patatāṃ varāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.019e: idam ūcuś ca cakrāṅgā vacaḥ kākaṃ vihaṃgamāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.020c: pakṣiṇāṃ ca vayaṃ nityaṃ dūrapātena pūjitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.021a: kathaṃ nu haṃsaṃ balinaṃ vajrāṅgaṃ dūrapātinam
GE07mbh_08_u:028.021e: kathaṃ tvaṃ patanaṃ kāka sahāsmābhir bravīṣi tat
GE07mbh_08_u:028.022a: atha haṃsavaco mūḍhaḥ kutsayitvā punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.023a: śatam ekaṃ ca pātānāṃ patitāsmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.024a: uḍḍīnam avaḍīnaṃ ca praḍīnaṃ ḍīnam eva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:028.024c: niḍīnam atha saṃḍīnaṃ tiryak cātigatāni ca
GE07mbh_08_u:028.026c: kartāsmi miṣatāṃ vo 'dya tato drakṣyatha me balam
GE07mbh_08_u:028.026d-0326_02: pradiśadhvaṃ yathānyāyaṃ kena haṃsāḥ patāmy aham
GE07mbh_08_u:028.026d-0327_01: te vai dhruvaṃ viniścitya patadhvaṃ na mayā saha
GE07mbh_08_u:028.026d-0327_02: pātair ebhiḥ khalu khagāḥ patituṃ khe nirāśraye
GE07mbh_08_u:028.027a: evam ukte tu kākena prahasyaiko vihaṃgamaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.027c: uvāca haṃsas taṃ kākaṃ vacanaṃ tan nibodha me
GE07mbh_08_u:028.028a: śatam ekaṃ ca pātānāṃ tvaṃ kāka patitā dhruvam
GE07mbh_08_u:028.028c: ekam eva tu ye pātaṃ viduḥ sarve vihaṃgamāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.029a: tam ahaṃ patitā kāka nānyaṃ jānāmi kaṃ cana
GE07mbh_08_u:028.029c: pata tvam api raktākṣa yena vā tena manyase
GE07mbh_08_u:028.030a: atha kākāḥ prajahasur ye tatrāsan samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.030c: katham ekena pātena haṃsaḥ pātaśataṃ jayet
GE07mbh_08_u:028.031b-0328_01: aham ekena pātena haṃsa pātaśataṃ jaye
GE07mbh_08_u:028.031b-0328_02: ekenaiva ca haṃsa tvaṃ pāteneha patiṣyasi
GE07mbh_08_u:028.032c: ekapātī ca cakrāṅgaḥ kākaḥ pātaśatena ca
GE07mbh_08_u:028.032d-0329_01: spardhinau sahitau tūrṇaṃ kham āsthāya tarasvinau
GE07mbh_08_u:028.032d-0330_01: pūrvam eva tu vai kākas tūrṇaṃ gantuṃ pracakrame
GE07mbh_08_u:028.032d-0331_02: vegenātītya tarasā punar eti muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.032d-0331_04: rorūyann iti cāpy etaṃ samāhvayati vai muhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.033a: petivān atha cakrāṅgaḥ petivān atha vāyasaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.034c: dṛṣṭvā pramuditāḥ kākā vinedur atha taiḥ svaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.035a: haṃsāṃś cāvahasanti sma prāvadann apriyāṇi ca
GE07mbh_08_u:028.035c: utpatyotpatya ca prāhur muhūrtam iti ceti ca
GE07mbh_08_u:028.036a: vṛkṣāgrebhyaḥ sthalebhyaś ca nipatanty utpatanti ca
GE07mbh_08_u:028.036c: kurvāṇā vividhān rāvān āśaṃsantas tadā jayam
GE07mbh_08_u:028.037c: pratyahīyata kākāc ca muhūrtam iva māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:028.038a: avamanya rayaṃ haṃsān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:028.038c: yo 'sāv utpatito haṃsaḥ so 'sāv eva prahīyate
GE07mbh_08_u:028.039a: atha haṃsaḥ sa tac chrutvā prāpatat paścimāṃ diśam
GE07mbh_08_u:028.039d-0333_03: tato 'tīva pariśrāntaḥ kathaṃ cid dhaṃsam anvagāt
GE07mbh_08_u:028.040a: tato bhīḥ prāviśat kākaṃ tadā tatra vicetasam
GE07mbh_08_u:028.040d-0334_01: avekṣamāṇas taṃ kākaṃ vihvalaṃ taṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.040e: nipateyaṃ kva nu śrānta iti tasmiñ jalārṇave
GE07mbh_08_u:028.042a: gāmbhīryād dhi samudrasya na viśeṣaḥ kulādhama
GE07mbh_08_u:028.042e: vidūrapātāt toyasya kiṃ punaḥ karṇa vāyasaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.043a: atha haṃso 'bhyatikramya muhūrtam iti ceti ca
GE07mbh_08_u:028.043e: atikramya ca cakrāṅgaḥ kākaṃ taṃ samudaikṣata
GE07mbh_08_u:028.043f-0335_01: yāvad gatvā pataty eṣa kāko mām iti cintayan
GE07mbh_08_u:028.043f-0335_02: tataḥ kāko bhṛśaṃ śrānto haṃsam abhyāgamat tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:028.043f-0336_02: taṃ prahasya ca cakrāṅgaḥ kākaṃ mandagatiṃ tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:028.044a: taṃ tathā hīyamānaṃ ca haṃso dṛṣṭvābravīd idam
GE07mbh_08_u:028.045a: bahūni patanāni tvam ācakṣāṇo muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.045c: patasy avyāharaṃś cedaṃ na no guhyaṃ prabhāṣase
GE07mbh_08_u:028.046a: kiṃ nāma patanaṃ kāka yat tvaṃ patasi sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_08_u:028.046c: jalaṃ spṛśasi pakṣābhyāṃ tuṇḍena ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.046d-0337_01: prabrūhi katame tatra pāte vartasi vāyasa
GE07mbh_08_u:028.046d-0337_02: ehy ehi kāka śīghraṃ tvam eṣa tvāṃ pratipālaye
GE07mbh_08_u:028.047a: sa pakṣābhyāṃ spṛśann ārtas tuṇḍena jalam arṇave
GE07mbh_08_u:028.047b-0338_01: dṛṣṭo haṃsena duṣṭātmann idaṃ haṃsaṃ tato 'bravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:028.047b-0338_02: apaśyann ambhasaḥ pāraṃ nipataṃś ca śramānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.047b-0338_04: vayaṃ kākāḥ kuto nāma carāmaḥ kākapātikām
GE07mbh_08_u:028.047b-0338_05: haṃsa prāṇaiḥ prapadye tvāṃ dvīpāntaṃ prāpayasva mām
GE07mbh_08_u:028.047b-0339_01: sa pakṣābhyāṃ spṛśann ārtas tuṇḍena ca mahārṇavam
GE07mbh_08_u:028.047c: kāko dṛḍhaṃ pariśrāntaḥ sahasā nipapāta ha
GE07mbh_08_u:028.047d-0340_02: mriyamāṇam idaṃ kākaṃ haṃso vākyam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_08_u:028.048a: śatam ekaṃ ca pātānāṃ yat prabhāṣasi vāyasa
GE07mbh_08_u:028.048b-0341_01: ślāghamānas tvam ātmānaṃ kāka bhāṣitavān asi
GE07mbh_08_u:028.048b-0342_01: sa tvam ekaśataṃ pātaṃ patann abhyadhiko mayā
GE07mbh_08_u:028.048b-0342_03: pratyuvāca tataḥ kākaḥ sīdamāna idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.048c: nānāvidhānīha purā tac cānṛtam ihādya te
GE07mbh_08_u:028.049c: avamanya bahūṃś cāhaṃ kākān anyāṃś ca pakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.049e: prāṇair haṃsa prapadye tvāṃ dvīpāntaṃ prāpayasva mām
GE07mbh_08_u:028.050a: yady ahaṃ svastimān haṃsa svadeśaṃ prāpnuyāṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.050c: na kaṃ cid avamanyeyam āpado māṃ samuddhara
GE07mbh_08_u:028.050d-0345_01: yadi nāma punar jīvan gaccheyaṃ svaṃ niveśanam
GE07mbh_08_u:028.050d-0345_02: naivaṃ punar hīnam api kṣeptāhaṃ khevicāriṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:028.052c: padbhyām utkṣipya vepantaṃ pṛṣṭham āropayac chanaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.053a: āropya pṛṣṭhaṃ kākaṃ taṃ haṃsaḥ karṇa vicetasam
GE07mbh_08_u:028.053b-0347_01: avismayaṃs tadā karṇa punar enaṃ samānayat
GE07mbh_08_u:028.053c: ājagāma punar dvīpaṃ spardhayā petatur yataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.053d-0348_01: utsṛjaṃś cābravīn maivaṃ punaḥ kāryaṃ tvayeti ha
GE07mbh_08_u:028.054a: saṃsthāpya taṃ cāpi punaḥ samāśvāsya ca khecaram
GE07mbh_08_u:028.054c: gato yathepsitaṃ deśaṃ haṃso mana ivāśugaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.054d-0349_02: balaṃ vīryaṃ mahat karṇa tyaktvā kṣāntim upāgataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.055a: ucchiṣṭabhojanāt kāko yathā vaiśyakule tu saḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.055c: evaṃ tvam ucchiṣṭabhṛto dhārtarāṣṭrair na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.056c: virāṭanagare pārtham ekaṃ kiṃ nāvadhīs tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:028.057a: yatra vyastāḥ samastāś ca nirjitāḥ stha kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_08_u:028.057c: sṛgālā iva siṃhena kva te vīryam abhūt tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:028.058a: bhrātaraṃ ca hataṃ dṛṣṭvā nirjitaḥ savyasācinā
GE07mbh_08_u:028.059c: kurūn samagrān utsṛjya prathamaṃ tvaṃ palāyathāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.060a: hatvā jitvā ca gandharvāṃś citrasenamukhān raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:028.061a: punaḥ prabhāvaḥ pārthasya purāṇaḥ keśavasya ca
GE07mbh_08_u:028.062a: satataṃ ca tad aśrauṣīr vacanaṃ droṇabhīṣmayoḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.062c: avadhyau vadatoḥ kṛṣṇau saṃnidhau vai mahīkṣitām
GE07mbh_08_u:028.063a: kiyantaṃ tatra vakṣyāmi yena yena dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:028.064a: idānīm eva draṣṭāsi pradhane syandane sthitau
GE07mbh_08_u:028.064c: putraṃ ca vasudevasya pāṇḍavaṃ ca dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_08_u:028.064d-0351_02: draṣṭāsy ekarathe karṇaṃ tadā naivaṃ vadiṣyasi
GE07mbh_08_u:028.064d-0351_03: yadā śaraśataiḥ pārtho darpaṃ tava vadhiṣyati
GE07mbh_08_u:028.064d-0351_04: tadā tvam antaraṃ draṣṭā ātmanaś cārjunasya ca
GE07mbh_08_u:028.064d-0352_01: tvaṃ śīghram eva vārṣṇeyaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ ca dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_08_u:028.065b-0353_01: tau māvamaṃsthā maurkhyāt tvaṃ khadyota iva rocanau
GE07mbh_08_u:028.066c: nṛsiṃhau tau naraśvā tvaṃ joṣam āssva vikatthana
GE07mbh_08_u:029.001c: uvāca śalyaṃ viditaṃ mamaitad; yathāvidhāv arjunavāsudevau
GE07mbh_08_u:029.002a: śaure rathaṃ vāhayato 'rjunasya; balaṃ mahāstrāṇi ca pāṇḍavasya
GE07mbh_08_u:029.002c: ahaṃ vijānāmi yathāvad adya; parokṣabhūtaṃ tava tat tu śalya
GE07mbh_08_u:029.003a: tau cāpradhṛṣyau śastrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhau; vyapetabhīr yodhayiṣyāmi kṛṣṇau
GE07mbh_08_u:029.003c: saṃtāpayaty abhyadhikaṃ tu rāmāc; chāpo 'dya māṃ brāhmaṇasattamāc ca
GE07mbh_08_u:029.004a: avātsaṃ vai brāhmaṇacchadmanāhaṃ; rāme purā divyam astraṃ cikīrṣuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:029.004c: tatrāpi me devarājena vighno; hitārthinā phalgunasyaiva śalya
GE07mbh_08_u:029.005a: kṛto 'vabhedena mamorum etya; praviśya kīṭasya tanuṃ virūpām
GE07mbh_08_u:029.005c: guror bhayāc cāpi na celivān ahaṃ; tac cāvabuddho dadṛśe sa vipraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:029.005d-0357_02: na tvaṃ vipraḥ ko 'si satyaṃ vadeti
GE07mbh_08_u:029.006a: pṛṣṭaś cāhaṃ tam avocaṃ maharṣiṃ; sūto 'ham asmīti sa māṃ śaśāpa
GE07mbh_08_u:029.006c: sūtopadhāv āptam idaṃ tvayāstraṃ; na karmakāle pratibhāsyati tvām
GE07mbh_08_u:029.007a: anyatra yasmāt tava mṛtyukālād; abrāhmaṇe brahma na hi dhruvaṃ syāt
GE07mbh_08_u:029.007c: tad adya paryāptam atīva śastram; asmin saṃgrāme tumule tāta bhīme
GE07mbh_08_u:029.007d-0361_01: astraṃ hi me tat pratipannam adya
GE07mbh_08_u:029.007d-0362_05: astraṃ hi me na pratibhām upaiti
GE07mbh_08_u:029.008a: apāṃ patir vegavān aprameyo; nimajjayiṣyan nivahān prajānām
GE07mbh_08_u:029.008c: mahānagaṃ yaḥ kurute samudraṃ; velaiva taṃ vārayaty aprameyam
GE07mbh_08_u:029.009a: pramuñcantaṃ bāṇasaṃghān amoghān; marmacchido vīrahaṇaḥ sapatrān
GE07mbh_08_u:029.009c: kuntīputraṃ pratiyotsyāmi yuddhe; jyākarṣiṇām uttamam adya loke
GE07mbh_08_u:029.010a: evaṃ balenātibalaṃ mahāstraṃ; samudrakalpaṃ sudurāpam ugram
GE07mbh_08_u:029.010c: śaraughiṇaṃ pārthivān majjayantaṃ; veleva pārtham iṣubhiḥ saṃsahiṣye
GE07mbh_08_u:029.011a: adyāhave yasya na tulyam anyaṃ; manye manuṣyaṃ dhanur ādadānam
GE07mbh_08_u:029.011c: surāsurān vai yudhi yo jayeta; tenādya me paśya yuddhaṃ sughoram
GE07mbh_08_u:029.012a: atimānī pāṇḍavo yuddhakāmo; amānuṣair eṣyati me mahāstraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:029.012c: tasyāstram astrair abhihatya saṃkhye; śarottamaiḥ pātayiṣyāmi pārtham
GE07mbh_08_u:029.013a: divākareṇāpi samaṃ tapantaṃ; samāptaraśmiṃ yaśasā jvalantam
GE07mbh_08_u:029.013c: tamonudaṃ megha ivātimātro; dhanaṃjayaṃ chādayiṣyāmi bāṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:029.014a: vaiśvānaraṃ dhūmaśikhaṃ jvalantaṃ; tejasvinaṃ lokam imaṃ dahantam
GE07mbh_08_u:029.014c: megho bhūtvā śaravarṣair yathāgniṃ; tathā pārthaṃ śamayiṣyāmi yuddhe
GE07mbh_08_u:029.015a: pramāthinaṃ balavantaṃ prahāriṇaṃ; prabhañjanaṃ mātariśvānam ugram
GE07mbh_08_u:029.015c: yuddhe sahiṣye himavān ivācalo; dhanaṃjayaṃ kruddham amṛṣyamāṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:029.016a: viśāradaṃ rathamārgeṣv asaktaṃ; dhuryaṃ nityaṃ samareṣu pravīram
GE07mbh_08_u:029.016c: loke varaṃ sarvadhanurdharāṇāṃ; dhanaṃjayaṃ saṃyuge saṃsahiṣye
GE07mbh_08_u:029.017a: adyāhave yasya na tulyam anyaṃ; madhyemanuṣyaṃ dhanur ādadānam
GE07mbh_08_u:029.017c: sarvām imāṃ yaḥ pṛthivīṃ saheta; tathā vidvān yotsyamāno 'smi tena
GE07mbh_08_u:029.018a: yaḥ sarvabhūtāni sadevakāni; prasthe 'jayat khāṇḍave savyasācī
GE07mbh_08_u:029.018c: ko jīvitaṃ rakṣamāṇo hi tena; yuyutsate mām ṛte mānuṣo 'nyaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:029.018d-0366_07: anyo hi na hy ekarathena martyo

GE07mbh_08_u:030.043a: pañca nadyo vahanty etā yatra niḥsṛtya parvatāt

GE07mbh_08_u:032.062d-0430_07: jagrāheṣuvarān vīraḥ śīghraṃ sa daśa pañca ca
GE07mbh_08_u:032.063a: sātyakir vṛṣasenasya hatvā sūtaṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:032.063c: dhanuś ciccheda bhallena jaghānāśvāṃś ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:032.063e: dhvajam ekeṣuṇonmathya tribhis taṃ hṛdy atāḍayat
GE07mbh_08_u:032.066a: duḥśāsanas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā virathaṃ vyāyudhaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_08_u:032.067b-0432_03: nakulaṃ triṃśatā bāṇaiḥ śatānīkaṃ ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:032.067b-0432_04: śikhaṇḍinaṃ ca daśabhir dharmarājaṃ śatena ca
GE07mbh_08_u:032.067b-0432_05: etāṃś cānyāṃś ca rājendra pravīrāñ jayagṛddhinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:032.067c: karṇasya yudhi durdharṣaḥ punaḥ pṛṣṭham apālayat
GE07mbh_08_u:032.068a: duḥśāsanaṃ tu śaineyo navair navabhir āśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:032.069a: sa tv anyaṃ ratham āsthāya vidhivat kalpitaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:032.070a: dhṛṣṭadyumnas tataḥ karṇam avidhyad daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:032.071c: nakulas triṃśatā bāṇaiḥ śatānīkaś ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:032.071e: śikhaṇḍī daśabhir vīro dharmarājaḥ śatena tu
GE07mbh_08_u:032.072a: ete cānye ca rājendra pravīrā jayagṛddhinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:032.073a: tān sūtaputro viśikhair daśabhir daśabhiḥ śitaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:032.073c: rathe cāru caran vīraḥ pratyavidhyad ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:032.073d-0433_04: virathān rathinaḥ śreṣṭhān nimeṣārdhāc cakāra ha
GE07mbh_08_u:032.075a: na hy ādadānaṃ dadṛśuḥ saṃdadhānaṃ ca sāyakān
GE07mbh_08_u:032.075c: vimuñcantaṃ ca saṃrambhād dadṛśus te mahāratham
GE07mbh_08_u:032.075d-0434_01: pratīcyāṃ diśi taṃ dṛṣṭvā prācyāṃ paśyāma lāghavāt
GE07mbh_08_u:032.075d-0434_02: na tu paśyāma rājendra kva nu karṇo vyatiṣṭhata
GE07mbh_08_u:032.075d-0434_03: iṣūn eva sma paśyāmo vikirantaṃ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:032.075d-0434_04: chādayanto diśo rājañ śalabhānām iva vrajān
GE07mbh_08_u:032.075d-0434_05: tasya tair iṣubhis tīkṣṇaiḥ saṃpatadbhiḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:032.075d-0434_07: vyāptāḥ sarvā diśo rājan yodhāś ca dadṛśus tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:032.075d-0434_08: śaraiḥ saṃvṛtam ākāśaṃ tatrābhram iva cābhavat
GE07mbh_08_u:032.076a: dyaur viyad bhūr diśaś cāśu praṇunnā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:032.076d-0435_01: tataḥ punar ameyātmā karṇo rājan mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:032.077a: nṛtyann iva hi rādheyaś cāpahastaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_08_u:032.077c: yair viddhaḥ pratyavidhyat tān ekaikaṃ triguṇaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:032.078a: daśabhir daśabhiś cainān punar viddhvā nanāda ha
GE07mbh_08_u:032.078d-0436_01: te hanyamānāḥ karṇena palāyante diśo daśa
GE07mbh_08_u:032.080a: sa rathāṃs triśatān hatvā cedīnām anivartinām
GE07mbh_08_u:032.080d-0437_01: tatas te virathāḥ śūrā rathān anyān samāsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:032.081a: tatas te pāṇḍavā rājañ śikhaṇḍī ca sasātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:032.082a: tathaiva tāvakāḥ sarve karṇaṃ durvāraṇaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:033.001a: vidārya karṇas tāṃ senāṃ dharmarājam upādravat
GE07mbh_08_u:033.002c: chittvā bāṇaśatair ugrais tān avidhyad asaṃbhramaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.003a: nicakarta śirāṃsy eṣāṃ bāhūn ūrūṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.003c: te hatā vasudhāṃ petur bhagnāś cānye vidudruvuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.005c: petuḥ pṛthivyāṃ yugapac chinnaṃ śālavanaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:033.006a: evaṃ yodhaśatāny ājau sahasrāṇy ayutāni ca
GE07mbh_08_u:033.007a: atha vaikartanaṃ karṇaṃ raṇe kruddham ivāntakam
GE07mbh_08_u:033.008a: sa tān pramṛdyābhyapatat punar eva yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_08_u:033.009c: nāśakat tān atikrāntuṃ mṛtyur brahmavido yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:033.010b-0440_01: tair yodhaiḥ pramukhe vīraṃ dṛṣṭvā vivyādha sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.010b-0440_02: karṇaḥ pārthaśarair viddhas tottrārdita iva dvipaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.010b-0440_04: tato yudhiṣṭhiraḥ karṇam āsādya jayatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_08_u:033.011a: karṇa karṇa vṛthādṛṣṭe sūtaputra vacaḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_08_u:033.012a: yad balaṃ yac ca te vīryaṃ pradveṣo yaś ca pāṇḍuṣu
GE07mbh_08_u:033.012c: tat sarvaṃ darśayasvādya pauruṣaṃ mahad āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.013a: evam uktvā mahārāja karṇaṃ pāṇḍusutas tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:033.014d-009_0004: samādhatta śitaṃ bāṇaṃ girīṇām api dāraṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:033.014d-009_0007: sa tu vegavatā mukto bāṇo vajrāśanisvanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.014d-009_0008: viveśa sahasā karṇaṃ savye pārśve mahāratham
GE07mbh_08_u:033.014d-009_0009: sa tu tena prahāreṇa pīḍitaḥ pramumoha vai
GE07mbh_08_u:033.014d-009_0013: siṃhanādaś ca saṃjajñe kṣveḍāḥ kilakilās tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:033.014d-009_0015: pratilabhya tu rādheyaḥ saṃjñāṃ nāticirād iva
GE07mbh_08_u:033.014d-009_0017: sa hemavikṛtaṃ cāpaṃ visphārya vijayaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_08_u:033.017a: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ punaḥ karṇam avidhyat triṃśatā śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.017c: suṣeṇaṃ satyasenaṃ ca tribhis tribhir atāḍayat
GE07mbh_08_u:033.018a: śalyaṃ navatyā vivyādha trisaptatyā ca sūtajam
GE07mbh_08_u:033.018c: tāṃś cāsya goptṝn vivyādha tribhis tribhir ajihmagaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.019c: bhittvā bhallena rājānaṃ viddhvā ṣaṣṭyānadan mudā
GE07mbh_08_u:033.021a: sātyakiś cekitānaś ca yuyutsuḥ pāṇḍya eva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:033.022a: yamau ca bhīmasenaś ca śiśupālasya cātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.023a: janamejayaś ca pāñcālyaḥ karṇaṃ vivyādha sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.025b-0442_02: na cacāla raṇe karṇo mahendro dānavair iva
GE07mbh_08_u:033.025c: udairayad brāhmam astraṃ śaraiḥ saṃpūrayan diśaḥ saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.025d-0443_02: tataḥ punar ameyātmā cedīnāṃ pravarān daśa
GE07mbh_08_u:033.025d-0443_05: dṛśyante dikṣu sarvāsu śalabhānām iva vrajāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.025d-0443_09: sṛñjayānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ śataśo nihatā raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:033.025d-0443_11: nājñāyata tataḥ kiṃ cit pareṣām ātmano 'pi vā
GE07mbh_08_u:033.025d-0443_12: tasmiṃs tamasi bhūte ca kṣatriyāṇāṃ bhayaṃkare
GE07mbh_08_u:033.028c: bibheda kavacaṃ rājño raṇe karṇaḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.029a: tad varma hemavikṛtaṃ rarāja nipatat tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:033.030c: ratnair alaṃkṛtaṃ divyair vyabhraṃ niśi yathā nabhaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.031a: sa vivarmā śaraiḥ pārtho rudhireṇa samukṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.031b-0445_04: naditvā ca ciraṃ kālaṃ pāṇḍavo rabhaso raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:033.032a: tāṃ jvalantīm ivākāśe śaraiś ciccheda saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.032c: sā chinnā bhūmim apatan maheṣvāsasya sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.033a: tato bāhvor lalāṭe ca hṛdi caiva yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.034a: udbhinnarudhiraḥ karṇaḥ kruddhaḥ sarpa iva śvasan
GE07mbh_08_u:033.034b-0446_01: jaghāna sūtaṃ pārthasya pārṣṇiṃ ca navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.034c: dhvajaṃ ciccheda bhallena tribhir vivyādha pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_08_u:033.034d-0447_01: hatvā sūtaṃ ca pārthasya pṛṣṭhagopaṃ ca sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.034e: iṣudhī cāsya ciccheda rathaṃ ca tilaśo 'cchinat
GE07mbh_08_u:033.034f-0448_01: kālavālās tu ye pārthaṃ dantavarṇāvahan hayāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.034f-0448_02: tair yuktaṃ ratham āsthāya prāyād rājā parāṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.034f-010_0005: śaineyaṃ tu tataḥ kruddhaḥ karṇaḥ pañcabhir āyasaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.034f-010_0006: vivyādha samare rājaṃs tribhiś cānyaiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.034f-010_0007: dakṣiṇaṃ tu bhujaṃ tasya tribhiḥ karṇo 'py avidhyata
GE07mbh_08_u:033.034f-010_0008: savyaṃ ṣoḍaśabhir bāṇair yantāraṃ cāsya saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.034f-010_0009: athāsya caturo vāhāṃś caturbhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.034f-010_0013: hatāśvasūte tu rathe sthitaḥ sa śinipuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.034f-010_0015: tām āpatantīṃ sahasā dvidhā ciccheda bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:033.034f-010_0016: karṇo vai dhanvināṃ śreṣṭhas tāṃś ca sarvān avārayat
GE07mbh_08_u:033.034f-010_0017: tatas tān niśitair bāṇaiḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathān
GE07mbh_08_u:033.034f-010_0018: nyavārayad ameyātmā śikṣayā ca balena ca
GE07mbh_08_u:033.034f-010_0019: ardayitvā śarais tāṃs tu siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgān iva
GE07mbh_08_u:033.036a: tam abhidrutya rādheyaḥ skandhaṃ saṃspṛśya pāṇinā
GE07mbh_08_u:033.036b-0449_04: grahītum icchan sa balāt kuntīvākyaṃ ca so 'smarat
GE07mbh_08_u:033.036b-0449_05: taṃ śalyaḥ prāha mā karṇa gṛhṇīthāḥ pārthivottamam
GE07mbh_08_u:033.036b-0449_06: gṛhītamātro hatvā tvāṃ mā kariṣyati bhasmasāt
GE07mbh_08_u:033.036c: abravīt prahasan rājan kutsayann iva pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_08_u:033.037a: kathaṃ nāma kule jātaḥ kṣatradharme vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.037c: prajahyāt samare śatrūn prāṇān rakṣan mahāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:033.038a: na bhavān kṣatradharmeṣu kuśalo 'sīti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.038c: brāhme bale bhavān yuktaḥ svādhyāye yajñakarmaṇi
GE07mbh_08_u:033.039a: mā sma yudhyasva kaunteya mā ca vīrān samāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.039c: mā cainān apriyaṃ brūhi mā ca vraja mahāraṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:033.039d-0450_01: vaktavyā māriṣānye tu na vaktavyās tu mādṛśāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.039d-0450_02: mādṛśān hi bruvan yuddhe etad anyac ca lapsyase
GE07mbh_08_u:033.039d-0450_03: svagṛhaṃ gaccha kaunteya yatra vā keśavārjunau
GE07mbh_08_u:033.039d-0450_04: na hi tvāṃ samare rājan hanyāt karṇaḥ kathaṃ cana saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.039d-0451_01: varapradānaṃ kuntyās tu karṇaḥ smṛtvā mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.040a: evam uktvā tataḥ pārthaṃ visṛjya ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.040e: tataḥ prāyād drutaṃ rājan vrīḍann iva janeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.041a: atha prayāntaṃ rājānam anvayus te tadācyutam
GE07mbh_08_u:033.041e: draupadeyās tathā śūrā mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_08_u:033.042c: kurubhiḥ sahito vīraiḥ pṛṣṭhagaiḥ pṛṣṭham anvayāt
GE07mbh_08_u:033.044a: yudhiṣṭhiras tu kauravya ratham āruhya satvaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.045c: tān yodhān abravīt kruddho hatainaṃ vai sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.047a: abhavat tumulaḥ śabdo yodhānāṃ tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:033.047d-0452_01: udgataḥ pratisṛṣṭānāṃ śastrāṇāṃ ca tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.048c: iti bruvāṇā anyonyaṃ jaghnur yodhā raṇājire
GE07mbh_08_u:033.055a: tathā tu vitate vyomni nisvanaṃ śuśruvur janāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.056a: hatān kṛttān abhimukhān vīrān vīraiḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.056d-0454_01: tavāyaṃ na tavaivāyaṃ mamāyam iti vallabhaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.057a: tad dṛṣṭvā mahad āścaryaṃ pratyakṣaṃ svargalipsayā
GE07mbh_08_u:033.058a: rathino rathibhiḥ sārdhaṃ citraṃ yuyudhur āhave
GE07mbh_08_u:033.058c: pattayaḥ pattibhir nāgā nāgaiḥ saha hayair hayāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:033.059c: sainye ca rajasā vyāpte sve svāñ jaghnuḥ pare parān
GE07mbh_08_u:033.063c: gādhena ca plavantaś ca nimajjyonmajjya cāpare
GE07mbh_08_u:033.064c: sasnus tasyāṃ papuś cāsṛṅ mamluś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_08_u:033.065a: rathān aśvān narān nāgān āyudhābharaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_08_u:033.065c: vasanāny atha varmāṇi hanyamānān hatān api
GE07mbh_08_u:033.065e: bhūmiṃ khaṃ dyāṃ diśaś caiva prāyaḥ paśyāma lohitam
GE07mbh_08_u:033.066a: lohitasya tu gandhena sparśena ca rasena ca
GE07mbh_08_u:033.066e: viṣādaḥ sumahān āsīt prāyaḥ sainyasya bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:033.067a: tat tu viprahataṃ sainyaṃ bhīmasenamukhais tava
GE07mbh_08_u:033.068c: putrāṇāṃ te mahat sainyam āsīd rājan parāṅmukham
GE07mbh_08_u:034.001a: tān abhidravato dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavāṃs tāvakaṃ balam
GE07mbh_08_u:034.001b-0456_02: yodhāṃś ca svabalaṃ caiva samantād bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_08_u:034.001c: krośatas tava putrasya na sma rājan nyavartata
GE07mbh_08_u:034.002a: tataḥ pakṣāt prapakṣāc ca prapakṣaiś cāpi dakṣiṇāt
GE07mbh_08_u:034.003b-0457_02: evam uktaś ca karṇena śalyo madrādhipas tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:034.003c: haṃsavarṇān hayāgryāṃs tān praiṣīd yatra vṛkodaram
GE07mbh_08_u:034.006a: so 'bravīt sātyakiṃ vīraṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pārṣatam
GE07mbh_08_u:034.006e: saṃśayān mahato muktaṃ kathaṃ cit prekṣato mama
GE07mbh_08_u:034.008a: antam adya kariṣyāmi tasya duḥkhasya pārṣata
GE07mbh_08_u:034.008c: hantā vāsmi raṇe karṇaṃ sa vā māṃ nihaniṣyati
GE07mbh_08_u:034.008e: saṃgrāmeṇa sughoreṇa satyam etad bravīmi vaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:034.009a: rājānam adya bhavatāṃ nyāsabhūtaṃ dadāmi vai
GE07mbh_08_u:034.010a: evam uktvā mahābāhuḥ prāyād ādhirathiṃ prati
GE07mbh_08_u:034.013a: īdṛśaṃ nāsya rūpaṃ me dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_08_u:034.013c: abhimanyau hate karṇa rākṣase vā ghaṭotkace
GE07mbh_08_u:034.015a: iti bruvati rādheyaṃ madrāṇām īśvare nṛpa
GE07mbh_08_u:034.016c: abravīd vacanaṃ śalyaṃ rādheyaḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_08_u:034.017a: yad uktaṃ vacanaṃ me 'dya tvayā madrajaneśvara
GE07mbh_08_u:034.017c: bhīmasenaṃ prati vibho tat satyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:034.018a: eṣa śūraś ca vīraś ca krodhanaś ca vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:034.018c: nirapekṣaḥ śarīre ca prāṇataś ca balādhikaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:034.021c: arjunaṃ samare hanyāṃ māṃ vā hanyād dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:034.021e: sa me kadā cid adyaiva bhaved bhīmasamāgamāt
GE07mbh_08_u:034.021f-0458_01: saṃśayaḥ sumahāñ śalya prāpya bhīmam ariṃdamam
GE07mbh_08_u:034.022a: nihate bhīmasene tu yadi vā virathīkṛte
GE07mbh_08_u:034.022c: abhiyāsyati māṃ pārthas tan me sādhu bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_08_u:034.022e: atra yan manyase prāptaṃ tac chīghraṃ saṃpradhāraya
GE07mbh_08_u:034.022f-0459_02: mūrtimantam ahaṃ manye mārutiṃ marutāṃ patim
GE07mbh_08_u:034.023a: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ rādheyasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:034.024c: nirasya bhīmasenaṃ tu tataḥ prāpsyasi phalgunam
GE07mbh_08_u:034.024d-0460_01: nirapekṣaś ca yudhyasva śaktiṃ svāṃ saṃpradarśayan
GE07mbh_08_u:034.025a: yas te kāmo 'bhilaṣitaś cirāt prabhṛti hṛdgataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:034.025c: sa vai saṃpatsyate karṇa satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_08_u:034.026a: evam ukte tataḥ karṇaḥ śalyaṃ punar abhāṣata
GE07mbh_08_u:034.026c: hantāham arjunaṃ saṃkhye māṃ vā hantā dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:034.026d-0461_01: evam uktvā tato rājan rādheyo rathināṃ varaḥ

GE07mbh_08_u:037.021d-0493_01: nāgam astraṃ tataḥ pārthaḥ prāduś cakre hasann iva

GE07mbh_08_u:037.022a: yān uddiśya raṇe pārthaḥ padabandhaṃ cakāra ha
GE07mbh_08_u:037.023a: niśceṣṭāṃs tu tato yodhān avadhīt pāṇḍunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:037.023c: yathendraḥ samare daityāṃs tārakasya vadhe purā
GE07mbh_08_u:037.024a: te vadhyamānāḥ samare mumucus taṃ rathottamam
GE07mbh_08_u:037.024d-0494_01: te baddhāḥ pādabandhena na śekuś ceṣṭituṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_08_u:037.024d-0494_02: tatas tān avadhīt pārthaḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:037.025a: tataḥ suśarmā rājendra gṛhītāṃ vīkṣya vāhinīm
GE07mbh_08_u:037.026c: te vai vidudruvur nāgā dṛṣṭvā tān khacarān nṛpa
GE07mbh_08_u:037.027a: babhau balaṃ tad vimuktaṃ padabandhād viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:037.027c: meghavṛndād yathā mukto bhāskaras tāpayan prajāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:037.028a: vipramuktās tu te yodhāḥ phalgunasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_08_u:037.028c: sasṛjur bāṇasaṃghāṃś ca śastrasaṃghāṃś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:037.030c: arjunaṃ hṛdaye viddhvā vivyādhānyais tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:037.030d-0497_02: tataḥ śaraśataiḥ pārthaḥ saṃchādyainaṃ kṣaṇād raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:037.030d-0497_03: diśa āvārayām āsa bāṇais tatra mahāstravit
GE07mbh_08_u:037.030f-0498_01: tata uccukruśuḥ sarve hataḥ pārtha iti sma ha
GE07mbh_08_u:037.030f-0498_02: tataḥ śaṅkhaninādāś ca bherīśabdāś ca puṣkalāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:037.032c: hayān rathāṃś ca samare śastraiḥ śatasahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:037.032d-0499_01: rarāja samare rājañ śakro nighnann ivāsurān
GE07mbh_08_u:037.033a: vadhyamāne tataḥ sainye vipulā bhīḥ samāviśat
GE07mbh_08_u:037.033e: na hi kaś cit pumāṃs tatra yo 'rjunaṃ pratyayudhyata
GE07mbh_08_u:037.034a: paśyatāṃ tatra vīrāṇām ahanyata mahad balam
GE07mbh_08_u:037.034c: hanyamānam apaśyaṃś ca niśceṣṭāḥ sma parākrame
GE07mbh_08_u:037.035a: ayutaṃ tatra yodhānāṃ hatvā pāṇḍusuto raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:037.035c: vyabhrājata raṇe rājan vidhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan
GE07mbh_08_u:037.036c: rathānām ayutaṃ caiva trisāhasrāś ca dantinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:037.037c: martavyam iti niścitya jayaṃ vāpi nivartanam
GE07mbh_08_u:037.038a: tatra yuddhaṃ mahad dhy āsīt tāvakānāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:037.038d-0500_01: jitvā tān nyahanat pārthaḥ śatrūñ śakra ivāsurān
GE07mbh_08_u:038.001a: kṛtavarmā kṛpo drauṇiḥ sūtaputraś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:038.001c: ulūkaḥ saubalaś caiva rājā ca saha sodaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:038.003a: tato yuddham atīvāsīn muhūrtam iva bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:038.003d-0501_02: vaikartanaḥ svayaṃ yuddhvā vārayām āsa kārmukaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:038.003d-0501_03: tataś cedikarūṣāṃś ca sṛñjayāṃś ca mahārathān
GE07mbh_08_u:038.004c: sṛñjayāḥ śātayām āsuḥ śalabhānāṃ vrajā iva
GE07mbh_08_u:038.005a: śikhaṇḍī tu tataḥ kruddho gautamaṃ tvarito yayau
GE07mbh_08_u:038.005d-0502_01: mahad āsīt tadā yuddhaṃ muhūrtād iva dāruṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:038.006a: kṛpas tu śaravarṣaṃ tad vinihatya mahāstravit
GE07mbh_08_u:038.006c: śikhaṇḍinaṃ raṇe kruddho vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:038.007a: tataḥ śikhaṇḍī kupītaḥ śaraiḥ saptabhir āhave
GE07mbh_08_u:038.008a: tataḥ kṛpaḥ śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ so 'tividdho mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:038.008b-0503_01: tatas tu niśitais tīkṣṇaiḥ kṣuraprair hemabhūṣaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:038.009a: hatāśvāt tu tato yānād avaplutya mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:038.009c: carmakhaḍge ca saṃgṛhya satvaraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ yayau
GE07mbh_08_u:038.010c: chādayām āsa samare tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_08_u:038.011c: niśceṣṭo yad raṇe rājañ śikhaṇḍī samatiṣṭhata
GE07mbh_08_u:038.016c: karṇo vaikartano yuddhe vārayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:038.017a: śikhaṇḍinas tato bāṇān kṛpaḥ śāradvato yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:038.017c: prāhiṇot tvarayā yukto didhakṣur iva māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:038.018a: tāñ śarān preṣitāṃs tena samantād dhemabhūṣaṇān
GE07mbh_08_u:038.018c: ciccheda khaḍgam āvidhya bhrāmayaṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:038.019a: śatacandraṃ tataś carma gautamaḥ pārṣatasya ha
GE07mbh_08_u:038.019c: vyadhamat sāyakais tūrṇaṃ tata uccukruśur janāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:038.020c: kṛpasya vaśam āpanno mṛtyor āsyam ivāturaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:038.022a: vikiran brāhmaṇaṃ yuddhe bahubhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:038.024a: suketus tu tato rājan gautamaṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:038.024c: viddhvā vivyādha saptatyā punaś cainaṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:038.025a: athāsya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ punaś ciccheda māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:038.025c: sārathiṃ ca śareṇāsya bhṛśaṃ marmaṇy atāḍayat
GE07mbh_08_u:038.026a: gautamas tu tataḥ kruddho dhanur gṛhya navaṃ dṛḍham
GE07mbh_08_u:038.027c: bhūmicāle yathā vṛkṣaś calaty ākampito bhṛśam
GE07mbh_08_u:038.028a: calatas tasya kāyāt tu śiro jvalitakuṇḍalam
GE07mbh_08_u:038.029a: tac chiraḥ prāpatad bhūmau śyenāhṛtam ivāmiṣam
GE07mbh_08_u:038.029c: tato 'sya kāyo vasudhāṃ paścāt prāpa tadā cyutaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:038.030a: tasmin hate mahārāja trastās tasya padānugāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:038.030c: gautamaṃ samare tyaktvā dudruvus te diśo daśa
GE07mbh_08_u:038.032a: tad abhūt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ vṛṣṇipārṣatayo raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:038.032c: āmiṣārthe yathā yuddhaṃ śyenayor gṛddhayor nṛpa
GE07mbh_08_u:038.033a: dhṛṣṭadyumnas tu samare hārdikyaṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:038.034c: pārṣataṃ sarathaṃ sāśvaṃ chādayām āsa sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:038.035a: sarathaś chādito rājan dhṛṣṭadyumno na dṛśyate
GE07mbh_08_u:038.037a: tatas tu pārṣataḥ kruddhaḥ śastravṛṣṭiṃ sudāruṇām
GE07mbh_08_u:038.038d-013_0002: tathaiva sātvato rājan vāhān vāhair amiśrayat
GE07mbh_08_u:038.038d-013_0003: gṛhītvā carma khaḍgaṃ ca rathaṃ tasyāvapupluve
GE07mbh_08_u:038.038d-013_0004: miśriteṣv atha vāheṣu pratyāsanne ca pārṣate
GE07mbh_08_u:038.038d-013_0006: gadāpāṇis tato rājan rathāt tūrṇam avaplutaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:038.038d-013_0008: khaḍgena śitadhāreṇa sa hataḥ prāpatad rathāt
GE07mbh_08_u:038.038d-013_0009: kṛtavarmā tato hṛṣṭas talaśabdaṃ cakāra ha
GE07mbh_08_u:038.038d-013_0010: pārṣataṃ cābravīd rājann ehy ehīti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:038.038d-013_0011: sa taṃ na mamṛṣe yuddhe talaśabdaṃ samīritam
GE07mbh_08_u:038.038d-013_0012: yathā nāgaḥ sadā mattas talaśabdaṃ samīritam
GE07mbh_08_u:038.038d-013_0013: avaplutya rathāt tasmāt svarathaṃ punar āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:038.038d-013_0014: abhyayāt sa tu taṃ tūrṇaṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:038.038d-013_0017: tato rājan maheṣvāsaḥ kṛtavarmāṇam āśu vai
GE07mbh_08_u:038.038d-013_0018: gadāṃ gṛhya punar vegāt kṛtavarmāṇam āhanat
GE07mbh_08_u:038.038d-013_0020: tato rājan maheṣvāsaṃ kṛtavarmāṇam āśu vai
GE07mbh_08_u:038.039a: dṛṣṭvā tu dāritāṃ yuddhe śastravṛṣṭiṃ duruttarām
GE07mbh_08_u:038.039d-0504_01: hārdikyaṃ chādayām āsa pārṣato niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:038.040c: bhallena śitadhāreṇa sa hataḥ prāpatad rathāt
GE07mbh_08_u:038.041a: dhṛṣṭadyumnas tu balavāñ jitvā śatruṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_08_u:038.041c: kauravān samare tūrṇaṃ vārayām āsa sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:038.042a: tatas te tāvakā yodhā dhṛṣṭadyumnam upādravan
GE07mbh_08_u:039.003a: tataḥ khaṃ pūrayām āsa śarair divyāstramantritaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:039.004c: bāṇabhūtam abhūt sarvam āyodhanaśiro hi tat
GE07mbh_08_u:039.006a: tena channe raṇe rājan bāṇajālena bhāsvatā
GE07mbh_08_u:039.007c: na sma saṃpatate bhūmau dṛṣṭvā drauṇeḥ parākramam
GE07mbh_08_u:039.008e: śekus te sarvarājānas tapantam iva bhāskaram
GE07mbh_08_u:039.009a: sātyakir yatamānas tu dharmarājaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:039.009c: tathetarāṇi sainyāni na sma cakruḥ parākramam
GE07mbh_08_u:039.010c: sātyakir dharmarājaś ca pāñcālāś cāpi saṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:039.012c: śrutakarmā tribhir bāṇaiḥ śrutakīrtis tu saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:039.013a: sutasomaś ca navabhiḥ śatānīkaś ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:039.013c: anye ca bahavaḥ śūrā vivyadhus taṃ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:039.014a: so 'tikruddhas tato rājann āśīviṣa iva śvasan
GE07mbh_08_u:039.015a: śrutakīrtiṃ ca navabhiḥ sutasomaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:039.015e: śatānīkaṃ ca navabhir dharmaputraṃ ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:039.016a: athetarāṃs tataḥ śūrān dvābhyāṃ dvābhyām atāḍayat
GE07mbh_08_u:039.016c: śrutakīrtes tathā cāpaṃ ciccheda niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:039.017c: drauṇāyaniṃ tribhir viddhvā vivyādhānyaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:039.018c: chādayām āsa tat sainyaṃ samantāc ca śarair nṛpān
GE07mbh_08_u:039.019c: drauṇiś ciccheda vihasan vivyādha ca śarais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:039.020a: tato dharmasuto rājan pragṛhyānyan mahad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:039.020c: drauṇiṃ vivyādha saptatyā bāhvor urasi cārdayat
GE07mbh_08_u:039.021a: sātyakis tu tataḥ kruddho drauṇeḥ praharato raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:039.022a: chinnadhanvā tato drauṇiḥ śaktyā śaktimatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:039.022c: sārathiṃ pātayām āsa śaineyasya rathād drutam
GE07mbh_08_u:039.027c: drauṇir dadāha samare kakṣam agnir yathā vane
GE07mbh_08_u:039.028c-0505_04: tat tāpyamānaṃ tīkṣṇāgrair brāhmaṇasya ca sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:039.029c: nihatān menire sarvān pāṇḍūn droṇasutena vai
GE07mbh_08_u:039.030a: yudhiṣṭhiras tu tvarito drauṇiṃ śliṣya mahāratham
GE07mbh_08_u:039.030d-0507_01: jānāmi tvāṃ yudhi śreṣṭhaṃ vīryavantaṃ balānvitam
GE07mbh_08_u:039.030d-0507_03: balam etad bhavān sarvaṃ pārṣate yadi darśayet
GE07mbh_08_u:039.030d-0507_04: tatas tvāṃ balavantaṃ ca kṛtavīryaṃ ca vidmahe
GE07mbh_08_u:039.030d-0507_05: sa hi vai pārṣataṃ dṛṣṭvā samare śatrusūdanam
GE07mbh_08_u:039.030d-0507_06: bhavet tava balaṃ kiṃ cid bravīmi tvāṃ na tu dvija
GE07mbh_08_u:039.031a: naiva nāma tava prītir naiva nāma kṛtajñatā
GE07mbh_08_u:039.031c: yatas tvaṃ puruṣavyāghra mām evādya jighāṃsasi
GE07mbh_08_u:039.032a: brāhmaṇena tapaḥ kāryaṃ dānam adhyayanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:039.032c: kṣatriyeṇa dhanur nāmyaṃ sa bhavān brāhmaṇabruvaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:039.033a: miṣatas te mahābāho jeṣyāmi yudhi kauravān
GE07mbh_08_u:039.033c: kuruṣva samare karma brahmabandhur asi dhruvam
GE07mbh_08_u:039.034a: evam ukto mahārāja droṇaputraḥ smayann iva
GE07mbh_08_u:039.034c: yuktatvaṃ tac ca saṃcintya nottaraṃ kiṃ cid abravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:039.035a: anuktvā ca tataḥ kiṃ cic charavarṣeṇa pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_08_u:039.035c: chādayām āsa samare kruddho 'ntaka iva prajāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:039.036c: pārtho 'payātaḥ śīghraṃ vai vihāya mahatīṃ camūm
GE07mbh_08_u:039.038a: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā tyaktvā drauṇiṃ mahāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:039.038c: prayayau tāvakaṃ sainyaṃ yuktaḥ krūrāya karmaṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:040.001c: vaikartanaḥ svayaṃ ruddhvā vārayām āsa sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:040.002a: tatas tu cedikārūṣān sṛñjayāṃś ca mahārathān
GE07mbh_08_u:040.003c: prayayau kauravaṃ sainyaṃ kakṣam agnir iva jvalan
GE07mbh_08_u:040.005c: pāñcāleṣu tathā karṇaḥ kṣayaṃ cakrūr mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:040.006a: te kṣatriyā dahyamānās tribhis taiḥ pāvakopamaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:040.006c: jagmur vināśaṃ samare rājan durmantrite tava
GE07mbh_08_u:040.007a: tato duryodhanaḥ kruddho nakulaṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:040.008a: tataḥ punar ameyātmā tava putro janādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:040.009a: nakulas tu tataḥ kruddhas tava putraṃ trisaptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:040.009c: jaghāna samare rājan sahadevaś ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:040.011c: yamayoḥ prahasan rājan vivyādhaiva ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:040.012a: tāv anye dhanuṣī śreṣṭhe śakracāpanibhe śubhe
GE07mbh_08_u:040.013a: tatas tau rabhasau yuddhe bhrātarau bhrātaraṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_08_u:040.014a: tataḥ kruddho mahārāja tava putro mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:040.017a: te tu bāṇā mahārāja hemapuṅkhāḥ śilāśitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:040.018a: bāṇabhūte tatas tasmin saṃchanne ca nabhastale
GE07mbh_08_u:040.018b-0508_01: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca krodhaṃ tīvraṃ samāsthitau
GE07mbh_08_u:040.018b-0508_02: tāṃ bāṇavṛṣṭiṃ rājñas tu śaraiḥ śatasahasrabhiḥ (sic)
GE07mbh_08_u:040.018b-0508_03: chādayām āsatur ubhau bāṇaughais tanayaṃ tava
GE07mbh_08_u:040.018b-0508_04: tatas tayor mahārāja sṛjator aniśaṃ śarān
GE07mbh_08_u:040.019a: parākramaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā tava sūnor mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:040.019b-0509_01: krodham āsthāya paramaṃ niḥśvasaṃś ca yathoragaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:040.019b-0509_02: bāṇāndhakāraṃ sasṛje tava putras tayos tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:040.019c: mṛtyor upāntikaṃ prāptau mādrīputrau sma menire
GE07mbh_08_u:040.020c: pārṣataḥ prayayau tatra yatra rājā suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:040.021c: dhṛṣṭadyumnas tava sutaṃ tāḍayām āsa sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:040.023a: tataḥ punar ameyātmā putras te pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_08_u:040.023c: viddhvā nanāda pāñcālyaṃ ṣaṣṭyā pañcabhir eva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:040.024a: athāsya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ hastāvāpaṃ ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:040.025a: tad apāsya dhanuś chinnaṃ pāñcālyaḥ śatrukarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:040.025c: anyad ādatta vegena dhanur bhārasahaṃ navam
GE07mbh_08_u:040.027a: sa pañcadaśa nārācāñ śvasataḥ pannagān iva
GE07mbh_08_u:040.028a: te varma hemavikṛtaṃ bhittvā rājñaḥ śilāśitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:040.031c: sāyakair daśabhī rājan bhruvor madhye samārdayat
GE07mbh_08_u:040.033a: tad apāsya dhanuś chinnaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumno mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:040.033c: anyad ādatta vegena dhanur bhallāṃś ca ṣoḍaśa
GE07mbh_08_u:040.034a: tato duryodhanasyāśvān hatvā sūtaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:040.035a: rathaṃ sopaskaraṃ chatraṃ śaktiṃ khaḍgaṃ gadāṃ dhvajam
GE07mbh_08_u:040.035c: bhallaiś ciccheda navabhiḥ putrasya tava pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:040.038a: tam āropya rathe rājan daṇḍadhāro janādhipam
GE07mbh_08_u:040.039a: karṇas tu sātyakiṃ jitvā rājagṛddhī mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:040.040a: taṃ pṛṣṭhato 'bhyayāt tūrṇaṃ śaineyo vitudañ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:040.041a: sa bhārata mahān āsīd yodhānāṃ sumahātmanām

GE07mbh_08_u:044.036c: śatruṃ vivyādha viṃśatyā sa ca taṃ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ

GE07mbh_08_u:044.038e: nivṛtte tu tataḥ karṇe nakulaḥ kauravān yayau
GE07mbh_08_u:044.038f-0603_01: vṛṣasenas tu pāñcālān pitrā sārdhaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:044.039a: karṇaputras tu samare hitvā nakulam eva tu

GE07mbh_08_u:044.040e: sārathiṃ preṣayām āsa yamasya sadanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_08_u:044.041a: ulūkas tu tato yānād avaplutya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:044.041d-0606_01: ratham anyaṃ samāsthāya jagāma pitur antikam
GE07mbh_08_u:044.042a: sātyakiḥ śakuniṃ viddhvā viṃśatyā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:044.042c: dhvajaṃ ciccheda bhallena saubalasya hasann iva

GE07mbh_08_u:044.043b-0607_01: sārathiṃ preṣayām āsa yamasya sadanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_08_u:044.043c: vidārya kavacaṃ bhūyo dhvajaṃ ciccheda kāñcanam

GE07mbh_08_u:044.044e: athāsya vāhāṃs tvaritaḥ śarair ninye yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_08_u:044.046a: sātyakis tu raṇe rājaṃs tāvakānām anīkinīm
GE07mbh_08_u:044.047a: śaineyaśaranunnaṃ tu tataḥ sainyaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:044.047c: bheje daśa diśas tūrṇaṃ nyapatac ca gatāsuvat
GE07mbh_08_u:044.048a: bhīmasenaṃ tava suto vārayām āsa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:044.049e: tatra rāvo mahān āsīd bhīmam ekaṃ jighāṃsatām
GE07mbh_08_u:044.050a: yudhāmanyuḥ kṛpaṃ viddhvā dhanur asyāśu cicchide
GE07mbh_08_u:044.050c: athānyad dhanur ādāya kṛpaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:044.051a: yudhāmanyor dhvajaṃ sūtaṃ chatraṃ cāpātayat kṣitau
GE07mbh_08_u:044.052c: chādayām āsa sahasā megho vṛṣṭyā yathācalam
GE07mbh_08_u:044.053a: tad yuddhaṃ sumahac cāsīd ghorarūpaṃ paraṃtapa

GE07mbh_08_u:044.054c: hṛdi vivyādha sa tadā rathopastha upāviśat

GE07mbh_08_u:044.055c: tatas tu satvaraṃ rājan pāṇḍusainyam upādravat
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-0611_04: tāvakaṃ sainyam abhyaghnat samantān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-017_0006: dṛṣṭvaiva subhṛśaṃ kruddho divyam astram udairayat
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-017_0009: chādayām āsa samare gajān nighnan vṛkodaraḥ

GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-017_0015: ke cid vibhinnahṛdayāḥ kuñjarā nyapatan bhuvi
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-017_0017: aśobhata mahī tatra viśīrṇair iva parvataiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-017_0019: rarāja bhūmiḥ patitaiḥ kṣīṇapuṇyair iva grahaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-017_0022: ke cid vamanto rudhiraṃ bhayārtāḥ parvatopamāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-017_0028: bhīmasenasya tat karma rājann ekasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-017_0029: nighnataḥ sarvabhūtāni rudrasyeva ca nirbabhau saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0003: tad balaṃ nṛpatiśreṣṭha tāvakaṃ vijayo raṇe
