GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0020: śaraughān visṛjantas te prerayantaś ca tomarān
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0024: duryodhanaṃ tu viṃśatyā śīghram astram udīrayan
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0028: dṛṣṭvā tava sutaṃ tatra gāḍhaviddhaṃ sutejanaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0029: abhyadhāvad dṛḍhaṃ kruddho rādheyo rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0030: duryodhanaṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā śīghram astram udīrya saḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0031: tena yaudhiṣṭhiraṃ sainyam avadhīt pārṣataṃ tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0038: tato daśa diśaḥ karṇaḥ śalabhair iva yāyibhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0042: tataḥ sarvā diśo rājan sāyakair vipramohayan
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0047: hāhākāro mahān āsīt tāvakānāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0051: yatra yatra sa dharmātmā duṣṭāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ vyasarjayat
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0054: nārācair ardhacandraiś ca vatsadantaiś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0057: yudhiṣṭhiraś cāpi śataṃ svarṇapuṅkhaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0058: prahasann iva taṃ karṇaḥ kaṅkapatraiḥ śilāśitaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0059: urasy avidhyad rājānaṃ tribhir bhallaiś ca pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0060: sa pīḍito bhṛśaṃ tena dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0067: duryodhanaś ca bhīmaś ca sameyātāṃ mahābalau
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0072: aviṣahyaṃ tato dṛṣṭvā rādheyaṃ yudhi yodhinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0077: yamayor madhyagaṃ vīraṃ śanair yāntaṃ vicetasam
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0081: śarais tribhiś ca yantāraṃ caturbhiś caturo hayān
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0083: tāv apy adhāvatāṃ karṇaṃ rājānaṃ mā vadhīr iti
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0085: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca paramaṃ yatnam āsthitau
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0093: īṣāṃ dhanuś ca ciccheda mādrīputrasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0096: tau dṛṣṭvā mātulas tatra virathau paravīrahā
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0098: yoddhavyam adya pārthena phalgunena tvayā saha
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0103: evam ukto 'pi karṇas tu madrarājena saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0105: śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ parāvidhya mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0106: prahasya samare karṇaś cakāra vimukhaṃ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0107: tataḥ śalyaḥ prahasyedaṃ karṇaṃ punar uvāca ha
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0110: taṃ pārthaṃ jahi rādheya kiṃ te hatvā yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0111: śaṅkhayor dhmāyatoḥ śabdaḥ sumahān eṣa kṛṣṇayoḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0114: sarvāṃ grasati naḥ senāṃ karṇa paśyainam āhave
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0116: uttaraṃ cāsya vai śūraś cakraṃ rakṣati sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0117: dhṛṣṭadyumnas tathā cāsya cakraṃ rakṣati dakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0118: bhīmasenaś ca vai rājñā dhārtarāṣṭreṇa yudhyate
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0119: yathā na hanyāt taṃ bhīmaḥ sarveṣāṃ no 'dya paśyatām
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0120: tathā rādheya kriyatāṃ rājā mucyeta no yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0122: yadi tv āsādya mucyeta vismayaḥ sumahān bhavet
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0123: paritrāhy enam abhyetya saṃśayaṃ paramaṃ gatam
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0124: kiṃ nu mādrīsutau hatvā rājānaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0131: gate karṇe tu kaunteyaḥ pāṇḍuputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0133: tābhyāṃ sa sahitas tūrṇaṃ vrīḍann iva nareśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0135: avatīrṇo rathāt tūrṇam āviśac chayanaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_08_u:044.055d-018_0139: jīmūta iva nardaṃs tu yudhyate sa vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.001c: āpatat sahasā rājan yatra rājā vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.003c: arjunaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca chādayām āsa patribhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.004a: avacchannau tataḥ kṛṣṇau dṛṣṭvā tatra mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.004c: vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā praikṣanta kuravas tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:045.005a: arjunas tu tato divyam astraṃ cakre hasann iva
GE07mbh_08_u:045.005c: tad astraṃ brāhmaṇo yuddhe vārayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:045.006a: yad yad dhi vyākṣipad yuddhe pāṇḍavo 'straṃ jighāṃsayā
GE07mbh_08_u:045.006c: tat tad astraṃ maheṣvāso droṇaputro vyaśātayat
GE07mbh_08_u:045.008a: sa diśo vidiśaś caiva chādayitvā vijihmagaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.008c: vāsudevaṃ tribhir bāṇair avidhyad dakṣiṇe bhuje
GE07mbh_08_u:045.009a: tato 'rjuno hayān hatvā sarvāṃs tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.009d-0617_02: drauṇer apahatān saṃkhye dadṛśuḥ sa ca tāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:045.009d-0617_04: tayos tu vyākule yuddhe drauṇeḥ pārthasya dāruṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:045.009d-0617_06: rathair hatāśvasūtaiś ca hatārohaiś ca vājibhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.009d-0617_08: pārthena samare rājan kṛto ghoro janakṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.010c: hayāś ca paryadhāvanta muktayoktrās tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.011a: tad dṛṣṭvā karma pārthasya drauṇir āhavaśobhinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.011c: avākirad raṇe kṛṣṇaṃ samantān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.013b-0619_02: saṃchādya samare drauṇiṃ cicchedāsya ca cārmukam
GE07mbh_08_u:045.013c: ādatta parighaṃ ghoraṃ drauṇeś cainam avākṣipat
GE07mbh_08_u:045.014a-0621_02: ciccheda sahasā rājan prahasann iva pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.014c: drauṇiś ciccheda sahasā tata uccukruśur janāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.015c: viśīrṇaḥ parvato rājan yathā syān mātariśvanā
GE07mbh_08_u:045.015d-0622_17: aśvāṃś ca sūtaṃ ca tathā dhanur jyām
GE07mbh_08_u:045.016a: tato 'rjuno raṇe drauṇiṃ vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.016b-0623_01: sa viddhvā marmasu drauṇiṃ pāṇḍavaḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_08_u:045.017a: sa saṃgṛhya svayaṃ vāhān kṛṣṇau prācchādayac charaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.018a: ayacchat turagān yac ca phalgunaṃ cāpy ayodhayat
GE07mbh_08_u:045.018c: tad asya samare rājan sarve yodhā apūjayan
GE07mbh_08_u:045.019a: yadā tv agrasyata raṇe droṇaputreṇa phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.019c: tato raśmīn rathāśvānāṃ kṣurapraiś cicchide jayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.020c: tato 'bhūn ninado bhūyas tava sainyasya bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:045.021a: pāṇḍavās tu jayaṃ labdhvā tava sainyam upādravan
GE07mbh_08_u:045.022c: punaḥ punar atho vīrair abhajyata jayoddhataiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.025a: tato yodhair mahārāja palāyadbhis tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.025c: abhavad vyākulaṃ bhītaiḥ putrāṇāṃ te mahad balam
GE07mbh_08_u:045.028a: tato duryodhanaḥ karṇam abravīt praṇayād iva
GE07mbh_08_u:045.028c: paśya karṇa yathā senā pāṇḍavair arditā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_08_u:045.029c: etaj jñātvā mahābāho kuru prāptam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_08_u:045.030a: sahasrāṇi ca yodhānāṃ tvām eva puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_08_u:045.031a: etac chrutvā tu rādheyo duryodhanavaco mahat
GE07mbh_08_u:045.032a: paśya me bhujayor vīryam astrāṇāṃ ca janeśvara
GE07mbh_08_u:045.032c: adya hanmi raṇe sarvān pāñcālān pāṇḍubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_08_u:045.033e: sajyaṃ kṛtvā mahārāja saṃmṛjya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.034a: saṃnivārya ca yodhān svān satyena śapathena ca
GE07mbh_08_u:045.035a: tato rājan sahasrāṇi prayutāny arbudāni ca
GE07mbh_08_u:045.035c: koṭiśaś ca śarās tīkṣṇā niragacchan mahāmṛdhe
GE07mbh_08_u:045.036c: saṃchannā pāṇḍavī senā na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_08_u:045.037a: hāhākāro mahān āsīt pāñcālānāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:045.038a: nipatadbhir gajai rājan naraiś cāpi sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.038c: rathaiś cāpi naravyāghra hayaiś cāpi samantataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.039a: prākampata mahī rājan nihatais tais tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.039c: vyākulaṃ sarvam abhavat pāṇḍavānāṃ mahad balam
GE07mbh_08_u:045.040a: karṇas tv eko yudhāṃ śreṣṭho vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.040c: dahañ śatrūn naravyāghra śuśubhe sa paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.041a: te vadhyamānāḥ karṇena pāñcālāś cedibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_08_u:045.041c: tatra tatra vyamuhyanta vanadāhe yathā dvipāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.041e: cukruśus te naravyāghra yathāprāg vā narottamāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.042a: teṣāṃ tu krośatāṃ śrutvā bhītānāṃ raṇamūrdhani
GE07mbh_08_u:045.042c: dhāvatāṃ ca diśo rājan vitrastānāṃ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.042e: ārtanādo mahāṃs tatra pretānām iva saṃplave
GE07mbh_08_u:045.043a: vadhyamānāṃs tu tān dṛṣṭvā sūtaputreṇa māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:045.044c: arjunaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca vyākrośanta muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.044d-0626_01: śrutvā tu ninadaṃ teṣāṃ vadhyatāṃ karṇasāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.044f-0627_02: duḥsaho vajriṇāpy ājau parājitya guroḥ sutam
GE07mbh_08_u:045.046c: naitad astraṃ hi samare śakyaṃ hantuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_08_u:045.047a: sūtaputraṃ ca saṃrabdhaṃ paśya kṛṣṇa mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:045.048a: sutīkṣṇaṃ codayann aśvān prekṣate māṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.048c: na ca paśyāmi samare karṇasya prapalāyitam
GE07mbh_08_u:045.049c: jitasya tu hṛṣīkeśa vadha eva kuto jayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.049d-0628_01: evam uktas tu pārthena kṛṣṇo matimatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_08_u:045.049d-0629_01: karṇena hi dṛḍhaṃ rājā kuntīputraḥ parikṣataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.049d-0629_02: taṃ dṛṣṭvāśvāsya ca punaḥ karṇaṃ pārtha vadhiṣyasi
GE07mbh_08_u:045.049d-0631_01: eṣa karṇo raṇe bhāti madhyāhna iva bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.049d-0631_02: nivartaya rathaṃ kṛṣṇa jīvan bhadrāṇi paśyati
GE07mbh_08_u:045.050a: tato janārdanaḥ prāyād draṣṭum icchan yudhiṣṭhiram saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:045.050b-0632_01: tato janārdanaḥ śrutvā tasya vākyaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:045.050b-0633_03: alaṃ viṣahituṃ hy eṣa kurūṇāṃ saṃprapadyatām
GE07mbh_08_u:045.050c: śrameṇa grāhayiṣyaṃś ca karṇaṃ yuddhena māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:045.050d-0634_01: karṇaṃ ca samare rājan grāhayiṣyañ śramaṃ prati
GE07mbh_08_u:045.050d-0635_02: apayāto raṇād vīro rājānaṃ draṣṭum eva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:045.051a: arjunaṃ cābravīt kṛṣṇo bhṛśaṃ rājā parikṣataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.051c: tam āśvāsya kuruśreṣṭha tataḥ karṇaṃ haniṣyasi
GE07mbh_08_u:045.052b-0636_02: rājānaṃ prati vārṣṇeya dūyate me dṛḍhaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.053c: sainyam ālokayām āsa nāpaśyat tatra cāgrajam
GE07mbh_08_u:045.054a: yuddhaṃ kṛtvā tu kaunteyo droṇaputreṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:045.054c: duḥsahaṃ vajriṇā saṃkhye parājigye bhṛgoḥ sutam
GE07mbh_08_u:045.055a: drauṇiṃ parājitya tatogradhanvā; kṛtvā mahad duṣkaram āryakarma
GE07mbh_08_u:045.055c: ālokayām āsa tataḥ svasainyaṃ; dhanaṃjayaḥ śatrubhir apradhṛṣyaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.056a: sa yudhyamānaḥ pṛtanāmukhasthāñ; śūrāñ śūro harṣayan savyasācī
GE07mbh_08_u:045.056c: pūrvāpadānaiḥ prathitaiḥ praśaṃsan; sthirāṃś cakārātmarathān anīke
GE07mbh_08_u:045.057a: apaśyamānas tu kirīṭamālī; yudhi jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaram ājamīḍham
GE07mbh_08_u:045.057c: uvāca bhīmaṃ tarasābhyupetya; rājñaḥ pravṛttis tv iha keti rājan
GE07mbh_08_u:045.059a: tasmād bhavāñ śīghram itaḥ prayātu; rājñaḥ pravṛttyai kurusattamasya
GE07mbh_08_u:045.059c: nūnaṃ hi viddho 'tibhṛśaṃ pṛṣatkaiḥ; karṇena rājā śibiraṃ gato 'sau
GE07mbh_08_u:045.060a: yaḥ saṃprahāre niśi saṃpravṛtte; droṇena viddho 'tibhṛśaṃ tarasvī
GE07mbh_08_u:045.060c: tasthau ca tatrāpi jayapratīkṣo; droṇena yāvan na hataḥ kilāsīt
GE07mbh_08_u:045.061a: sa saṃśayaṃ gamitaḥ pāṇḍavāgryaḥ; saṃkhye 'dya karṇena mahānubhāvaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.061c: jñātuṃ prayāhy āśu tam adya bhīma; sthāsyāmy ahaṃ śatrugaṇān nirudhya
GE07mbh_08_u:045.062a: tvam eva jānīhi mahānubhāva; rājñaḥ pravṛttiṃ bharatarṣabhasya
GE07mbh_08_u:045.062c: ahaṃ hi yady arjuna yāmi tatra; vakṣyanti māṃ bhīta iti pravīrāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.063a: tato 'bravīd arjuno bhīmasenaṃ; saṃśaptakāḥ pratyanīkaṃ sthitā me
GE07mbh_08_u:045.063c: etān ahatvā na mayā tu śakyam; ito 'payātuṃ ripusaṃghagoṣṭhāt
GE07mbh_08_u:045.064a: athābravīd arjunaṃ bhīmasenaḥ; svavīryam āśritya kurupravīra
GE07mbh_08_u:045.064c: saṃśaptakān pratiyotsyāmi saṃkhye; sarvān ahaṃ yāhi dhanaṃjayeti
GE07mbh_08_u:045.065a: tad bhīmasenasya vaco niśamya; sudurvacaṃ bhrātur amitramadhye
GE07mbh_08_u:045.065c: draṣṭuṃ kuruśreṣṭham abhiprayātuṃ; provāca vṛṣṇipravaraṃ tadānīm
GE07mbh_08_u:045.065d-0638_01: rājānaṃ prati vārṣṇeya dūyate me dṛḍhaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.066d-0639_01: taṃ rathaṃ codayām āsa bībhatsor vacanād dhariḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.067a: tato hayān sarvadāśārhamukhyaḥ; prācodayad bhīmam uvāca cedam
GE07mbh_08_u:045.067c: naitac citraṃ tava karmādya vīra; yāsyāmahe jahi bhīmārisaṃghān
GE07mbh_08_u:045.068a: tato yayau hṛṣīkeśo yatra rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.069c: saṃdiśya caiva rājendra yuddhaṃ prati vṛkodaram
GE07mbh_08_u:045.070a: tatas tu gatvā puruṣapravīrau; rājānam āsādya śayānam ekam
GE07mbh_08_u:045.070c: rathād ubhau pratyavaruhya tasmād; vavandatur dharmarājasya pādau
GE07mbh_08_u:045.070d-0642_01: ity evam abhisaṃgṛhya ubhau tu prāñjalī sthitau
GE07mbh_08_u:045.072a: tāv abhyanandad rājā hi vivasvān aśvināv iva
GE07mbh_08_u:045.072c: hate mahāsure jambhe śakraviṣṇū yathā guruḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:045.073c: harṣagadgadayā vācā prītaḥ prāha paraṃtapau saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:046.001a: mahāsattvau tu tau dṛṣṭvā sahitau keśavārjunau
GE07mbh_08_u:046.003c: priyaṃ me darśanaṃ bāḍhaṃ yuvayor acyutārjunau
GE07mbh_08_u:046.005a: agragaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ śarma varma ca
GE07mbh_08_u:046.008c: analānilayos tulyaṃ tejasā ca balena ca
GE07mbh_08_u:046.010a: tena yuddham adīnena mayā hy adyācyutārjunau
GE07mbh_08_u:046.011a: tena ketuś ca me chinno hatau ca pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_08_u:046.013a: etāñ jitvā mahāvīryān karṇaḥ śatrugaṇān bahūn
GE07mbh_08_u:046.014a: anusṛtya ca māṃ yuddhe paruṣāṇy uktavān bahu
GE07mbh_08_u:046.014c: tatra tatra yudhāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ paribhūya na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:046.015c: bahunātra kim uktena nāhaṃ tat soḍhum utsahe
GE07mbh_08_u:046.016c: na sma nidrāṃ labhe rātrau na cāhani sukhaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_08_u:046.017c: ātmano maraṇaṃ jānan vādhrīṇasa iva dvipaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:046.017d-0650_02: sa vai vādhrīṇasaḥ prokto yājñikaiḥ pitṛkarmasu
GE07mbh_08_u:046.018a: yasyāyam agamat kālaś cintayānasya me vibho
GE07mbh_08_u:046.018c: kathaṃ śakyo mayā karṇo yuddhe kṣapayituṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_08_u:046.019a: jāgrat svapaṃś ca kaunteya karṇam eva sadā hy aham
GE07mbh_08_u:046.019c: paśyāmi tatra tatraiva karṇabhūtam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_08_u:046.020a: yatra yatra hi gacchāmi karṇād bhīto dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:046.020c: tatra tatra hi paśyāmi karṇam evāgrataḥ sthitam
GE07mbh_08_u:046.021c: sahayaḥ sarathaḥ pārtha jitvā jīvan visarjitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:046.022a: ko nu me jīvitenārtho rājyenārtho 'tha vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:046.023a: na prāptapūrvaṃ yad bhīṣmāt kṛpād droṇāc ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:046.023c: tat prāptam adya me yuddhe sūtaputrān mahārathāt
GE07mbh_08_u:046.024a: tat tvā pṛcchāmi kaunteya yathā hy akuśalas tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:046.024c: tan mamācakṣva kārtsnyena yathā karṇas tvayā hataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:046.025c: rāmatulyas tathāstre yaḥ sa kathaṃ vai niṣūditaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:046.027c: sadā tvadarthaṃ rādheyaḥ sa kathaṃ nihatas tvayā
GE07mbh_08_u:046.028a: dhṛtarāṣṭro hi yodheṣu sarveṣv eva sadārjuna
GE07mbh_08_u:046.028c: tava mṛtyuṃ raṇe karṇaṃ manyate puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:046.029a: sa tvayā puruṣavyāghra kathaṃ yuddhe niṣūditaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:046.029c: taṃ mamācakṣva bībhatso yathā karṇo hatas tvayā
GE07mbh_08_u:046.030a: sotsedham asya ca śiraḥ paśyatāṃ suhṛdāṃ hṛtam
GE07mbh_08_u:046.031a: yaḥ paryupāsīt pradiśo diśaś ca; tvāṃ sūtaputraḥ samare parīpsan
GE07mbh_08_u:046.031c: ditsuḥ karṇaḥ samare hastipūgaṃ; sa hīdānīṃ kaṅkapatraiḥ sutīkṣṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:046.032a: tvayā raṇe nihataḥ sūtaputraḥ; kaccic chete bhūmitale durātmā
GE07mbh_08_u:046.032c: kaccit priyaṃ me paramaṃ tvayādya; kṛtaṃ raṇe sūtaputraṃ nihatya
GE07mbh_08_u:046.033a: yaḥ sarvataḥ paryapatat tvadarthe; madānvito garvitaḥ sūtaputraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:046.033c: sa śūramānī samare sametya; kaccit tvayā nihataḥ saṃyuge 'dya
GE07mbh_08_u:046.034a: raukmaṃ rathaṃ hastivaraiś ca yuktaṃ; rathaṃ ditsur yaḥ parebhyas tvadarthe
GE07mbh_08_u:046.034c: sadā raṇe spardhate yaḥ sa pāpaḥ; kaccit tvayā nihatas tāta yuddhe
GE07mbh_08_u:046.035a: yo 'sau nityaṃ śūramadena matto; vikatthate saṃsadi kauravāṇām
GE07mbh_08_u:046.035c: priyo 'tyarthaṃ tasya suyodhanasya; kaccit sa pāpo nihatas tvayādya
GE07mbh_08_u:046.036a: kaccit samāgamya dhanuḥpramuktais; tvatpreṣitair lohitārthair vihaṃgaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:046.036c: śete 'dya pāpaḥ sa vibhinnagātraḥ; kaccid bhagno dhārtarāṣṭrasya bāhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:046.037a: yo 'sau sadā ślāghate rājamadhye; duryodhanaṃ harṣayan darpapūrṇaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:046.037c: ahaṃ hantā phalgunasyeti mohāt; kaccid dhatas tasya na vai tathā rathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:046.037d-0652_02: yat tat priyām avadat tāta karṇaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:046.037d-0652_04: dhik pāṇḍavān apatis tvaṃ hi kṛṣṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:046.038a: nāhaṃ pādau dhāvayiṣye kadā cid; yāvat sthitaḥ pārtha ity alpabuddhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:046.038c: vrataṃ tasyaitat sarvadā śakrasūno; kaccit tvayā nihataḥ so 'dya karṇaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:046.038d-0653_01: pādau na dhāve yāvad ahaṃ na hanmi
GE07mbh_08_u:046.039a: yo 'sau kṛṣṇām abravīd duṣṭabuddhiḥ; karṇaḥ sabhāyāṃ kuruvīramadhye
GE07mbh_08_u:046.039c: kiṃ pāṇḍavāṃs tvaṃ na jahāsi kṛṣṇe; sudurbalān patitān hīnasattvān
GE07mbh_08_u:046.040a: yat tat karṇaḥ pratyajānāt tvadarthe; nāhatvāhaṃ saha kṛṣṇena pārtham
GE07mbh_08_u:046.040c: ihopayāteti sa pāpabuddhiḥ; kaccic chete śarasaṃbhinnagātraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:046.041a: kaccit saṃgrāme vidito vā tadāyaṃ; samāgamaḥ sṛñjayakauravāṇām
GE07mbh_08_u:046.041c: yatrāvasthām īdṛśīṃ prāpito 'haṃ; kaccit tvayā so 'dya hataḥ sametya
GE07mbh_08_u:046.042a: kaccit tvayā tasya sumandabuddher; gāṇḍīvamuktair viśikhair jvaladbhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:046.042c: sakuṇḍalaṃ bhānumad uttamāṅgaṃ; kāyāt prakṛttaṃ yudhi savyasācin
GE07mbh_08_u:046.043a: yat tan mayā bāṇasamarpitena; dhyāto 'si karṇasya vadhāya vīra
GE07mbh_08_u:046.043c: tan me tvayā kaccid amogham adya; dhyātaṃ kṛtaṃ karṇanipātanena
GE07mbh_08_u:046.044a: yad darpapūrṇaḥ sa suyodhano 'smān; avekṣate karṇasamāśrayeṇa
GE07mbh_08_u:046.044c: kaccit tvayā so 'dya samāśrayo 'sya; bhagnaḥ parākramya suyodhanasya
GE07mbh_08_u:046.045a: yo naḥ purā ṣaṇḍhatilān avocat; sabhāmadhye pārthivānāṃ samakṣam
GE07mbh_08_u:046.045c: sa durmatiḥ kaccid upetya saṃkhye; tvayā hataḥ sūtaputro 'tyamarṣī
GE07mbh_08_u:046.046a: yaḥ sūtaputraḥ prahasan durātmā; purābravīn nirjitāṃ saubalena
GE07mbh_08_u:046.046c: svayaṃ prasahyānaya yājñasenīm; apīha kaccit sa hatas tvayādya
GE07mbh_08_u:046.046d-0656_03: sa pāpātmā sa tu no vidviṣāṇaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:046.046d-0656_04: kaccit karṇo nihato vā tvayā dhik
GE07mbh_08_u:046.046d-0656_17: atho bhāsāś ca sṛgālāś ca gṛdhrā
GE07mbh_08_u:046.047a: yaḥ śastrabhṛc chreṣṭhatamaṃ pṛthivyāṃ; pitāmahaṃ vyākṣipad alpacetāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:046.047c: saṃkhyāyamāno 'rdharathaḥ sa kaccit; tvayā hato 'dyādhirathir durātmā
GE07mbh_08_u:046.047d-0657_01: yat tat tvayā saṃśrutaṃ me kirīṭin
GE07mbh_08_u:046.047d-0657_04: tat karma kṛtvā hy anṛṇo 'si kaccit
GE07mbh_08_u:046.048a: amarṣaṇaṃ nikṛtisamīraṇeritaṃ; hṛdi śritaṃ jvalanam imaṃ sadā mama
GE07mbh_08_u:046.048c: hato mayā so 'dya sametya pāpadhīr; iti bruvan praśamaya me 'dya phalguna
GE07mbh_08_u:047.001a: tad dharmaśīlasya vaco niśamya; rājñaḥ kruddhasyādhirathau mahātmā
GE07mbh_08_u:047.001c: uvāca durdharṣam adīnasattvaṃ; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ jiṣṇur anantavīryaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:047.002a: saṃśaptakair yudhyamānasya me 'dya; senāgrayāyī kurusainyasya rājan
GE07mbh_08_u:047.002c: āśīviṣābhān khagamān pramuñcan; drauṇiḥ purastāt sahasā vyatiṣṭhat
GE07mbh_08_u:047.003a: dṛṣṭvā rathaṃ meghanibhaṃ mamemam; ambaṣṭhasenā maraṇe vyatiṣṭhat
GE07mbh_08_u:047.003c: teṣām ahaṃ pañca śatāni hatvā; tato drauṇim agamaṃ pārthivāgrya
GE07mbh_08_u:047.003d-0662_11: tāṃs tena muktān aham asya bāṇair
GE07mbh_08_u:047.004c: sasarja śikṣāstrabalaprayatnais; tathā yathā prāvṛṣi kālameghaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:047.005a: naivādadānaṃ na ca saṃdadhānaṃ; jānīmahe katareṇāsyatīti
GE07mbh_08_u:047.005c: vāmena vā yadi vā dakṣiṇena; sa droṇaputraḥ samare paryavartat
GE07mbh_08_u:047.006a: avidhyan māṃ pañcabhir droṇaputraḥ; śitaiḥ śaraiḥ pañcabhir vāsudevam
GE07mbh_08_u:047.006c: ahaṃ tu taṃ triṃśatā vajrakalpaiḥ; samārdayaṃ nimiṣasyāntareṇa
GE07mbh_08_u:047.007a: sa vikṣaran rudhiraṃ sarvagātrai; rathānīkaṃ sūtasūnor viveśa
GE07mbh_08_u:047.007c: mayābhibhūtaḥ sainikānāṃ prabarhān; asāv apaśyan rudhireṇa pradigdhān
GE07mbh_08_u:047.008a: tato 'bhibhūtaṃ yudhi vīkṣya sainyaṃ; vidhvastayodhaṃ drutavājināgam
GE07mbh_08_u:047.008c: pañcāśatā rathamukhyaiḥ sametaḥ; karṇas tvaran mām upāyāt pramāthī
GE07mbh_08_u:047.009a: tān sūdayitvāham apāsya karṇaṃ; draṣṭuṃ bhavantaṃ tvarayābhiyātaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:047.009c: sarve pāñcālā hy udvijante sma karṇād; gandhād gāvaḥ kesariṇo yathaiva
GE07mbh_08_u:047.010a: mahājhaṣasyeva mukhaṃ prapannāḥ; prabhadrakāḥ karṇam abhi dravanti
GE07mbh_08_u:047.010c: mṛtyor āsyaṃ vyāttam ivānvapadyan; prabhadrakāḥ karṇam āsādya rājan
GE07mbh_08_u:047.010d-019_0003: na cāpy abhūt klāntamanāḥ sa rājan
GE07mbh_08_u:047.010d-019_0005: śrutvā tu tvāṃ tena dṛṣṭaṃ sametam
GE07mbh_08_u:047.011a: āyāhi paśyādya yuyutsamānaṃ; māṃ sūtaputraṃ ca vṛtau jayāya
GE07mbh_08_u:047.011c: ṣaṭsāhasrā bhārata rājaputrāḥ; svargāya lokāya rathā nimagnāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:047.012a: sametyāhaṃ sūtaputreṇa saṃkhye; vṛtreṇa vajrīva narendramukhya
GE07mbh_08_u:047.012b-0671_01: evaṃ gate kiṃ ca mayādya śakyaṃ
GE07mbh_08_u:047.012c: yotsye bhṛśaṃ bhārata sūtaputram; asmin saṃgrāme yadi vai dṛśyate 'dya
GE07mbh_08_u:047.013a: karṇaṃ na ced adya nihanmi rājan; sabāndhavaṃ yudhyamānaṃ prasahya
GE07mbh_08_u:047.013c: pratiśrutyākurvatāṃ vai gatir yā; kaṣṭāṃ gaccheyaṃ tām ahaṃ rājasiṃha
GE07mbh_08_u:047.014a: āmantraye tvāṃ brūhi jayaṃ raṇe me; purā bhīmaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrā grasante
GE07mbh_08_u:047.014c: sautiṃ haniṣyāmi narendrasiṃha; sainyaṃ tathā śatrugaṇāṃś ca sarvān
GE07mbh_08_u:048.001a: śrutvā karṇaṃ kalyam udāravīryaṃ; kruddhaḥ pārthaḥ phalgunasyāmitaujāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:048.001c: dhanaṃjayaṃ vākyam uvāca cedaṃ; yudhiṣṭhiraḥ karṇaśarābhitaptaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:048.001d-0673_01: bhīto bhīmaṃ tyajya cāyās tathā tvaṃ
GE07mbh_08_u:048.001d-0675_01: tyaktvā raṇe yad apāyāḥ sa bhīmaṃ
GE07mbh_08_u:048.001d-0677_01: imāṃ ca vasatiṃ prāpto bhayāt karṇena bādhitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:048.001d-0677_02: ahaṃ tvaṃ bhīmasenaś ca mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_08_u:048.001d-0677_04: punar eva vanaṃ prāpya tapaścaryāṃ carāmahe
GE07mbh_08_u:048.001d-0677_06: ity evam uktvā bībhatsuṃ roṣāt saṃraktalocanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:048.002a: idaṃ yadi dvaitavane hy avakṣyaḥ; karṇaṃ yoddhuṃ na prasahe nṛpeti
GE07mbh_08_u:048.002c: vayaṃ tadā prāptakālāni sarve; vṛttāny upaiṣyāma tadaiva pārtha
GE07mbh_08_u:048.003a: mayi pratiśrutya vadhaṃ hi tasya; balasya cāptasya tathaiva vīra
GE07mbh_08_u:048.003c: ānīya naḥ śatrumadhyaṃ sa kasmāt; samutkṣipya sthaṇḍile pratyapiṃṣṭhāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:048.004a: anvāśiṣma vayam arjuna tvayi; yiyāsavo bahu kalyāṇam iṣṭam
GE07mbh_08_u:048.004c: tan naḥ sarvaṃ viphalaṃ rājaputra; phalārthināṃ nicula ivātipuṣpaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:048.004d-0678_03: taṃ naḥ satyam aphalam akārṣīs tvaṃ
GE07mbh_08_u:048.005a: pracchāditaṃ baḍiśam ivāmiṣeṇa; pracchādito gavaya ivāpavācā
GE07mbh_08_u:048.005c: anarthakaṃ me darśitavān asi tvaṃ; rājyārthino rājyarūpaṃ vināśam
GE07mbh_08_u:048.005d-0680_04: tan naḥ sarvān narake tvaṃ nyamajjayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:048.006a: yat tat pṛthāṃ vāg uvācāntarikṣe; saptāhajāte tvayi mandabuddhau
GE07mbh_08_u:048.006c: jātaḥ putro vāsavavikramo 'yaṃ; sarvāñ śūrāñ śātravāñ jeṣyatīti
GE07mbh_08_u:048.007a: ayaṃ jetā khāṇḍave devasaṃghān; sarvāṇi bhūtāny api cottamaujāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:048.007c: ayaṃ jetā madrakaliṅgakekayān; ayaṃ kurūn hanti ca rājamadhye
GE07mbh_08_u:048.008a: asmāt paro na bhavitā dhanurdharo; na vai bhūtaḥ kaś cana jātu jetā
GE07mbh_08_u:048.008c: icchann āryaḥ sarvabhūtāni kuryād; vaśe vaśī sarvasamāptavidyaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:048.009a: kāntyā śaśāṅkasya javena vāyoḥ; sthairyeṇa meroḥ kṣamayā pṛthivyāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:048.009c: sūryasya bhāsā dhanadasya lakṣmyā; śauryeṇa śakrasya balena viṣṇoḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:048.010a: tulyo mahātmā tava kunti putro; jāto 'diter viṣṇur ivārihantā
GE07mbh_08_u:048.010c: sveṣāṃ jayāya dviṣatāṃ vadhāya; khyāto 'mitaujāḥ kulatantukartā
GE07mbh_08_u:048.011c: evaṃvidhaṃ tvāṃ tac ca nābhūt tavādya; devā hi nūnam anṛtaṃ vadanti
GE07mbh_08_u:048.012a: tathāpareṣām ṛṣisattamānāṃ; śrutvā giraṃ pūjayatāṃ sadaiva
GE07mbh_08_u:048.012c: na saṃnatiṃ praimi suyodhanasya; na tvā jānāmy ādhirather bhayārtam
GE07mbh_08_u:048.013a: tvaṣṭrā kṛtaṃ vāham akūjanākṣaṃ; śubhaṃ samāsthāya kapidhvajaṃ tvam
GE07mbh_08_u:048.013c: khaḍgaṃ gṛhītvā hemacitraṃ samiddhaṃ; dhanuś cedaṃ gāṇḍivaṃ tālamātram
GE07mbh_08_u:048.013e: sa keśavenohyamānaḥ kathaṃ nu; karṇād bhīto vyapayāto 'si pārtha
GE07mbh_08_u:048.013f-020_0011: evaṃ gate kiṃ ca mayādya śakyaṃ
GE07mbh_08_u:048.013f-020_0050: yathā hy aśaktaḥ kriyate hy abāndhavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:048.014a: dhanuś caitat keśavāya pradāya; yantābhaviṣyas tvaṃ raṇe ced durātman
GE07mbh_08_u:048.014c: tato 'haniṣyat keśavaḥ karṇam ugraṃ; marutpatir vṛtram ivāttavajraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:048.015a: māse 'patiṣyaḥ pañcame tvaṃ prakṛcchre; na vā garbho 'py abhaviṣyaḥ pṛthāyāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:048.015c: tat te śramo rājaputrābhaviṣyan; na saṃgrāmād apayātuṃ durātman
GE07mbh_08_u:048.015d-0686_01: dhig gāṇḍivaṃ dhik ca te bāhuvīryam
GE07mbh_08_u:048.015d-0686_04: kṛśānudattaṃ ca rathaṃ ca te dhik
GE07mbh_08_u:049.002a: tasya kopaṃ samudvīkṣya cittajñaḥ keśavas tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:049.002c: uvāca kim idaṃ pārtha gṛhītaḥ khaḍga ity uta
GE07mbh_08_u:049.003a: neha paśyāmi yoddhavyaṃ tava kiṃ cid dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:049.003c: te dhvastā dhārtarāṣṭrā hi sarve bhīmena dhīmatā
GE07mbh_08_u:049.004a: apayāto 'si kaunteya rājā draṣṭavya ity api
GE07mbh_08_u:049.004c: sa rājā bhavatā dṛṣṭaḥ kuśalī ca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.005c: harṣakāle tu saṃprāpte kasmāt tvā manyur āviśat
GE07mbh_08_u:049.006a: na taṃ paśyāmi kaunteya yas te vadhyo bhaved iha
GE07mbh_08_u:049.006b-0687_01: prahartum icchase kasmāt kiṃ vā te cittavibhramaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.007a: tat tvā pṛcchāmi kaunteya kim idaṃ te cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_08_u:049.008a: evam uktas tu kṛṣṇena prekṣamāṇo yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_08_u:049.008c: arjunaḥ prāha govindaṃ kruddhaḥ sarpa iva śvasan
GE07mbh_08_u:049.009a: dada gāṇḍīvam anyasmā iti māṃ yo 'bhicodayet
GE07mbh_08_u:049.009c: chindyām ahaṃ śiras tasya ity upāṃśuvrataṃ mama
GE07mbh_08_u:049.010c: samakṣaṃ tava govinda na tat kṣantum ihotsahe
GE07mbh_08_u:049.012a: so 'haṃ yudhiṣṭhiraṃ hatvā satye 'py ānṛṇyatāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.013a: kiṃ vā tvaṃ manyase prāptam asmin kāle samutthite
GE07mbh_08_u:049.013c: tvam asya jagatas tāta vettha sarvaṃ gatāgatam
GE07mbh_08_u:049.013d-0689_01: jātas tvatto hi dharmaś cādharmaś ceti parā śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.013e: tat tathā prakariṣyāmi yathā māṃ vakṣyate bhavān saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:049.013f-0690_01: dhig dhig ity eva govindaḥ pārtham uktvābravīt punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.014a: idānīṃ pārtha jānāmi na vṛddhāḥ sevitās tvayā
GE07mbh_08_u:049.014e: na hi dharmavibhāgajñaḥ kuryād evaṃ dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:049.015a: akāryāṇāṃ ca kāryāṇāṃ saṃyogaṃ yaḥ karoti vai
GE07mbh_08_u:049.015c: kāryāṇām akriyāṇāṃ ca sa pārtha puruṣādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.016a: anusṛtya tu ye dharmaṃ kavayaḥ samupasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.017c: avaśo muhyate pārtha yathā tvaṃ mūḍha eva tu
GE07mbh_08_u:049.018a: na hi kāryam akāryaṃ vā sukhaṃ jñātuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_08_u:049.018c: śrutena jñāyate sarvaṃ tac ca tvaṃ nāvabudhyase
GE07mbh_08_u:049.019a: avijñānād bhavān yac ca dharmaṃ rakṣati dharmavit
GE07mbh_08_u:049.019c: prāṇināṃ hi vadhaṃ pārtha dhārmiko nāvabudhyate
GE07mbh_08_u:049.020a: prāṇinām avadhas tāta sarvajyāyān mato mama
GE07mbh_08_u:049.020c: anṛtaṃ tu bhaved vācyaṃ na ca hiṃsyāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_08_u:049.021a: sa kathaṃ bhrātaraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ rājānaṃ dharmakovidam
GE07mbh_08_u:049.021c: hanyād bhavān naraśreṣṭha prākṛto 'nyaḥ pumān iva
GE07mbh_08_u:049.022e: kṛtāñjaleḥ prapannasya na vadhaḥ pūjyate budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.022e-0692_02: na vadhaḥ pūjyate sadbhis tac ca sarvaṃ gurau tava
GE07mbh_08_u:049.023a: tvayā caiva vrataṃ pārtha bālenaiva kṛtaṃ purā
GE07mbh_08_u:049.024a: sa guruṃ pārtha kasmāt tvaṃ hanyā dharmam anusmaran
GE07mbh_08_u:049.025c: yad brūyāt tava bhīṣmo vā dharmajño vā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.026a: viduro vā tathā kṣattā kuntī vāpi yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_08_u:049.026b-0693_01: kuntī vā bharataśreṣṭha draupadī vā yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_08_u:049.026c: tat te vakṣyāmi tattvena tan nibodha dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:049.027a: satyasya vacanaṃ sādhu na satyād vidyate param
GE07mbh_08_u:049.028a: bhavet satyam avaktavyaṃ vaktavyam anṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_08_u:049.029a: prāṇātyaye vivāhe ca vaktavyam anṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_08_u:049.029c: yatrānṛtaṃ bhavet satyaṃ satyaṃ cāpy anṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_08_u:049.030a: tādṛśaṃ paśyate bālo yasya satyam anuṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_08_u:049.030b-0695_01: bhavet satyam avaktavyaṃ na vaktavyam anuṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_08_u:049.032a: kim āścaryaṃ punar mūḍho dharmakāmo 'py apaṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.032c: sumahat prāpnuyāt pāpam āpagām iva kauśikaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.033a: ācakṣva bhagavann etad yathā vidyām ahaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:049.034a: mṛgavyādho 'bhavat kaś cid balāko nāma bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:049.034c: yātrārthaṃ putradārasya mṛgān hanti na kāmataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.035a: so 'ndhau ca mātāpitarau bibharty anyāṃś ca saṃśritān
GE07mbh_08_u:049.036a: sa kadā cin mṛgāṃl lipsur nānvavindat prayatnavān
GE07mbh_08_u:049.037a: adṛṣṭapūrvam api tat sattvaṃ tena hataṃ tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:049.037c: anv eva ca tato vyomnaḥ puṣpavarṣam avāpatat
GE07mbh_08_u:049.039c: tapas taptvā varaṃ prāptaṃ kṛtam andhaṃ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_08_u:049.040c: tato balākaḥ svaragād evaṃ dharmaḥ sudurvidaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.041a: kauśiko 'py abhavad vipras tapasvī na bahuśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.041c: nadīnāṃ saṃgame grāmād adūre sa kilāvasat
GE07mbh_08_u:049.042a: satyaṃ mayā sadā vācyam iti tasyābhavad vratam
GE07mbh_08_u:049.043a: atha dasyubhayāt ke cit tadā tad vanam āviśan
GE07mbh_08_u:049.044a: atha kauśikam abhyetya prāhus taṃ satyavādinam
GE07mbh_08_u:049.044c: katamena pathā yātā bhagavan bahavo janāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.044e: satyena pṛṣṭaḥ prabrūhi yadi tān vettha śaṃsa naḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.045a: sa pṛṣṭaḥ kauśikaḥ satyaṃ vacanaṃ tān uvāca ha
GE07mbh_08_u:049.045b-0696_01: satyasya tv avibhāgajñaḥ satyaṃ tebhyaḥ śaśaṃsa saḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.045d-0697_01: iti tān khyāpayām āsa sa tebhyaḥ pārtha kauśikaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.045e: tatas te tān samāsādya krūrā jaghnur iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.047a: vṛddhān apṛṣṭvā saṃdehaṃ mahac chvabhram ito 'rhati
GE07mbh_08_u:049.047c: tatra te lakṣaṇoddeśaḥ kaś cid eva bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_08_u:049.048c: śrutir dharma iti hy eke vadanti bahavo janāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.049a: na tv etat pratisūyāmi na hi sarvaṃ vidhīyate
GE07mbh_08_u:049.049b-0698_01: śrutir dhāryeyam ity eke vadanti bahavo janāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.049b-0698_02: na tān pārthābhyasūyāmi na ca sarvatra śiṣyati
GE07mbh_08_u:049.049b-0698_03: smṛtir dhāryā iti tv eke vadanti bahavo janāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.049b-0698_04: na tu tān pratyasūyāmi nātra sarvaṃ vidhīyate
GE07mbh_08_u:049.049d-0699_03: manvādīnāṃ tu kṛtsnaṃ vai ko dharmaṃ vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_08_u:049.049d-0699_04: adharmād eva bhavati dharme 'pi ca mahān yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:049.049d-0699_06: vedo mūlaṃ hi dharmāṇām iti santo yad abruvan
GE07mbh_08_u:049.049d-0699_07: jijñāsate hi vidyānāṃ sādhanāny eva tattvavit
GE07mbh_08_u:049.049d-0699_09: sa tu vetti paraṃ dharmam ahiṃsāṃ vetti bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:049.049d-0700_01: yat syād ahiṃsāsaṃyuktaṃ sa dharma iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.050a: dhāraṇād dharmam ity āhur dharmo dhārayati prajāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.050c: yaḥ syād dhāraṇasaṃyuktaḥ sa dharma iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.051a: ye 'nyāyena jihīrṣanto janā icchanti karhi cit
GE07mbh_08_u:049.051c: akūjanena cen mokṣo nātra kūjet kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_08_u:049.052a: avaśyaṃ kūjitavyaṃ vā śaṅkeran vāpy akūjataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.052c: śreyas tatrānṛtaṃ vaktuṃ satyād iti vicāritam
GE07mbh_08_u:049.052d-0701_01: yaḥ kāryebhyo vrataṃ kṛtvā karmaṇā nopapādayet
GE07mbh_08_u:049.052d-0701_02: na tat phalam avāpnoti evam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.052d-0702_01: satye sati na pāpebhyo dhanaṃ deyaṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_08_u:049.053c: narmaṇy abhipravṛtte vā pravaktavyaṃ mṛṣā bhavet
GE07mbh_08_u:049.053f-0703_01: sarvadā hi vadet tat tu nānṛtaḥ syād vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.054a: yaḥ stenaiḥ saha saṃbandhān mucyate śapathair api
GE07mbh_08_u:049.054c: śreyas tatrānṛtaṃ vaktuṃ tat satyam avicāritam
GE07mbh_08_u:049.055a: na ca tebhyo dhanaṃ deyaṃ śakye sati kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_08_u:049.055c: pāpebhyo hi dhanaṃ dattaṃ dātāram api pīḍayet
GE07mbh_08_u:049.055e: tasmād dharmārtham anṛtam uktvā nānṛtavāg bhavet
GE07mbh_08_u:049.056c: etac chrutvā brūhi pārtha yadi vadhyo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.057a: yathā brūyān mahāprājño yathā brūyān mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.057c: hitaṃ caiva yathāsmākaṃ tathaitad vacanaṃ tava
GE07mbh_08_u:049.058c: gatiś ca paramā kṛṣṇa tena te vākyam adbhutam
GE07mbh_08_u:049.059a: na hi te triṣu lokeṣu vidyate 'viditaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_08_u:049.059c: tasmād bhavān paraṃ dharmaṃ veda sarvaṃ yathātatham
GE07mbh_08_u:049.060c: tasmin samayasaṃyoge brūhi kiṃ cid anugraham
GE07mbh_08_u:049.060e: idaṃ cāparam atraiva śṛṇu hṛtsthaṃ vivakṣitam
GE07mbh_08_u:049.061a: jānāsi dāśārha mama vrataṃ tvaṃ; yo māṃ brūyāt kaś cana mānuṣeṣu
GE07mbh_08_u:049.061c: anyasmai tvaṃ gāṇḍivaṃ dehi pārtha; yas tvatto 'strair bhavitā vā viśiṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.062a: hanyām ahaṃ keśava taṃ prasahya; bhīmo hanyāt tūbaraketi coktaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.062c: tan me rājā proktavāṃs te samakṣaṃ; dhanur dehīty asakṛd vṛṣṇisiṃha
GE07mbh_08_u:049.063a: taṃ hatvā cet keśava jīvaloke; sthātā kālaṃ nāham apy alpamātram
GE07mbh_08_u:049.063b-0705_01: evaṃ tvaṃ māṃ kṛṣṇa jānāsi sarvaṃ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.063b-0706_01: dhyātvā nūnaṃ hy enasā cāpi mukto
GE07mbh_08_u:049.063c: sā ca pratijñā mama lokaprabuddhā; bhavet satyā dharmabhṛtāṃ variṣṭha
GE07mbh_08_u:049.063e: yathā jīvet pāṇḍavo 'haṃ ca kṛṣṇa; tathā buddhiṃ dātum adyārhasi tvam
GE07mbh_08_u:049.063f-0707_01: evaṃ jñātvā yad dhitaṃ me sadaiva
GE07mbh_08_u:049.064a: rājā śrānto jagato vikṣataś ca; karṇena saṃkhye niśitair bāṇasaṃghaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.064b-0709_05: akopito hy eṣa yadi sma saṃkhye
GE07mbh_08_u:049.064b-0709_06: karṇaṃ na hanyād iti cābravīc ca
GE07mbh_08_u:049.064c: tasmāt pārtha tvāṃ paruṣāṇy avocat; karṇe dyūtaṃ hy adya raṇe nibaddham
GE07mbh_08_u:049.065a: tasmin hate kuravo nirjitāḥ syur; evaṃbuddhiḥ pārthivo dharmaputraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.065b-0711_03: jīvann ayaṃ yena mṛto bhaved dhi
GE07mbh_08_u:049.065c: yadāvamānaṃ labhate mahāntaṃ; tadā jīvan mṛta ity ucyate saḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.066a: tan mānitaḥ pārthivo 'yaṃ sadaiva; tvayā sabhīmena tathā yamābhyām
GE07mbh_08_u:049.066c: vṛddhaiś ca loke puruṣapravīrais; tasyāvamānaṃ kalayā tvaṃ prayuṅkṣva
GE07mbh_08_u:049.066d-0713_01: yad idaṃ dharmaśāstrārthaṃ vedeṣu ca nidarśanam
GE07mbh_08_u:049.066d-0714_01: śṛṇu pārtha yathā nityo hataḥ syād bhavatā guruḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.066d-0714_02: hato bhavety evam ukto guruḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.067a: tvam ity atrabhavantaṃ tvaṃ brūhi pārtha yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_08_u:049.067c: tvam ity ukto hi nihato gurur bhavati bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:049.069a: atharvāṅgirasī hy eṣā śrutīnām uttamā śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.069d-0715_01: avadhena vadhaḥ prokto yad gurus tvam iti prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.069d-0715_02: tad brūhi tvaṃ yan mayoktaṃ dharmarājasya dharmavit
GE07mbh_08_u:049.070a: vadho hy ayaṃ pāṇḍava dharmarājñas; tvatto yukto vetsyate caivam eṣaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.070c: tato 'sya pādāv abhivādya paścāc; chamaṃ brūyāḥ sāntvapūrvaṃ ca pārtham
GE07mbh_08_u:049.071a: bhrātā prājñas tava kopaṃ na jātu; kuryād rājā kaṃ cana pāṇḍaveyaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.071c: mukto 'nṛtād bhrātṛvadhāc ca pārtha; hṛṣṭaḥ karṇaṃ tvaṃ jahi sūtaputram
GE07mbh_08_u:049.072a: ity evam uktas tu janārdanena; pārthaḥ praśasyātha suhṛdvadhaṃ tam
GE07mbh_08_u:049.072c: tato 'bravīd arjuno dharmarājam; anuktapūrvaṃ paruṣaṃ prasahya
GE07mbh_08_u:049.073a: mā tvaṃ rājan vyāhara vyāharatsu; na tiṣṭhase krośamātre raṇārdhe
GE07mbh_08_u:049.073b-0716_01: mā vocas tvaṃ kiṃ cid ihādya rājaṃs
GE07mbh_08_u:049.073b-0716_02: tyaktvā yuddhaṃ ya iha vyavasthitas tvam
GE07mbh_08_u:049.073c: bhīmas tu mām arhati garhaṇāya; yo yudhyate sarvayodhapravīraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:049.074a: kāle hi śatrūn pratipīḍya saṃkhye; hatvā ca śūrān pṛthivīpatīṃs tān rathapradhānottamanāgamukhyān
GE07mbh_08_u:049.074c: yaḥ kuñjarāṇām adhikaṃ sahasraṃ; hatvānadat tumulaṃ siṃhanādam
GE07mbh_08_u:049.075a: suduṣkaraṃ karma karoti vīraḥ; kartuṃ yathā nārhasi tvaṃ kadā cit

GE07mbh_08_u:050.054d-0745_01: na cābhimukhato vācyo bhavān etad vaco mayā
GE07mbh_08_u:050.054d-0745_03: avaśyam eva vaktavyam atas tvāṃ prabravīmy aham
GE07mbh_08_u:050.054d-0746_01: atimānāc ca tenātmā mantavyo vai kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_08_u:050.054d-0747_01: bahunātra kim uktena saṃkṣepāc chṛṇu pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_08_u:050.054d-0747_02: tvatsamaṃ tvadviśiṣṭaṃ vā karṇaṃ manye mahāratham
GE07mbh_08_u:050.054d-0747_03: paramaṃ yatnam āsthāya tvayā vadhyo mahāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:050.054d-0748_01: na hi karṇaṃ raṇe prāpya śakto hi syāt puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:050.054d-0748_03: tvāṃ tu prāpya mahāraṅge yatnavān api bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:050.054d-0748_04: nivarteta raṇāt karṇa iti me dhīyate matiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:050.055a: dhanurgrahā hi ye ke cit kṣatriyā yuddhadurmadāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:050.055c: ā devāt tvatsamaṃ teṣāṃ na paśyāmi śṛṇomi vā
GE07mbh_08_u:050.056a: brahmaṇā ca prajāḥ sṛṣṭā gāṇḍīvaṃ ca mahādbhutam
GE07mbh_08_u:050.056c: yena tvaṃ yudhyase pārtha tasmān nāsti tvayā samaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:050.057a: avaśyaṃ tu mayā vācyaṃ yat pathyaṃ tava pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_08_u:050.058a: karṇo hi balavān dhṛṣṭaḥ kṛtāstraś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:050.058c: kṛtī ca citrayodhī ca deśe kāle ca kovidaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:050.060c: atimānī ca śūraś ca pravīraḥ priyadarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:050.061d-0749_01: na bhīṣaye tvāṃ pārthāhaṃ harṣaṃ saṃjanayāmi te
GE07mbh_08_u:050.062a: sarvair avadhyo rādheyo devair api savāsavaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:050.062c: ṛte tvām iti me buddhis tvam adya jahi sūtajam
GE07mbh_08_u:050.063a: devair api hi saṃyattair bibhradbhir māṃsaśoṇitam
GE07mbh_08_u:050.063c: aśakyaḥ samare jetuṃ sarvair api yuyutsubhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:050.063d-0750_01: devair api hi saṃrabdhaiḥ sarvalokeśvarair api
GE07mbh_08_u:050.063d-0750_02: aśakyaṃ taṃ raṇe manye sarvair api yuyutsubhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:050.064a: durātmānaṃ pāpamatiṃ nṛśaṃsaṃ; duṣṭaprajñaṃ pāṇḍaveyeṣu nityam
GE07mbh_08_u:050.064c: hīnasvārthaṃ pāṇḍaveyair virodhe; hatvā karṇaṃ dhiṣṭhitārtho bhavādya
GE07mbh_08_u:050.065a: vīraṃ manyata ātmānaṃ yena pāpaḥ suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:050.065c: tam adya mūlaṃ pāpānāṃ jaya sautiṃ dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:050.065d-0754_03: ahaṃ tvām anujānāmi vīryeṇa ca balena ca
GE07mbh_08_u:050.065d-0754_04: jahi karṇaṃ raṇe śūraṃ mātaṅgam iva kesarī
GE07mbh_08_u:050.065d-0754_06: tam adya pārtha saṃgrāme karṇaṃ vaikartanaṃ jahi
GE07mbh_08_u:051.003a: bhūtvā hi vipulā senā tāvakānāṃ paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_08_u:051.003c: anyonyaṃ samare prāpya kiṃciccheṣā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:051.004c: tvāṃ vai śatruṃ samāsādya vinaṣṭā raṇamūrdhani
GE07mbh_08_u:051.005a: ete ca sarve pāñcālāḥ sṛñjayāś ca sahānvayāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.005c: tvāṃ samāsādya durdharṣaṃ pāṇḍavāś ca vyavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.006b-0755_01: māgadhaiḥ pārijātaiś ca dākṣiṇātyaiś ca keralaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.007a: ko hi śakto raṇe jetuṃ kauravāṃs tāta saṃgatān
GE07mbh_08_u:051.007c: anyatra pāṇḍavān yuddhe tvayā guptān mahārathān
GE07mbh_08_u:051.008a: tvaṃ hi śakto raṇe jetuṃ sasurāsuramānuṣān
GE07mbh_08_u:051.008c: trīṃl lokān samam udyuktān kiṃ punaḥ kauravaṃ balam
GE07mbh_08_u:051.009a: bhagadattaṃ hi rājānaṃ ko 'nyaḥ śaktas tvayā vinā
GE07mbh_08_u:051.010a: tathemāṃ vipulāṃ senāṃ guptāṃ pārtha tvayānagha
GE07mbh_08_u:051.010c: na śekuḥ pārthivāḥ sarve cakṣurbhir abhivīkṣitum
GE07mbh_08_u:051.011a: tathaiva satataṃ pārtha rakṣitābhyāṃ tvayā raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:051.012a: ko hi śakto raṇe pārtha pāñcālānāṃ mahārathau
GE07mbh_08_u:051.013a: ko hi śāṃtanavaṃ saṃkhye droṇaṃ vaikartanaṃ kṛpam
GE07mbh_08_u:051.013c: drauṇiṃ ca saumadattiṃ ca kṛtavarmāṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:051.013e: saindhavaṃ madrarājaṃ ca rājānaṃ ca suyodhanam
GE07mbh_08_u:051.014d-0757_01: tvām ṛte puruṣavyāghra jetuṃ śaktaḥ pumān iha
GE07mbh_08_u:051.016b-0758_02: tvāṃ samāsādya bībhatso hatā nāgāś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:051.018a: ugrāś ca krūrakarmāṇas tukhārā yavanāḥ khaśāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.019a: andhrakāś ca pulindāś ca kirātāś cogravikramāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.020c: na śakyā yudhi nirjetuṃ tvad anyena paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_08_u:051.021a: dhārtarāṣṭram udagraṃ hi vyūḍhaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahābalam
GE07mbh_08_u:051.021c: yasya tvaṃ na bhaves trātā pratīyāt ko nu mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.022a: tat sāgaram ivoddhūtaṃ rajasā saṃvṛtaṃ balam
GE07mbh_08_u:051.022c: vidārya pāṇḍavaiḥ kruddhais tvayā guptair hataṃ vibho
GE07mbh_08_u:051.024c: jaghāna gadayā bhīmas tasya rājñaḥ paricchadam
GE07mbh_08_u:051.024e: tato 'nye 'pi hatā nāgā rathāś ca śataśo balāt
GE07mbh_08_u:051.025a: tad evaṃ samare tāta vartamāne mahābhaye
GE07mbh_08_u:051.025c: bhīmasenaṃ samāsādya tvāṃ ca pāṇḍava kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.026a: tathā senāmukhe tatra nihate pārtha pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.028d-0759_02: lakṣaṃ naradvipān hatvā sametān sa mahābalān
GE07mbh_08_u:051.028d-0761_01: tena śūreṇa balinā muktās tv ayutaśaḥ śarāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.029a: gatyā daśamyā te gatvā jaghnur vājirathadvipān
GE07mbh_08_u:051.029c: hitvā nava gatīr duṣṭāḥ sa bāṇān vyāyato 'mucat
GE07mbh_08_u:051.030a: dināni daśa bhīṣmeṇa nighnatā tāvakaṃ balam
GE07mbh_08_u:051.030c: śūnyāḥ kṛtā rathopasthā hatāś ca gajavājinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.033c: tathā carantaṃ samare tapantam iva bhāskaram
GE07mbh_08_u:051.033e: na śekuḥ sṛñjayā draṣṭuṃ tathaivānye mahīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.034a: vicarantaṃ tathā taṃ tu saṃgrāme jitakāśinam
GE07mbh_08_u:051.035a: sa tu vidrāvya samare pāṇḍavān sṛñjayān api
GE07mbh_08_u:051.035c: eka eva raṇe bhīṣma ekavīratvam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.036a: taṃ śikhaṇḍī samāsādya tvayā gupto mahāratham
GE07mbh_08_u:051.036d-0763_01: mṛtyur jāto 'vadhīd bhīṣmaṃ śaraughaiḥ pātayan rathāt
GE07mbh_08_u:051.037a: sa eṣa patitaḥ śete śaratalpe pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.037c: tvāṃ prāpya puruṣavyāghra gṛdhraḥ prāpyeva vāyasam
GE07mbh_08_u:051.038a: droṇaḥ pañca dināny ugro vidhamya ripuvāhinīḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.040a: adyeti dve dine vīro bhāradvājaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_08_u:051.040c: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ samāsādya sa gataḥ paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_08_u:051.041a: yadi caiva parān yuddhe sūtaputramukhān rathān
GE07mbh_08_u:051.041c: nāvārayiṣyaḥ saṃgrāme na sma droṇo vyanaṅkṣyata
GE07mbh_08_u:051.042a: bhavatā tu balaṃ sarvaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrasya vāritam
GE07mbh_08_u:051.042c: tato droṇo hato yuddhe pārṣatena dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:051.043a: ka ivānyo raṇe kuryāt tvad anyaḥ kṣatriyo yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:051.043b-0764_01: kaś ca śakto raṇe kartuṃ tvad anyaḥ puruṣabruvaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.043c: yādṛśaṃ te kṛtaṃ pārtha jayadrathavadhaṃ prati
GE07mbh_08_u:051.044a: nivārya senāṃ mahatīṃ hatvā śūrāṃś ca pārthivān
GE07mbh_08_u:051.045c: anāścaryaṃ hi tat tvattas tvaṃ hi pārtha mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.046a: tvāṃ hi prāpya raṇe kṣatram ekāhād iti bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:051.046c: tapyamānam asaṃyuktaṃ na bhaved iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.047a: seyaṃ pārtha camūr ghorā dhārtarāṣṭrasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:051.047c: hatā sasarvavīrā hi bhīṣmadroṇau yadā hatau
GE07mbh_08_u:051.049a: vidhvastā hi raṇe pārtha seneyaṃ bhīmavikramāt
GE07mbh_08_u:051.050a: teṣāṃ hatāvaśiṣṭās tu pañca santi mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.051a: tāṃs tvam adya naravyāghra hatvā pañca mahārathān
GE07mbh_08_u:051.051d-0765_01: droṇaputraṃ kṛpaṃ śalyaṃ bhojam ādhirathiṃ tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:051.051d-0765_02: etāṃs tu vai naravyāghra hatvā vīrān mahārathān
GE07mbh_08_u:051.053a: etāṃ purā viṣṇur iva hatvā daiteyadānavān
GE07mbh_08_u:051.053c: prayaccha medinīṃ rājñe śakrāyeva yathā hariḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.054a: adya modantu pāñcālā nihateṣv ariṣu tvayā
GE07mbh_08_u:051.055a: yadi vā dvipadāṃ śreṣṭha droṇaṃ mānayato gurum
GE07mbh_08_u:051.056d-0766_01: yuddhvā yāmy adya tau pārtha saṃrabdhāv ātatāyinau
GE07mbh_08_u:051.057c: yadi tvam aravindākṣa dayāvān na jighāṃsasi
GE07mbh_08_u:051.058a: imaṃ pāpamatiṃ kṣudram atyantaṃ pāṇḍavān prati
GE07mbh_08_u:051.058c: karṇam adya naraśreṣṭha jahy āśu niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.059a: etat te sukṛtaṃ karma nātra kiṃ cin na yujyate
GE07mbh_08_u:051.059c: vayam apy atra jānīmo nātra doṣo 'sti kaś cana
GE07mbh_08_u:051.060a: dahane yat saputrāyā niśi mātus tavānagha
GE07mbh_08_u:051.060c: dyūtārthe yac ca yuṣmāsu prāvartata suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.060e: tatra sarvatra duṣṭātmā karṇo mūlam ihārjuna
GE07mbh_08_u:051.061a: karṇād dhi manyate trāṇaṃ nityam eva suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.061c: tato mām api saṃrabdho nigrahītuṃ pracakrame
GE07mbh_08_u:051.062c: karṇaḥ pārthān raṇe sarvān vijeṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.063c: rocito bhavatā sārdhaṃ jānatāpi balaṃ tava
GE07mbh_08_u:051.064a: karṇo hi bhāṣate nityam ahaṃ pārthān samāgatān
GE07mbh_08_u:051.065c: samitau garjate karṇas tam adya jahi bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:051.066a: yac ca yuṣmāsu pāpaṃ vai dhārtarāṣṭraḥ prayuktavān
GE07mbh_08_u:051.066b-0768_01: sarvatrānṛjur aprājñaḥ karṇam āśritya vai purā
GE07mbh_08_u:051.066c: tatra sarvatra duṣṭātmā karṇaḥ pāpamatir mukham
GE07mbh_08_u:051.067a: yac ca tad dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ krūraiḥ ṣaḍbhir mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.068c: nirmanuṣyāṃś ca mātaṅgān virathāṃś ca mahārathān
GE07mbh_08_u:051.071a: śaraiḥ saubhadram āyastaṃ dahantam iva vāhinīm
GE07mbh_08_u:051.071c: tan me dahati gātrāṇi sakhe satyena te śape
GE07mbh_08_u:051.072a: yat tatrāpi ca duṣṭātmā karṇo 'bhyadruhyata prabho
GE07mbh_08_u:051.074b-0770_01: duryodhanaṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā lajjamāno muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.074b-0770_03: dṛṣṭvā droṇaṃ vadhopāyam abhimanyos tu pṛṣṭavān
GE07mbh_08_u:051.075a: atha droṇasya samare tat kālasadṛśaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:051.075c: śrutvā karṇo vacaḥ krūraṃ tataś ciccheda kārmukam
GE07mbh_08_u:051.076a: tataś chinnāyudhaṃ tena raṇe pañca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.076d-0771_01: tasmin vinihate vīre sarveṣāṃ duḥkham āviśat
GE07mbh_08_u:051.076d-0772_01: prāhasat sa tu duṣṭātmā karṇaḥ sa ca suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.077a: yac ca karṇo 'bravīt kṛṣṇāṃ sabhāyāṃ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.078a: vinaṣṭāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kṛṣṇe śāśvataṃ narakaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.079d-0773_01: na pāṇḍavāḥ prabhavanti tava kṛṣṇe kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_08_u:051.079d-0773_02: dāsabhāryāsi pāñcāli svayaṃ dāsī ca śobhane
GE07mbh_08_u:051.079d-0773_03: adya duryodhano hy ekaḥ pṛthivyāṃ nṛpatiḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.079d-0773_05: paśyedānīṃ yathā bhadre vinaṣṭāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ samam
GE07mbh_08_u:051.079d-0773_07: vyaktaṃ ṣaṇḍhatilā hy ete narake ca nimajjitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.080c: pāpaḥ pāpaṃ vacaḥ karṇaḥ śṛṇvatas tava bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:051.081a: tasya pāpasya tad vākyaṃ suvarṇavikṛtāḥ śarāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.081d-023_0001: adya karṇaṃ raṇe grastaṃ paśyantu kuravas tvayā
GE07mbh_08_u:051.081d-023_0003: adya te samare vīryaṃ paśyantu kuruyodhinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.081d-023_0004: sūtaputre hate pārtha jānantu tvāṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_08_u:051.081d-023_0005: adya kaṅkā valā gṛdhrā vāyasā jambukās tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:051.081d-023_0007: adyātirathir ākṣipto nihataś ca tvayā raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:051.081d-023_0008: kurūṇāṃ śokam ādhattāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mudaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:051.081d-023_0009: adya tvāṃ pratinandantu pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_08_u:051.081d-023_0010: yathā vṛtravadhe vṛtte devāḥ sarve śatakratum
GE07mbh_08_u:051.081d-023_0011: adya karṇaṃ raṇe hatvā prāpya caivottamaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.081d-023_0015: tathā tvam api rādheyaṃ ghoraṃ kṛtvā mahad vapuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.081d-023_0016: jahi yuddhe mahābāho trāyasva ca bhayāt svakān
GE07mbh_08_u:051.082a: yāni cānyāni duṣṭātmā pāpāni kṛtavāṃs tvayi
GE07mbh_08_u:051.082c: tāny adya jīvitaṃ cāsya śamayantu śarās tava
GE07mbh_08_u:051.082d-0774_03: adya cādhirathir viddhas tava bāṇaiḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.082d-0774_05: gāṇḍīvaprasṛtān ghorān adya gātraiḥ spṛśañ śarān
GE07mbh_08_u:051.082d-0774_06: etu karṇo raṇe pārthaḥ śvāvicchalalito yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:051.083a: gāṇḍīvaprahitān ghorān adya gātraiḥ spṛśañ śarān
GE07mbh_08_u:051.084c: tvayāstās tasya marmāṇi bhittvā pāsyanti śoṇitam
GE07mbh_08_u:051.085a: ugrās tvadbhujanirmuktā marma bhittvā śitāḥ śarāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.085d-0775_02: na cet smarati rādheyo vacanaṃ droṇabhīṣmayoḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.085d-0775_04: na ced ādhirather varma bhittvā pāsyanti śoṇitam
GE07mbh_08_u:051.085d-0775_05: ugrās tvadbāhunirmuktā na cen marmacchidaḥ śarāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.086b-0776_01: taṃ ca hāhākṛtaṃ dīnaṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ śarapīḍitam
GE07mbh_08_u:051.087a: adya svaśoṇite magnaṃ śayānaṃ patitaṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_08_u:051.087d-0777_01: tac caivādya mahad varma gāṇḍīvapreṣitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.087d-0777_03: āśu cādya śarās tasya saṃpatanto mahāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:051.087d-0777_05: tvayā cādya hate tasya vikrame bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_08_u:051.087d-0777_07: tathā cādhirathau yāte prayāntu kuravo diśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.087d-0777_09: sa caivādya bhayāt tyaktvā dhārtarāṣṭro mahācamūm
GE07mbh_08_u:051.087d-0777_11: tathādya taṃ hataṃ śrutvā dhārtarāṣṭro janeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.087d-0777_12: mohena nipated bhūmau niḥsaṃjño vai mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.087d-0777_13: adya jānantu te pārtha vikramaṃ sarvadhanvinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.087d-0777_14: yān avocat sabhāmadhye paruṣān bhārata tvayi
GE07mbh_08_u:051.089d-0778_01: na cet karṇasutaṃ pārtha sūtaputrasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:051.089d-0779_01: hataṃ karṇaḥ sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā priyaṃ putraṃ durātmavān
GE07mbh_08_u:051.089d-0779_02: smaratāṃ droṇabhīṣmābhyāṃ vacaḥ kṣattuś ca mānada
GE07mbh_08_u:051.090a: tataḥ suyodhano dṛṣṭvā hatam ādhirathiṃ tvayā

GE07mbh_08_u:054.014a: sarvāṃs tūṇīrān mārgaṇān vānvavekṣya; kiṃ śiṣṭaṃ syāt sāyakānāṃ rathe me

GE07mbh_08_u:054.014d-0817_02: hy ācakṣva me sārathe kṣipram eva
GE07mbh_08_u:054.015a: ṣaṇmārgaṇānām ayutāni vīra; kṣurāś ca bhallāś ca tathāyutākhyāḥ

GE07mbh_08_u:054.016b-0821_01: prāsāś ca mudgarāḥ śaktayas tomarāś ca
GE07mbh_08_u:054.016c: etad vidvan muñca sahasraśo 'pi; gadāsibāhudraviṇaṃ ca te 'sti
GE07mbh_08_u:054.017a: sūtādyemaṃ paśya bhīmapramuktaiḥ; saṃbhindadbhiḥ pārthivān āśuvegaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:054.017c: ugrair bāṇair āhavaṃ ghorarūpaṃ; naṣṭādityaṃ mṛtyulokena tulyam
GE07mbh_08_u:054.018a: adyaiva tad viditaṃ pārthivānāṃ; bhaviṣyati ākumāraṃ ca sūta

GE07mbh_08_u:054.020a: āśāstāraḥ karma cāpy uttamaṃ vā; tan me devāḥ kevalaṃ sādhayantu

GE07mbh_08_u:054.021a: īkṣasvaitāṃ bhāratīṃ dīryamāṇām; ete kasmād vidravante narendrāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:054.021c: vyaktaṃ dhīmān savyasācī narāgryaḥ; sainyaṃ hy etac chādayaty āśu bāṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:054.022a: paśya dhvajāṃś ca dravato viśoka; nāgān hayān pattisaṃghāṃś ca saṃkhye
GE07mbh_08_u:054.022c: rathān viśīrṇāñ śaraśaktitāḍitān; paśyasvaitān rathinaś caiva sūta
GE07mbh_08_u:054.023a: āpūryate kauravī cāpy abhīkṣṇaṃ; senā hy asau subhṛśaṃ hanyamānā

GE07mbh_08_u:054.024e: hāhākṛtāś caiva raṇe viśoka; muñcanti nādān vipulān gajendrāḥ viśoka uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:054.025a: sarve kāmāḥ pāṇḍava te samṛddhāḥ; kapidhvajo dṛśyate hastisainye
GE07mbh_08_u:054.025c: nīlād dhanād vidyutam uccarantīṃ; tathāpaśyaṃ visphurad vai dhanus tat
GE07mbh_08_u:054.026a: kapir hy asau vīkṣyate sarvato vai; dhvajāgram āruhya dhanaṃjayasya
GE07mbh_08_u:054.026c: divākarābho maṇir eṣa divyo; vibhrājate caiva kirīṭasaṃsthaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:054.027a: pārśve bhīmaṃ pāṇḍurābhraprakāśaṃ; paśyemaṃ tvaṃ devadattaṃ sughoṣam
GE07mbh_08_u:054.028a: raviprabhaṃ vajranābhaṃ kṣurāntaṃ; pārśve sthitaṃ paśya janārdanasya
GE07mbh_08_u:054.028c: cakraṃ yaśo vardhayat keśavasya; sadārcitaṃ yadubhiḥ paśya vīra
GE07mbh_08_u:054.028d-026_0014: vidāritān paśya patanty amī yathā tavānujenāmararājatejasā

GE07mbh_08_u:055.001a: śrutvā ca rathanirghoṣaṃ siṃhanādaṃ ca saṃyuge

GE07mbh_08_u:055.006a: tair astam uccāvacam āyudhaugham; ekaḥ praciccheda kirīṭamālī

GE07mbh_08_u:055.007a: chatrāṇi vālavyajanāni ketūn; aśvān rathān pattigaṇān dvipāṃś ca
GE07mbh_08_u:055.007c: te petur urvyāṃ bahudhā virūpā; vātaprabhagnāni yathā vanāni
GE07mbh_08_u:055.008c: suvarṇapuṅkhair iṣubhiḥ samācitāś; cakāśire prajvalitā yathācalāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:055.009a: vidārya nāgāṃś ca rathāṃś ca vājinaḥ; śarottamair vāsavavajrasaṃnibhaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:055.009c: drutaṃ yayau karṇajighāṃsayā tathā; yathā marutvān balabhedane purā
GE07mbh_08_u:055.013a: te tu taṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ vyāghrā iva mahārathāḥ

GE07mbh_08_u:055.015d-0838_04: parighaiḥ paṭṭiśaiś caiva gadābhiś ca paraśvadhaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:055.016c: preṣayām āsa viśikhair yamasya sadanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_08_u:055.017c: tatra tatra sma līyante bhaye jāte mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:055.019a: te vadhyamānāḥ samare nānāliṅgaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:055.019c: arjunaṃ samabhityajya dudruvur vai diśo bhayāt
GE07mbh_08_u:055.020a: teṣāṃ śabdo mahān āsīd dravatāṃ vāhinīmukhe
GE07mbh_08_u:055.020c: mahaughasyeva bhadraṃ te girim āsādya dīryataḥ

GE07mbh_08_u:055.022a: tasya śabdo mahān āsīt parān abhimukhasya vai

GE07mbh_08_u:055.026a: tenārdyamānā rājendra senā tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:055.026c: vyabhrāmyata mahārāja bhinnā naur iva sāgare
GE07mbh_08_u:055.027a: tāṃ tu senāṃ tadā bhīmo darśayan pāṇilāghavam
GE07mbh_08_u:055.027b-0840_02: gajān gajair naravarān narair evānayat kṣayam
GE07mbh_08_u:055.027b-0840_03: kaṃ cid gajaṃ samutkṣipya gajaṃ bhīmo 'bhyadhāvata
GE07mbh_08_u:055.027b-0840_05: sa tu tenāhanat kruddho giriṇeva mahāgirim
GE07mbh_08_u:055.027b-0840_06: kasya cid dantam utpāṭya dantenaivāhanad gajam
GE07mbh_08_u:055.027b-0840_09: rathān hayān nṛpavarān āviṣṭa iva pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:055.029c: dṛṣṭvā duryodhano rājā idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:055.030a: sainikān sa maheṣvāso yodhāṃś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_08_u:055.030c: samādiśad raṇe sarvān hata bhīmam iti sma ha
GE07mbh_08_u:055.030e: tasmin hate hataṃ manye sarvasainyam aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:055.031a: pratigṛhya ca tām ājñāṃ tava putrasya pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:055.031d-0841_01: tasmin raṇe mahārāja maheṣvāsā narās tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:055.032a: gajāś ca bahulā rājan narāś ca jayagṛddhinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:055.032c: rathā hayāś ca rājendra parivavrur vṛkodaram
GE07mbh_08_u:055.033a: sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ śūraiḥ śūro rājan samantataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:055.034a: sa rarāja tathā saṃkhye darśanīyo narottamaḥ

GE07mbh_08_u:055.035a: tatra te pārthivāḥ sarve śaravṛṣṭīḥ samāsṛjan

GE07mbh_08_u:055.048a: śakunis tasya rājendra vāme pārśve stanāntare
GE07mbh_08_u:055.049a: varma bhittvā tu sauvarṇaṃ bāṇās tasya mahātmanaḥ

GE07mbh_08_u:055.052a: tasmin nipatite bhūmau bhīmaḥ kruddho viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:055.052c: dhanuś ciccheda bhallena saubalasya hasann iva

GE07mbh_08_u:055.055a: dhvajam ekena ciccheda chatraṃ dvābhyāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:055.055d-0847_01: tato hṛṣṭo mahārāja tava putro mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:055.055d-0847_02: sādhu sādhu mahābāho jahi bhīmaṃ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:055.058a: tatas tām eva saṃgṛhya śaktiṃ kanakabhūṣaṇām
GE07mbh_08_u:055.058d-0848_01: bhīmo 'pi paramāmarṣī tāṃ śaktiṃ saṃnivārya ca
GE07mbh_08_u:055.059a: sā nirbhidya bhujaṃ savyaṃ pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:055.059c: papāta ca tato bhūmau yathā vidyun nabhaścyutā
GE07mbh_08_u:055.060c: na tu taṃ mamṛṣe bhīmaḥ siṃhanādaṃ tarasvinām
GE07mbh_08_u:055.061a: sa saṃgṛhya dhanuḥ sajyaṃ tvaramāṇo mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:055.061c: muhūrtād iva rājendra chādayām āsa sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:055.062a: tasyāśvāṃś caturo hatvā sūtaṃ caiva viśāṃ pate

GE07mbh_08_u:056.002a: karṇo vā jayatāṃ śreṣṭho yodhā vā māmakā yudhi

GE07mbh_08_u:056.007f-0852_01: atha karṇo 'bravīc chalyaṃ pāñcālān prāpayasva mām
GE07mbh_08_u:056.008c: yantāram abravīt karṇaḥ pāñcālān eva mā vaha

GE07mbh_08_u:056.024f-0854_01: prādravanta raṇe bhītāḥ siṃhatrastā mṛgā iva
GE07mbh_08_u:056.024f-0855_01: tatas tān prahasan vīro vijigye pāṇḍavān raṇe

GE07mbh_08_u:056.027c: tutuṣur devatāḥ sarvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:056.029c: kakṣam iddho yathā vahnir nidāghe jvalito mahān
GE07mbh_08_u:056.030a: te vadhyamānāḥ karṇena pāṇḍaveyās tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:056.030c: prādravanta raṇe bhītāḥ karṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahābalam
GE07mbh_08_u:056.032c: karṇam ekaṃ raṇe yodhaṃ menire tatra śātravāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:056.033c: yad ekaṃ pāṇḍavāḥ sarve na śekur abhivīkṣitum
GE07mbh_08_u:056.034c: tathā tat pāṇḍavaṃ sainyaṃ karṇam āsādya dīryate

GE07mbh_08_u:056.036c: bāhūṃś ca vīro vīrāṇāṃ ciccheda laghu ceṣubhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:056.037a: hastidantān tsarūn khaḍgān dhvajāñ śaktīr hayān gajān
