GE07mbh_08_u:058.019a: utsṛjya hi mahābāhuṃ bhīmasenaṃ tadā raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:058.019c: balaṃ kurūṇām udvignaṃ sarvam āsīt parāṅmukham
GE07mbh_08_u:058.021a: samāgamya sa bhīmena mantrayitvā ca phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:058.022c: nādayan rathaghoṣeṇa pṛthivīṃ dyāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:058.024a: te tam abhyardayan bāṇair ulkābhir iva kuñjaram
GE07mbh_08_u:058.024c: ātateṣv asanāḥ krūrā nṛtyanta iva bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:058.025a: apasavyāṃs tu tāṃś cakre rathena madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:058.025b-0902_01: niyuktān hi sa tān mene yamāyāśu kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_08_u:058.026a: teṣām āpatatāṃ ketūn rathāṃś cāpāni sāyakān
GE07mbh_08_u:058.026c: nārācair ardhacandraiś ca kṣipraṃ pārtho nyapātayat
GE07mbh_08_u:058.027a: athānyair daśabhir bhallaiḥ śirāṃsy eṣāṃ nyapātayat
GE07mbh_08_u:058.027e: tāni vaktrāṇi vibabhur vyomni tārāgaṇā iva
GE07mbh_08_u:058.028a: tāṃs tu bhallair mahāvegair daśabhir daśa kauravān
GE07mbh_08_u:059.001a: taṃ tu yāntaṃ mahāvegair aśvaiḥ kapivaradhvajam
GE07mbh_08_u:059.003a: tataḥ karṇarathaṃ yāntam arīn ghnantaṃ dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_08_u:059.004c: jaghāna navatiṃ vīrān arjuno niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.005c: savimānā yathā siddhāḥ svargāt puṇyakṣaye tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:059.007c: putrāṇāṃ te mahat sainyaṃ samarautsīd dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.009c: vyadhamat pāṇḍavo bāṇais tamaḥ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.010a: tato mlecchāḥ sthitair mattais trayodaśaśatair gajaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.011c: kampanair bhiṇḍipālaiś ca rathasthaṃ pārtham ārdayan
GE07mbh_08_u:059.012a: tām astravṛṣṭiṃ prahitāṃ dvipasthair yavanaiḥ smayan
GE07mbh_08_u:059.012c: ciccheda niśitair bhallair ardhacandraiś ca phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.013a: atha tān dviradān sarvān nānāliṅgair mahāśaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.015a: tato gāṇḍīvanirghoṣo mahān āsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:059.016a: kuñjarāś ca hatā rājan prādravaṃs te samantataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.016c: aśvāś ca paryadhāvanta hatārohā diśo daśa
GE07mbh_08_u:059.017a: rathā hīnā mahārāja rathibhir vājibhis tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:059.019a: tasmin kṣaṇe pāṇḍavasya bāhvor balam adṛśyata
GE07mbh_08_u:059.019c: yat sādino vāraṇāṃś ca rathāṃś caiko 'jayad yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:059.019d-0906_01: asaṃyuktāś ca te rājan parivṛttā raṇaṃ prati
GE07mbh_08_u:059.019d-0906_02: narā nāgā rathāś caiva nadanto 'rjunam abhyayuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.021a: hatāvaśeṣān utsṛjya tvadīyān kati cid rathān
GE07mbh_08_u:059.022a: tatas tat prādravat sainyaṃ hatabhūyiṣṭham āturam
GE07mbh_08_u:059.022c: dṛṣṭvā yad arjunaṃ bhīmo jagāma bhrātaraṃ prati
GE07mbh_08_u:059.023d-0907_01: gadāpāṇiṃ tadā bhīmaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhārata bhāratāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.025a: tato gadāṃ nṛnāgāśveṣv āśu bhīmo vyavāsṛjat
GE07mbh_08_u:059.025c: sā jaghāna bahūn aśvān aśvārohāṃś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:059.026a: kāṃsyāyasatanutrāṃs tān narān aśvāṃś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.026c: pothayām āsa gadayā saśabdaṃ te 'patan hatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.026d-0909_01: kṣaṇena bhīmaḥ saṃkruddhas tān ninye vai yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_08_u:059.026f-0910_04: nyahanal līlayā rājañ śikṣayā ca balena ca
GE07mbh_08_u:059.026f-0911_04: asthīny apy aśnatī tasthau kālarātrīva durdṛśā
GE07mbh_08_u:059.026f-0911_05: sahasrāṇi daśāśvānāṃ hatvā pattīṃś ca bhūyasā
GE07mbh_08_u:059.026f-0911_07: gadāpāṇiṃ tato bhīmaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhārata tāvakāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.026f-0911_09: sa matta iva mātaṅgaḥ saṃkruddhaḥ pāṇḍunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.026f-0911_11: vigāhya ca gajānīkaṃ pragṛhya mahatīṃ gadām
GE07mbh_08_u:059.026f-0911_12: kṣaṇena bhīmaḥ saṃkruddhas tān ninye yamasādanam
GE07mbh_08_u:059.027a: hatvā tu tad gajānīkaṃ bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.029d-0912_02: śaravrātaiś citā rejuḥ kadambā iva kesaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.030d-0914_01: kurūṇāṃ tu mahārāja āsīd ārtasvaro mahān
GE07mbh_08_u:059.031d-0915_01: tatas tad yuddham abhavat kurūṇāṃ sumahad balam
GE07mbh_08_u:059.031d-0915_02: na hy atrāsīd anirbhinno rathaḥ sādī hayo gajaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.031d-0916_01: tataḥ śaradhvastam abhūt kurūṇāṃ sumahad balam
GE07mbh_08_u:059.031d-0916_02: na tatrāsīd anirbhinno ratho vājī naro gajaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.032a: ādīptaṃ tava tat sainyaṃ śaraiś chinnatanucchadam
GE07mbh_08_u:059.032d-0917_01: tat sainyaṃ bharataśreṣṭha vadhyamānaṃ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.032d-0917_02: na jahau samaraṃ prāpya phalgunaṃ śatrutāpanam
GE07mbh_08_u:059.032d-0917_04: vadhyamānāpi yat pārthaṃ na jahuḥ samare prabho
GE07mbh_08_u:059.033a: tad dṛṣṭvā kuravas tatra vikrāntaṃ savyasācinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.035a: te hitvā samare pārthaṃ vadhyamānāś ca sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.035c: pradudruvur diśo bhītāś cukruśuś cāpi sūtajam
GE07mbh_08_u:059.036a: abhyadravata tān pārthaḥ kirañ śaraśatān bahūn
GE07mbh_08_u:059.037a: putrās tu te mahārāja jagmuḥ karṇarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_08_u:059.037c: agādhe majjatāṃ teṣāṃ dvīpaḥ karṇo 'bhavat tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:059.038a: kuravo hi mahārāja nirviṣāḥ pannagā iva
GE07mbh_08_u:059.039a: yathā sarvāṇi bhūtāni mṛtyor bhītāni bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:059.039c: dharmam evopalīyante karmavanti hi yāni ca
GE07mbh_08_u:059.040a: tathā karṇaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ putrās tava narādhipa
GE07mbh_08_u:059.041c: mā bhaiṣṭety abravīt karṇo hy abhito mām iteti ca
GE07mbh_08_u:059.042a: saṃbhagnaṃ hi balaṃ dṛṣṭvā balāt pārthena tāvakam
GE07mbh_08_u:059.042d-0919_01: tān vidrutān kurūn dṛṣṭvā karṇaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.042d-0920_01: saṃcintayitvā pārthasya vadhe dadhre manaḥ śvasan
GE07mbh_08_u:059.042d-0920_02: visphārya sumahac cāpaṃ tataś cādhirathir vṛṣaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:059.043c: karṇaṃ vavarṣur bāṇaughair yathā meghā mahīdharam
GE07mbh_08_u:059.045a: tato raṇo mahān āsīt pāñcālānāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:060.001a: tataḥ karṇaḥ kuruṣu pradruteṣu; varūthinā śvetahayena
GE07mbh_08_u:060.001c: pāñcālaputrān vyadhamat sūtaputro; maheṣubhir vāta ivābhrasaṃghān
GE07mbh_08_u:060.002a: sūtaṃ rathād añjalikena pātya; jaghāna cāśvāñ janamejayasya
GE07mbh_08_u:060.002c: śatānīkaṃ sutasomaṃ ca bhallair; avākirad dhanuṣī cāpy akṛntat
GE07mbh_08_u:060.003a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ nirbibhedātha ṣaḍbhir; jaghāna cāśvaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ tasya saṃkhye
GE07mbh_08_u:060.003c: hatvā cāśvān sātyakeḥ sūtaputraḥ; kaikeyaputraṃ nyavadhīd
GE07mbh_08_u:060.004a: tam abhyadhāvan nihate kumāre; kaikeyasenāpatir ugradhanvā
GE07mbh_08_u:060.004c: śarair vibhinnaṃ bhṛśam ugravegaiḥ; karṇātmajaṃ so 'bhyahanat suṣeṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:060.005a: tasyārdhacandrais tribhir uccakarta; prasahya bāhū ca śiraś ca karṇaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:060.005c: sa syandanād gām apatad gatāsuḥ; paraśvadhaiḥ śāla ivāvarugṇaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:060.006a: hatāśvam añjogatibhiḥ suṣeṇaḥ; śinipravīraṃ niśitaiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:060.006c: pracchādya nṛtyann iva sautiputraḥ; śaineyabāṇābhihataḥ papāta
GE07mbh_08_u:060.007a: putre hate krodhaparītacetāḥ; karṇaḥ śinīnām ṛṣabhaṃ jighāṃsuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:060.007c: hato 'si śaineya iti bruvan sa; vyavāsṛjad bāṇam amitrasāham
GE07mbh_08_u:060.008a: sa tasya ciccheda śaraṃ śikhaṇḍī; tribhis tribhiś ca pratutoda karṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:060.008c: śikhaṇḍinaḥ kārmukaṃ sa dhvajaṃ ca; cchittvā śarābhyām ahanat sujātam
GE07mbh_08_u:060.009a: śikhaṇḍinaṃ ṣaḍbhir avidhyad ugro; dānto dhārṣṭadyumnaśiraś cakarta
GE07mbh_08_u:060.009c: athābhinat sutasomaṃ śareṇa; sa saṃśitenādhirathir mahātmā
GE07mbh_08_u:060.010a: athākrande tumule vartamāne; dhārṣṭadyumne nihate tatra kṛṣṇaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:060.010c: apāñcālyaṃ kriyate yāhi pārtha; karṇaṃ jahīty abravīd rājasiṃha
GE07mbh_08_u:060.011a: tataḥ prahasyāśu narapravīro; rathaṃ rathenādhirather jagāma
GE07mbh_08_u:060.011c: bhaye teṣāṃ trāṇam icchan subāhur; abhyāhatānāṃ rathayūthapena
GE07mbh_08_u:060.012a: visphārya gāṇḍīvam athograghoṣaṃ; jyayā samāhatya tale bhṛśaṃ ca
GE07mbh_08_u:060.012c: bāṇāndhakāraṃ sahasaiva kṛtvā; jaghāna nāgāśvarathān narāṃś ca
GE07mbh_08_u:060.013a: taṃ bhīmaseno 'nu yayau rathena; pṛṣṭhe rakṣan pāṇḍavam ekavīram
GE07mbh_08_u:060.013c: tau rājaputrau tvaritau rathābhyāṃ; karṇāya yātāv aribhir vimuktau
GE07mbh_08_u:060.014a: atrāntare sumahat sūtaputraś; cakre yuddhaṃ somakān saṃpramṛdnan
GE07mbh_08_u:060.014c: rathāśvamātaṅgagaṇāñ jaghāna; pracchādayām āsa diśaḥ śaraiś ca
GE07mbh_08_u:060.015a: tam uttamaujā janamejayaś ca; kruddhau yudhāmanyuśikhaṇḍinau ca
GE07mbh_08_u:060.015c: karṇaṃ vineduḥ sahitāḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ; saṃmardamānāḥ saha pārṣatena
GE07mbh_08_u:060.016a: te pañca pāñcālarathāḥ surūpair; vaikartanaṃ karṇam abhidravantaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:060.016c: tasmād rathāc cyāvayituṃ na śekur; dhairyāt kṛtātmānam ivendriyāṇi
GE07mbh_08_u:060.017a: teṣāṃ dhanūṃṣi dhvajavājisūtāṃs; tūṇaṃ patākāś ca nikṛtya bāṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:060.017c: tān pañcabhiḥ sa tv ahanat pṛṣatkaiḥ; karṇas tataḥ siṃha ivonnanāda
GE07mbh_08_u:060.018a: tasyāsyatas tān abhinighnataś ca; jyābāṇahastasya dhanuḥsvanena
GE07mbh_08_u:060.018c: sādridrumā syāt pṛthivī viśīrṇā; ity eva matvā janatā vyaṣīdat
GE07mbh_08_u:060.019a: sa śakracāpapratimena dhanvanā; bhṛśātatenādhirathiḥ śarān sṛjan
GE07mbh_08_u:060.019c: babhau raṇe dīptamarīcimaṇḍalo; yathāṃśumālī pariveṣavāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:060.020a: śikhaṇḍinaṃ dvādaśabhiḥ parābhinac; chitaiḥ śaraiḥ ṣaḍbhir athottamaujasam
GE07mbh_08_u:060.020c: tribhir yudhāmanyum avidhyad āśugais; tribhis tribhiḥ somakapārṣatātmajau
GE07mbh_08_u:060.021a: parājitāḥ pañca mahārathās tu te; mahāhave sūtasutena māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:060.022a: nimajjatas tān atha karṇasāgare; vipannanāvo vaṇijo yathārṇave
GE07mbh_08_u:060.022c: uddadhrire naubhir ivārṇavād rathaiḥ; sukalpitair draupadijāḥ svamātulān
GE07mbh_08_u:060.023a: tataḥ śinīnām ṛṣabhaḥ śitaiḥ śarair; nikṛtya karṇaprahitān iṣūn bahūn
GE07mbh_08_u:060.023c: vidārya karṇaṃ niśitair ayasmayais; tavātmajaṃ jyeṣṭham avidhyad aṣṭabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:060.024a: kṛpo 'tha bhojaś ca tavātmajas tathā; svayaṃ ca karṇo niśitair atāḍayat
GE07mbh_08_u:060.024c: sa taiś caturbhir yuyudhe yadūttamo; digīśvarair daityapatir yathā tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:060.025c: babhūva durdharṣataraḥ sa sātyakiḥ; śaran nabhomadhyagato yathā raviḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:060.026a: punaḥ samāsādya rathān sudaṃśitāḥ; śinipravīraṃ jugupuḥ paraṃtapāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:060.026c: sametya pāñcālarathā mahāraṇe; marudgaṇāḥ śakram ivārinigrahe
GE07mbh_08_u:060.027a: tato 'bhavad yuddham atīva dāruṇaṃ; tavāhitānāṃ tava sainikaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_08_u:060.027c: rathāśvamātaṅgavināśanaṃ tathā; yathā surāṇām asuraiḥ purābhavat
GE07mbh_08_u:060.028c: paraspareṇābhihatāś ca caskhalur; vinedur ārtā vyasavo 'patanta ca
GE07mbh_08_u:060.029a: tathā gate bhīmam abhīs tavātmajaḥ; sasāra rājāvarajaḥ kirañ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:060.029c: tam abhyadhāvat tvarito vṛkodaro; mahāruruṃ siṃha ivābhipetivān
GE07mbh_08_u:060.030a: tatas tayor yuddham atītamānuṣaṃ; pradīvyatoḥ prāṇadurodare 'bhavat
GE07mbh_08_u:060.031a: śaraiḥ śarīrāntakaraiḥ sutejanair; nijaghnatus tāv itaretaraṃ bhṛśam
GE07mbh_08_u:060.031d-028_0002: samaṃ ca śūrau ca sasārathī tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:060.031d-028_0011: ciroditaṃ taṃ yan mayā te sabhāyāṃ
GE07mbh_08_u:060.031d-028_0013: sa evam uktas tu tato mahātmā
GE07mbh_08_u:060.032a: tavātmajasyātha vṛkodaras tvaran; dhanuḥ kṣurābhyāṃ dhvajam eva cācchinat
GE07mbh_08_u:060.032c: lalāṭam apy asya bibheda patriṇā; śiraś ca kāyāt prajahāra sāratheḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:060.033a: sa rājaputro 'nyad avāpya kārmukaṃ; vṛkodaraṃ dvādaśabhiḥ parābhinat
GE07mbh_08_u:060.033c: svayaṃ niyacchaṃs turagān ajihmagaiḥ; śaraiś ca bhīmaṃ punar abhyavīvṛṣat
GE07mbh_08_u:060.033d-0927_04: punaś ca saṃjñām upalabhya cānadat saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:061.001a: tatrākarod duṣkaraṃ rājaputro; duḥśāsanas tumule yudhyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:061.001c: ciccheda bhīmasya dhanuḥ kṣureṇa; ṣaḍbhiḥ śaraiḥ sārathim apy avidhyat
GE07mbh_08_u:061.002a: tato 'bhinad bahubhiḥ kṣipram eva; vareṣubhir bhīmasenaṃ mahātmā
GE07mbh_08_u:061.002b-029_0007: dṛṣṭvā tu tat karma kṛtaṃ suduṣkaraṃ
GE07mbh_08_u:061.002b-030_0015: sa tena viddho hy urasi hy aprameyo
GE07mbh_08_u:061.002c: sa vikṣaran nāga iva prabhinno; gadām asmai tumule prāhiṇod vai
GE07mbh_08_u:061.003a: tayāharad daśa dhanvantarāṇi; duḥśāsanaṃ bhīmasenaḥ prasahya
GE07mbh_08_u:061.003c: tayā hataḥ patito vepamāno; duḥśāsano gadayā vegavatyā
GE07mbh_08_u:061.004a: hayāḥ sasūtāś ca hatā narendra; cūrṇīkṛtaś cāsya rathaḥ patantyā
GE07mbh_08_u:061.004d-0932_05: sa samīpasthito bhīmo visajñaṃ vīkṣya te sutam
GE07mbh_08_u:061.004d-0932_06: cakāra khedaṃ manasā cintāṃ ca paramāṃ yayau
GE07mbh_08_u:061.004d-0932_07: acetanasya rudhiraṃ kathaṃ pāsyāmy ahaṃ ripoḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:061.004d-0932_10: vastreṇāvījayac cainaṃ tena saṃjñām avāpa ha
GE07mbh_08_u:061.004d-0932_12: prahṛṣṭarūpo bhīmas tu sāsīḥ provāca taṃ tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:061.005a: tataḥ smṛtvā bhīmasenas tarasvī; sāpatnakaṃ yat prayuktaṃ sutais te
GE07mbh_08_u:061.005c: rathād avaplutya gataḥ sa bhūmau; yatnena tasmin praṇidhāya cakṣuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:061.005d-0934_03: vadāśu yad gaur iti tad bruvāṇo
GE07mbh_08_u:061.005d-0934_14: kliṣṭām āryāṃ paśyatas te tv anena
GE07mbh_08_u:061.005d-0934_18: aṣṭādaśa dvā ca kuruṣva yatnam bhīmaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:061.005d-0935_01: draupadyās tu kacagrāhe yaḥ prayuktas tvayā karaḥ duḥśāsanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:061.005d-0935_02: diśyatāṃ ca sa me pāpin kaṃ tam utpāṭayāmy aham
GE07mbh_08_u:061.006a: asiṃ samuddhṛtya śitaṃ sudhāraṃ; kaṇṭhe samākramya ca vepamānam
GE07mbh_08_u:061.006b-032_0009: anena yājñasenyā me bhīma keśā vikarṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:061.006c: utkṛtya vakṣaḥ patitasya bhūmāv; athāpibac choṇitam asya koṣṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:061.006e: āsvādya cāsvādya ca vīkṣamāṇaḥ; kruddho 'tivelaṃ prajagāda vākyam
GE07mbh_08_u:061.007a: stanyasya mātur madhusarpiṣo vā; mādhvīkapānasya ca satkṛtasya
GE07mbh_08_u:061.007c: divyasya vā toyarasasya pānāt; payodadhibhyāṃ mathitāc ca mukhyāt
GE07mbh_08_u:061.008a: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ punar ādravantam; āsvādya valgantam atiprahṛṣṭam
GE07mbh_08_u:061.008c: ye bhīmasenaṃ dadṛśus tadānīṃ; bhayena te 'pi vyathitā nipetuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:061.009a: ye cāpi tatrāpatitā manuṣyās; teṣāṃ karebhyaḥ patitaṃ ca śastram
GE07mbh_08_u:061.009c: bhayāc ca saṃcukruśur uccakais te; nimīlitākṣā dadṛśuś ca tan na
GE07mbh_08_u:061.010a: ye tatra bhīmaṃ dadṛśuḥ samantād; dauḥśāsanaṃ tadrudhiraṃ pibantam
GE07mbh_08_u:061.010c: sarve palāyanta bhayābhipannā; nāyaṃ manuṣya iti bhāṣamāṇāḥ saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:061.010d-0940_01: sa pītvā rudhiraṃ tasya caraṇau gṛhya bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:061.011b-0941_01: ity uccair vacanaṃ prāha pratinṛtya vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:061.011c: eṣa te rudhiraṃ kaṇṭhāt pibāmi puruṣādhama
GE07mbh_08_u:061.011e: brūhīdānīṃ susaṃrabdhaḥ punar gaur iti gaur iti
GE07mbh_08_u:061.011f-0942_01: ye tadāsmān pranṛtyanti punar gaur iti gaur iti
GE07mbh_08_u:061.011f-0942_02: tān vayaṃ pratinṛtyāmaḥ punar gaur iti gaur iti
GE07mbh_08_u:061.012c: daśanaṃ cāhibhiḥ kaṣṭaṃ dāhaṃ ca jatuveśmani
GE07mbh_08_u:061.013a: dyūtena rājyaharaṇam araṇye vasatiś ca yā
GE07mbh_08_u:061.013c: iṣvastrāṇi ca saṃgrāmeṣv asukhāni ca veśmani
GE07mbh_08_u:061.013d-0945_02: anubhūtāni duḥkhāni teṣāṃ hetus tvam eva hi
GE07mbh_08_u:061.014a: duḥkhāny etāni jānīmo na sukhāni kadā cana
GE07mbh_08_u:061.014d-0946_01: sukhāny etāni jānīmo labdhavanto na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:061.015a: ity uktvā vacanaṃ rājañ jayaṃ prāpya vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:061.015c: punar āha mahārāja smayaṃs tau keśavārjunau
GE07mbh_08_u:061.015d-0948_09: sa hatvā samare rājan rājaputraṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_08_u:061.015d-0948_12: sapuṣpaḥ kiṃśuka iva raktād raktataro babhau
GE07mbh_08_u:061.015d-0949_01: brūhīdānīṃ pāpamate nṛśaṃsa patito hy asi
GE07mbh_08_u:061.016a: duḥśāsane yad raṇe saṃśrutaṃ me; tad vai sarvaṃ kṛtam adyeha vīrau
GE07mbh_08_u:061.016c: adyaiva dāsyāmy aparaṃ dvitīyaṃ; duryodhanaṃ yajñapaśuṃ viśasya
GE07mbh_08_u:061.016e: śiro mṛditvā ca padā durātmanaḥ; śāntiṃ lapsye kauravāṇāṃ samakṣam
GE07mbh_08_u:061.016f-0951_01: yā cāpatiḥ sā sapatir hi jātā
GE07mbh_08_u:061.016f-0951_05: te cet siddhā nidhanaṃ gatāḥ pare
GE07mbh_08_u:061.017a: etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ prahṛṣṭo; nanāda coccai rudhirārdragātraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:061.017c: nanarta caivātibalo mahātmā; vṛtraṃ nihatyeva sahasranetraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.001a: duḥśāsane tu nihate putrās tava mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.001e: daśa rājan mahāvīryo bhīmaṃ prācchādayañ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.004a: sa vāryamāṇo viśikhaiḥ samantāt tair mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.005a: tāṃs tu bhallair mahāvegair daśabhir daśabhiḥ śitaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.006a: hateṣu teṣu vīreṣu pradudrāva balaṃ tava
GE07mbh_08_u:062.007c: dṛṣṭvā bhīmasya vikrāntam antakasya prajāsv iva
GE07mbh_08_u:062.008e: mā vyathāṃ kuru rādheya naitat tvayy upapadyate
GE07mbh_08_u:062.013a: sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla pauruṣe mahati sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.014a: bhāro hi dhārtarāṣṭreṇa tvayi sarvaḥ samarpitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.014e: jaye syād vipulā kīrtir dhruvaḥ svargaḥ parājaye
GE07mbh_08_u:062.015a: vṛṣasenaś ca rādheya saṃkruddhas tanayas tava
GE07mbh_08_u:062.016c: hṛdi mānuṣyakaṃ bhāvaṃ cakre yuddhāya susthiram
GE07mbh_08_u:062.017a: tataḥ kruddho vṛṣaseno 'bhyadhāvad; ātasthivāṃsaṃ svarathaṃ hatārim
GE07mbh_08_u:062.017c: vṛkodaraṃ kālam ivāttadaṇḍaṃ; gadāhastaṃ pothamānaṃ tvadīyān
GE07mbh_08_u:062.018a: tam abhyadhāvan nakulaḥ pravīro; roṣād amitraṃ pratudan pṛṣatkaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.018c: karṇasya putraṃ samare prahṛṣṭaṃ; jiṣṇur jighāṃsur maghaveva jambham
GE07mbh_08_u:062.019a: tato dhvajaṃ sphāṭikacitrakambuṃ; ciccheda vīro nakulaḥ kṣureṇa
GE07mbh_08_u:062.020a: athānyad ādāya dhanuḥ suśīghraṃ; karṇātmajaḥ pāṇḍavam abhyavidhyat
GE07mbh_08_u:062.020c: divyair mahāstrair nakulaṃ mahāstro; duḥśāsanasyāpacitiṃ yiyāsuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.021a: tataḥ kruddho nakulas taṃ mahātmā; śarair maholkāpratimair avidhyat
GE07mbh_08_u:062.021c: divyair astrair abhyavidhyac ca so 'pi; karṇasya putro nakulaṃ kṛtāstraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.022a: karṇasya putro nakulasya rājan; sarvān aśvān akṣiṇod uttamāstraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.022c: vanāyujān sukumārasya śubhrān; alaṃkṛtāñ jātarūpeṇa śīghrān
GE07mbh_08_u:062.023a: tato hatāśvād avaruhya yānād; ādāya carma ruciraṃ cāṣṭacandram
GE07mbh_08_u:062.023c: ākāśasaṃkāśam asiṃ gṛhītvā; poplūyamānaḥ khagavac cacāra
GE07mbh_08_u:062.024a: tato 'ntarikṣe nṛvarāśvanāgāṃś; ciccheda mārgān vicaran vicitrān
GE07mbh_08_u:062.024c: te prāpatann asinā gāṃ viśastā; yathāśvamedhe paśavaḥ śamitrā
GE07mbh_08_u:062.025a: dvisāhasrā viditā yuddhaśauṇḍā; nānādeśyāḥ subhṛtāḥ satyasaṃdhāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.025c: ekena śīghraṃ nakulena kṛttāḥ; sārepsunevottamacandanās te
GE07mbh_08_u:062.026a: tam āpatantaṃ nakulaṃ so 'bhipatya; samantataḥ sāyakair abhyavidhyat
GE07mbh_08_u:062.026c: sa tudyamāno nakulaḥ pṛṣatkair; vivyādha vīraṃ sa cukopa viddhaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.027c: krīḍantam aṣṭādaśabhiḥ pṛṣatkair; vivyādha vīraṃ sa cukopa viddhaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.028a: tato 'bhyadhāvat samare jighāṃsuḥ; karṇātmajaṃ pāṇḍusuto nṛvīraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.028b-0963_05: sa tān moghāṃs tasya kurvañ śaraughāṃś
GE07mbh_08_u:062.028c: tasyeṣubhir vyadhamat karṇaputro; mahāraṇe carma sahasratāram
GE07mbh_08_u:062.029a: tasyāyasaṃ niśitaṃ tīkṣṇadhāram; asiṃ vikośaṃ gurubhārasāham
GE07mbh_08_u:062.030a: kṣipraṃ śaraiḥ ṣaḍbhir amitrasāhaś; cakarta khaḍgaṃ niśitaiḥ sudhāraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.030c: punaś ca pītair niśitaiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ; stanāntare gāḍham athābhyavidhyat
GE07mbh_08_u:062.031a: sa bhīmasenasya rathaṃ hatāśvo; mādrīsutaḥ karṇasutābhitaptaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.032a: nakulam atha viditvā chinnabāṇāsanāsiṃ; viratham ariśarārtaṃ karṇaputrāstrabhagnam
GE07mbh_08_u:062.032c: pavanadhutapatākā hrādino valgitāśvā; varapuruṣaniyattās te rathāḥ śīghram
GE07mbh_08_u:062.033a: drupadasutavariṣṭhāḥ pañca śaineyaṣaṣṭhā; drupadaduhitṛputrāḥ pañca cāmitrasāhāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.033c: dviradarathanarāśvān sūdayantas tvadīyān; bhujagapatinikāśair mārgaṇair āttaśastrāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.034a: atha tava rathamukhyās tān pratīyus tvaranto; hṛdikasutakṛpau ca drauṇiduryodhanau
GE07mbh_08_u:062.034c: śakuniśukavṛkāś ca krāthadevāvṛdhau ca; dviradajaladaghoṣaiḥ syandanaiḥ kārmukaiś
GE07mbh_08_u:062.035a: tava naravaravaryās tān daśaikaṃ ca vīrān; pravaraśaravarāgryais tāḍayanto 'bhyarundhan
GE07mbh_08_u:062.035c: navajaladasavarṇair hastibhis tān udīyur; giriśikharanikāśair bhīmavegaiḥ kuṇindāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.036a: sukalpitā haimavatā madotkaṭā; raṇābhikāmaiḥ kṛtibhiḥ samāsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.036c: suvarṇajālāvatatā babhur gajās; tathā yathā vai jaladāḥ savidyutaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.037a: kuṇindaputro daśabhir mahāyasaiḥ; kṛpaṃ sasūtāśvam apīḍayad bhṛśam
GE07mbh_08_u:062.037c: tataḥ śaradvatsutasāyakair hataḥ; sahaiva nāgena papāta bhūtale
GE07mbh_08_u:062.038c: rathaṃ ca vikṣobhya nanāda nardatas; tato 'sya gāndhārapatiḥ śiro 'harat
GE07mbh_08_u:062.039a: tataḥ kuṇindeṣu hateṣu teṣv atha; prahṛṣṭarūpās tava te mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.039c: bhṛśaṃ pradadhmur lavaṇāmbusaṃbhavān; parāṃś ca bāṇāsanapāṇayo 'bhyayuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.040a: athābhavad yuddham atīva dāruṇaṃ; punaḥ kurūṇāṃ saha pāṇḍusṛñjayaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.041c: yathā savidyutstanitā balāhakāḥ; samāsthitā digbhya ivogramārutaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.042a: tataḥ śatānīkahatān mahāgajāṃs; tathā rathān pattigaṇāṃś ca tāvakān
GE07mbh_08_u:062.042c: jaghāna bhojaś ca hayān athāpatan; viśastrakṛttāḥ kṛtavarmaṇā dvipāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.043c: nipetur urvyāṃ vyasavaḥ prapātitās; tathā yathā vajrahatā mahācalāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.044c: tavātmajaṃ tasya tavātmajaḥ śaraiḥ; śitaiḥ śarīraṃ bibhide dvipaṃ ca tam
GE07mbh_08_u:062.045a: sa nāgarājaḥ saha rājasūnunā; papāta raktaṃ bahu sarvataḥ kṣaran
GE07mbh_08_u:062.046c: tato 'patat krāthaśarābhidāritaḥ; saheśvaro vajrahato yathā giriḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.047a: rathī dvipasthena hato 'patac charaiḥ; krāthādhipaḥ parvatajena durjayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.048a: vṛko dvipasthaṃ girirājavāsinaṃ; bhṛśaṃ śarair dvādaśabhiḥ parābhinat
GE07mbh_08_u:062.048c: tato vṛkaṃ sāśvarathaṃ mahājavaṃ; tvaraṃś caturbhiś caraṇe vyapothayat
GE07mbh_08_u:062.049a: sa nāgarājaḥ saniyantṛko 'patat; parāhato babhrusuteṣubhir bhṛśam
GE07mbh_08_u:062.049c: sa cāpi devāvṛdhasūnur arditaḥ; papāta nunnaḥ sahadevasūnunā
GE07mbh_08_u:062.050c: jagāma vegena bhṛśārdayaṃś ca taṃ; tato 'sya gāndhārapatiḥ śiro 'harat
GE07mbh_08_u:062.051a: tataḥ śatānīkahatā mahāgajā; hayā rathāḥ pattigaṇāś ca tāvakāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.051c: suparṇavātaprahatā yathā nagās; tathā gatā gām avaśā vicūrṇitāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.052a: tato 'bhyavidhyad bahubhiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ; kuṇindaputro nakulātmajaṃ smayan
GE07mbh_08_u:062.052c: tato 'sya kāyān nicakarta nākuliḥ; śiraḥ kṣureṇāmbujasaṃnibhānanam
GE07mbh_08_u:062.053a: tataḥ śatānīkam avidhyad āśugais; tribhiḥ śitaiḥ karṇasuto 'rjunaṃ tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.053c: tribhiś ca bhīmaṃ nakulaṃ ca saptabhir; janārdanaṃ dvādaśabhiś ca sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.054a: tad asya karmātimanuṣyakarmaṇaḥ; samīkṣya hṛṣṭāḥ kuravo 'bhyapūjayan
GE07mbh_08_u:062.054c: parākramajñās tu dhanaṃjayasya te; huto 'yam agnāv iti taṃ tu menire
GE07mbh_08_u:062.055a: tataḥ kirīṭī paravīraghātī; hatāśvam ālokya narapravīram
GE07mbh_08_u:062.055c: tam abhyadhāvad vṛṣasenam āhave; sa sūtajasya pramukhe sthitaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:062.056a: tam āpatantaṃ naravīram ugraṃ; mahāhave bāṇasahasradhāriṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:062.056c: abhyāpatat karṇasuto mahāratho; yathaiva cendraṃ namuciḥ purātane
GE07mbh_08_u:062.057a: tato 'dbhutenaikaśatena pārthaṃ; śarair viddhvā sūtaputrasya putraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.057c: nanāda nādaṃ sumahānubhāvo; viddhveva śakraṃ namuciḥ purā vai
GE07mbh_08_u:062.058a: punaḥ sa pārthaṃ vṛṣasena ugrair; bāṇair avidhyad bhujamūlamadhye
GE07mbh_08_u:062.058c: tathaiva kṛṣṇaṃ navabhiḥ samārdayat; punaś ca pārthaṃ daśabhiḥ śitāgraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.059a: tataḥ kirīṭī raṇamūrdhni kopāt; kṛtvā triśākhāṃ bhrukuṭiṃ lalāṭe
GE07mbh_08_u:062.059b-035_0017: tam adya mūlaṃ kalahasya saṃkhye duryodhanāpāśrayajātadarpam
GE07mbh_08_u:062.059c: mumoca bāṇān viśikhān mahātmā; vadhāya rājan sūtaputrasya saṃkhye
GE07mbh_08_u:062.060a: vivyādha cainaṃ daśabhiḥ pṛṣatkair; marmasv asaktaṃ prasabhaṃ kirīṭī
GE07mbh_08_u:062.060c: ciccheda cāsyeṣvasanaṃ bhujau ca; kṣuraiś caturbhiḥ śira eva cograiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.061a: sa pārthabāṇābhihataḥ papāta; rathād vibāhur viśirā dharāyām
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062a: taṃ prekṣya bāṇābhihataṃ patantaṃ; rathāt sutaṃ sūtajaḥ kṣiprakārī
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062c: rathaṃ rathenāśu jagāma vegāt; kirīṭinaḥ putravadhābhitaptaḥ 08,062.062d@036_0000
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062d-036_0004: ayaṃ sa ratha āyāti śvetāśvaḥ śalyasārathiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062d-036_0005: yena te saha yoddhavyaṃ sthiro bhava dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062d-036_0006: paśya cainaṃ samāyuktaṃ rathaṃ karṇasya pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062d-036_0010: dhvajaṃ ca paśya karṇasya nāgakakṣaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062d-036_0017: siṃhanādāṃś ca vividhāñ śṛṇu pāṇḍava sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062d-036_0021: dṛṣṭvā kesariṇaṃ kruddhaṃ mṛgā iva mahāvane
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062d-036_0023: na hi karṇaśarān anyaḥ soḍhum utsahate 'nagha
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062d-036_0025: tvaṃ hi jetuṃ raṇe śaktas tathaiva viditaṃ mama
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062d-036_0026: bhīmam ugraṃ mahādevaṃ tryakṣaṃ śarvaṃ kapardinam
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062d-036_0027: na śaktā draṣṭum īśānaṃ kiṃ punar yodhituṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062d-036_0029: yuddhenārādhitaḥ sthāṇur devāś ca varadās tava
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062d-036_0031: jahi karṇaṃ mahābāho namuciṃ vṛtrahā yathā arjuna uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062d-036_0032: śreyas te 'stu sadā pārtha yuddhe jayam avāpnuhi
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062d-036_0033: dhruva eva jayaḥ kṛṣṇa mama nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062d-036_0037: adya karṇaṃ hataṃ paśya maccharaiḥ śakalīkṛtam
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062d-036_0038: māṃ vā drakṣyasi govinda karṇena nihataṃ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062d-036_0040: yaj janāḥ kathayiṣyanti yāvad bhūmir dhariṣyati
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062d-036_0041: evaṃ bruvaṃs tadā pārthaḥ kṛṣṇam akliṣṭakāriṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062d-036_0043: punaś cāha mahātejāḥ pārthaḥ kṛṣṇam ariṃdamam
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062d-036_0045: evam uktas tadā tena pāṇḍavena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_08_u:062.062d-0975_01: śiraḥ karau caiva dhanuś ca pārtha
GE07mbh_08_u:063.001c: muktvā śokodbhavaṃ vāri netrābhyāṃ sahasā vṛṣaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.003c: sametau dadṛśus tatra dvāv ivārkau samāgatau
GE07mbh_08_u:063.005a: tau dṛṣṭvā vismayaṃ jagmuḥ sarvabhūtāni māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:063.007a: dhvajau ca dṛṣṭvā saṃsaktau vismayaḥ samapadyata
GE07mbh_08_u:063.007c: hastikakṣyāṃ ca karṇasya vānaraṃ ca kirīṭinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.008a: tau rathau saṃprasaktau ca dṛṣṭvā bhārata pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.009a: śrutvā tu dvairathaṃ tābhyāṃ tatra yodhāḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.009c: cakrur bāhuvalaṃ caiva tathā celavalaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_08_u:063.010c: karṇaṃ praharṣayantaś ca śaṅkhān dadhmuś ca puṣkalān
GE07mbh_08_u:063.013a: tau dṛṣṭvā puruṣavyāghrau rathasthau rathināṃ varau
GE07mbh_08_u:063.015b-0979_04: prabhinnāv iva mātaṅgau saṃrabdhāv iva cācalau
GE07mbh_08_u:063.017b-0981_01: tau dṛṣṭvā puruṣavyāghrau śārdūlāv iva vegitau
GE07mbh_08_u:063.017b-0981_02: babhūva paramo harṣas tāvakānāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:063.021c: sārathī pravarau caiva tayor āstāṃ mahābalau
GE07mbh_08_u:063.022a: tau tu dṛṣṭvā mahārāja rājamānau mahārathau
GE07mbh_08_u:063.024b-0983_01: yamau ca cekitānaś ca prahṛṣṭāś ca prabhadrakāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.024b-0983_02: nānādeśyāś ca ye śūrāḥ śiṣṭā yuddhābhinandinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.024b-0983_03: te sarve sahitā hṛṣṭāḥ parivavrur dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_08_u:063.025a: tāvakānāṃ raṇe karṇo glaha āsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:063.026a: ta eva sabhyās tatrāsan prekṣakāś cābhavan sma te
GE07mbh_08_u:063.028a: tau tu sthitau mahārāja samare yuddhaśālinau
GE07mbh_08_u:063.030c: mitho bhedāś ca bhūtānām āsan karṇārjunāntare
GE07mbh_08_u:063.030e: vyāśrayanta diśo bhinnāḥ sarvalokāś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:063.032a: dyaur āsīt karṇato vyagrā sanakṣatrā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:063.032c: bhūmir viśālā pārthasya mātā putrasya bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:063.033a: saritaḥ sāgarāś caiva girayaś ca narottama
GE07mbh_08_u:063.034a: asurā yātudhānāś ca guhyakāś ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_08_u:063.036c: parvatāś ca tathā sarve kādraveyāś ca sānvayāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.038b-0985_01: maṅgaḷyāḥ paśavaś caiva siṃhavyāghrās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:063.039a: vasavo marutaḥ sādhyā rudrā viśve 'śvinau tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:063.039b-0986_01: arjunasya jaye cāstām aśvināv api sapriyau
GE07mbh_08_u:063.039c: agnir indraś ca somaś ca pavanaś ca diśo daśa
GE07mbh_08_u:063.039d-0987_02: mṛgāś ca paśavaś caiva siṃhavyāghrās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:063.039d-0987_03: vasavaś ca mahendreṇa marutaś ca sahāgninā
GE07mbh_08_u:063.039d-0988_01: agni(gnī ?) rudraś ca somaś ca yamo vaiśravaṇas tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:063.039f-0989_01: viśaḥ śūdrāś ca sūtāś ca varṇasaṃkarajāś ca ye
GE07mbh_08_u:063.039f-0989_02: sarvasattveṣu te rājan rādheyam abhajaṃs tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:063.040c: yamo vaiśravaṇaś caiva varuṇaś ca yato 'rjunaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.040d-0990_01: brahma kṣatraṃ ca yajñāś ca dakṣiṇāś cārjunaṃ śritāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.040d-0990_02: asurā yātudhānāś ca kravyādāś ca mṛgāṇḍajāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.040d-0990_03: rākṣasāḥ saha yādobhiḥ śvasṛgālāś ca karṇataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.041b-0991_01: devarṣibrahmarṣigaṇāḥ sarve ca khacarāś ca ye
GE07mbh_08_u:063.042b-037_0003: amanojñāś ca ye gandhās te sarve karṇam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.042b-037_0007: te bhāvāḥ sahitāḥ karṇaṃ praviṣṭāḥ sūtanandanam
GE07mbh_08_u:063.042b-037_0008: ojas tejaś ca siddhiś ca praharṣaḥ satyavikramau
GE07mbh_08_u:063.042b-037_0011: nimittāni ca śubhrāṇi viviśur jiṣṇum āhave
GE07mbh_08_u:063.042b-037_0013: tato devagaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.043a: uhyamānās tathā meghair vāyunā ca manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.046a: brahmā brahmarṣibhiḥ sārdhaṃ prajāpatibhir eva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:063.046c: bhavenāvasthito yānaṃ divyaṃ taṃ deśam abhyayāt
GE07mbh_08_u:063.046d-0992_02: arjuno jayatāṃ karṇam iti śakro 'bravīt svayam
GE07mbh_08_u:063.046d-0992_04: hatvārjunaṃ mama sutaḥ karṇo jayatu saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:063.046d-0992_05: hatvā karṇaṃ jayatv adya mama putro dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.046d-0992_06: iti sūryasya caivāsīd vivādo vāsavasya ca
GE07mbh_08_u:063.046d-0992_08: dvaipakṣam āsīd devānām asurāṇāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_08_u:063.046d-0992_11: sarve devagaṇāś caiva sarvabhūtāni yāni ca
GE07mbh_08_u:063.046d-0992_12: yataḥ pārthas tato devā yataḥ karṇas tato 'surāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.046d-0993_02: dvairathaṃ yudhi taṃ draṣṭuṃ karṇapāṇḍavayos tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:063.046d-0993_07: prajāpatis tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā devabhāgaṃ samāgatam
GE07mbh_08_u:063.046d-0993_08: abravīt tu tato rājan paśyato vai svayaṃbhuvaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.048d-0995_01: svayaṃbho brūhi nas tathyam etayor vijayaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_08_u:063.049a: svayaṃbho brūhi tad vākyaṃ samo 'stu vijayo 'nayoḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.049b-0996_02: pūrvaṃ bhagavatā proktaṃ kṛṣṇayor vijayo dhruvaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.049b-0997_01: evam uktas tu bhagavāñ jaye tābhyām aniścite
GE07mbh_08_u:063.049b-0997_02: ity abravīn mahārāja mahān brahmā prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.049b-0997_03: dvāv apy etau hi kṛtinau dvāv apy atibalotkaṭau
GE07mbh_08_u:063.049c: tat tathāstu namas te 'stu prasīda bhagavan mama
GE07mbh_08_u:063.050d-0998_02: svargaṃ ca samanuprāpya sāhāyyaṃ śakra te kṛtam
GE07mbh_08_u:063.050d-0998_03: karṇaś ca dānavaḥ pakṣa ataḥ kāryaḥ parājayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.050d-0998_04: evaṃ kṛte bhavet kāryaṃ devānām eva niścitam
GE07mbh_08_u:063.050d-0998_07: vijayas tasya niyataṃ jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.050d-0998_09: kathaṃ vā tasya na jayo jāyate śatalocana
GE07mbh_08_u:063.050d-0999_01: yasya cakre svayaṃ viṣṇuḥ sārathyaṃ jagataḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.051a: manasvī balavāñ śūraḥ kṛtāstraś ca tapodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.052a: atikramec ca māhātmyād diṣṭam etasya paryayāt
GE07mbh_08_u:063.052c: atikrānte ca lokānām abhāvo niyato bhavet
GE07mbh_08_u:063.053a: na vidyate vyavasthānaṃ kṛṣṇayoḥ kruddhayoḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_08_u:063.053c: sraṣṭārau hy asataś cobhau sataś ca puruṣarṣabhau
GE07mbh_08_u:063.054d-1001_01: naitayos tu samaḥ kaś cid divi vā mānuṣeṣu vā
GE07mbh_08_u:063.054d-1001_04: anayos tu prabhāvena vartate nikhilaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_08_u:063.055a: karṇo lokān ayaṃ mukhyān prāpnotu puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.055c: vīro vaikartanaḥ śūro vijayas tv astu kṛṣṇayoḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.056a: vasūnāṃ ca salokatvaṃ marutāṃ vā samāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_08_u:063.056d-1002_01: kleśito hi vane pārtho dīrghakālaṃ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_08_u:063.056d-1002_03: pūrvaṃ bhagavatā proktaḥ kṛṣṇayor vijayo dhruvaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.056d-1002_04: tat tathāstu namaste 'stu prabho brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_08_u:063.056d-1002_06: novāca taj jayaṃ tulyaṃ tayoḥ karṇakirīṭinoḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.056d-1002_07: tasmād āśāṃ gataḥ śakras tūṣṇīṃbhūte pitāmahe
GE07mbh_08_u:063.058a: śrutaṃ bhavadbhir yat proktaṃ bhagavadbhyāṃ jagaddhitam
GE07mbh_08_u:063.058c: tat tathā nānyathā tad dhi tiṣṭhadhvaṃ gatamanyavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.059c: vismitāny abhavan rājan pūjayāṃ cakrire ca tat
GE07mbh_08_u:063.059d-1003_01: nocus tadā jayaṃ tulyaṃ tayoḥ puruṣasiṃhayoḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.060a: vyasṛjaṃś ca sugandhīni nānārūpāṇi khāt tathā
GE07mbh_08_u:063.061e: rathau ca tau śvetahayau yuktaketū mahāsvanau
GE07mbh_08_u:063.061f-1005_01: yau tau karṇārjunau rājan prahṛṣṭāv abhyatiṣṭhatām
GE07mbh_08_u:063.062a: samāgatā lokavīrāḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_08_u:063.066c: bhīṣayann eva daṃṣṭrābhir durnirīkṣyo ravir yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:063.068a: utpatya ca mahāvegaḥ kakṣyām abhyahanat kapiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.068c: nakhaiś ca daśanaiś caiva garuḍaḥ pannagaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:063.070a: ubhayor uttame yuddhe dvairathe dyūta āhṛte
GE07mbh_08_u:063.070c: prakurvāte dhvajau yuddhaṃ pratyaheṣan hayān hayāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.072c: karṇaṃ cāpy ajayad dṛṣṭyā kuntīputro dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.073b-1008_01: uvāca praṇayād rājan sāmapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.073c: yadi pārtho raṇe hanyād adya mām iha karhi cit
GE07mbh_08_u:063.073e: kim uttaraṃ tadā te syāt sakhe satyaṃ bravīhi me śalya uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:063.074-1009_01: hate tvayi hy ahaṃ hanyām ubhau kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayau
GE07mbh_08_u:063.074a: yadi karṇa raṇe hanyād adya tvāṃ śvetavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.075a: evam eva tu goviṃdam arjunaḥ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_08_u:063.075c: taṃ prahasyābravīt kṛṣṇaḥ pārthaṃ param idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.076c: śaityam agnir iyān na tvā karṇo hanyād dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_08_u:063.077a: yadi tv evaṃ kathaṃ cit syāl lokaparyasanaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:063.077c: hanyāṃ karṇaṃ tathā śalyaṃ bāhubhyām eva saṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:063.080a: draṣṭāsy adya śaraiḥ karṇaṃ raṇe kṛttam anekadhā
GE07mbh_08_u:063.080d-1010_03: dhruvaṃ svapneṣv aniṣṭāni tābhir dṛṣṭāni mādhava
GE07mbh_08_u:063.080e: na hi me śāmyate vairaṃ kṛṣṇāṃ yat prāhasat purā
GE07mbh_08_u:063.080f-1011_02: asmāṃs tathāvahasatā kṣipatā ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:063.081a: adya draṣṭāsi govinda karṇam unmathitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_08_u:063.082a: adya tā madhurā vācaḥ śrotāsi madhusūdana
GE07mbh_08_u:063.082b-1012_01: diṣṭyā jayasi vārṣṇeya iti karṇe nipātite
GE07mbh_08_u:064.002a: nānadyamānaṃ ninadair manojñair; vāditragītastutibhiś ca nṛttaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.002c: sarve 'ntarikṣe dadṛśur manuṣyāḥ; khasthāṃś ca tān vismayanīyarūpān
GE07mbh_08_u:064.003c: ninādayanto vasudhāṃ diśaś ca; svanena sarve dviṣato nijaghnuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.005a: tathā pravṛtte 'strabhṛtāṃ parābhave; dhanaṃjayaś cādhirathiś ca sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.005c: diśaś ca sainyaṃ ca śitair ajihmagaiḥ; parasparaṃ prorṇuvatuḥ sma daṃśitau
GE07mbh_08_u:064.006a: tatas tvadīyāś ca pare ca sāyakaiḥ; kṛte 'ndhakāre vividur na kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_08_u:064.006c: bhayāt tu tāv eva rathau samāśrayaṃs; tamonudau khe prasṛtā ivāṃśavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.007a: tato 'stram astreṇa parasparasya tau; vidhūya vātāv iva pūrvapaścimau
GE07mbh_08_u:064.007c: ghanāndhakāre vitate tamonudau; yathoditau tadvad atīva rejatuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.008a: na cābhimantavyam iti pracoditāḥ; pare tvadīyāś ca tadāvatasthire
GE07mbh_08_u:064.008c: mahārathau tau parivārya sarvataḥ; surāsurā vāsavaśambarāv iva
GE07mbh_08_u:064.009c: sasiṃhanādau babhatur narottamau; śaśāṅkasūryāv iva meghasaṃplave
GE07mbh_08_u:064.010c: didhakṣamāṇau sacarācaraṃ jagad; yugāstasūryāv iva duḥsahau raṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:064.011a: ubhāv ajeyāv ahitāntakāv ubhau; jighāṃsatus tau kṛtinau parasparam
GE07mbh_08_u:064.011c: mahāhave vīravarau samīyatur; yathendrajambhāv iva karṇapāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_08_u:064.012a: tato mahāstrāṇi mahādhanurdharau; vimuñcamānāv iṣubhir bhayānakaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.012c: narāśvanāgān amitau nijaghnatuḥ; parasparaṃ jaghnatur uttameṣubhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.013a: tato visasruḥ punar arditāḥ śarair; narottamābhyāṃ kurupāṇḍavāśrayāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.013c: sanāgapattyaśvarathā diśo gatās; tathā yathā siṃhabhayād vanaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.014a: tatas tu duryodhanabhojasaubalāḥ; kṛpaś ca śāradvatasūnunā saha
GE07mbh_08_u:064.014c: mahārathāḥ pañca dhanaṃjayācyutau; śaraiḥ śarīrāntakarair atāḍayan
GE07mbh_08_u:064.015a: dhanūṃṣi teṣām iṣudhīn hayān dhvajān; rathāṃś ca sūtāṃś ca dhanaṃjayaḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.015c: samaṃ ca ciccheda parābhinac ca tāñ; śarottamair dvādaśabhiś ca sūtajam
GE07mbh_08_u:064.015d-1015_01: te pañca vīrāḥ satataṃ hatā[yā]rathāḥ nikṛttadehārjunabāṇavegaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.015d-1015_04: ruruha[hū] rathānyeṣu punar yayuś ca tam
GE07mbh_08_u:064.016a: athābhyadhāvaṃs tvaritāḥ śataṃ rathāḥ; śataṃ ca nāgārjunam ātatāyinaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.016c: śakās tukhārā yavanāś ca sādinaḥ; sahaiva kāmbojavarair jighāṃsavaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.017a: varāyudhān pāṇigatān karaiḥ saha; kṣurair nyakṛntaṃs tvaritāḥ śirāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_08_u:064.017c: hayāṃś ca nāgāṃś ca rathāṃś ca yudhyatāṃ; dhanaṃjayaḥ śatrugaṇaṃ tam akṣiṇot
GE07mbh_08_u:064.018c: nipetur apy uttamapuṣpavṛṣṭayaḥ; surūpagandhāḥ pavaneritāḥ śivāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.019a: tad adbhutaṃ devamanuṣyasākṣikaṃ; samīkṣya bhūtāni visiṣmiyur nṛpa
GE07mbh_08_u:064.019c: tavātmajaḥ sūtasutaś ca na vyathāṃ; na vismayaṃ jagmatur ekaniścayau
GE07mbh_08_u:064.020a: athābravīd droṇasutas tavātmajaṃ; karaṃ kareṇa pratipīḍya sāntvayan
GE07mbh_08_u:064.020c: prasīda duryodhana śāmya pāṇḍavair; alaṃ virodhena dhig astu vigraham
GE07mbh_08_u:064.021a: hato gurur brahmasamo mahāstravit; tathaiva bhīṣmapramukhā nararṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.021c: ahaṃ tv avadhyo mama cāpi mātulaḥ; praśādhi rājyaṃ saha pāṇḍavaiś ciram
GE07mbh_08_u:064.022a: dhanaṃjayaḥ sthāsyati vārito mayā; janārdano naiva virodham icchati
GE07mbh_08_u:064.022c: yudhiṣṭhiro bhūtahite sadā rato; vṛkodaras tadvaśagas tathā yamau
GE07mbh_08_u:064.023a: tvayā ca pārthaiś ca paraspareṇa; prajāḥ śivaṃ prāpnuyur icchati tvayi
GE07mbh_08_u:064.023c: vrajantu śeṣāḥ svapurāṇi pārthivā; nivṛttavairāś ca bhavantu sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.023d-1018_01: na ced dhataṃ śroṣyasi caiva karṇaṃ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.024a: na ced vacaḥ śroṣyasi me narādhipa; dhruvaṃ prataptāsi hato 'ribhir yudhi
GE07mbh_08_u:064.024c: idaṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ jagatā saha tvayā; kṛtaṃ yad ekena kirīṭamālinā
GE07mbh_08_u:064.024e: yathā na kuryād balabhinna cāntako; na ca pracetā bhagavān na yakṣarāṭ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.024f-038_0001: vṛddhaṃ pitaram ālokya gāndhārīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE07mbh_08_u:064.024f-038_0002: kṛpālur dharmarājo hi yācitaḥ śamam eṣyati
GE07mbh_08_u:064.024f-038_0003: yathocitaṃ ca vai rājyam anujñāsyati te prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.024f-038_0005: vairaṃ neṣyati dharmātmā svajane nāsty atikramaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.024f-038_0011: jīvite yatnam ātiṣṭha jīvan bhadrāṇi paśyati
GE07mbh_08_u:064.024f-038_0012: rājyaṃ śrīś caiva bhadraṃ te jīvamāne tu kalpyate
GE07mbh_08_u:064.024f-038_0013: mṛtasya khalu kauravya naiva rājyaṃ kutaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_08_u:064.024f-038_0014: lokavṛttam idaṃ vṛttaṃ pravṛttaṃ paśya bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:064.024f-038_0015: śāmya tvaṃ pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdhaṃ rakṣa śeṣaṃ kulasya ca
GE07mbh_08_u:064.024f-038_0016: mā bhūt sa kālaḥ kauravya yadāham ahitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.024f-038_0017: brūyāṃ kāmaṃ mahābāho māvamaṃsthā vaco mama
GE07mbh_08_u:064.024f-038_0018: dharmiṣṭhaṃ hitam atyantaṃ rājñaś caiva kulasya ca
GE07mbh_08_u:064.024f-038_0019: etad dhi paramaṃ śreyaḥ kuruvaṃśasya vṛddhaye
GE07mbh_08_u:064.024f-038_0020: prajāhitaṃ ca gāndhāre kulasya ca sukhāvaham
GE07mbh_08_u:064.024f-038_0021: pathyam āyatisaṃyuktaṃ karṇo hy arjunam āhave
GE07mbh_08_u:064.024f-038_0022: na jeṣyati naravyāghram iti me dhīyate matiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.024f-038_0023: rocatāṃ te naraśreṣṭha mamaitad vacanaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_08_u:064.024f-038_0024: ato 'nyathā hi rājendra vināśaḥ sumahān bhavet
GE07mbh_08_u:064.025a: ato 'pi bhūyāṃś ca guṇair dhanaṃjayaḥ; sa cābhipatsyaty akhilaṃ vaco mama
GE07mbh_08_u:064.025c: tavānuyātrāṃ ca tathā kariṣyati; prasīda rājañ jagataḥ śamāya vai
GE07mbh_08_u:064.026a: mamāpi mānaḥ paramaḥ sadā tvayi; bravīmy atas tvāṃ paramāc ca sauhṛdāt
GE07mbh_08_u:064.026c: nivārayiṣyāmi hi karṇam apy ahaṃ; yadā bhavān sapraṇayo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_08_u:064.027a: vadanti mitraṃ sahajaṃ vicakṣaṇās; tathaiva sāmnā ca dhanena cārjitam
GE07mbh_08_u:064.027b-1020_06: viṣṇuḥ sakhā yasya sakhā na vigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.027b-1020_11: na śroṣyasi tvaṃ yadi me mahāratha
GE07mbh_08_u:064.027b-1021_02: sa me sthitaś caiva tathaiva durmanāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.027c: pratāpataś copanataṃ caturvidhaṃ; tad asti sarvaṃ tvayi pāṇḍaveṣu ca
GE07mbh_08_u:064.028a: nisargatas te tava vīra bāndhavāḥ; punaś ca sāmnā ca samāpnuhi sthiram
GE07mbh_08_u:064.028c: tvayi prasanne yadi mitratām iyur; dhruvaṃ narendrendra tathā tvam ācara
GE07mbh_08_u:064.029a: sa evam uktaḥ suhṛdā vaco hitaṃ; vicintya niḥśvasya ca durmanābravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:064.029c: yathā bhavān āha sakhe tathaiva tan; mamāpi ca jñāpayato vacaḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_08_u:064.030a: nihatya duḥśāsanam uktavān bahu; prasahya śārdūlavad eṣa durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.030c: vṛkodaras tad dhṛdaye mama sthitaṃ; na tatparokṣaṃ bhavataḥ kutaḥ śamaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:064.031a: na cāpi karṇaṃ guruputra saṃstavād; upāramety arhasi vaktum acyuta
GE07mbh_08_u:064.031c: śrameṇa yukto mahatādya phalgunas; tam eṣa karṇaḥ prasabhaṃ haniṣyati
GE07mbh_08_u:064.032a: tam evam uktvābhyanunīya cāsakṛt; tavātmajaḥ svān anuśāsti sainikān
GE07mbh_08_u:064.032c: samāghnatābhidravatāhitān imān; sabāṇaśabdān kim u joṣam āsyate
GE07mbh_08_u:065.001a: tau śaṅkhabherīninade samṛddhe; samīyatuḥ śvetahayau narāgryau
GE07mbh_08_u:065.001c: vaikartanaḥ sūtaputro 'rjunaś ca; durmantrite tava putrasya rājan
GE07mbh_08_u:065.002a: yathā gajau haimavatau prabhinnau; pragṛhya dantāv iva vāśitārthe
GE07mbh_08_u:065.002c: tathā samājagmatur ugravegau; dhanaṃjayaś cādhirathiś ca vīrau
GE07mbh_08_u:065.003a: balāhakeneva yathā balāhako; yadṛcchayā vā giriṇā girir yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:065.003c: tathā dhanurjyātalaneminisvanau; samīyatus tāv iṣuvarṣavarṣiṇau śarāstraśaktyṛṣṭigadāsisarpau
GE07mbh_08_u:065.004c: yathācalau vā galitau mahābalau; tathā mahāstrair itaretaraṃ ghnataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.005a: sa saṃnipātas tu tayor mahān abhūt; sureśavairocanayor yathā purā
GE07mbh_08_u:065.006c: susaṃnikṛṣṭāv aniloddhatau yathā; tathā rathau tau dhvajinau samīyatuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.007a: ubhau mahendrasya samānavikramāv; ubhau mahendrapratimau mahārathau
GE07mbh_08_u:065.007c: mahendravajrapratimaiś ca sāyakair; mahendravṛtrāv iva saṃprajahratuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.008c: cakampatuś connamataḥ sma vismayād; viyadgatāś cārjunakarṇasaṃyuge
GE07mbh_08_u:065.009a: bhujāḥ savajrāṅgulayaḥ samucchritāḥ; sasiṃhanādā hṛṣitair didṛkṣubhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.009c: yadārjunaṃ mattam iva dvipo dvipaṃ; samabhyayād ādhirathir jighāṃsayā
GE07mbh_08_u:065.010a: abhyakrośan somakās tatra pārthaṃ; tvarasva yāhy arjuna vidhya karṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:065.010c: chindhy asya mūrdhānam alaṃ cireṇa; śraddhāṃ ca rājyād dhṛtarāṣṭrasūnoḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.011a: tathāsmākaṃ bahavas tatra yodhāḥ; karṇaṃ tadā yāhi yāhīty avocan
GE07mbh_08_u:065.011c: jahy arjunaṃ karṇa tataḥ sacīrāḥ; punar vanaṃ yāntu cirāya pārthāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.012a: tataḥ karṇaḥ prathamaṃ tatra pārthaṃ; maheṣubhir daśabhiḥ paryavidhyat
GE07mbh_08_u:065.012c: tam arjunaḥ pratyavidhyac chitāgraiḥ; kakṣāntare daśabhir atīva kruddhaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.013a: parasparaṃ tau viśikhaiḥ sutīkṣṇais; tatakṣatuḥ sūtaputro 'rjunaś ca
GE07mbh_08_u:065.013d-1032_03: tataḥ prajajvāla tad astram ugraṃ yugāntasūryajvalanaprakāśam
GE07mbh_08_u:065.013d-1041_01: tathā ca sarvās timireṇa vai diśo
GE07mbh_08_u:065.013d-1041_02: meghair vṛtā na pradṛśyeta kiṃ cit
GE07mbh_08_u:065.013d-1046_13: tān astāṃs taiḥ sa nikṛtyāśu bāṇān
GE07mbh_08_u:065.013d-1046_27: sarve hy amanyanta vaśe kṛtau tau
GE07mbh_08_u:065.014a: amṛṣyamāṇaś ca mahāvimarde; tatrākrudhyad bhīmaseno mahātmā
GE07mbh_08_u:065.014c: athābravīt pāṇinā pāṇim āghnan; saṃdaṣṭauṣṭho nṛtyati vādayann iva
GE07mbh_08_u:065.014e: kathaṃ nu tvāṃ sūtaputraḥ kirīṭin; maheṣubhir daśabhir avidhyad agre
GE07mbh_08_u:065.015a: yayā dhṛtyā sarvabhūtāny ajaiṣīr; grāsaṃ dadad vahnaye khāṇḍave tvam
GE07mbh_08_u:065.015c: tayā dhṛtyā sūtaputraṃ jahi tvam; ahaṃ vainaṃ gadayā pothayiṣye
GE07mbh_08_u:065.016a: athābravīd vāsudevo 'pi pārthaṃ; dṛṣṭvā ratheṣūn pratihanyamānān
GE07mbh_08_u:065.016c: amīmṛdat sarvathā te 'dya karṇo; hy astrair astrāṇi kim idaṃ kirīṭin
GE07mbh_08_u:065.017a: sa vīra kiṃ muhyasi nāvadhīyase; nadanty ete kuravaḥ saṃprahṛṣṭāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.017c: karṇaṃ puraskṛtya vidur hi sarve; tvadastram astrair vinipātyamānam
GE07mbh_08_u:065.018a: yayā dhṛtyā nihataṃ tāmasāstraṃ; yuge yuge rākṣasāś cāpi ghorāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.018c: dambhodbhavāś cāsurāś cāhaveṣu; tayā dhṛtyā tvaṃ jahi sūtaputram
GE07mbh_08_u:065.019a: anena vāsya kṣuraneminādya; saṃchinddhi mūrdhānam areḥ prasahya
GE07mbh_08_u:065.019c: mayā nisṛṣṭena sudarśanena; vajreṇa śakro namucer ivāreḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.020a: kirātarūpī bhagavān yayā ca; tvayā mahatyā paritoṣito 'bhūt
GE07mbh_08_u:065.020c: tāṃ tvaṃ dhṛtiṃ vīra punar gṛhītvā; sahānubandhaṃ jahi sūtaputram
GE07mbh_08_u:065.021a: tato mahīṃ sāgaramekhalāṃ tvaṃ; sapattanāṃ grāmavatīṃ samṛddhām
GE07mbh_08_u:065.021c: prayaccha rājñe nihatārisaṃghāṃ; yaśaś ca pārthātulam āpnuhi tvam
GE07mbh_08_u:065.022a: saṃcodito bhīmajanārdanābhyāṃ; smṛtvā tadātmānam avekṣya sattvam
GE07mbh_08_u:065.023a: prāduṣkaromy eṣa mahāstram ugraṃ; śivāya lokasya vadhāya sauteḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.023c: tan me 'nujānātu bhavān surāś ca; brahmā bhavo brahmavidaś ca sarve
GE07mbh_08_u:065.024a: ity ūcivān brāhmam asahyam astraṃ; prāduścakre manasā saṃvidheyam
GE07mbh_08_u:065.024c: tato diśaś ca pradiśaś ca sarvāḥ; samāvṛṇot sāyakair bhūritejāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.024e: sasarja bāṇān bharatarṣabho 'pi; śataṃśatān ekavad āśuvegān
GE07mbh_08_u:065.025c: te ghoṣiṇaḥ pāṇḍavam abhyupeyuḥ; parjanyamuktā iva vāridhārāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.026a: sa bhīmasenaṃ ca janārdanaṃ ca; kirīṭinaṃ cāpy amanuṣyakarmā
GE07mbh_08_u:065.026c: tribhis tribhir bhīmabalo nihatya; nanāda ghoraṃ mahatā svareṇa
GE07mbh_08_u:065.027a: sa karṇabāṇābhihataḥ kirīṭī; bhīmaṃ tathā prekṣya janārdanaṃ ca
GE07mbh_08_u:065.027c: amṛṣyamāṇaḥ punar eva pārthaḥ; śarān daśāṣṭau ca samudbabarha
GE07mbh_08_u:065.028a: suṣeṇam ekena śareṇa viddhvā; śalyaṃ caturbhis tribhir eva karṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:065.028c: tataḥ sumuktair daśabhir jaghāna; sabhāpatiṃ kāñcanavarmanaddham
GE07mbh_08_u:065.029a: sa rājaputro viśirā vibāhur; vivājisūto vidhanur viketuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.029c: tato rathāgrād apatat prabhagnaḥ; paraśvadhaiḥ śāla ivābhikṛttaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.030a: punaś ca karṇaṃ tribhir aṣṭabhiś ca; dvābhyāṃ caturbhir daśabhiś ca viddhvā
GE07mbh_08_u:065.030c: catuḥśatān dviradān sāyudhīyān; hatvā rathān aṣṭaśataṃ jaghāna
GE07mbh_08_u:065.030e: sahasram aśvāṃś ca punaś ca sādīn; aṣṭau sahasrāṇi ca pattivīrān
GE07mbh_08_u:065.031a: dṛṣṭvājimukhyāv atha yudhyamānau; didṛkṣavaḥ śūravarāv arighnau
GE07mbh_08_u:065.031c: karṇaṃ ca pārthaṃ ca niyamya vāhān; khasthā mahīsthāś ca janāvatasthuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.032a: tato dhanurjyā sahasātikṛṣṭā; sughoṣam ācchidyata pāṇḍavasya
GE07mbh_08_u:065.032c: tasmin kṣaṇe sūtaputras tu pārthaṃ; samācinot kṣudrakāṇāṃ śatena
GE07mbh_08_u:065.033c: ṣaṣṭyā nārācair vāsudevaṃ bibheda; tadantaraṃ somakāḥ prādravanta
GE07mbh_08_u:065.033d-1066_03: kṛṣṇaṃ ca pārthaṃ ca tathā dhvajaṃ ca
GE07mbh_08_u:065.033d-1067_19: sarve hy amanyanta vaśe kṛtau tau
GE07mbh_08_u:065.034a: tato dhanurjyām avadhamya śīghraṃ; śarān astān ādhirather vidhamya
GE07mbh_08_u:065.034c: susaṃrabdhaḥ karṇaśarakṣatāṅgo; raṇe pārthaḥ somakān pratyagṛhṇāt
GE07mbh_08_u:065.034d-1070_03: śalyaṃ ca karṇaṃ ca kurūṃś ca sarvān
GE07mbh_08_u:065.034e: na pakṣiṇaḥ saṃpatanty antarikṣe; kṣepīyasāstreṇa kṛte 'ndhakāre
GE07mbh_08_u:065.035a: śalyaṃ ca pārtho daśabhiḥ pṛṣatkair; bhṛśaṃ tanutre prahasann avidhyat
GE07mbh_08_u:065.035c: tataḥ karṇaṃ dvādaśabhiḥ sumuktair; viddhvā punaḥ saptabhir abhyavidhyat
GE07mbh_08_u:065.036c: vibhinnagātraḥ kṣatajokṣitāṅgaḥ; karṇo babhau rudra ivātateṣuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.037a: tatas tribhiś ca tridaśādhipopamaṃ; śarair bibhedādhirathir dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_08_u:065.037c: śarāṃs tu pañca jvalitān ivoragān; pravīrayām āsa jighāṃsur acyute
GE07mbh_08_u:065.038a: te varma bhittvā puruṣottamasya; suvarṇacitraṃ nyapatan sumuktāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.038c: vegena gām āviviśuḥ suvegāḥ; snātvā ca karṇābhimukhāḥ pratīyuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.039a: tān pañcabhallais tvaritaiḥ sumuktais; tridhā tridhaikaikam athoccakarta
GE07mbh_08_u:065.039c: dhanaṃjayas te nyapatan pṛthivyāṃ; mahāhayas takṣakaputrapakṣāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.040a: tataḥ prajajvāla kirīṭamālī; krodhena kakṣaṃ pradahann ivāgniḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.040c: sa karṇam ākarṇavikṛṣṭasṛṣṭaiḥ; śaraiḥ śarīrāntakarair jvaladbhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.040e: marmasv avidhyat sa cacāla duḥkhād; dhairyāt tu tasthāv atimātradhairyaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.041a: tataḥ śaraughaiḥ pradiśo diśaś ca; raviprabhā karṇarathaś ca rājan
GE07mbh_08_u:065.041c: adṛśya āsīt kupite dhanaṃjaye; tuṣāranīhāravṛtaṃ yathā nabhaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.042a: sa cakrarakṣān atha pādarakṣān; puraḥsarān pṛṣṭhagopāṃś ca sarvān
GE07mbh_08_u:065.043a: dvisāhasrān samare savyasācī; kurupravīrān ṛṣabhaḥ kurūṇām
GE07mbh_08_u:065.043c: kṣaṇena sarvān sarathāśvasūtān; nināya rājan kṣayam ekavīraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.044a: athāpalāyanta vihāya karṇaṃ; tavātmajāḥ kuravaś cāvaśiṣṭāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.044c: hatān avākīrya śarakṣatāṃś ca; lālapyamānāṃs tanayān pitṝṃś ca
GE07mbh_08_u:065.044d-1076_06: kṣātre ca dharme niratāḥ stha yūyam
GE07mbh_08_u:065.045a: sa sarvataḥ prekṣya diśo viśūnyā; bhayāvadīrṇaiḥ kurubhir vihīnaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:065.045c: na vivyathe bhārata tatra karṇaḥ; pratīpam evārjunam abhyadhāvat
GE07mbh_08_u:066.002a: tad arjunāstraṃ grasate sma vīrān; viyat tathākāśam anantaghoṣam
GE07mbh_08_u:066.002c: kruddhena pārthena tadāśu sṛṣṭaṃ; vadhāya karṇasya mahāvimarde
GE07mbh_08_u:066.003c: tad arjunāstraṃ vyadhamad dahantaṃ; pārthaṃ ca bāṇair niśitair nijaghne
GE07mbh_08_u:066.004a: tato vimardaḥ sumahān babhūva; tasyārjunasyādhiratheś ca rājan
GE07mbh_08_u:066.004c: anyonyam āsādayatoḥ pṛṣatkair; viṣāṇaghātair dvipayor ivograiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:066.004d-1079_07: nānyaṃ ca bhūtaṃ dadṛśus tadā te
GE07mbh_08_u:066.004d-039_0007: pārthaḥ kadā cit tv adhikaḥ kirīṭī
GE07mbh_08_u:066.004d-039_0015: bhoḥ karṇa sādhv arjuna sādhu ceti
GE07mbh_08_u:066.004d-040_0019: nānyat kiṃ cid dadṛśuḥ saṃpatad vai
GE07mbh_08_u:066.004d-040_0026: karṇas tu pārthaṃ na viśeṣayad yadā
GE07mbh_08_u:066.005a: tato ripughnaṃ samadhatta karṇaḥ; susaṃśitaṃ sarpamukhaṃ jvalantam
GE07mbh_08_u:066.005c: raudraṃ śaraṃ saṃyati supradhautaṃ; pārthārtham atyarthacirāya guptam
GE07mbh_08_u:066.006c: pradīptam airāvatavaṃśasaṃbhavaṃ; śiro jihīrṣur yudhi phalgunasya
GE07mbh_08_u:066.006d-1085_02: nihata iti suto me srastagātro babhūva
GE07mbh_08_u:066.006d-1085_04: tridaśapatim avocan mā vyadhiṣṭhā jaye śrīḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:066.007a: tam abravīn madrarājo mahātmā; vaikartanaṃ prekṣya hi saṃhiteṣum
GE07mbh_08_u:066.007c: na karṇa grīvām iṣur eṣa prāpsyate; saṃlakṣya saṃdhatsva śaraṃ śiroghnam
GE07mbh_08_u:066.008a: athābravīt krodhasaṃraktanetraḥ; karṇaḥ śalyaṃ saṃdhiteṣuḥ prasahya
GE07mbh_08_u:066.008c: na saṃdhatte dviḥ śaraṃ śalya karṇo; na mādṛśāḥ śāṭhyayuktā bhavanti
GE07mbh_08_u:066.009a: tathaivam uktvā visasarja taṃ śaraṃ; balāhakaṃ varṣaghanābhipūjitam
GE07mbh_08_u:066.009c: hato 'si vai phalguna ity avocat; tatas tvarann ūrjitam utsasarja
GE07mbh_08_u:066.010c: ākramya syandanaṃ padbhyāṃ balena balināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:066.011a: avagāḍhe rathe bhūmau jānubhyām agaman hayāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:066.011c: tataḥ śaraḥ so 'bhyahanat kirīṭaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:066.011d-1088_05: taṃ prekṣya dīptaṃ yudhi mādhavas tu
GE07mbh_08_u:066.011d-1088_09: kṣitiṃ gatā jānubhis te tu vāhās
GE07mbh_08_u:066.012c: balāstrasargottamayatnamanyubhiḥ; śareṇa mūrdhnaḥ sa jahāra sūtajaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:066.013c: puraṃdarārthaṃ tapasā prayatnataḥ; svayaṃ kṛtaṃ yad bhuvanasya sūnunā
GE07mbh_08_u:066.014a: mahārharūpaṃ dviṣatāṃ bhayaṃkaraṃ; vibhāti cātyarthasukhaṃ sugandhi tat
GE07mbh_08_u:066.014c: nijaghnuṣe devaripūn sureśvaraḥ; svayaṃ dadau yat sumanāḥ kirīṭine
GE07mbh_08_u:066.015c: surottamair apy aviṣahyam ardituṃ; prasahya nāgena jahāra yad vṛṣaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:066.016a: tad uttameṣūn mathitaṃ viṣāgninā; pradīptam arciṣmad abhikṣiti priyam
GE07mbh_08_u:066.016c: papāta pārthasya kirīṭam uttamaṃ; divākaro 'stād iva parvatāj jvalan
GE07mbh_08_u:066.017a: tataḥ kirīṭaṃ bahuratnamaṇḍitaṃ; jahāra nāgo 'rjunamūrdhato balāt
GE07mbh_08_u:066.018a: mahī viyad dyauḥ salilāni vāyunā; yathā vibhinnāni vibhānti bhārata
GE07mbh_08_u:066.018c: tathaiva śabdo bhuvaneṣv abhūt tadā; janā vyavasyan vyathitāś ca caskhaluḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:066.019a: tataḥ samudgrathya sitena vāsasā; svamūrdhajānavyathitaḥ sthito
GE07mbh_08_u:066.019d-041_0008: dṛḍhāhataḥ saṃś ca punas tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:066.019d-041_0009: na hy arjunas taṃ vyasane tadeyivān
GE07mbh_08_u:066.019d-041_0016: nihatya dharmaṃ ca yaśaś ca vindati

GE07mbh_08_u:066.019d-1096_03: dṛṣṭvā gogatakaṃ jahāra mukuṭaṃ gośabdagopūri vai

GE07mbh_08_u:066.022d-1113_02: dāśārha ko nv eṣa mamādya nāgaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:066.023a: yo 'sau tvayā khāṇḍave citrabhānuṃ; saṃtarpayānena dhanurdhareṇa

GE07mbh_08_u:066.024c: nāgaṃ viyat tiryag ivotpatantaṃ; sa chinnagātro nipapāta bhūmau

GE07mbh_08_u:066.028a: tato vṛṣo bāṇanipātakopito; mahorago daṇḍavighaṭṭito yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:066.028c: tathāśukārī vyasṛjac charottamān; mahāviṣaḥ sarpa ivottamaṃ viṣam
GE07mbh_08_u:066.029a: janārdanaṃ dvādaśabhiḥ parābhinan; navair navatyā ca śarais tathārjunam
GE07mbh_08_u:066.029c: śareṇa ghoreṇa punaś ca pāṇḍavaṃ; vibhidya karṇo 'bhyanadaj jahāsa ca

GE07mbh_08_u:066.031a: tataḥ śarāṇāṃ navatīr navārjunaḥ; sasarja karṇe 'ntakadaṇḍasaṃnibhāḥ

GE07mbh_08_u:066.033a: mahādhanaṃ śilpivaraiḥ prayatnataḥ; kṛtaṃ yad asyottamavarma bhāsvaram

GE07mbh_08_u:066.036a: dṛḍhāhataḥ patribhir ugravegaiḥ; pārthena karṇo vividhaiḥ śitāgraiḥ

GE07mbh_08_u:066.037a: sāśvaṃ tu karṇaṃ sarathaṃ kirīṭī; samācinod bhārata vatsadantaiḥ

GE07mbh_08_u:066.041a: bāhvantarād ādhirather vimuktān; bāṇān mahāhīn iva dīpyamānān
GE07mbh_08_u:066.041c: vyadhvaṃsayann arjunabāhumuktāḥ; śarāḥ samāsādya diśaḥ śitāgrāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:066.042a: tataś cakramapatat tasya bhūmau; sa vihvalaḥ samare sūtaputraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:066.042c: ghūrṇe rathe brāhmaṇasyābhiśāpād; rāmād upātte 'pratibhāti cāstre
GE07mbh_08_u:066.043a: amṛṣyamāṇo vyasanāni tāni; hastau vidhunvan sa vigarhamāṇaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:066.043c: dharmapradhānān abhipāti dharma; ity abruvan dharmavidaḥ sadaiva
GE07mbh_08_u:066.043e: mamāpi nimno 'dya na pāti bhaktān; manye na nityaṃ paripāti dharmaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:066.044c: marmābhighātāc calitaḥ kriyāsu; punaḥ punar dharmam agarhad ājau

GE07mbh_08_u:066.047c: kampitātmā tathā karṇaḥ śaktyā ceṣṭām adarśayat
GE07mbh_08_u:066.049a: gāṇḍīvaṃ jyāṃ ca bāṇāṃś ca anumantrya dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:066.050a: tatas tejomayā bāṇā rathāt pārthasya niḥsṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:066.051a: tān karṇas tv agrato 'bhyastān moghāṃś cakre mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:066.052a: visṛjāstraṃ paraṃ pārtha rādheyo grasate śarān
GE07mbh_08_u:066.053a: chādayitvā tato bāṇaiḥ karṇaṃ prabhrāmya cārjunaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:066.053c: tasya karṇaḥ śaraiḥ kruddhaś ciccheda jyāṃ sutejanaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:066.053d-1129_01: dvitīyāṃ ca tṛtīyāṃ ca caturthīṃ pañcamīṃ tathā

GE07mbh_08_u:066.054a: tato jyām avadhāyānyām anumṛjya ca pāṇḍavaḥ

GE07mbh_08_u:066.060b-1131_01: arjunaṃ vīkṣya saṃrabdham idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:066.060b-1131_02: bho bho pārtha maheṣvāsa muhūrtaṃ paripālaya

GE07mbh_08_u:066.060d-1132_01: yāvac cakram idaṃ grastam uddharāmi mahītalāt

GE07mbh_08_u:066.061d-1134_01: na tvaṃ kāpuruṣācīrṇaṃ mārgam āsthātum arhasi

GE07mbh_08_u:066.065c: smṛtvā dharmopadeśaṃ tvaṃ muhūrtaṃ kṣama pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_08_u:066.065d-1139_01: yāvat karomi dhanuṣaṃ sajjaṃ matimatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_08_u:067.001a: athābravīd vāsudevo rathastho; rādheya diṣṭyā smarasīha dharmam
GE07mbh_08_u:067.001b-1140_01: dharme hi gṛddhāḥ satataṃ hi pārthās
GE07mbh_08_u:067.001c: prāyeṇa nīcā vyasaneṣu magnā; nindanti daivaṃ kukṛtaṃ na tat tat
GE07mbh_08_u:067.002a: yad draupadīm ekavastrāṃ sabhāyām; ānāyya tvaṃ caiva suyodhanaś ca
GE07mbh_08_u:067.002c: duḥśāsanaḥ śakuniḥ saubalaś ca; na te karṇa pratyabhāt tatra dharmaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:067.003c: akṣajñaḥ śakunir jetā tadā dharmaḥ kva te gataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:067.003d-1142_01: yad bhīmasenaṃ sarpaiś ca viṣayuktaiś ca bhojanaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:067.003d-1142_02: ācarat tvanmate rājā kva te dharmas tadā gataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:067.003d-1143_01: yad vāraṇāvate pārthān suptāñ jatugṛhe tadā

GE07mbh_08_u:067.003d-1144_01: vanavāse vyatīte ca karṇa varṣe trayodaśe
GE07mbh_08_u:067.003d-1144_02: na prayacchasi yad rājyaṃ kva te dharmas tadā gataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:067.004c: sabhāyāṃ prāhasaḥ karṇa kva te dharmas tadā gataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:067.004d-1145_01: yad anāryaiḥ purā kṛṣṇāṃ kliśyamānām anāgasam
GE07mbh_08_u:067.004d-1145_02: vinaṣṭāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kṛṣṇe śāśvataṃ narakaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:067.004d-1145_03: patim anyaṃ vṛṇīṣveti vadaṃs tvaṃ gajagāminīm
GE07mbh_08_u:067.004d-1145_04: upaprekṣasi rādheya kva te dharmas tadā gataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:067.005c: gāndhārarājam āśritya kva te dharmas tadā gataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:067.005d-1146_02: parivārya raṇe bālaṃ kva te dharmas tadā gataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:067.005d-1147_01: yady eṣa dharmas tatra na vidyate hi
GE07mbh_08_u:067.005d-1148_02: lajjayāvanato bhūtvā nottaraṃ kiṃ cid uktavān
GE07mbh_08_u:067.006a: evam ukte tu rādheye vāsudevena pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_08_u:067.006c: manyur abhyāviśat tīvraḥ smṛtvā tat tad dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_08_u:067.008a: taṃ samīkṣya tataḥ karṇo brahmāstreṇa dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_08_u:067.009c: mumoca karṇam uddiśya tat prajajvāla vai bhṛśam
GE07mbh_08_u:067.010a: vāruṇena tataḥ karṇaḥ śamayām āsa pāvakam
GE07mbh_08_u:067.010c: jīmūtaiś ca diśaḥ sarvāś cakre timiradurdināḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:067.011d-042_0001: tataḥ śaraṃ mahāghoraṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_08_u:067.011d-042_0003: yojyamāne tatas tasmin bāṇe dhanuṣi pūjite
GE07mbh_08_u:067.011d-042_0005: vavau saśarkaro vāyur diśaś ca rajasā vṛtāḥ

GE07mbh_08_u:067.013a: ūrjaskaraṃ tava sainyasya nityam; amitravitrāsanam īḍyarūpam

GE07mbh_08_u:067.014a: tataḥ kṣureṇādhiratheḥ kirīṭī; suvarṇapuṅkhena śitena yattaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:067.014c: śriyā jvalantaṃ dhvajam unmamātha; mahārathasyādhirather mahātmā
GE07mbh_08_u:067.015a: yaśaś ca dharmaś ca jayaś ca māriṣa; priyāṇi sarvāṇi ca tena ketunā
GE07mbh_08_u:067.015c: tadā kurūṇāṃ hṛdayāni cāpatan; babhūva hāheti ca nisvano mahān
GE07mbh_08_u:067.016c: ādatta pārtho 'ñjalikaṃ niṣaṅgāt; sahasraraśmer iva raśmim uttamam
GE07mbh_08_u:067.018d-1154_09: tatas tu taṃ vai śaram aprameyaṃ
GE07mbh_08_u:067.019a: yuktvā mahāstreṇa pareṇa mantravid; vikṛṣya gāṇḍīvam uvāca sasvanam
GE07mbh_08_u:067.019c: ayaṃ mahāstro 'pratimo dhṛtaḥ śaraḥ; śarīrabhic cāsuharaś ca durhṛdaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:067.020a: tapo 'sti taptaṃ guravaś ca toṣitā; mayā yad iṣṭaṃ suhṛdāṃ tathā śrutam
GE07mbh_08_u:067.020c: anena satyena nihantv ayaṃ śaraḥ; sudaṃśitaḥ karṇam ariṃ mamājitaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:067.021a: ity ūcivāṃs taṃ sa mumoca bāṇaṃ; dhanaṃjayaḥ karṇavadhāya ghoram
GE07mbh_08_u:067.021c: kṛtyām atharvāṅgirasīm ivogrāṃ; dīptām asahyāṃ yudhi mṛtyunāpi
GE07mbh_08_u:067.022a: bruvan kirīṭī tam atiprahṛṣṭo; ayaṃ śaro me vijayāvaho 'stu

GE07mbh_08_u:067.024c: varāṅgam urvyām apatac camūpater; divākaro 'stād iva raktamaṇḍalaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:067.025a: tad asya dehī satataṃ sukhoditaṃ; svarūpam atyartham udārakarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:067.025c: pareṇa kṛcchreṇa śarīram atyajad; gṛhaṃ maharddhīva sasaṅgam īśvaraḥ

GE07mbh_08_u:067.027a: dehāt tu karṇasya nipātitasya; tejo dīptaṃ khaṃ vigāhyācireṇa
GE07mbh_08_u:067.027c: tad adbhutaṃ sarvamanuṣyayodhāḥ; paśyanti rājan nihate sma karṇe
GE07mbh_08_u:067.028a: taṃ somakāḥ prekṣya hataṃ śayānaṃ; prītā nādaṃ saha sainyair akurvan
GE07mbh_08_u:067.028c: tūryāṇi cājaghnur atīva hṛṣṭā; vāsāṃsi caivādudhuvur bhujāṃś ca
GE07mbh_08_u:067.028e: balānvitāś cāpy apare hy anṛtyann; anyonyam āśliṣya nadanta ūcuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:067.029a: dṛṣṭvā tu karṇaṃ bhuvi niṣṭanantaṃ; hataṃ rathāt sāyakenāvabhinnam
GE07mbh_08_u:067.032a: astaṃ gacchan yathādityaḥ prabhām ādāya gacchati
GE07mbh_08_u:067.032c: evaṃ jīvitam ādāya karṇasyeṣur jagāma ha
GE07mbh_08_u:067.034a: upary upari sainyānāṃ tasya śatros tad añjasā
GE07mbh_08_u:067.034c: śiraḥ karṇasya sotsedham iṣuḥ so 'pāharad drutam
GE07mbh_08_u:067.034d-1168_01: tac chiro bharataśreṣṭha śobhayām āsa medinīm
GE07mbh_08_u:067.034d-1168_02: yadṛcchayā mahārāja āditya iva gāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:067.035a: karṇaṃ tu śūraṃ patitaṃ pṛthivyāṃ; śarācitaṃ śoṇitadigdhagātram

GE07mbh_08_u:067.036a: karṇe hate kuravaḥ prādravanta; bhayārditā gāḍhaviddhāś ca saṃkhye
GE07mbh_08_u:067.036c: avekṣamāṇā muhur arjunasya; dhvajaṃ mahāntaṃ vapuṣā jvalantam
GE07mbh_08_u:067.036d-1169_01: hate tu karṇe kuravaḥ prādravanta bhayārditāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:067.036d-1169_02: gāḍhaviddhāś ca saṃkhye te bāṇair gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
GE07mbh_08_u:067.037c: sahasraraśmir dinasaṃkṣaye yathā; tathāpatat tasya śiro vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_08_u:067.037d-1171_04: mandaṃ mandaṃ vrajati savitā mandiraṃ mandaraśmiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.001a: śalyas tu karṇārjunayor vimarde; balāni dṛṣṭvā mṛditāni
GE07mbh_08_u:068.001c: duryodhanaṃ yāntam avekṣamāṇo; saṃdarśayad bhārata yuddhabhūmim
GE07mbh_08_u:068.002c: duryodhano 'śrupratipūrṇanetro; muhur muhur nyaśvasad ārtarūpaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:068.003a: karṇaṃ tu śūraṃ patitaṃ pṛthivyāṃ; śarācitaṃ śoṇitadigdhagātram
GE07mbh_08_u:068.003c: yadṛcchayā sūryam ivāvanisthaṃ; didṛkṣavaḥ saṃparivārya tasthuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.004c: pare tvadīyāś ca paraspareṇa; yathā yathaiṣāṃ prakṛtis tathābhavan
GE07mbh_08_u:068.005c: niśamya karṇaṃ kuravaḥ pradudruvur; hatarṣabhā gāva ivākulākulāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.006a: kṛtvā vimardaṃ bhṛśam arjunena; karṇaṃ hataṃ kesariṇeva nāgam
GE07mbh_08_u:068.006c: dṛṣṭvā śayānaṃ bhuvi madrarājo; bhīto 'pasarpat sarathaḥ suśīghram
GE07mbh_08_u:068.007c: duryodhanasyāntikam etya śīghraṃ; saṃbhāṣya duḥkhārtam uvāca vākyam
GE07mbh_08_u:068.008c: anyonyam āsādya hataṃ mahadbhir; narāśvanāgair girikūṭakalpaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.009a: naitādṛśaṃ bhārata yuddham āsīd; yathādya karṇārjunayor babhūva
GE07mbh_08_u:068.009c: grastau hi karṇena sametya kṛṣṇāv; anye ca sarve tava śatravo ye
GE07mbh_08_u:068.010a: daivaṃ tu yat tat svavaśaṃ pravṛttaṃ; tat pāṇḍavān pāti hinasti cāsmān
GE07mbh_08_u:068.010c: tavārthasiddhyarthakarā hi sarve; prasahya vīrā nihatā dviṣadbhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.011c: vīryeṇa śauryeṇa balena caiva; tais taiś ca yuktā vipulair guṇaughaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.012a: avadhyakalpā nihatā narendrās; tavārthakāmā yudhi pāṇḍaveyaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.012c: tan mā śuco bhārata diṣṭam etat; paryāyasiddhir na sadāsti siddhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013a: etad vaco madrapater niśamya; svaṃ cāpanītaṃ manasā nirīkṣya
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013c: duryodhano dīnamanā visaṃjñaḥ; punaḥ punar nyaśvasad ārtarūpaḥ saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-1178_04: duryodhanaṃ vākyam idaṃ babhāṣe dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0005: śṛṇu rājann avahito yathā vṛtto mahākṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0007: yatra karṇe hate pārthaḥ siṃhanādam athākarot
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0008: tadā tava sutān rājann āviveśa mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0009: na saṃdhātum anīkāni na caivātha parākrame
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0010: āsīd buddhir hate karṇe tava yodhasya kasya cit
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0011: vaṇijo nāvi bhinnāyām agādhe hy aplavā yathā
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0012: apāre pāram icchanto hate dvīpe kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0014: anāthā nātham icchanto mṛgāḥ siṃhair ivārditāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0018: sūtaputre hate rājan putrās te vyadravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0021: mām eva tūrṇaṃ bībhatsur mām eva ca vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0022: abhiyātīti manvānāḥ petur mamluś ca saṃbhramāt
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0023: hayān anye rathān anye gajān anye mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0025: kuñjaraiḥ syandanāḥ kṣuṇṇāḥ sādinaś ca mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0029: hatārohās tathā nāgāś chinnahastās tathā narāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0032: duryodhano 'tha svaṃ sūtaṃ vāhety uktvedam abravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0034: jaghanya eva sainyānāṃ śanair aśvān acodayat
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0035: jaghanye yudhyamānaṃ hi kaunteyo māṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0038: nihatya śiṣṭāñ śatrūṃś ca karṇasyānṛṇyam āpnuyām
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0043: tān bhīmasenaḥ saṃkruddho dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0047: akrudhyata tadā bhīmas tai raṇe pratyupasthitaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0049: na tān rathastho bhūmiṣṭhān dharmāpekṣī vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0054: bhīmam abhyadravan saṃkhye pataṃgā iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0070: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā tvadīyāḥ prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0072: mādrīputrau tu śakuniṃ sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0075: tam abhyadhāvaṃs tvaritās tato yuddham abhūt tadā
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0077: viśrutaṃ triṣu lokeṣu vyākṣipad gāṇḍivaṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0079: arjunaṃ cāpi yoddhāraṃ tvadīyāḥ prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0090: cekitānaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca draupadeyāś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0091: hatvā tvadīyaṃ sumahat sainyaṃ śaṅkhān athādhaman
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0092: te sarve tāvakān prekṣya dravamāṇān parāṅmukhān
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0093: abhyadravañ jighāṃsanto vṛṣāñ jitvā yathā vṛṣāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0094: senāvaśeṣaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā tava sainyaṃ parāṅmukham
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0097: viśrutaṃ triṣu lokeṣu vyākṣipad gāṇḍivaṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0098: tata etāñ śarai rājan sahasrān samavārayan
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0099: rajasā coddhatenātha na sma kiṃ cid vyadṛśyata
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0101: diśaḥ sarvā mahārāja tāvakāḥ prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0103: parān abhimukhāṃś caiva sutas te samupādravat
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0105: yuddhāya bharataśreṣṭha devān iva purā baliḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0108: duryodhano 'py asaṃbhrāntas tān arīn niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0109: vyadhamad yudhi rājendra ghorarūpo viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0111: yad enaṃ pāṇḍavāḥ sarve na śekur ativartitum
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0115: harṣayann iva tān yodhān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0116: na taṃ deśaṃ prapaśyāmi pṛthivyāṃ parvateṣu ca
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0117: yatra yātān na vo hanyuḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kiṃ sṛtena vaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0118: alpaṃ ca balam eteṣāṃ kṛṣṇau ca bhṛśavikṣatau
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0119: yadi sarve 'tra tiṣṭhāmo dhruvo no vijayo bhavet
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0120: viprayātāṃś ca no bhinnān pāṇḍavāḥ kṛtakilbiṣāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0121: anusṛtya vadhiṣyanti śreyān naḥ samare vadhaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0123: mṛto duḥkhaṃ na jānīte pretya cānantyam aśnute
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0124: śṛṇudhvaṃ kṣatriyāḥ sarve yāvantaḥ stha samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0125: yadā śūraṃ ca bhīruṃ ca mārayaty antako yamaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0126: ko nu mūḍho na yudhyeta mādṛśaḥ kṣatriyavrataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0128: pitāmahair ācaritaṃ na dharmaṃ hātum arhatha
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0129: na hi dharmo 'sti pāpīyān kṣatriyasya palāyanāt
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0130: na yuddhadharmāc chreyo 'nyaḥ panthāḥ svargasya kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0131: acireṇa hatā lokaṃ sarve yodhāḥ samāpnuta
GE07mbh_08_u:068.013d-043_0132: evaṃ bruvati te putre sainikā bhṛśavikṣatāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.014a: taṃ dhyānamūkaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ bhṛśārtam; ārtāyanir dīnam uvāca vākyam
GE07mbh_08_u:068.014c: paśyedam ugraṃ naravājināgair; āyodhanaṃ vīrahataiḥ prapannam
GE07mbh_08_u:068.015a: mahīdharābhaiḥ patitair mahāgajaiḥ; sakṛt praviddhaiḥ śaraviddhamarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.015c: tair vihvaladbhiś ca gatāsubhiś ca; pradhvastayantrāyudhavarmayodhaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.017a: śarāvabhinnaiḥ patitaiś ca vājibhiḥ; śvasadbhir anyaiḥ kṣatajaṃ vamadbhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.017c: dīnaiḥ stanadbhiḥ parivṛttanetrair; mahīṃ daśadbhiḥ kṛpaṇaṃ nadadbhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.018a: tathāpaviddhair gajavājiyodhair; mandāsubhiś caiva gatāsubhiś ca
GE07mbh_08_u:068.018c: narāśvanāgaiś ca rathaiś ca marditair; mahī mahāvaitaraṇīva durdṛśā
GE07mbh_08_u:068.019c: yaśasvibhir nāgarathāśvayodhibhiḥ; padātibhiś cābhimukhair hataiḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.019e: viśīrṇavarmābharaṇāmbarāyudhair; vṛtā niśāntair iva pāvakair mahī
GE07mbh_08_u:068.020c: pranaṣṭasaṃjñaiḥ punar ucchvasadbhir; mahī babhūvānugatair ivāgnibhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.020e: divaś cyutair bhūr atidīptimadbhir; naktaṃ grahair dyaur amaleva dīptaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.021c: prāṇān nirasyāśu mahīm atīyur; mahoragā vāsam ivābhito 'straiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.022a: hatair manuṣyāśvagajaiś ca saṃkhye; śarāvabhinnaiś ca rathair babhūva
GE07mbh_08_u:068.022c: dhanaṃjayasyādhiratheś ca mārge; gajair agamyā vasudhātidurgā
GE07mbh_08_u:068.023a: rathair vareṣūn mathitaiś ca yodhaiḥ; saṃsyūtasūtāśvavarāyudhadhvajaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.024c: prabhagnanīḍair maṇihemamaṇḍitaiḥ; stṛtā mahī dyaur iva śāradair ghanaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.025a: vikṛṣyamaṇair javanair alaṃkṛtair; hateśvarair ājirathaiḥ sukalpitaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.026c: petuś ca khaḍgā vimalā vikośā; gadāś ca jāmbūnadapaṭṭabaddhāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.027c: ṛṣṭyaś ca pītā vimalā vikośāḥ; prāsāḥ sakhaḍgāḥ kanakāvabhāsāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.028a: chatrāṇi vālavyajanāni śaṅkhāḥ; srajaś ca puṣpottamahemacitrāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.028c: kuthāḥ patākāmbaraveṣṭitāś ca; kirīṭamālā mukuṭāś ca śubhrāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.029a: prakīrṇakā viprakīrṇāḥ kuthāś ca; pradhānamuktātaralāś ca hārāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.031a: dehāṃś ca bhogāṃś ca paricchadāṃś ca; tyaktvā manojñāni sukhāni cāpi
GE07mbh_08_u:068.031c: svadharmaniṣṭhāṃ mahatīm avāpya; vyāptāṃś ca lokān yaśasā samīyuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.032a: ity evam uktvā virarāma śalyo; duryodhanaḥ śokaparītacetāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.032c: hā karṇa hā karṇa iti bruvāṇa; ārto visaṃjño bhṛśam aśrunetraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.032d-1185_02: hā karṇa hā karṇa iti bruvāṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:068.033a: taṃ droṇaputrapramukhā narendrāḥ; sarve samāśvāsya saha prayānti
GE07mbh_08_u:068.033c: nirīkṣamāṇā muhur arjunasya; dhvajaṃ mahāntaṃ yaśasā jvalantam
GE07mbh_08_u:068.034c: raktāmbarasrak tapanīyayogān; nārī prakāśā iva sarvagamyā
GE07mbh_08_u:068.035c: naivāvatasthuḥ kuravaḥ samīkṣya; pravrājitā devalokāś ca sarve
GE07mbh_08_u:068.036a: vadhena karṇasya suduḥkhitās te; hā karṇa hā karṇa iti bruvāṇāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.036c: drutaṃ prayātāḥ śibirāṇi rājan; divākaraṃ raktam avekṣamāṇāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.037a: gāṇḍīvamuktais tu suvarṇapuṅkhaiḥ; śitaiḥ śaraiḥ śoṇitadigdhavājaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.037c: śaraiś citāṅgo bhuvi bhāti karṇo; hato 'pi san sūrya ivāṃśumālī
GE07mbh_08_u:068.038a: karṇasya dehaṃ rudhirāvasiktaṃ; bhaktānukampī bhagavān vivasvān
GE07mbh_08_u:068.038c: spṛṣṭvā karair lohitaraktarūpaḥ; siṣṇāsur abhyeti paraṃ samudram
GE07mbh_08_u:068.039a: itīva saṃcintya surarṣisaṃghāḥ; saṃprasthitā yānti yathāniketam
GE07mbh_08_u:068.039c: saṃcintayitvā ca janā visasrur; yathāsukhaṃ khaṃ ca mahītalaṃ ca
GE07mbh_08_u:068.040a: tad adbhutaṃ prāṇabhṛtāṃ bhayaṃkaraṃ; niśamya yuddhaṃ kuruvīramukhyayoḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.040c: dhanaṃjayasyādhiratheś ca vismitāḥ; praśaṃsamānāḥ prayayus tadā janāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.041c: gatāsum api rādheyaṃ naiva lakṣmīr vyamuñcata
GE07mbh_08_u:068.041d-1186_02: jīvantam iva taṃ śūraṃ sarvabhūtāni menire
GE07mbh_08_u:068.041d-1188_01: nābhavad vikṛtaṃ kiṃ cin mṛtasyāpi mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.042b-1189_02: śrīmān iva sahasrāṃśur jvalan sarvān pratāpya ca
GE07mbh_08_u:068.043b-1191_02: yathā hi jvalano dīpto jalam āsādya śāmyati
GE07mbh_08_u:068.043b-1191_04: pragṛhya ca yaśo dīptaṃ suyuddhenātmano bhuvi
GE07mbh_08_u:068.043b-1192_01: visṛjya śaravarṣāṇi pratāpya ca diśo daśa
GE07mbh_08_u:068.044a: dadānīty eva yo 'vocan na nāstīty arthito 'rthibhiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.044c: sadbhiḥ sadā satpuruṣaḥ sa hato dvairathe vṛṣaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.045a: yasya brāhmaṇasāt sarvam ātmārthaṃ na mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.045c: nādeyaṃ brāhmaṇeṣv āsīd yasya svam api jīvitam
GE07mbh_08_u:068.046a: sadā nṝṇāṃ priyo dātā priyadāno divaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.046b-1193_02: yam āśrityākarod vairaṃ sutas te sa gato divam
GE07mbh_08_u:068.046c: ādāya tava putrāṇāṃ jayāśāṃ śarma varma ca
GE07mbh_08_u:068.047a: hate sma karṇe sarito na sravanti; jagāma cāstaṃ kaluṣo divākaraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.047c: grahaś ca tiryag jvalitārkavarṇo; yamasya putro 'bhyudiyāya rājan
GE07mbh_08_u:068.048a: nabhaḥ paphālātha nanāda corvī; vavuś ca vātāḥ paruṣātivelam
GE07mbh_08_u:068.048c: diśaḥ sadhūmāś ca bhṛśaṃ prajajvalur; mahārṇavāś cukṣubhire ca sasvanāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.049a: sakānanāḥ sādricayāś cakampuḥ; pravivyathur bhūtagaṇāś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_08_u:068.050a: hate karṇe na diśo viprajajñus; tamovṛtā dyaur vicacāla bhūmiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.050c: papāta colkā jvalanaprakāśā; niśācarāś cāpy abhavan prahṛṣṭāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.051a: śaśiprakāśānanam arjuno yadā; kṣureṇa karṇasya śiro nyapātayat
GE07mbh_08_u:068.051c: athāntarikṣe divi ceha cāsakṛd; babhūva hāheti janasya nisvanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.052a: sa devagandharvamanuṣyapūjitaṃ; nihatya karṇaṃ ripum āhave 'rjunaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.052c: rarāja pārthaḥ parameṇa tejasā; vṛtraṃ nihatyeva sahasralocanaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.054c: raṇājire vītabhayau virejatuḥ; samānayānāv iva viṣṇuvāsavau
GE07mbh_08_u:068.055a: tato dhanurjyātalaneminisvanaiḥ; prasahya kṛtvā ca ripūn hataprabhān
GE07mbh_08_u:068.055c: saṃsādhayitvaiva kurūñ śaraughaiḥ; kapidhvajaḥ pakṣivaradhvajaś ca
GE07mbh_08_u:068.055e: prasahya śaṅkhau dhamatuḥ sughoṣau; manāṃsy arīṇām avasādayantau
GE07mbh_08_u:068.056c: cucumbatuḥ śaṅkhavarau nṛṇāṃ varau; varānanābhyāṃ yugapac ca dadhmatuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.057c: pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃ ca dyām apaś cāpy apūrayat

GE07mbh_08_u:068.058c: vitrāsayantau tava putrasenāṃ; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ nandayataḥ sma vīrau
GE07mbh_08_u:068.059a: tataḥ prayātāḥ kuravo javena; śrutvaiva śaṅkhasvanam īryamāṇam
GE07mbh_08_u:068.059c: vihāya madrādhipatiṃ patiṃ ca; duryodhanaṃ bhārata bhāratānām
GE07mbh_08_u:068.060a: mahāhave taṃ bahu śobhamānaṃ; dhanaṃjayaṃ bhūtagaṇāḥ sametāḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.060c: tadānvamodanta janārdanaṃ ca; prabhākarāv abhyuditau yathaiva
GE07mbh_08_u:068.061a: samācitau karṇaśaraiḥ paraṃtapāv; ubhau vyabhātāṃ samare 'cyutārjunau
GE07mbh_08_u:068.061c: tamo nihatyābhyuditau yathāmalau; śaśāṅkasūryāv iva raśmimālinau
GE07mbh_08_u:068.062a: vihāya tān bāṇagaṇān athāgatau; suhṛdvṛtāv apratimānavikramau
GE07mbh_08_u:068.062c: sukhaṃ praviṣṭau śibiraṃ svam īśvarau; sadasyahūtāv iva vāsavācyutau
GE07mbh_08_u:068.063c: jayābhivṛddhyā parayābhipūjitau; nihatya karṇaṃ paramāhave tadā saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_08_u:068.063d-044_0002: vīkṣamāṇā diśaḥ sarvāḥ palāyante sma sarvataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.063d-044_0003: vīraṃ tu nihataṃ śrutvā śatrubhiḥ paramāhave
GE07mbh_08_u:068.063d-044_0005: tato 'vahāraṃ cakrus te rājan yodhāḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.063d-044_0007: teṣāṃ tu matam ājñāya putras te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_08_u:068.063d-044_0009: yodhair mahārathaiḥ sārdhaṃ vṛto bhārata tāvakaiḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.063d-044_0015: aśvatthāmā tataḥ śūro viniḥśvasya muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.063d-044_0021: chinnadhvajena śalyas tu rathena rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:068.063d-044_0026: kuravaḥ pradrutāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā karṇaṃ nipātitam

GE07mbh_08_u:068.063d-044_0030: nāsīt tatra pumān kaś cid yo yuddhāya mano dadhe
GE07mbh_08_u:068.063d-044_0032: jīviteṣv atha rājyeṣu dāreṣu ca dhaneṣu ca
GE07mbh_08_u:068.063d-044_0033: tān samānīya putras te yatnena mahatā vibho

GE07mbh_08_u:069.001a: tathā nipātite karṇe tava sainye ca vidrute

GE07mbh_08_u:069.002a: hato balabhidā vṛtras tvayā karṇo dhanaṃjaya

GE07mbh_08_u:069.005d-1198_01: vartamāne tu yuddhe vai tava karṇasya cobhayoḥ

GE07mbh_08_u:069.030a: saputraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā karṇaṃ rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_08_u:069.031a: adya rājāsmi govinda pṛthivyāṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha

GE07mbh_08_u:069.043d-1224_02: arjunasya jayaṃ yuddhe cintayānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
